story:
Meet Charge Boards.

Finally, Premium Electric Skateboards You Can Afford.

We have been closely watching the rapid growth of the electric skateboard industry and we identified a gap in the marketplace; premium boards at an affordable price.

That's where Charge Boards Fit In...

Quality and Support You Can Trust!

Every Charge Board is covered with a comprehensive 6-Month Warranty.

We will repair, replace or provide replacement parts for any manufacturer defects.

 

WE'VE GOT A BOARD FOR EVERYONE

Choose the one that's best for you!

FOR MAXIMUM PORTABILITY

KICK BOARD™

FUN, COMPACT, PORTABLE.

$195 Early Bird Price | $295 Backer Price | $395 MSRP

 

 

 

 

PERFECT RATIO OF WEIGHT AND RANGE

SHRED BOARD™

RESPONSIVE, VERSATILE, FUN.

$295 Early Bird Price | $395 Backer Price | $495 MSRP

 

 

 

MAXIMUM SPEED ON YOUR DAILY RIDE

STEALTH BOARD™

QUIET, FAST AND SMOOTH.

$395 Early Bird Price | $495 Backer Price | $595 MSRP

 

 

 

LOW COST ≠ LOW QUALITY

 

How are we able to keep pricing so low and still provide a premium product?

It's simple, first we utilize original equipment manufacturers (OEM) to supply our parts in bulk and provide assembly and initial quality control instead of building a new factory.

Second, we lower costs by eliminating fancy retail packaging and only selling direct to consumer, avoiding wholesale markups.

Finally, we rely on our backers and social networks to help build organic awareness for our brand.

 

Speaking of Organic Brand Awareness

Please help us keep our pricing low and run a successful campaign!

SHARE OUR CAMPAIGN USING THE LINKS BELOW

 

Frequently Asked Questions

 

How much is shipping?

We offer free US shipping.

International shipping depends on the country and will be calculated in the cart.

 

Do you ship Internationally?

Yes, we ship to the US, Canada, Europe, and Australia. 

Shipping costs will be charged during Indiegogo perk checkout.

Additional duties and taxes may apply upon delivery, we are not responsible for abandoned packages due to non-payment of duties/taxes by the receiver, if you refuse the package we will consider your order fulfilled and you will not be eligible for another shipment or any further action.

 

What features does the Charge Boards controller have?

Two Speed Modes - Beginner and Advanced

Reverse with Smart Activation

Regenerative and Active Braking

Soft-start for smooth acceleration off the line

Low Battery ramp to reduce voltage sag, and low battery braking enabled

The remote charges with the included micro-USB cable.

 

Can I take my board on an airplane?

Please check with your airline and provide the battery specs and watt-hours for clarification.

 

Are Charge Boards waterproof?

The safe answer here is no. While light rain and runoff may not pose a problem we do not advise riding through puddles or in heavy rain, it's just not safe in general.

 

If your question is not answered here, please reach out to us at sales@chargeboards.com and we'll add it to the list.
story_txt:
Meet Charge Boards.Finally, Premium Electric Skateboards You Can Afford.We have been closely watching the rapid growth of the electric skateboard industry and we identified a gap in the marketplace; premium boards at an affordable price.That's where Charge Boards Fit In...Quality and Support You Can Trust!Every Charge Board is covered with a comprehensive 6-Month Warranty.We will repair, replace or provide replacement parts for any manufacturer defects. WE'VE GOT A BOARD FOR EVERYONEChoose the one that's best for you!FOR MAXIMUM PORTABILITYKICK BOARD™FUN, COMPACT, PORTABLE.$195 Early Bird Price | $295 Backer Price | $395 MSRP 


 

 
 PERFECT RATIO OF WEIGHT AND RANGESHRED BOARD™RESPONSIVE, VERSATILE, FUN.$295 Early Bird Price | $395 Backer Price | $495 MSRP


 

 
 MAXIMUM SPEED ON YOUR DAILY RIDESTEALTH BOARD™QUIET, FAST AND SMOOTH.$395 Early Bird Price | $495 Backer Price | $595 MSRP


 

 
 LOW COST ≠ LOW QUALITY How are we able to keep pricing so low and still provide a premium product?It's simple, first we utilize original equipment manufacturers (OEM) to supply our parts in bulk and provide assembly and initial quality control instead of building a new factory.Second, we lower costs by eliminating fancy retail packaging and only selling direct to consumer, avoiding wholesale markups.Finally, we rely on our backers and social networks to help build organic awareness for our brand. Speaking of Organic Brand AwarenessPlease help us keep our pricing low and run a successful campaign!SHARE OUR CAMPAIGN USING THE LINKS BELOW Frequently Asked Questions How much is shipping?We offer free US shipping.International shipping depends on the country and will be calculated in the cart. Do you ship Internationally?Yes, we ship to the US, Canada, Europe, and Australia. Shipping costs will be charged during Indiegogo perk checkout.Additional duties and taxes may apply upon delivery, we are not responsible for abandoned packages due to non-payment of duties/taxes by the receiver, if you refuse the package we will consider your order fulfilled and you will not be eligible for another shipment or any further action. What features does the Charge Boards controller have?Two Speed Modes - Beginner and AdvancedReverse with Smart ActivationRegenerative and Active BrakingSoft-start for smooth acceleration off the lineLow Battery ramp to reduce voltage sag, and low battery braking enabledThe remote charges with the included micro-USB cable. Can I take my board on an airplane?Please check with your airline and provide the battery specs and watt-hours for clarification. Are Charge Boards waterproof?The safe answer here is no. While light rain and runoff may not pose a problem we do not advise riding through puddles or in heavy rain, it's just not safe in general. If your question is not answered here, please reach out to us at sales@chargeboards.com and we'll add it to the list.

story:
I am 29 year old graduate of Philosophy. A Nigerian, passionate about making our communities and world a better place.
I truly believe that "Lives of great men all remind us we can make our lives sublime; and departing, leave behind us footprints on the sand of time."
Despite my not sufficient experience in ICT, I saw a problem, joined forces with some more tech savvy friends, and together we are making the world a little bit safer. I really admire Bill Gates and the huge work he is doing towards changing the world positively, especially in Africa. Due to my background in Logic, I really have interests in solving problems in an ingenious and effective manner, and also in reading the biographies of people who have really impacted our world.

By making a donation and helping this car theft-deterrent system come alive, you could be saving lives. By giving your money and voice to this campaign, you will be preventing a car theft that could cost someone's life even before it happens. Many people use their cars as a means of livelihood, and when these cars are stolen from them they descend further into poverty. This is very unacceptable, and we are working hard to prevent this from continuing. So by giving your resources to this campaign, you are partnering with us to keep people out of poverty.

A demo of our website is already online at www.legitcar.ng

WHAT IS LEGITCAR?

LegitCar is a car theft deterrent system. Since most cars stolen from people either at gun-point, or cars just moved from parking lots, are resold to other people who do not know these cars are stolen, we are working hard to prevent this resale from happening. We sincerely believe that if we make it quite difficult for people who steal other people's cars to resell them, we will be putting them out of business with time.

WHAT ARE WE BUILDING AND WHY IS IT IMPORTANT?

Starting from Nigeria, we are building a database of all missing cars  and are enabling car buyers search the database to ensure that the cars that they are about to purchase are not listed as one. But if a match is made, they get to see the information of the original owner and get a cash reward if they help reunite the owner with the car. Thus, we aim to impact our world.

We are currently compiling the database of missing vehicles in Nigeria at the moment, but will expand to other West African countries as soon as we become fully operational in Nigeria. We are getting this data primarily from the Police, insurance companies, and from the victims themselves by having them register the details on our website.

Once we build  good database, we will charge a small amount not higher than $1 or $2 per search.

We already have some level of interest from insurance companies who are willing to work with us to reverse the losses incurred from claims paid on insured missing vehicles.

Though we are still at the demo stage, we already have people go to the site to register the details of their missing vehicles, and others make searches.

The demo is already online at www.legitcar.ng

By donating to this cause, you are doing the much you can to make our world a safer and better place. The whole world owes you a debt of gratitude.

HOW ARE WE GOING TO BE SPENDING YOUR MONEY?

We will be spending money on:

1. Logistics and traveling to the Police Headquarters in each of the 36 states of Nigeria to collate the list of missing vehicles and owners' details.

2. Since people will not use the website if they do not know about it, publicity is key to the success of what we are doing. This is where the bulk of the money will be going into: Social media ads, TV ads, Radio jingles, Fliers and banners, etc.

3. We are currently operating out of an office space given to us by someone who believes in the work we are doing to use on a temporary basis. So, we would be spending some part of the money on an office space that will confer the required legitimacy on what we are doing.

4. If we have additional funds left after these, we would purchase a used vehicle in good condition to make our movements in the city and out of it easier and faster. We will be as accountable as possible by giving an update quarterly on how we have spent money, and what we have achieved at the given time. You will also have the chance to make suggestions and recommendations, thereby having a say on how money is being utilised.

WHO ARE WE?

We are a team of programmers and web developers who were put together at the UN INFLUX HACKATHON in Lagos, Nigeria (Team LegitCar emerged as one of the three winning teams at the UN INFLUX HACKATHON, Lagos, capable of solving a real life problem), to continue work on this project which was already started by these founders:

1. Okeke Vincent Chukwuemeka

29 years Old

BA Philosophy

2. Ukpong Inimfon

27 years Old

B. Eng. Computer Engineering

3. Ogbujimma, Samuel Ikechukwu

28 years old

B. Eng Computer Engineering

THESE ARE SOME OF OUR ACTIVITIES IN PICTURES:

1. Team LegitCar working together at the UN INFLUX HACKATHON before the pitch in Lagos, Nigeria.

2. Team LegitCar during the pitch.

 

3. Some members of the LegitCar Team with an attendee impressed with our performance.

 

4. LegitCar was endorsed and featured on several Nigerian Newspapers by the Federal Ministry of Finance, as a business capable of solving a real-life problem. These Newspapers include: Sunday Vanguard, and Sunday Punch (Sunday, April 2, 2017); The Nation, Leadership, and Daily Trust Newspapers (Wednesday, April 5, 2017)

Please help us spread the world as we aim to make our communities, and our world safer, one LegitCar user at a time.

story:
About

We have been manufacturing custom electric bikes for a couple of years and this brought us to  the idea to make something different and unusual. We don't try to make something incredible, we just like things which have a good and attractive design, and we like to bring our ideas to life.

The ESnail  is much smaller than an ordinary bike, it's length is only 145cm.  and it's weight is just 18kg. It's easy to carry and it doesn't take up much space for storage. In the rear wheel we have integrated an 500w brushless hub motor with max power of 600w, it has enough powerful to climb uphill. The top speed of the ESnail is 30kmh. and in one charge it can go as far as up to 45km. In the frame, there is an integrated 36V 13Ah Li-ion Panasonic battery with more than 1000 recharge cycles, LCD display and thumb throttle, front V brakes, rear disk brakes. The ESnail has great looking lightning, powerful 8w front and rear LED lights and an amazing looking under frame light. Sometimes we get a question from different types of people - "why there is no pedals?" , but after their first ride they never ask us about it again. After their first ride, everyone comes back with a wide smile on their faces, and their first and main question is - I love it, can I go again?

You can choose whatever colour you want your ESnail to be!

Available colors are:

 White

 Yellow

 Blue

 Red

 Green

 Black

 

To recharge an empty battery with 2A charger will take up to 7 hours, and with 5A charger it will need less than 3 hours to charge. To fully recharge an empty battery will cost less than 0.1€! Battery life time is more than 1000 cycles, which is more than 30000km, and even if you recharge the battery more than 1000 cycles, you still can ride the ESnail, but just with reduced range by 20-30%. Battery can reach more than 2000 cycles overall, new replacement Panasonic battery price is 220€.

We have work experience of 5 years in designing and manufacturing the extraordinary ebikes, this experience had helped us to design and manufacture the ESnail. The biggest challenge was to accommodate all of the components to the small frame, but it has already been done. In pictures you see the first generation ESnail, next generation ESnail will have new improvements such as integrated in rear wheel brushless hub motor and LCD screen.

This campaign will help us to change peoples attitudes to the bikes, our mission is show the world that the extraordinary things can be useful and practical.

What you get ?

Ready to drive next generation unique design ESnail for low price.

The benefits

  • The Rebike is green pollution free vehicle,
  • You will get a lot of fun and attention when riding the ESnail,
  • You will get unforgettable experiences,
  • It is cheap to recharge,
  • Fast recharge ( 2A charger will take up to 7 hours, with 5A charger it will need less than 3 hours),
  • Battery lasts up to 50km!
  • It will make your journeys more pleasant and enjoyable,
  • It is light and storage friendly,
  • Brilliant for tourists or anyone else who wishes to explore any area by foot, where in this case by going on a ride with ESnail,
  • Suitable for all ages form 10 years old,
  • Attractive design for rent.

Frequently Asked Questions

Q: What is ESnail size, who can ride the ESnail ? 

   A: ESnail is designed for people from 10 years old and height from 120cm.

Q: Where is the battery, can I remove it or change it ? 

   A: Battery is integrated in the frame and you can not remove it or change it. The replacement of the battery must be performed by a specialist.

Q: How long does the ESnail battery last?

   A: The battery is built to last on average up to 50 km (30 mi). The battery takes around 6-7 hours charge with standart 2A charger or 2-3 hours with the added speed charger perk.  

Q: Can I still ride on ESnail if the battery runs out of power?

   A: Yes! You can ride it like a kick bike.

Q: How much does ESnail weigh?

   A: ESnail weighs approximately 18 kg.

Q: How is ESnail delivered and do i need to assemble it?

   A: ESnail comes delivered safely packed in a box and requires minimal assembly. However, if you don't have much experience, we recommend that you visit your local bike shop to assembly the ESnail.

Q: How much does shipping cost?

   A: Shipping within EU cost 160€. Worldwide shipping cost 330€.

Q: What kind of warranty do you offer?  

   A: All ESnail bikes are covered with a 1 year manufacturer's warranty. If some problems occurs just contact our customer support and we will take care of it. Some parts of a bike may get damaged due to normal driving use, we do not offer warranty on parts such as tires, disc brakes etc.

Q: What is your returns-policy ?

   A: We are sure that you will love your new ESnail. However, if you are not satisfied and decide to return ESnail, we offer you a 14 days money back guarantee after you have received it. The ESnail must be not used and in new condition.

Q: Where can I get spare parts ?

   A: The most components of the ESnail are standard, this means that you can get replacement parts from us or your local bike shop. The battery is custom built, however you can buy spare batteries from us at a price of 220€.

Q: Do i have to pay any additional taxes, duties or VAT?

   A: Within the EU you do not have to pay any taxes. For rest of the world please check your country's import duties before purchasing. The additional taxes will have to be payed by the buyer/backer.

story:
What is Dirty Billy?

Some of you know what I’ve been up to but for the rest; Here goes.

 

First and foremost - Dirty Billy is a community garage and co-working space that will be located in the Bushwick/Ridgewood area of NYC. A workshop and shared parking garage with a bit different concept than you may have seen. A secure environment but also a creative and inviting co-working garage designed and built for the adventurous and demanding NYC motorcyclist. Parking and wrenching on your motorcycle is a hassle in NYC to say the least. We want to be a part of the solution.

Dirty Billy will host not only full time spaces but also hourly lift and day rates. We’ll be able to do some projects for you if you like and one of the coolest aspects of the shop will be the learning platform that we’re developing. For those of you that are interested in learning how to maintain and customize your own ride we will have workshops to help you along the way. Think basic maintenance and changing your tires, to custom projects like building your cafe bike, tracker or vintage restoration.

 

Second is our look. This is where I think we step out from under the predisposed notion of a garage. For us motorcycles aren’t just transportation. They have seeped into our bloodstream. It’s what we do, think about and surround ourselves with every minute of our free time. Any way we can.

I see Dirty Billy as part gallery too. I love all of the moto centric art that’s out there but it’s scattered about and I want to bring it closer together in one space. A modular gallery to showcase the amazing artwork from in and around the motoring community will be in the space at all times. I thought, “What better place to have it then around a bunch of bikes, builds and all the people that would love to support the artists that document our obsession with these machines."

 

Third, and most important is our community, Dirty Billy will be a hub, a jump off point for our rider groups, organizing adventures and a non judgmental space. We have a few places that we gather now as riders in New York and we love them dearly. We are building Dirty Billy to add our name to that short list.

A space to learn, wrench, ride and get a little Dirty.

 

 

 

 

What We Need & What You Get

Being that we’ve decided to build a community garage.  What better way than to have it crowdfunded by the community that it serves. This really is your garage. This crowdfunding campaign is the test to see if there’s a place for Dirty Billy in the NYC riding community. I want to build it for us and I need you to let me know it should be done.

On to the fun stuff.

As well as the obvious pre-sale of full time spaces and hourly packages we've curated some early bird as well as other awesome perks and thank you gifts for your generous support in making Dirty Billy real. More will be released as we go along and most are limited to a finite number so, if something catches your eye, make sure you snag it up before it's gone! Keep checking the perks sidebar and we'll keep updating it. 

We’ll be sending out a bunch of updates to keep you posted on new stuff and an event that we’re planning too so if you have another minute (after you donate of course) head over to dirtybilly.com and sign up for the mailing list, like our facebook page, and follow along on instagram. Yell it from the rooftops!

 

A challenging task is before us. The goal has been set. 

So, on to the ask. There’s a limited number of discounted, early bird pre-sale spaces, lift hours to be booked, and if you look at the perks there’s some pretty cool stuff available to thank you for your support. It's time to click and lean into this. Let's get to work. 

Get involved in anyway you can. Get in touch with me (adam@dirtybilly.com) if you have any questions, resources or ideas you think will help. Like I said, this is our community’s garage, and it’s going to take all of you. You never know where the key to getting Dirty Billy off the ground will come from.

 

If you all tell a friend we double our chances of success. There's some share buttons right over there. Feel free to spread the word far and wide. 

Ride safe, ride fast; I'll see you out there. Thank you.

I want to build it for us and I need you to let me know it should be done.
On to the fun stuff.
As well as the obvious pre-sale of full time spaces and hourly packages we've curated some early bird as well as other awesome perks and thank you gifts for your generous support in making Dirty Billy real. More will be released as we go along and most are limited to a finite number so, if something catches your eye, make sure you snag it up before it's gone! Keep checking the perks sidebar and we'll keep updating it. 
We’ll be sending out a bunch of updates to keep you posted on new stuff and an event that we’re planning too so if you have another minute (after you donate of course) head over to dirtybilly.com and sign up for the mailing list, like our facebook page, and follow along on instagram. Yell it from the rooftops!


 
A challenging task is before us. The goal has been set. 
So, on to the ask. There’s a limited number of discounted, early bird pre-sale spaces, lift hours to be booked, and if you look at the perks there’s some pretty cool stuff available to thank you for your support. It's time to click and lean into this. Let's get to work. 
Get involved in anyway you can. Get in touch with me (adam@dirtybilly.com) if you have any questions, resources or ideas you think will help. Like I said, this is our community’s garage, and it’s going to take all of you. You never know where the key to getting Dirty Billy off the ground will come from.
 
If you all tell a friend we double our chances of success. There's some share buttons right over there. Feel free to spread the word far and wide. 
Ride safe, ride fast; I'll see you out there. Thank you.

story:
Why Diva

 

This project was born from the meeting of "Pro-Lite advanced composites technology" and "Giulio Paz Design". In ten years we have worked on many projects, mainly in the field of nautical and motorcycles competition. 
Most of all we share the passion for motorcycles and so we decided to converge our skills in this project.

We want push over this project, before to start production. To go further in this direction, going up in riding performance, safety and style.

This will be possible to do by extending the use of carbon fiber from the bodywork to the frame and swingarm and, where is useful, to all the structural parts. Through an innovative design in the motorcycle field. This will give a lighter overall weight, for the body and the for not suspended masses. Also a greater stiffness, where it's needed. 
With a better yield of all components.
Which will result in an exceptional riding precision, better braking, better acceleration, better cornering grip, super handling, and consequently an improved safety. 

 

Goals

We reach for 120.000 euros to Engineering of the new parts, Execution of the Structural calculations, Realization of  molds and parts, parts test. To get the new prototype and after go on with production of the bike and all the parts derived, like wheels and swingarm

If we will not reach our founding goal, we will still use the funds to invest in some of the components of this project.

 

Project description

First of all we rethink  the man-machine interface, crossing the classic schemes. The position is inspired by the first decades of last century's motorbike, and picking something from off-road saddle. And so we have a perfect match with legs, but without constrinctions. We get stability and freedom at the same time.

 

The main feature that distinguishes it is a feeling of flight and liberty, because of a free visual perspective and a free riding position.

 

The other advantage is the carbon fiber large use, extended to all structural parts, to get lightness and great reactivity, with strong benefits for all motorcyle dynamics. Even the style reflects this spirit. Something that stands out from the crowd, with an out of time look, Looking at the past to upset the balance of modern. 

 

Philosophy and Impact

Motorcycles riding it's a kind of meditation.  While driving your concentration must be at its best, you must stop the mind and think only of the road. A perfect man-machine connection will give you feelings of real bliss. We know the value of this and we want to build the perfect bike to achieve this purpose. A great maneuverability, a great grip, a great braking, the right delivery of power, the right driving position, will give you the opportunity to do this with great pleasure and with greater safety. our research is in this direction, in an innovative way.

                                           

If you share our passion and our idea, please add to the bakers and support us to complete development of the prototype and the aftermarket parts that will derive. Together with you, we can do something beautiful and also achieve important advances in motorcycle enjoying and riding safety. Thank you!

   

 If you support us, you can follow us in the development of the prototype and the testing phases, Until the final roadway.    

 

How to face the challenge

Our skills is in design,  carbon fiber processing, project managing, a great expertize in motorcycle, and also nautic and aeronautic.  We have an high profile network, great suppliers, and client like BMW, Honda, Benelli, Vyrus,  America's Cup teams and italian univertsities.     

We just have everything to get our purpose,  we need only money gasoline to make the "machine" work at best.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please share our campaign with friends and with everyone you think can help us.

story:
Truckerwall

We're ending the driver shortage by giving truck drivers much needed work-life balance.  

  • Truckerwall is a website where drivers select jobs that work for their schedule. Trucking companies use our Truckerwall Certified Drivers to deliver freights safely.
  • Truckerwall was built from experience. Gritty, real life, knowledge of the trucking industries' challenges. We know what it's like to be on the road for weeks at a time missing family and friends. 
  • Help Truckerwall give drivers work-life balance and help the economy truckin.' By contributing you support those who keep our grocery stores stocked, gas station tanks filled, and deliver all those goodies we order online. 

What We Need & What You Get

With your support, 25k will help Truckerwall insure and support its awesome drivers. 

  • The majority of funds go to insurance and safety precautions like Road Testing for Drivers. Road testing is standard hiring practice for Truckerwall. Every driver must pass by showing off their Class-A skills to be approved as a Truckerwall Certified Driver. (oooh, ahhh) 
  • Donate, feel the warm fuzzy feeling of helping others, and get sweet perks like:  
    • You're Famous! Your company or name displayed on our home page
    • Get tested! Pre-employment drug screening test courtesy of https://yellowcup.co
    • Swag! Truckerwall swag like Trucker Hats (of course) and limited edition stickers with our fresh new branding which goes live mid- March 2019

The Impact

By empowering drivers to build their own schedule we're ending the driver shortage. This means that stores get stocked and packages get delivered!

(Yes, packages include all the stuff you ordered online the other day.)  

  • You can help end the driver shortage and keep the economy moving. 
  • Your donation helps truckers have better lives, which is great karma.
  • We polled truck drivers and found the majority preferred more 'home time' over higher pay.  For more info on the driver shortage: http://bit.ly/tdshortage

Risks & Challenges

Every business has risks. To minimize ours, we're using our industry expertise, good old common sense, and critical thinking to ensure the future health of Truckerwall. 

  • We're raising funds to minimize incidents by throughly researching, insuring and supporting our drivers.
  • The majority of the funds go to insurance and safety precautions like background checks, drug screenings and road tests for drivers.  
  • Innovative marketing and growth strategies will propel Truckerwall into the forefront of the transportation industry and keep revenue flowing. 

Other Ways You Can Help 

Please Share our campaign with Friends, Family, Co-Workers, and your gaggle of Loyal Social Media followers! 

  • Thanks for reading this far! Your attention to detail is impressive. We still need your help even if you aren't able to donate! Please share our campaign with your personal fan club. 
  • Shared this campaign with a ton of people? Let us know at AdrianG@Truckerwall.com and we'll send you a perk as a token of our gratitude. :) 
  • We appreciate you supporting Truckerwall. You have our permission to enthusiatically  motion at truck drivers to honk.

story:
The Rideshare industry is fragmented, and needs to change!

The leading Transportation Network Companies (TNC) have lowered riders fares to unsustainable levels, while taking extremely high commission rates, anywhere between 20% to 28% per ride. When you factor in all cost to operate a vehicle, a driver is only making $0.06 to $0.07 per mile.

At Rhyd our team has over 10 years of commercial transportation, TNC, and Telematics  consulting and fleet management experience in the Bay Area.  When we came across these figures, we knew there is a need to build a platform to fix the exploitation of drivers pay. 

The success of the major TNC companies has been at the expense and financial livelihood of drivers, who are making below minimum wage. There is a growing need to fix this problem and to bring transparency and to inform riders, drivers, and government regulatory bodies of  the questionable and unethical strategies the major TNC practice with no regards to social welfare and sustainablility.

With your support, we can build a rideshare platform that is fair for everyone, not just for a handfull of investors. At Rhyd we have only one mission, and that is to ask you to Rethink How You are Driven. 

You can learn about the Rhyd team, and find informative articles about the Rideshare industry at www.rhyd.co

The Rhyd Platform can be a success with your support

We can change this industry, but we can't do it alone. It will take the support of both riders and drivers that would like to see true change happen. Our goal at this stage in our campaign is to validate the market for future investors, finalize our patent, technical drawings, and documents of incorporation.  

Our Goal!

We are looking to only raise $3000 to validate the market for future investors, cover our patent & lawyer fees, technical drawings, and articles of incorporation. Any additional contributions will go to the further development of the Rhyd platform. 

Let's Rhyd! Here are some great perks for your support.

To show our appreciation to our contributors we have some great perks:

1. $1 Rhyd Tip!  It's easy to do, and helps the cause build traction.

2. $5 Let's Rhyd!. It's a great start, and we are very grateful for your contribution.

3. $10 Your Name on our Contributors Wall.  All contributors that select this perk will be forever immortalized on our contributors page of the Rhyd website as our thanks to you.

4. $25 A Rhyd Founding Contributors T-Shirt. As a contributor for this perk you will get an exclusive Rhyd Silkscreen T-Shirt in both Men's or Women's sizes. The shirt showcases the Rhyd app icon logo. Wear it with pride in knowing that you are founding contributor that is helping to change the Rideshare industry. In addition, you will also be thanked on our "Contributing Founders Wall."

 

5. $35 Limited Edition Black T-Shirt. With this contribution, you will receive a limited edition black version of our Rhyd Silkscreen T-Shirt in both men's or women's sizes.  In addition, you will also be thanked on our "Contributing Founders Wall."

 

 

6. $100 Meet the Team Bundle.  With this perk, you will receive your choice of either the "White" Rhyd Silkscreen or "Black" limited edition Rhyd Silkscreen T-shirt. A chance to join a live WebEx where you can meet the founders, hear about our vision, and participate in a Q&A session. (30)

7. $300 Designers Bundle. With this perk, our contributors will receive perks 3 & 5 (Choice of shirt style), with the added option of being able to offer the Rhyd team your insight on features to be included on the Rhyd Platform. (10)

8. $500 Designers Recognition Bundle. You will receive perks 3 & 5, along with recognition on your LinkedIn account as a designing contributor. Get the commercial recognition and know you will be helping a startup fix the fragmented Rideshare industry. (6)

The Impact

A Driver Focused Rideshare platform will revolutionize the industry for decades to come:

  • Drivers can finally make a sustainable living while allowing riders an option to support a platform with a mission of corporate social  responsibility and social welfare

 

  • The Rhyd team has over 10 years of TNC, Commercial Transportation, Telematics, and Fleet management experience. We have seen the pitfalls of how other TNC's operate and know how to fix this industry so it's sustainable and fair for everyone, not just corporate interests.

 

  • Our model will be the stepping stones for future products and services that will increase drivers pay and vastly change riders experience. Rhyd is just at the beginning, but with your support, we will be rolling out services that have not been done yet in the rideshare industry.

Risks & Challenges

There will be hurdles in our mission, but we know that if drivers and riders support our cause we can make a impact that will be a turning point in the Rideshare industry.

  • Dealing with heavily funded competition will be a challenge, but our belief is simple. Pay drivers a liveable and sustainable wage and watch their loyalty grow with Rhyd and away from the competition. 
  • Rider adoption will be another factor. At Rhyd we know that it will be a challenge to get the word out, so our plan is to solely concentrate on drivers wellbeing and pay. If there are no drivers on the other platforms, riders will likely download the app with the most drivers and least wait-time.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, which is perfectly fine. Here are other ways to help:

  • Share and join our Twitter & Facebook groups, please feel free to leave a written or video comment about how you feel the rideshare industry needs to change and why Rhyd is needed for that change
  • https://twitter.com/rhydapp
  • https://facebook.com/rhydapp

And that's all there is to it.

Risks & Challenges
There will be hurdles in our mission, but we know that if drivers and riders support our cause we can make a impact that will be a turning point in the Rideshare industry.

Dealing with heavily funded competition will be a challenge, but our belief is simple. Pay drivers a liveable and sustainable wage and watch their loyalty grow with Rhyd and away from the competition. 
Rider adoption will be another factor. At Rhyd we know that it will be a challenge to get the word out, so our plan is to solely concentrate on drivers wellbeing and pay. If there are no drivers on the other platforms, riders will likely download the app with the most drivers and least wait-time.


Other Ways You Can Help
Some people just can't contribute, which is perfectly fine. Here are other ways to help:

Share and join our Twitter & Facebook groups, please feel free to leave a written or video comment about how you feel the rideshare industry needs to change and why Rhyd is needed for that change
https://twitter.com/rhydapp
https://facebook.com/rhydapp

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Short Summary

Welcome to the official page of Marlin1 project. My name is Viktor Polyakov. I’m the author of Marlin1. As long as I remember, I’ve always been inventing and constructing something. Industrial design is my passion. I’ve always dreamed of creating something brand new in cycling which also could offer new options for outdoor family activities. It took me long to design a technologically and esthetically perfect vehicle from scratch, to design and adjust it. I'm not the first who try to promote such idea but my project is unique in its own way. The patent for Marlin1 hydrobike proves it.

We created Marlin1 hydrobike for all cycling lovers and those who can't imagine their life without exercise. Marlin1 is a pedal-powered bike designed for peddling on water with the rotational force transmitted to the propeller blade. Marlin1 is easy to handle, user-friendly and looks cool. The hydrobike is a small floating craft and an additional bike gadget. Marlin1 is primarily made for water cycling and other water activities.

Now the project is at the concept stage. We have designed a computer prototype of the hydrobike, including the models and 3D visualizations, worked on obtaining patent protection and on getting all papers ready for the launch of our product. The team is ready too. All is set to start the Marlin1 prototype production. All we need is to raise USD 38,000. I count on you! 

What We Need 

Now the project is at the concept stage. We have designed a computer prototype of the hydrobike, including the models and 3D visualizations, worked on obtaining patent protection and on getting all papers ready for the launch of our product. The team is ready too. All is set to start the Marlin1 prototype production. All we need is to raise USD 38,000.

Our financial estimates show that we need USD 17,500 (45%) to produce the prototype of Marlin1:

Production of reusable carbon fiber console matrices: USD 5,500. This amount is sufficient to produce 120 catamaran consoles;

Milling operations needed for the production of the catamaran frames are conducted by our contractor and the production of units and mounts required for the assembly of the consoles, the drive train, gears, screws and the bike itself: USD 4,000;

Design of the drive train, the transmission and the handlebar control: USD 4,500;

Purchase of expendables (carbon fiber, wood, aluminum tubes, loops, clamps, gears, screws, mounts, etc): USD 3,500;

Other expenses are to fulfill all of our obligations to our backers (37%), pay taxes and fees (18%).

The Impact

Despite the fact that many authors tried to design similar vehicles before us we started from scratch and created a technologically and esthetically perfect vehicle. It took us a lot of time to adjust the idea, come up with the design and get in touch with potential producers of necessary component parts. In 2016 the hydro bike Marlin1 and its folding design were patented as a utility model primarily made for water cycling and other water activities. We worked hard on getting the project ready for launch making some adjustments in computer design sketches and model drafts. In early 2017 we built a project team and estimated the requirements for the production site. Today the appropriate project documents are ready and calculations are done. The project is ready for launch.

After submitting our project to Indiegogo we’ll conclude contracts for the delivery of the required component parts and materials. We’ll produce float matrices and floats, as well as other parts that we can manufacture using our own productive capacity.

About Team. Grigorijus Selibovskis is responsibe for technical issues and logistics. Sergejus Prokopjevas is responsible for marketing and business process management. Maksim Matveev deals with administrative issues. He has been successfully realizing different business projects since 2010. Among his most significant achievements are car insurance, financial agency service supermarket and public catering projects.

Timeline

After submitting our project to Indiegogo we’ll conclude contracts for the delivery of the required component parts and materials. We’ll produce float matrices and floats, as well as other parts that we can manufacture using our own productive capacity.

September-October 2018

We’ll start sending rewards to our backers. After receiving all the necessary component parts from our partners, we’ll proceed on with the assembly of an experimental model and the trial tests. The creation of the prototype will allow us to run tests, make any necessary adjustments to the designs and eliminate any inaccuracies. Our participation in exhibitions related to sports, active leisure, bicycles, automobiles and yachts will help us in taking orders and start the mass production of the hydrobike, making it available to a wide range of cycling lovers. It’ll take us four months to produce the first sample.

October-November 2018

We’ll finish sending rewards to our backers. The final assembly of the prototype will be done upon the completion of all tests and adjustments. Tests will be run on the lake. A place will also be set for small-scale production.

November-December 2018

We’ll produce the first commercial batch of 15 to 25 hydrobikes. We will start work on reducing the manufacturing costs and on creating Marlin2.

December 2018

We’ll focus on developing the prototypes of accessories taking into consideration our sponsors’ feedback and suggestions. Our products will be certified. We’ll produce the first Marlin 1 hydrobikes and then set up their mass production.

Perks

As the purpose of the Marlin1 project at this stage is to create a prototype and not to establish serial production, we decided to offer you useful things related to cycling and outdoor activities as perks. All the proposed perks are produced by our partners, local manufacturers, and are of limited series.

Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)

How much money do you need to produce the prototype of the hydrobike Marlin1?

The feasibility study report indicates that the production of three items Is sufficient in the initial stage. The estimated sum of production is USD 38,000.

What further steps will you take after raising the required funds via the crowdfunding platform to produce first three hydrobikes?

We’ll use one of the samples to continue testing and adjusting the hydrobike design, and we intend to demonstrate the other two at various international exhibitions.

What are your financial estimates based on?

Our team worked out a detailed financial plan for the hydrobike sample production based on our successful experience in the realization of similar projects. We made a precise calculation of the price of the first hydrobike and preliminary arrangements for the delivery of materials and component parts. We formed a professional team too.

How long will it take you to produce the prototype?

It will take us from 4 to 6 months to produce the first three hydrobikes.

How would you describe your vehicle in one sentence?

Marlin1 is a high-tech hydrobike made for water sports and active outdoor activities.

Have you patented your invention?

Yes, by all means. The project’s legal protection matters a lot to us. In 2016 the Marlin1 hydrobike and its folding design were patented as a utility model. The two-seater hydrobike brings a variety of water activities to all cycling lovers and can be used as an independent floating craft.

Where is your production site located?

The production site and other facilities related to our project are located in Kaunas, Lithuania.

How would you define your vehicle?

Basically the Marlin1 hydrobike is a latest high-tech product. This pedal-powered bike is designed for peddling on water with the rotational force transmitted to the propeller blade.

How safe and compact is your vehicle during transportation?

Marlin1 hydrobike is very user-friendly and safe. You can easily fold and transport it on top of your car. When folded the hydrobike is almost halved and can be easily attached to the car roof box.

What materials do you intend to use in your hydrobike manufacturing?

We’ll use only high-quality materials such as carbon fiber and aluminum.

How many people can the Marlin1 hydrobike hold?

Marlin1 can be used as a swimming platform with a carrying capacity of two or fewer occupants.

Does your production plan include the production of supplementary hydro bike accessories?

Our intention is to raise enough money through crowdfunding to produce three samples of the hydrobike. If the project proves to be a success, we plan to launch the production of accessories, such as railings for transportation of the hydrobike on top of the car, storage and transportation bags, hydrobike transportation carts, gadget mounts and much more.

What objectives does your project pursue?

Our initial goal was to organize production of the first three samples. Upon successful completion of tests, we plan to go into large-scale production of the hydrobikes.

What is a planned in-store price for the hydrobike?

Its retail price is planned to be USD 5,700.

Do you plan to change the store price in the future?

Yes, certainly. The current premium model will consist of expensive materials and therefore costs USD 5,700. For 2-3 years of production, the team will work to create more affordable models and reduce the cost of the gadget.
story_txt:
Short Summary

Welcome to the official page of Marlin1 project. My name is Viktor Polyakov. I’m the author of Marlin1. As long as I remember, I’ve always been inventing and constructing something. Industrial design is my passion. I’ve always dreamed of creating something brand new in cycling which also could offer new options for outdoor family activities. It took me long to design a technologically and esthetically perfect vehicle from scratch, to design and adjust it. I'm not the first who try to promote such idea but my project is unique in its own way. The patent for Marlin1 hydrobike proves it.

We created Marlin1 hydrobike for all cycling lovers and those who can't imagine their life without exercise. Marlin1 is a pedal-powered bike designed for peddling on water with the rotational force transmitted to the propeller blade. Marlin1 is easy to handle, user-friendly and looks cool. The hydrobike is a small floating craft and an additional bike gadget. Marlin1 is primarily made for water cycling and other water activities.
Now the project is at the concept stage. We have designed a computer prototype of the hydrobike, including the models and 3D visualizations, worked on obtaining patent protection and on getting all papers ready for the launch of our product. The team is ready too. All is set to start the Marlin1 prototype production. All we need is to raise USD 38,000. I count on you! 


What We Need 
Now the project is at the concept stage. We have designed a computer prototype of the hydrobike, including the models and 3D visualizations, worked on obtaining patent protection and on getting all papers ready for the launch of our product. The team is ready too. All is set to start the Marlin1 prototype production. All we need is to raise USD 38,000.

Our financial estimates show that we need USD 17,500 (45%) to produce the prototype of Marlin1:
Production of reusable carbon fiber console matrices: USD 5,500. This amount is sufficient to produce 120 catamaran consoles;
Milling operations needed for the production of the catamaran frames are conducted by our contractor and the production of units and mounts required for the assembly of the consoles, the drive train, gears, screws and the bike itself: USD 4,000;
Design of the drive train, the transmission and the handlebar control: USD 4,500;
Purchase of expendables (carbon fiber, wood, aluminum tubes, loops, clamps, gears, screws, mounts, etc): USD 3,500;
Other expenses are to fulfill all of our obligations to our backers (37%), pay taxes and fees (18%).

The Impact

Despite the fact that many authors tried to design similar vehicles before us we started from scratch and created a technologically and esthetically perfect vehicle. It took us a lot of time to adjust the idea, come up with the design and get in touch with potential producers of necessary component parts. In 2016 the hydro bike Marlin1 and its folding design were patented as a utility model primarily made for water cycling and other water activities. We worked hard on getting the project ready for launch making some adjustments in computer design sketches and model drafts. In early 2017 we built a project team and estimated the requirements for the production site. Today the appropriate project documents are ready and calculations are done. The project is ready for launch.
After submitting our project to Indiegogo we’ll conclude contracts for the delivery of the required component parts and materials. We’ll produce float matrices and floats, as well as other parts that we can manufacture using our own productive capacity.
About Team. Grigorijus Selibovskis is responsibe for technical issues and logistics. Sergejus Prokopjevas is responsible for marketing and business process management. Maksim Matveev deals with administrative issues. He has been successfully realizing different business projects since 2010. Among his most significant achievements are car insurance, financial agency service supermarket and public catering projects.


Timeline
After submitting our project to Indiegogo we’ll conclude contracts for the delivery of the required component parts and materials. We’ll produce float matrices and floats, as well as other parts that we can manufacture using our own productive capacity.

September-October 2018
We’ll start sending rewards to our backers. After receiving all the necessary component parts from our partners, we’ll proceed on with the assembly of an experimental model and the trial tests. The creation of the prototype will allow us to run tests, make any necessary adjustments to the designs and eliminate any inaccuracies. Our participation in exhibitions related to sports, active leisure, bicycles, automobiles and yachts will help us in taking orders and start the mass production of the hydrobike, making it available to a wide range of cycling lovers. It’ll take us four months to produce the first sample.
October-November 2018
We’ll finish sending rewards to our backers. The final assembly of the prototype will be done upon the completion of all tests and adjustments. Tests will be run on the lake. A place will also be set for small-scale production.
November-December 2018
We’ll produce the first commercial batch of 15 to 25 hydrobikes. We will start work on reducing the manufacturing costs and on creating Marlin2.
December 2018
We’ll focus on developing the prototypes of accessories taking into consideration our sponsors’ feedback and suggestions. Our products will be certified. We’ll produce the first Marlin 1 hydrobikes and then set up their mass production.

Perks
As the purpose of the Marlin1 project at this stage is to create a prototype and not to establish serial production, we decided to offer you useful things related to cycling and outdoor activities as perks. All the proposed perks are produced by our partners, local manufacturers, and are of limited series.

Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)
How much money do you need to produce the prototype of the hydrobike Marlin1?
The feasibility study report indicates that the production of three items Is sufficient in the initial stage. The estimated sum of production is USD 38,000.

What further steps will you take after raising the required funds via the crowdfunding platform to produce first three hydrobikes?
We’ll use one of the samples to continue testing and adjusting the hydrobike design, and we intend to demonstrate the other two at various international exhibitions.
What are your financial estimates based on?
Our team worked out a detailed financial plan for the hydrobike sample production based on our successful experience in the realization of similar projects. We made a precise calculation of the price of the first hydrobike and preliminary arrangements for the delivery of materials and component parts. We formed a professional team too.
How long will it take you to produce the prototype?
It will take us from 4 to 6 months to produce the first three hydrobikes.
How would you describe your vehicle in one sentence?
Marlin1 is a high-tech hydrobike made for water sports and active outdoor activities.

Yes, by all means. The project’s legal protection matters a lot to us. In 2016 the Marlin1 hydrobike and its folding design were patented as a utility model. The two-seater hydrobike brings a variety of water activities to all cycling lovers and can be used as an independent floating craft.

The production site and other facilities related to our project are located in Kaunas, Lithuania.
How would you define your vehicle?
Basically the Marlin1 hydrobike is a latest high-tech product. This pedal-powered bike is designed for peddling on water with the rotational force transmitted to the propeller blade.
How safe and compact is your vehicle during transportation?
Marlin1 hydrobike is very user-friendly and safe. You can easily fold and transport it on top of your car. When folded the hydrobike is almost halved and can be easily attached to the car roof box.
What materials do you intend to use in your hydrobike manufacturing?
We’ll use only high-quality materials such as carbon fiber and aluminum.
How many people can the Marlin1 hydrobike hold?
Marlin1 can be used as a swimming platform with a carrying capacity of two or fewer occupants.
Does your production plan include the production of supplementary hydro bike accessories?
Our intention is to raise enough money through crowdfunding to produce three samples of the hydrobike. If the project proves to be a success, we plan to launch the production of accessories, such as railings for transportation of the hydrobike on top of the car, storage and transportation bags, hydrobike transportation carts, gadget mounts and much more.
What objectives does your project pursue?

Its retail price is planned to be USD 5,700.
Do you plan to change the store price in the future?
Yes, certainly. The current premium model will consist of expensive materials and therefore costs USD 5,700. For 2-3 years of production, the team will work to create more affordable models and reduce the cost of the gadget.

story:
"Know & Go"

We all know the frustration. You're behind the wheel  when the check engine light comes on. It never happens at a "good time," if such a thing exists. Now you're left with the dilemma of whether it's safe to continue driving or call a tow truck.

The idea for Maurer's Minute Mechanic came to Martin Maurer as a God moment after seeing a young lady struggling with the cost of having her car's diagnostics run at an auto repair shop. The cost was staggering. And that was before the work was even done.

Maurer's Minute Mechanic skips the high cost of having your car's mechanical issues diagnosed with the invention of simple to use kiosks located at state rest stops, gas stations and convenience stores. Within minutes, a simple plug 'n see system reveals whatever is causing any number of your car's warning lights to glow. And instead of waiting for a tow truck and a repair shop diagnostic with an expensive bill, $8 gets you a simple to understand summary so you can decide what to do next.

 Maurer's Minute Mechanic is a patented, technology in prototype stage that will make vehicle diagnostics as easy as pulling up to put air in your tire.

What We Need & What You Get

We have gas stations and convenience store chains interested in placing Maurer's Minute Mechanic kiosks at their locations which makes them easy to find, or as we like to say, "right down the street." What we need from you is the funding to move to the next level of development. 

  • Our initial investors have brought us to this point enabling us to develop a prototype machine with the basics. We need funding to pay our software developers and metal experts who build our kiosks.
  • We are a small team of experts who have literally left our careers in the automotive  industry to bring Maurer's Minute Mechanic to the public because we know there is an immediate need for it.
  • As an early contributor, you will receive a limited edition Care Card good for two diagnostic services. What a wonderful gift for a loved one to keep in their car.
  • We are also offering a higher level of investment which includes your name placed on our diagnostic kiosks honoring you as a founding member of the Maurer's Minute Mechanic family.
  • We are too far along to consider not completing our goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • They say there aren't any new ideas, but we have expanded on something the average person doesn't have control over. When you put you car in the repair shop, you trust them to accurately find and fix the problem. Maurer's Minute Mechanic allows you to already know the problem and potentially avoid the high diagnostic fee and or someone trying to upsell you on unnecessary parts and repairs. 
  • The convenience of having our kiosks located at the places you already go and available 24/7.
  • If you can plug in a cell phone, you can use our kiosk!

Risks & Challenges

We have spent considerable time and money and have trusted investors who got on board early with our idea. This is your opportunity to join us as the proverbial train leaves the station. We expect Maurer's Minute Mechanic to become as mainstream as the vacuum and air kiosk you find at most gas stations and convenient stores.

Other Ways You Can Help

We are making it easy to become part of the Maurer's Minute Mechanic family by offering contributor perks that will become peace of mind for you. 

Think we have a great idea? Tell others. Please share our campaign with friends and family. A

story:
Born on the trails of Whistler, BC, the A-Ride eScooter by Alpine Riding is ready to take on any season and any terrain. 

Its dual suspension, powerful motors, and robust design make for an adrenaline-packed, fast, safe, and controlled ride over anything — making it the ultimate joy ride and versatile year round commuter!

The 1000W geared hub motor provides superior torque and performance with incredible speeds. It’s so powerful, we had to limit the top speed to 20mph to maintain U.S. safety standards.
(Max speed can be easily  set up in the display to follow local's regulations or for Off-Road use)

A-Ride climbs 30% grades with ease and boasts a 50-mile range. Best of all, the all-season, all-terrain design can take on asphalt, snow, sand, and the roughest trails with ease.

The dual-suspension design, 24” all-terrain fat tires, and powerful 6061 aluminum frame lets A-Ride take on any terrain you throw at it. 

Ride it downtown, ride it down a mountain, grip over snow and ice, tear through sand, rip through gravel, tackle boulders, and even take on jumps. A-Ride will handle it all without a hiccup. 

Get an incredible low center of gravity with A-Ride’s unique engineering and design. Grip each turn, hug every curve, speed through switches, handle like a pro, and take your riding experience to the next level. 

Easy To Ride For All Skill Levels!
We made A-Ride safer. Unlike other eScooters and bikes, A-Ride distributes your weight equally throughout the frame — making it more stable and easier to balance, so you can ride harder. 


An extra wide platform lets you stand comfortably in a natural stance for even more stability and safety, while decreasing fatigue. 

Rip through trails and roads without sacrificing your safety. Enjoy a more comfortable, safer ride even as you tackle more difficult terrain.

Perfect for everyone, grandma can grab her groceries and riders can have fun on Off-Road terrain and improve their skills.

We didn’t hold back on A-Ride. From the motor and frame to the brakes, shocks, and accessories, we completely decked A-Ride out to give you the ultimate, seamless riding experience.

From the snow-ladened trails in Whistler to the asphalt alleys downtown, A-Ride will give you an exhilarating thrill ride like never before. 

Experience the rush of adrenaline as you lean through a turn, punch through at full speed, and tear through dirt, mud, snow, sand, and everything in between. 



 

Cut Down on Pollution in your Daily Life, WITHOUT Sacrificing Convenience (Oh, and then there’s the FUN factor=)

Getting out in the fresh air and sunshine is a lot more fun than sitting in a cramped car. And riding an A-Ride makes finding a parking spot or avoiding traffic way easier. Either way, it adds up to a big win for the environment. We know you’ll start driving less! From grocery shopping to commuting, taking the kids to school to going out for dinner - there are so many ways A-Ride can help you to cut down on your carbon footprint. 
 

We at Alpine Riding created the A-Ride to offer the possibility and joy to everybody to ride on two wheels safely on and off the road.

Following Audric Lacour’s design and vision and engineered by a former Apple product engineer, we developed a sleek and reliable E-Scooter utilizing Audric’s 16 years of expertise and development in the scooter industry.

Whether you’re commuting or exploring your backyard’s trails, A-Ride will give you a fun and comfortable ride!

Our goal was to create an eScooter that can shred trails and be great for commuting.

Go grocery shopping with it, take your kids to school using the kid handlebars, have a blast coasting through town or through mountains. The possibilities are endless!

We want to show the world that we don’t need pedals to have fun and stay safe on two wheels. We’ve created another way to ride and are bringing it to you today.

Safety and fun don’t need to be exclusive. With A-Ride, they can come together. We want to promote this, which is why we are encouraging all riders to wear a fastened helmet while riding.

We’ve been through plenty of bike shows, and everyone agrees — as soon as you hop on A-Ride, you will fall in love with it.

We dare you not to smile while riding it.

story:
Road bikes are known to be the fastest bicycles. The bike of choice for the Tour de France, road bikes are the quickest way to get from A to B, as they're built for speed! It takes much less work to travel at adequate speeds and creates a much smoother ride for the rider on regular roads and flat terrain. They are designed to be the fastest, most efficient, aerodynamic, stiffest, and lightest weight bike available - meaning they're ideal for sport and also very easy to maneuver.

 

The perfect road bike with electric support! An e-road bike has all the fitness benefits of a traditional road bike, designed to minimize drag and maximize leg speed when you exercise or compete with friends. Plus the added advantage of electric assistance to help power you uphill on a sprint or support your daily commute. 

 

Life can have a habit of taking over, without long sustained periods of dedicated training, it can often be hard to keep up with your team. The C30 e-road bike provides you with support when and wherever you need it most. Its powerful motor and smart power adjustment can assist you to quickly increase speed up to 25km/h, helping to solve the most difficult starting and climbing issues, while giving you the strength to ride further and get closer to your training partners.

 

Road bikes are designed to ride as fast as possible. Professional Tour de France riders can generally maintain cruising speeds of 35-40 km/h. However, the average person can only maintain cruising speeds of 16-19 km/h. It will take years of intense training to get closer to a professional rider. To reach high speeds, professional bikes are made of expensive carbon fiber materials to reduce weight, but they are expensive and easier to damage.

 

 

Now, the HIMO C30 changes all of this forever, enabling you to reach the speeds of a professional rider, with optimal comfort, advanced technology, and aerodynamic riding position.

 

 

In addition to its intelligent, modern electric-assist system, the C30s is at its core a Road Bike designed for a professional riding experience:

 

Shanghai HIMO Electric Technology specializes in the research, development and production of two-wheeled electric vehicles. We strive to provide the best comprehensive digital solutions for green, urban mobility. Our aim is to provide people with smart and convenient ways of getting around, all while having more fun!

 

 

With a rise in consumers needs, HIMO has been at the forefront of leading the vast tech and digital solutions, allowing us to create limitless opportunities. We’re committed to setting the trend in smart, eco-friendly vehicles, and being the leading brand in the two-wheeler industry.

We know how to offer premium electric vehicles that are cutting-edge and user-friendly. This is proved by both the excellent results of our clients and the numerous awards we've received including the German Reddot 2019 Award (HIMO H1), and the German Reddot 2021 Award (HIMO C30s)!

In order to improve the service efficiency of HIMO, HIMO established a European operation center in Bruchsal, Germany in 2020. The center is responsible for European delivery, return and exchange, after-sales, trail riding, and other services.

US center is still building up, and soon it will provide these services.

We already begin first batch production, and will be ready to ship in the end of July.

The center is responsible for European delivery, return and exchange, after-sales, trail riding, and other services.US center is still building up, and soon it will provide these services.We already begin first batch production, and will be ready to ship in the end of July.

story:
Thank you to everyone who participated in this successful campaign!

 

For more info on our bikes post-crowdfunding, head to www.Beachman.ca

If you can't find what you're looking for on the site, send an email to info@beachman.ca with your questions.

Cheers!

Ben Taylor, CEO & Co-Founder

Beachman

 

 

 

 

 

 

No matter where you ride, the Beachman '64 is ready for any escape. Inspired by the classic 60s and 70s era in Malibu, the Beachman ‘64 E-bike is timeless.

 


Shipping costs based on destination / carrier, determined post-campaign.

 

The Tee

Simple, comfy, 70's style pocket tee featuring original artwork by French surf collage artist Yoann Fournier done for Beachman's summer collection. Featuring a 35mm film capture of an actual beachman at an actual beach, doing a whole lot of relaxing.

From Santa Monica to Monaco, you’ll find no e-bike like this.

Here's a look at each color option in its natural habitat.

Check out this video from the founders telling the story of the bike, how the company came to be, and what to expect from the Indiegogo campaign:

 

 

 

 

 

 

The Beachman idea came to fruition in 2016 to stand for the best things in life - enjoying afternoons by the water, weekends on the road, and the glory days of 1960’s industrial design. We wanted to build incredible things that make those moments even better.

Our two founders Ben Taylor and Steve Payne encountered each other in 2019, and instantly connected. Ben, having the idea for an electric cafe racer & Steve, the mechanic who could bring that dream to life, knew this was the perfect match.

A year later, Steve finished building our first prototype - a modified 1979 Kawasaki KZ200 dubbed “Bike Zero”. Using this as inspiration, we designed our first bike using standard motorcycle & E-bike parts. Two weeks after we opened the first shipment, all 30 bikes of the Founders Edition E-Bike had been sold.

We've been working day and night to build Beachman into the company we’ve dreamed of. From road trips across Canada to get that perfect shot, to hand building our own retail store in the West End of Toronto. With the ‘64, we hope to build the greatest E-bike the world has ever seen. 

There's much more to come from Beachman, from apparel and outdoors, to home, and to the beach. We're excited to embark on this journey and we're glad you're along for the ride.

 

See you down the road.

 

The Beachman Retail Store at 2879 Dundas West in Toronto, Canada

Ben Taylor - Co-Founder, CEO

Ben grew up in the west end of Toronto, Ontario. After moving to Vancouver at 18 to attend Film School, he fell in love with the west coast and there fostered a love for design, adventure, and everything retro. While working in the film & TV industry in Vancouver for some years, Ben created the Beachman Instagram page as a personal creative outlet and a mood board for his dream company. 6 years later, back in Toronto and teamed up with Steve, Ben is working to bring Beachman across North America and eventually to the world with the goal of reviving the best designs of the past with modern technology and materials.

Ben's next dream Beachman product? "The Parachute is always at the top of the list. I want people to be able to walk into our store and walk out a little closer to James Bond."

 

Steve Payne - Co-Founder, COO, Head of Motorcycle Design

Steve grew up in St. Johns, Newfoundland. In his teenage years while on a road trip out west, Steve joined up with some friends to do an epic motorcycle road trip from Vancouver to Sturgis and all the way to the East coast only a day after getting his Motorcycle license. From that day on a deep love of bikes was fostered, and Steve continued to work on bikes and get a formal education in motorcycle mechanics. After working as a professional sound engineer for the Film & TV Industry for many years and building bikes and electric Volkswagens on the side, Steve has teamed up with Ben to bring his motorcycles to the world. 

Steve's next dream Beachman product? "An electric car concept that uses hub motors to power all 4 wheels and a modular design system like the Dune Buggy/Beetle of the '70s that could be a Baja dune blaster, dragster, or city runner."

 

Here's an inside look at our earliest drawings and 3D renders from 2018-2020

The original concept featured an inline mid-drive motor, as hub drives were still considered inferior 3 years ago when we began development. Things have changed dramatically since.

 

Other early designs featured a leather bag in the frame opening. This accessory will surely make a comeback down the road...

 

3D Renderings we used to plan out the structure and style before building the first bike, Zero.

 

Zero hanging out in its natural habitat.

 

Will the Bladerunner style LED strips make a comeback? Who knows...

 

Marketing and Design by Agency 2.0, the #1 Crowdfunding and Product Launch Company since 2010.

 

 

Pre-launch marketing built by Coming Soon, a prelaunch marketplace for new tech products and gear.

3D Renderings we used to plan out the structure and style before building the first bike, Zero.

Will the Bladerunner style LED strips make a comeback? Who knows...

story:
FOR UPDATES

Join our

Facebook Group

or

Trello Board

 

It's time to rethink urban transportation and explore our environment in a completely new way. With the BlackTea Moped we want to inspire people to ride on electric two wheelers

 
 
The BlackTea Moped combines vintage design with insane performance on-road or off-road, regardless. To have more fun you can take a friend and second battery with you.​
 
 
 
 
 

80 km/h top speed. 70 km range.

High performance hub motor. Maintenance free. 

Storage for two batteries. Easy removable.

Designed for two passengers. Street legal.  

Simple customisation. Manual for repairs. 

 

 

The clean and quiet characteristics of the bike offer new possibilities without disturbing the environment.  Go faster and farther than any bicycle and get to places motorcycles can't.

 

The BlackTea Moped is the most exciting vehicle to get around town & explore the outback. Avoid road congestions, park directly at your destination & discover new paths off the beaten track.   

 

Conquer new terrains with your electric adventure moped

 

Nothing can stop you if you want to explore new places. The BlackTea Moped can withstand rain, dirt, shallow rivers & off-road tracks. If there is no path, make your own.

 

 

 

Inspired by the open source idea of the IT industry we will develop a manual and a video series for the BlackTea Moped. This will allow everyone to repair their moped without an existing workshop network and design it to their own taste. 

 

 

We want to give our customers the necessary know-how so that they can take care of their BlackTea and do not have to rely on external help. Riding a motorcycle stands for independence, and we want it to stay that way. 

 

 

 

The BlackTea Moped is street legal in the US & EU. It is equipped with two mirrors, indicator lights, reflectors, fenders, license plate carrier, a horn & an LCD display.

 

 

 

*In Europe you only need a car or a moped license to operate it. In the US, the required license depends on your state’s regulation. Please check beforehand.

 

 

The BlackTea Moped is equipped with dual sports tires & two hydraulic disc brakes for optimal handling on streets & off-road. The halo LED lights look sexy & the alarm keeps thieves away.

 

 

 
You can take out the battery to charge it at any normal power outlet.  A second battery fits into the moped to double the range.

 

 

 

 

 

More and more local authorities are promoting the purchase of electric two-wheelers to reduce pollution in cities. Please check with your local authority if this applies to crowdfunded products. In case we can provide you with an invoice, so that you can enjoy additional savings. 

Click here for a list of German subventions.

 

While there are a lot of electric sit-down scooters in Europe, there is no appealing affordable motorcycle alternative. Disappointed about the state of the industry, Viktor started working on his own vision of a cool moped inspired by the vintage designs of the 70’s.

 

 

After building the first prototype, he realized that more people felt the same way & that an electric moped has the potential to inspire people to ride on two wheels. Viktor decided to put everything on one card. He paused his Master studies & set out to create a brand of creativity & adventure.

 

 

With the supporting network at the Technical University Munich and his mechanical engineering background, Viktor was able to move from an idea to a fully working prototype in under 6 months. The next step is clear, series production of the BlackTea Moped – with your help.

 

 

 

​

We are ready to take riding to the next level - We have a fully functional prototype that we have shown you here on Indiegogo. We have discussed and confirmed the remaining development steps until series production with our suppliers and partners. If all goes as planned, we will be able to complete production in schedule and ship the BlackTea Moped to you next spring.

 

 

Whatever happens on the way – we will keep you informed. Building a hardware product is hard and we may face unforeseen events that are going to delay us. But you can count on one thing: we will always keep you updated about our status.  

We are aware of the risks associated with this project. That is why the BT Moped is based on existing petrol motorcycles. This helps us keeping development time & costs down to ship the first products to you as soon as possible.

 

 

Kicking off a big production entails high set-up costs. As an independent startup company, we can only get it done with your help. Only if enough supporters back our project by pre-ordering, we will have enough funding to produce, assemble and ship. So – are you taking the ride with us? 

 

 

Help us by spreading our message into the world. Let’s show that electric mopeds can be damn sexy and fun-to-ride. Follow us on Social Media & share our story.
