story:
Please check your customer panel for the status update.

Check you our official forum for the latest updates,

Check out our backers' Facebook group for more details.

Check out our official Instagram page for more posts about it.

 

THE CAMPAIGN

 

  THE FUTURE OF ELECTRIC BIKE IS HERE!

Nireeka is a beautifully designed smart e-bike with a carbon fiber frame and powerful motor at an affordable price.

You can ride Nireeka as a normal bike with the 10 speed Shimano gears. But the real joy comes from the 500w electric hub motor.

You can cruise smoothly through your neighborhood at up to 20 mph (32 km/h) and with the range up to 50 miles (80 km) on a single charge, Nireeka takes you further and makes your commute a pleasant experience.

 

 

 Solid Frame
Tested beyond the boundaries

Nireeka is NOT a downhill bike, but it does not mean we have not pushed it too hard and break its limits.

Carry it anywhere because it's Featherlight!

USB Charger
With a built-in USB charger, you can keep your devices charged up as you ride.

 

Full Suspension
Enjoy the smooth riding with our full suspension system

 

 X-Fusion is focused on a simple concept: build high quality, all-metal suspension systems that provide a higher level of performance and durability.

Hydraulic Disk Brake
zero compromises on safety!

 

Shimano hydraulic disk brake front and rear (The Homie model only)
and Shimano cable disk brake for the other models

 Eye-catching colors
 

Please check all the color options HERE.

 

LET'S DISCOVER NIREEKA IN DEPTH

 

UPGRADES
After placing your bike order, you can get your upgrade directly from the perks or through your customer panel.

MOTOR COMPARISON

You can upgrade the power and top speed of your Nireeka by getting the "Upgrade to 1000 W motor" perk.
You can also limit the top speed in the case of urban commuting or unleash its power and hit the mountain roads.

This is how the bike looks like after upgrading to 1000 W motor.

* Please refer to your country rules and regulations regarding using 250+ W motors.

 THE BATTERY 

REAL-TIME MONITORING
We have a strict and organized discipline throughout the whole “Nireeka” brand and its projects.

We have the most innovative idea for the fulfillment stage, and we believe its only fair that you should be with us all along the way to the end since you were there from the start. ;)

We have built a dedicated “ORDER TRACKING” panel on our website, which you will have access to via your “CUSTOMERS PANEL” and you will find the following:

DIMENSIONS
If you're not sure what size is suitable for you, please check it here. 

 

WHY WE NEED YOUR SUPPORT
We think Indiegogo is a perfect platform for such an adventure because of the vast majority of passionate people.

By participating in our campaign, you will help us bring this fantastic ebike to life. We’ve put a lot of effort into designing, building, and testing our prototypes to make a perfect bike.

Please join the adventure and let's enjoy it together.

FAQ


Please check the complete FAQ on our website. Please read the FAQ before placing your order or you will be responsible for any misleading information you may get from somewhere else.

If you could not find what you're looking for here, please check our website and leave us a comment. We will get back to you ASAP!
You can contact us through support@nireeka.com

  

... All the best from the Nireeka Team ...
Nireeka.com

story:
The Most Powerful Electric Bike on the Market

The Ristretto 303 FS Founders Edition is a collectable limited edition of 500 units. With specialized components and materials, it's unique features make the Ristretto 303 FS a one-of-a-kind riding experience while reducing carbon footprint.

 

 

 


Functionality and Design

Iconic key for the battery, waterproof LCD display to control all functions at your fingertips, 26” x 4” fat tires and a double chain motor.

 

 

Timeline

 

The Ristretto 303 FS Founders Edition is one of the most powerful bikes on the market, with a unique rear suspension that provides steering stability and performance. The 303FS model allows you to enhance the power of the motor for maximum speed.

This performance vehicle is a street-legal electric motorbike that does not require a license or registration. 

The Ristretto 303 FS defines the lines that will always keep their value and is a collectible limited-edition bike.


 

 

 

Ten available colors to choose from

50 units each

 

Team Ristretto

 

Visit our Showroom

Denver, Colorado USA

story:
Enterprise Coatings, Inc. was formed to use a novel, patented and patent pending Diamond Hard Carbon™ nanomaterial to service industrial equipment of all types.

In an ideal world, air and water would be clean, cars busses and trucks would cruise the highways and city streets without production of pollution. We don’t live in that world YET, but there is a technology that can get us there and since 2004 a new form of Diamond Hard Carbon™ has come under serious scientific scrutiny. Tested by ARGONNE National Laboratory, NASA, and approved by the US Army & DoD, plus scores of other universities and laboratories across the world. This new discovery slashes friction, reduces wear, increases compression and is impervious to wear itself. Once applied, efficiency is permanently increased.

Contributor offer: try NEW QuantumCoat™ at a greatly discounted price, protect your engine, the environment and save cash with increased fuel economy. We have 250 standard engine treatment packages ready to ship, unlike, maybe six months from now, like some other offers. - Now that Christmas has passed, your order will ship within 3 days of contribution. 

Our primary goal is to spread the word internationally on this technology that actually works as advertised and get as many engines treated quickly, so that a tipping point is reached. At that point pollution begins to subside and soon every automotive product retailer will stock the shelves with QuantumCoat™. QuantumCoat™ has proven to reduce the use of DEF in heavy duty diesel engines by over 33%, the engine is running at least 33% cleaner and it is also using 33% less fuel than before treatment. MPG on that Class 8 tractor along with its owner who runs for Cargill is shown in our opening video. See www,enterprisecoatings.com

A trucker that invests $1200 in a  tractor treatment can expect about 33% savings off a $65,000 annual fuel bill, which would be $21,450 in savings. Not a bad ROI on anyone's books and that does not include reduced repairs as parts stop wearing out.

Enterprise Coatings, Inc. was originally formed in 2014 to provide a Diamond Hard Coating™ service to industry. We have also treated a 7500 HP diesel engine with proof of principle testing verified by Azima DLI in 2015 which proved to increase cylinder compression and HORSE POWER while lowering overall system vibration, as well as engine head & cylinder temperatures. We acquired the exclusive service license for this patented and patent pending nanomaterial from its American inventor and now we have the exclusive retail license. He discovered a process to create a new form of carbon in 2004, identified as the ONLY Spherical Nanodiamond. The goal of our company is to reverse environmental damage with a multidimensional approach that solves previously unsolvable issues that could not be addressed with current chemical lubrication or other technologies. Our Diamond Hard Coating™ service uses this new Diamond Hard Carbon™ to:

virtually eliminate friction and wear

reverse the effects of wear

eliminate future wear

eliminate wear from cold engine starts

eliminate need for depletion of natural resources by not replacing worn out equipment

eliminate emissions by not manufacturing replacement equipment

increase plant safety when machines no longer wear out

increase mechanical efficiency

increase plant profits due to benefits of durable equipment

Increase MPG

Increase compression

reduce harmful emissions

reduce thermal emissions by lowering friction

treat “Anything That Moves”™

Nothing is too small or too large to benefit from our Nano-Treatment, also it is FAA preventive maintenance approved.

Recently Enterprise Coatings, Inc. acquired the retail sales license that once covered an innovative product called DiamondLube™, a world renown nanomaterial. Unfortunately, even though DiamondLube™ is far superior to anything else on the market, it was very expensive. The primary reason was it cost $600,000.00 in private funding for R&D and received no government assistance. A semi engine was $1600 to permanently protect and $400.00 to permanently treat a small car engine. GREAT NEWS, now that we at Enterprise Coatings, Inc. have acquired the exclusive retail license as well, we improved on the original DiamondLube™ formula by adding over twice the Diamond Hard Carbon™ and decided to slash the price so everybody can now afford it, not just those with high priced sports cars or deep pockets. NEW QuantumCoat™ is stronger and better than anything, even the original DiamondLube™.

As Tribotex alluded to but neglected to mention, it was OUR nano-treatment that was tested at ARGONNE National Laboratory in 2012. Here is the photo of dated test cover page.

Contributors get more than a huge savings on the hottest technology to hit the market in decades, contributors are helping the environment and saving money on fuel and maintenance too.  Not only will you save a load of money off the original retail large auto engine treatment when you contribute, your engine will be permanently protected from wear, you’ll get better fuel economy and reduce emissions with something you know works.

FAQ’s

Can QuantumCoat™ be added to a new engine?

NOT advised. Add only after 7,000 or more miles are on the engine. The rings must first be seated to wear off the sharp edges on the rings, or pressure blow-by and loss of power will occur. Once the ring surface has flattened it is safe to add QuantumCoat™.  Contact the dealer for ring seating information.

What engine will show the most improvement?

High mileage engines gain the most with QuantumCoat™, such as auto engines with 150K or more miles and Semi Engines with 250,000 + miles. These high mileage engines also react the quickest and worn contact surface high spots coat quickly, resulting in rapid reduction of noise and vibration. Gas, diesel. propane and steam engines can all be treated.

What can I expect from this product?

Wherever you apply our product you get protection against wear, cooler, smoother, operating temperatures plus increase in fuel economy. The more places you protect, the higher the fuel economy rises because friction is lowered at the treated surface.

What are limits of QuantumCoat™ ?

It displays superior performance to oil and grease under low to extremely high pressures (3-4 million psi cannot break the particles), as well as in extremely low to extremely high temperatures.  It displays superior performance even after the oil or grease has burned away and is great on high temperature oven bearings such as automatic bread toasters used by all the major fast food chains.

How long should QuantumCoat™ be left in the Engine?

At least 3000 miles are when you normally change the oil, however oil analysis has proven its OK to change the oil filter, top off the oil and run it two times longer without changing the oil. Since wear metals will not be produced and the rings will be better sealed - carbon blow-by into oil is greatly reduced and the oil naturally stays cleaner. An Owner operator Ray Neal ran his own test after the treatment was fully worked in. He changed the oil to full synthetic and ran oil analysis at 20,000 miles (standard for OTR trucks) and the oil was OK. Again performed oil analysis at 40,000 and oil was OK, changed filter to be safe. Continued oil analysis every 5,000 and oil was OK. Stopped the test at 120,000 on that oil change because he got a little nervous, even though oil analysis showed the oil was still OK to use. On engines with heavy carbon deposits, this nanomaterial has been shown to creep under and loosen the deposits which puts the carbon into the oil turning it black, so change the filter and use the oil longer.

How much longer will an oil change last after QuantumCoat™ fully treats the Engine?

Normally new oil lasts 2 to 3 times longer because particulates no longer saturate the oil. It is normal for the oil to turn reddish brown with newly added oil, even at 10,000 and higher. Tribology testing (at Falex) of the oil at 10,000 miles (Castrol GTX that turned RED) from a treated Lincoln Continental proved the oil was as protective after 10K miles as it was when new, and it could have lasted another 10,000 miles or more - but that was good enough for the initial test performed in 2006.

Has QuantumCoat™ ever failed to work?

No, its a scientific principal that works every time the product is added, however adding a standard engine treatment to a semi, or extremely large engine will not produce optimum results. A special note to owners of 2012 vehicles and newer. An oil exec fully treated his 2015 Mustang GT (engine, trans, rear differential, water and power steering pump) and the efficiency gauge (computer) jumped to 30MPG while putting on 99% highway miles. After a couple weeks the efficiency display dropped back to the original 25MPG and he wanted to add more, but I said you don't need more. His testing finished when, on the highway (with a spare can of fuel in the trunk) his computer hit low fuel with 50 Miles to go. Noting the highway marker, he continued to drive exactly 50 miles, pulled over and the gauge read 25 miles to go. Never rely solely on the computer and they can reset themselves to factory presets.

What else can QuantumCoat™ be used on?

Any friction area such as Automatic or Manual transmissions, gear boxes, hydraulics, wheel bearings, Fifth wheel plates, any sliding contact surface (i.e. suspension components) etc.

Does QuantumCoat™ cause slipping in Automatic transmissions?

NO, This Nanotechnology works differently from chemical products and while under lower PSI conditions it reduces friction, under extreme loads it increases “stiction”. Exactly how it happens is somewhat of a secret, but tribological testing proved that is exactly what happens. Automatic transmissions tend to STOP slipping and shift faster.

Can QuantumCoat™ be added to airplanes or helicopters for preventive maintenance?

YES. The FAA informed us that our product was not restricted for use in aviation and the specifics are within the original FAQs at www.diamondlube.com

Can QuatumCoat™ be applied to propellers to reduce or eliminate cavitation, or pitting?

YES. Rubbing the nanomaterial into the surface provides a quick and cost effective treatment. Friction drives the nanomaterial into the surface material, creating an extremely slippery surface so water or even air can easily slide over. This removes the conditions that cause cavitation.

Will QuantumCoat™ reduce Vibration?

YES. AzimaDLI, a world renowned Vibration Analysis Specialist tested the effects of QuantumCoat™ on vibration within a 7500 HP diesel engine, pump and gearbox. Vibration immediately decreased upon its addition to all treated areas of the system and continued to decrease over time.  While the original vibration did not return, areas not treated were still vibrating. The result was a 30 year old system that was more efficient and reliable than when it was new.

What happens when QuantumCoat™ is added to the high speed gearbox of a 400 megawatt windmill?

Many things happen, and they are all good for the environment and owner. The $2 Million gearboxes that normally last a couple years will last for 10 to 20 years or longer, saving $20 to $40 Million in replacement cost alone. Less service increases SAFETY and a smoother running windmill translates into higher power output. Heat is a known parasitic loss in any system, and the less power lost in the production of heat, the overall efficiency of any system increases.

Can anything else be treated on a windmill?

YES. All bearings from roller, ball and slip style will benefit. A 40KW windmill in Ireland had two worn four foot diameter shaft bearings that could be heard howling from 1500 feet away. Within minutes of treatment virtually all noise vanished and the bearings no longer required replacement.

Does QuantumCoat™ REBUILD worn out metal?

Nothing out of a bottle can do that. We are dealing with a nano particle thick coating that is extremely thin, however it is virtually impenetrable once applied. What happens is the CONDITIONS that resulted in wear, vibration, power loss, oil blow-by, and excessive heat are altered, and the treated friction surfaces then slide effortlessly past each other without the usual metal on metal contact. This condition causes the problems to appear to be reversed, but it is actually a lowering of friction and NOT reversal of wear which is ridiculous. Once applied, wear cannot occur as the friction surfaces are now both coated with Diamond Hard Carbon™. Once metal on metal contact is no longer possible, heat from that contact is severely reduced, noise and vibration are quieted, and overall efficiency is increased. Because there are now mated Diamond Hard Carbon™ surfaces, wear is not possible and the surfaces slide effortlessly. We are preparing a video that shows exactly how the effects of seeming wear reversal, increase compression and elimination of wear caused by cold starts occurs.

What is the secret ingredient in QuantumCoat™?

A newly created invention called Spherical Nanodiamond that measures .1-4nm and was first offered in 2006.

What is the carrier of the nanomaterial?

100% synthetic motor oil. The standard treatment uses 1/2 fl.oz. while the semi engine treatment has 1 fl.oz. The oil is simply a carrier of the novel, safe nanomaterial.

How do you manufacture this unique nanomaterial?

That’s a trade secret.

Thank you for considering being a contributor.

  • Oil analysis of multiple semi engines proving reduction of soot and wear metals
  • US DoD approval on the ONLY Diamond Coating for weapons listed on the QPL
  • AzimaDLI data proving increased Horsepower and reduced head & Exhaust temps
  • Thermal imaging proving greatly reduced thermal emissions
  • Multiple Falex wear tests proving greatly reduced wear
  • All DYNOMOMETER tests show increased Horsepower and revving speed of 20% and higher
  • Gun Tests magazine rated our coatings Grade A after one year of intense testing
  • Prineville Railroad reported a 6% increase in fuel economy after only 81 miles of treatment
  • Van Air reported a 12% increase in fuel economy less than 1/3rd through recommended treatment time
  • DiamondLube™ wore out AG Russel Knife Company’s life wear machine, 30X life extensions over AG Russel oil but NO wear on knife
  • Tested by Gun Digest who reported two drops reduced trigger pull 25% & made action smoother
  • 4 slide press plates refused to gall, even after three times normal use
  • Carrier reefer increased fuel economy over 50%
  • Truckers using DiamondLube™ reporting 25%-50% gain in MPG

We don’t live in that world YET, but there is a technology that can get us there and since 2004 a new form of Diamond Hard Carbon™ has come under serious scientific scrutiny. Tested by ARGONNE National Laboratory, NASA, and approved by the US Army & DoD, plus scores of other universities and laboratories across the world. This new discovery slashes friction, reduces wear, increases compression and is impervious to wear itself. Once applied, efficiency is permanently increased.Contributor offer: try NEW QuantumCoat™ at a greatly discounted price, protect your engine, the environment and save cash with increased fuel economy. We have 250 standard engine treatment packages ready to ship, unlike, maybe six months from now, like some other offers. - Now that Christmas has passed, your order will ship within 3 days of contribution. Our primary goal is to spread the word internationally on this technology that actually works as advertised and get as many engines treated quickly, so that a tipping point is reached. At that point pollution begins to subside and soon every automotive product retailer will stock the shelves with QuantumCoat™. MPG on that Class 8 tractor along with its owner who runs for Cargill is shown in our opening video. story:
Introducing Solowheel Iota

A personal vehicle for the savvy 21st century commuter.

The Solowheel Iota is the smallest, greenest, most convenient e-vehicle ever invented. With 8" wheels and weighing as little as 8lbs, the Iota is a elegant device designed more for play than for transporation and is both versatile and easy to learn.

 

 

Iota in the Press

“Maybe the most impressive thing about the Iota is that, from the side, it’s pretty hard to see what the person is even using to get around.” Sean O'Kane, The Verge

“Shane Chen is back with his latest Kickstarter creation: The Solowheel Iota — and it looks like a winner.” Luke Dormehl, Digital Trends

“Iota is a like an hoverboard cut in half” Jayde Marvynne Zamora, Auto World News

 

 

Size Does Matter

The lightweight Iota is small enough to carry when not in use, but with the 1000W battery, it's also powerful enough to take you where you want to go. Perfect for "last mile" commuting, hanging around town, running quick errands, or just having fun. 

 

Anytime, Anywhere

The built in flashlight allows you to see where you are going in low light areas and the water resistant casing allows you to ride through small puddles or while it's raining. 

 

You're In Control

You can control how fast you travel by leaning forward on the foot pedals to go faster and leaning back to slow down or stop.

 

Let's Talk Power

Easily read the status of the battery and know when it's time to charge. Plus, the hidden charge port gives the Iota a more solid and sophisticated look. 

 

The Two Wheel Design

The Iota uses two small wheels instead of one to better stabilize the rider without the use of leg supports and in order to stand alone. The patent-pending design includes a parallelogram-based turning assist mechanism which makes the Iota maneuverable and easy to use. In addition to an intelligent rider detection system, folding pedals, lights and a convenient carrying handle, the Iota will include Bluetooth capabilities with smartphone and watch apps coming soon. A suspension system is also in the works. 

Our self-balancing technology is the best in the industry. We only use high-quality battery packs and motors as well as a full suite of electronic safety features giving the rider a gliding/flying free sort of feeling that enables you to move effortlessly and gracefully through the landscape. 

Hoverboards and Segways are not good for transportation because of their wide footprint. You need to be constantly watching the path of the wheels on both sides of your feet. If you hit something you can make the vehicle spin, which could throw you off balance. The Iota eliminates these hazards. Because the wheels are between your feet, you only need to scan the road directly in front of you, making it genuinely useful and practical. 

 

Perks


 

 

Why We Need Your Help

We currently have a working prototype and are focused on:

  • Finalizing the engineering schematics for the final product
  • Developing and iterating on the user experience for the mobile app
  • Developing the data visualization tools

We will soon begin the process of:

  • Designing packaging
  • Getting product certifications
  • UL, CE and other safety certificates
  • Tooling
  • Materials procurement
  • Production

We have been working on the Iota for the past year and we've come a long way. But now we need your help. Your support will allow us to initiate final design plans and manufacturing so we can make the Iota available to you and the millions of people who want to have fun with the latest and greatest gadget. 
 

So why should you support us?

  • Be the first to get one (and we mean it).
  • The Iota will be the first of our products to be built in America and you want to support American jobs
  • You love green technology and environmentally friendly transportation 

 

 

Meet the Inventor

Shane Chen
A self-described “tinkerer”, Shane is the creative genius behind successful products such as the Solowheel, Hovertrax and Orbitwheels.
 

 

FAQ’s

  1. Does the Iota come with a carrying bag? 
  2. Can you swap out the battery? 
  3. What is the weight limit? 
  4. Can the Iota go up hill? 
  5. How are the wheels inflated? 
  6. Is it waterproof?

 

 

1. Does the Iota come with a carrying bag? Yes, the bag will be made of a high quality, durable material and have a place for the charger, and an extra battery. It is sold separately from the Iota.

2. Can you swap out the battery? Yes, the Iota will have interchangeable battery capabilities.

3. What is the weight limit? The weight limit is 250 lbs.

4. Can the Iota go up hill? Yes, the Iota can climb hills that are less than 15°.

5. How are the wheels inflated? The wheels can be inflated with a standard bicycle pump through an easily accessible valve.

6. Is it waterproof? The Iota is water resistant. You'll be able to ride it in the rain and through puddles with no problem.

Be the first to get one (and we mean it).
The Iota will be the first of our products to be built in America and you want to support American jobs
You love green technology and environmentally friendly transportation 

 
 
Meet the Inventor
Shane ChenA self-described “tinkerer”, Shane is the creative genius behind successful products such as the Solowheel, Hovertrax and Orbitwheels. 
 
FAQ’s

Does the Iota come with a carrying bag? 
Can you swap out the battery? 

What is the weight limit? 
Can the Iota go up hill? 
How are the wheels inflated? 
Is it waterproof?

 
 
1. Does the Iota come with a carrying bag? Yes, the bag will be made of a high quality, durable material and have a place for the charger, and an extra battery. It is sold separately from the Iota.
2. Can you swap out the battery? Yes, the Iota will have interchangeable battery capabilities.
3. What is the weight limit? The weight limit is 250 lbs.
4. Can the Iota go up hill? Yes, the Iota can climb hills that are less than 15°.
5. How are the wheels inflated? The wheels can be inflated with a standard bicycle pump through an easily accessible valve.
6. Is it waterproof? The Iota is water resistant. You'll be able to ride it in the rain and through puddles with no problem.

story:
CLICK HERE or visit yawboard.com to get your board

 

Over 5 years and 7 prototypes, the Yawboard Team have developed a highly engineered hybrid of a scooter and skateboard, perfecting every component for low weight and high strength.

The result is a distinctive vehicle that combines the practicality and safety of a scooter, with the ride style and fun of a skateboard. 

Meet the all-round electric vehicle that will revolutionize the way you travel.

 

We have now completed the assembly and safety testing of all boards and we are delighted to say they are being shipped by sea to our backers now!!

 

"With a peak power output of 3000W, the YAWBOARD AT is in the class of scooters costing three times the price" - Josh Levitt  - Multiple scooter owner and commuter

 

 

The unique lean-to-steer style means you can ride the streets like you shred the mountains

 

With a combination of 4 wheels, 2 motors, a flexible deck, and a handle, the YAWBOARD All-Terrain offers incredible stability at high speeds on any terrain.

 

We’ve given you 3-speed modes with increasing speed and torque, to allow beginners to cruise, and more experienced riders to carve at up to 22mph / 35kph.

 

Safety is key, so we’ve included two regenerative brakes, a stable deck and a heat-treated  ergonomic handle to keep you safer than being on a skateboard.

Our unique riding position lets you look behind to always be aware of hazards you could miss on electric scooters.

You'll be in full control of the board using the handle so you can react quickly to avoid any dangers.

 

We've made that awesome feeling of riding an electric skateboard safer and more stable, so you can hit every turn with confidence.

 

With 2 x 700W motors supplying a peak output of 3000W, the huge torque lets you sail up hills with ease.

 

The quick release handle folds flatter than most existing scooters to make storing your YAWBOARD a breeze.

 

When you can’t ride, the fold flat handle and lightweight construction lets you carry and transport easily making it the perfect companion for every journey.

At just 12kg it tips the scales much lighter than most scooters which average at 20kg.

 

With a deck constructed of bamboo and fiberglass, we found the perfect combination of strength and flexibility supplying suspension and improving feedback throughout every turn.

 

With a 14AH battery, you can ride for longer without the worry of running out of juice.

 

 

With a battery status monitor for both the board and remote, the digital display also includes a speedometer and an odometer.

Optional front and rear light kit mean you can go carve any time of the day.

 

Compared to products with a similar spec, our discounted price is the clear winner at less than half the price of the closest vehicle.

The YAWBOARD All-Terrain One-Deck is the easiest to learn, giving that awesome carving experience with minimum effort. This board has a removable handle so you can choose to use it as a 'scooter' or an electric skateboard! Available now with various payment options.

 

For just a little extra, you can upgrade to the limited edition Stealth One-Deck board, black on black livery with all the added extras included to pimp your board and keep you safe.

Our patent pending split-deck board is still in the final stages of development.

 

At YAWBOARD, we're committed to keep our backers happy. We promise to offer 100% transparency on the manufacturing process and guarantee delivery of the product to your door.

 

If you're an urban dweller, or a nature lover - this vehicle is for you. Whether you want to commute to work, hit the beach, cruise through the park, shred the hills or ride off-road, the YAWBOARD All-Terrain can satisfy your needs.

Explore the World, conquer the hills, or cruise to work. The possibilities really are endless.

 

Switch between the 3-speed modes at the touch of a button, perfect for every level of experience.

 

 

With the YAWBOARD All-Terrain One-Deck you'll get:

YAWBOARD AT One-Deck x 1 / Skate Tool x 1 / Battery Charger x 1 (Correct for your country) / Remote control and charger x 1 / User Manual x 1 / Spare Belts x 2

With the YAWBOARD All-Terrain Stealth you'll get:

YAWBOARD AT Stealth One-Deck x 1 / Skate Tool x 1 / Battery Charger x 1 (Correct for your country) / Remote control and charger x 1 / User Manual x 1 / Spare Belts x 2 / Spare Remote x 1 / Front and Rear ShredLights / Helmet x 1 / Grip Tape Cleaner x 1 / Set of Cloudwheels and Belts / Bashguard x 1

 

Pitch, yaw and roll are the three dimensions of movement for a moving object. 

Yaw is when the nose moves from side to side, which represents the unique carving ride style that you find on a YAWBOARD.


 

 

 

The power of trial and improvement has featured heavily in the final design of the YAWBOARD-All-Terrain. We learnt an important lesson after every one of the 7 prototypes making improvements until we reached the perfect ride.

 

 

The money from the campaign will be put towards die-cast tooling and certification testing for standards and directives. These are an essential to be able to start on large scale production and to keep costs as low as possible for you.

The remainder of the raise will go towards manufacture of the boards and for quality inspection before shipping. We need those boards to be on point for you when they arrive.

 

 

We don't want to charge you a penny more than we need to, and as shipping costs around the world are very high right now, we think it's only fair to calculate the shipping when we're closer to shipping to make sure you get the best deal. We're hoping this will be around $105-$135 (£80-£100) to your door.

 

We have worked extremely hard to ready this product for Indiegogo, and full-scale manufacturing and fulfillment, but here are what we see as the risks and our plan to assess them:

MANUFACTURING: The manufacturer is lined up, and we have quality assurance people on site during production.

FULFILLMENT: Sometimes things get a bit crazy and stuff happens that can’t be planned for: a supplier misses a deadline, a global pandemic, customs clearance or a shipment gets lost. Those things could cause a delay. We are using an experienced logistics team to get our products to you. We’ll keep open and honest communication with you through our process so you know where your product is and when it’s going to get to you.

story:
Because an electric bike should be just that, a familiar pair of wheels that provides the power when it's needed but doesn't hinder you when it's not. We've kept the gears, the disk brakes and even a cheeky little bell. That's not to say we didn't make a few adjustments; how about a powerful motor and whopping battery for conquering those hills or arriving to work without breaking a sweat? 

And all of this for... >>>>>>

That's us, that's the PaperBoy, simply uncompromising. 

 

 

 

 

  

 

 

 

 

Inspired by others, we too set out to deliver a stealthy electric bike. Having searched the globe, studied countless candidates, we’ve finally found it ... the PAPERBOY®. One of the sleekest and best concealed eBikes we’ve seen yet. What we wanted was the feel of a traditional hybrid road bike, infused with 21st-century tech. We too hid the bulky powerpack and the messy wires right inside the downtube. Then we went further, increasing the battery capacity by 50% and adding 21-speed gears. the PAPERBOY®’s a lightweight eBike that rides just like a traditional hybrid road bike. This is our interpretation of 21st-century active transport. Simple and sustainable. the PAPERBOY® is set for manufacture. Pledge for yours now. With your support and our know-how, the PAPERBOY® will deliver.

 

 

 

 

In US factory-specification the PAPERBOY® has 500W max, power output, a 20mph top speed and is Class 1 eBike compliant. In UK factory-specification the PAPERBOY® has 250W max. power output, a 25kph top speed and is EAPC compliant. See "Outline Technical Specification" at the foot of this listing further details.

the PAPERBOY®'s versatile KT LCD3 display/meter offers 5 modes of assistance plus"Cruise Control" and 6kph "Walk / Push Power Assistance". 

the PAPERBOY® is stealthy by design. The bulky power-pack's hidden in the down-tube, so no one can see it's powered.

**: In UK spec. get 50+ miles / 80+ km of assistance from a single charge in mode 3. (Assisted range is dependent upon factors including rider weight, gradient / elevation, temperature and riding style.)

the PAPERBOY®'s 21-speed gears ensure that, even when the battery's depleted, you can continue to ride all day, whatever the gradient / elevation - something eBikes with just one or only a few gears simply don't enable a typical rider to do.

 

 

 

Production units of the PAPERBOY® are the subject of ongoing road tests. The alpha unit, 'Ada' reached 800km, without a significant issue, on 21st Nov '20 and reached 2,000km in early Jan '21.  The beta unit, 'Brian' had a controller failure shortly after assembly but nothing since. One of a number of solutions agreed with the manufacturer, arising from frailties uncovered during the road tests, is relocation of the controller to the seat tube.

The ‘2,000km Teardown’ is the name we’ve given to the feature-length interview we’ve transcribed about the 2,000km road test of the PAPERBOY® which we conducted in the British winter of 2020-21.

In the interview we,

  • explain what caused a veteran video game company to decide to offer an eBike
  • describe how the PAPERBOY® was selected
  • introduce you to Dave Neale, an eBike designer and builder and co-creator of the PAPERBOY®
  • discuss what we learned about the PAPERBOY® during the 2,000km road test
  • reveal how what we learned is being used by the manufacturer to improve the eBike, that’s already in production, to ensure that the PAPERBOY® delivers

The “2,000km Teardown” interview can be read (and downloaded) by clicking on the image below.

Consequently and uniquely, the manufacturer of the PAPERBOY® has enabled two key components, the display / meter and the controller, to be treated as user-serviceable parts (just like a worn-tyre). In so doing the manufacturer has, we believe, minimised the costs and mitigated the need for the PAPERBOY® to spend days, weeks or longer in the hands of an eBike engineer who would otherwise be required to repair or replace these notoriously frail components of all eBikes.

Note 1: In early Mar ’21 a preview of the “2,000km Teardown” was record by one of the PAPERBOY®’s creators. In the preview it’s claimed that “the "2,000km Teardown" is the name we’ve given to the short film we’re creating about the 2,000km road test and that the “2,000km Teardown” will be published on the day the Indiegogo campaign for the PAPERBOY® goes live”. Whilst Covid-19 restrictions mean that’s not yet been possible, for completeness the preview is available to view here.

The alpha unit, 'Ada' reached 800km, without a significant issue, on 21st Nov '20 and reached 2,000km in early Jan '21.

You might ask, "What Experience Do You Have In Running A Crowd Funding Campaign?"

In 2013/4 Elite EV’s sister company ran a crowd funding campaign to pay for the tooling for and production of 1,000 units of a system known as the Recreated ZX Spectrum; a 21st century recreation of a popular 1980s’ home computer. The campaign was successful and 10,000 units of the Recreated ZX Spectrum were manufactured. Today they typically resell on auction sites at a premium to their original £49.99 SRP.

You might also ask, "What Did You Learn From Your Previous Crowd Funding Campaign?"

We learned that however careful you are in choosing your manufacturing partner, unforeseeable issues and unexpected consequences can arise. In the case of the Recreated ZX Spectrum, we’ve documented those issues and consequences and how we successfully addressed them. (A copy of the document is available by request to: paperboy@elite-systsems.co.uk) We’re applying what we learned to the production of the PAPERBOY® by using a variety of techniques, including scheduling delivery.

 

 

If justified by demand (which we won't be able to guage until after this campaign is launched), we'll make the PAPERBOY® available for test rides - whist this campaign is running - by bringing 'Ada' (and or 'Brian') to railway stations around the United Kingdom. Look out for an announcement of the "Station To Station - Tour".

 

 

The service we offer to you is important to us. the PAPERBOY® is our interpretation of 21st century active transport, simple and sustainable. Our commitment to service and sustainability requires we that we are local and that, in the unlikely event of you wishing to return the PAPERBOY® for repair or another reason, you can do so in the UK (where we are located) or the US (where our activities are lead by the former head of our North American video games publishing unit). 

 

 

Getting the PAPERBOY® / Saving An ADDITIONAL £500

the PAPERBOY® Delivers, However You Get It: As it’s available in the UK / US exclusively from Elite EV there are no intermediaries to pay and so the PAPERBOY®’s arguably the best value stealthy lightweight hybrid eBike currently on offer.

Better, if you have the good fortune to be eligible for a £500 Travel Better voucher (you can read more about that here) then you can order one of the perks and you may get upto an ADDITIONAL £500 discount. If so, you may need to deliver your £500 Travel Better voucher to us before your perk is despatched. 

Bettter yet, on 25th Jan '21 the UK's Department of Transport confirmed to us "“We will establish a national eBike support programme, which could include loans, subsidies, or other financial incentives, using the learning from other schemes in the UK and abroad for eBikes, adapted eBikes and other eVehicles”. The eBike support programme is still being developed and decisions have yet to be made on options detailed above. Further details will be announced in due course."  You can read more about that here. So, in the event the £500 Travel Better voucher programme, or a comparable voucher programme, is extended across the UK and if you are eligible, then you too can order one of the perks and you may get upto an ADDITIONAL £500 discount. If so, you may need to deliver your UK national eBike support programme voucher to us before your perk is despatched.

In the event of comparable schemes being launched in the USA we'll reference them here.

Production capacity is limited. Order the PAPERBOY® here, now to get priority delivery.

Note 2: if there's sufficient demand, we'll add a perk or perks which include 2 or more units of the PAPERBOY®. If you'd like us to do this then do please let us know by sending an email to paperboy@elite-systems.co.uk 

 

 

 

The people who, in 1986, published the home computer versions of Paperboy®, a coin-op from American arcade game legends Atari® Games. The home computer versions of Paperboy® topped the UK game charts for a then record breaking 3 months. Tap on "Elite EV" above to read our full profile.

 

 

 

the PAPERBOY® is already being manufactured.  Nonetheless, manufacturers and their suppliers change their products and components from time to time. So, there may be some modest differences between the version of the PAPERBOY® described in the Technical Overview and the final product(s). The nature and position of the decals on the frame of the PAPERBOY® is for illustration and may vary. Also, demand for the premium components used in the PAPERBOY® is at an all time high. Shortages of these components and other issues could adversely affect production schedules and therefore deliveries.

 

 

 

A 2019 study published in the journal Injury Prevention found that crashes involving the power-assisted, potentially higher-speed cycles (eBikes) were more likely to result in hospitalization and internal injuries for riders compared to traditional bikes. It goes without saying that we want you to enjoy the PAPERBOY® safely. The UK government has published Cycle Safety information, with helpful tips and advice for cyclists and drivers. Consequently, we urge every reader, whether they back the campaign or not to devote 60 seconds of their time to this helpful read.

 

 

 

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help. If that's you, use the Indiegogo share tools and make some noise about our campaign.

With your help and our know-how, the PAPERBOY® will deliver.

 

 

 

Great, thanks. Check out the PAPERBOY® campaign's FAQ by tapping on the tab at the top of this listing for further information.

Elite EV (‘Elite Electric Vehicle’) is a trading style of an SPV - registered in England with company # 09192829 - for Elite's ex-entertainment activities. "the PAPERBOY" is a UK registered trademark (#UK00003543139) in Class 12. "PAPERBOY" is a UK registered trademark (#UK00001245167) in Class 28. "PAPERBOY" is a UK registered trademark (#UK00002110643) in Class 9. All rights reserved.

* and ***: see FAQ

Outline Technical Specification

Overview.

KT LCD3 Display / Meter.

the PAPERBOY® Delivers, However You Get It: As it’s available in the UK / US exclusively from Elite EV there are no intermediaries to pay and so the PAPERBOY®’s arguably the best value stealthy lightweight hybrid eBike currently on offer.
Better, if you have the good fortune to be eligible for a £500 Travel Better voucher (you can read more about that here) then you can order one of the perks and you may get upto an ADDITIONAL £500 discount. If so, you may need to deliver your £500 Travel Better voucher to us before your perk is despatched. 
Bettter yet, on 25th Jan '21 the UK's Department of Transport confirmed to us "“We will establish a national eBike support programme, which could include loans, subsidies, or other financial incentives, using the learning from other schemes in the UK and abroad for eBikes, adapted eBikes and other eVehicles”. The eBike support programme is still being developed and decisions have yet to be made on options detailed above. Further details will be announced in due course."  You can read more about that here. So, in the event the £500 Travel Better voucher programme, or a comparable voucher programme, is extended across the UK and if you are eligible, then you too can order one of the perks and you may get upto an ADDITIONAL £500 discount. If so, you may need to deliver your UK national eBike support programme voucher to us before your perk is despatched.
In the event of comparable schemes being launched in the USA we'll reference them here.
Production capacity is limited. Order the PAPERBOY® here, now to get priority delivery.
Note 2: if there's sufficient demand, we'll add a perk or perks which include 2 or more units of the PAPERBOY®. If you'd like us to do this then do please let us know by sending an email to paperboy@elite-systems.co.uk 
 
 

 
The people who, in 1986, published the home computer versions of Paperboy®, a coin-op from American arcade game legends Atari® Games. The home computer versions of Paperboy® topped the UK game charts for a then record breaking 3 months. Tap on "Elite EV" above to read our full profile.

 
 

 
the PAPERBOY® is already being manufactured.  Nonetheless, manufacturers and their suppliers change their products and components from time to time. So, there may be some modest differences between the version of the PAPERBOY® described in the Technical Overview and the final product(s). The nature and position of the decals on the frame of the PAPERBOY® is for illustration and may vary. Also, demand for the premium components used in the PAPERBOY® is at an all time high. Shortages of these components and other issues could adversely affect production schedules and therefore deliveries.
 
 

 

A 2019 study published in the journal Injury Prevention found that crashes involving the power-assisted, potentially higher-speed cycles (eBikes) were more likely to result in hospitalization and internal injuries for riders compared to traditional bikes. It goes without saying that we want you to enjoy the PAPERBOY® safely. The UK government has published Cycle Safety information, with helpful tips and advice for cyclists and drivers. Consequently, we urge every reader, whether they back the campaign or not to devote 60 seconds of their time to this helpful read.
 
 

 
Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help. If that's you, use the Indiegogo share tools and make some noise about our campaign.
With your help and our know-how, the PAPERBOY® will deliver.   Great, thanks. Check out the PAPERBOY® campaign's FAQ by tapping on the tab at the top of this listing for further information.Elite EV (‘Elite Electric Vehicle’) is a trading style of an SPV - registered in England with company # 09192829 - for Elite's ex-entertainment activities. "the PAPERBOY" is a UK registered trademark (#UK00003543139) in Class 12. "PAPERBOY" is a UK registered trademark (#UK00001245167) in Class 28. "PAPERBOY" is a UK registered trademark (#UK00002110643) in Class 9. All rights reserved.* and ***: see FAQOutline Technical SpecificationOverview.KT LCD3 Display / Meter.

story:
Velo 2 is your companion for better rides. 

 

 

 

Bicycles are good for us and for the world. Whether we are riding to work, the shops or getting out exploring at the weekend, there is no doubt that getting out on two wheels keeps our bodies and minds in shape. And that cycling is a fantastic eco-friendly mode of transport.

But it can be really hard to quickly find a good, safe route and a simple way of following it.

 

 

Existing solutions can be distracting, expensive and fragile.

We changed that when we released our Velo in 2017. And now, with years of feedback from tens of thousands of riders, we are very excited to bring you our updated Velo 2.

It combines everything that riders have loved about the Velo with a totally revamped design and an all-new interface that makes road rating (feeding back on your route to help us make your future rides - and those of other riders - better) even easier. 

 

 

 

And will incorporate all of the following features: 

 

  

 

 

What if you could follow routes that were selected by cyclists like you for cyclists like you? What if someone could tell you the quick ways, the quiet ways and the in-between ways? Where feels safe, and where feels scary?

Velo 2 is here to do just that.

Via its companion app (iOS and Android), Velo 2 offers its own Beeline Smart Routing* which blends all of the best available mapping and road use data with insights from cyclists who have ridden the road before. All you need to do is type your destination, and you’ll be offered up to three routes to get there.

A fast route will get you there as quickly as possible, a quiet route will prioritise roads that feel the safest, and a balanced route will blend the two. All of them will show you which parts of the route have been well rated by other riders, and which have been poorly rated; so you know when you can relax and enjoy the ride and prepare for any trickier sections.

It’s pretty simple, really. Anyone using Beeline can say at any point of their journey whether they’re having a positive or negative experience. We call them Beeline Road Ratings.

On the Velo 2, we make road rating even easier.

Just give your Velo 2 a press on the plus button if you like a road, and a press on the minus button if you don't. We’ve put little markers on the device so that it’s nice and simple!

After you have given your feedback, it feeds directly into our routing algorithm to adapt and improve your future routes, and those of other cyclists in your area. Win-win.

Combining real user data with road data, our routing is much better optimised for a good safe bike ride. You can see how we compare to well-known routing providers below:

 

 

 

Sometimes we want to follow a very specific route, sometimes we want to throw caution to the wind and have a bit of an adventure! That’s why we have a routing option for every occasion.

Choose turn-by-turn with Beeline Smart Routing for when you want to follow a fantastic route from A to B.

 

 

Choose our original Compass Mode for as-the-crow-flies navigation; an arrow will point at your final destination and allow you to pick your own path to it.

 

 

Or, if you have found a super route elsewhere, import a GPX into the Beeline app to be guided along it by your Velo 2.

 

 

 

Once you have a well planned route, being able to follow it is the next challenge!

Sometimes just navigating a navigation device makes you want to toss it into the nearest hedge. And how are you supposed to read and ride at the same time anyway?!

We know that a big part of feeling safe in the saddle is being able to keep your attention on the road in front of you. That’s why we have developed and tested an exceptionally simple navigation interface; so that all the information you need is just a glance away.

Want to check that you’re on track to arrive where you need to be on time? You can tap across to check your speed, time and how much of the route you have covered so far.

 


 

Knowing where to turn next is just part of the experience. Velo 2 will also have a speedo, odometer, clock and ETA so that you can keep track of your progress as you ride.

 

 

 

 

At Beeline, we don’t believe that it matters how far you went, or how fast you rode. But it’s still pretty cool to know, isn’t it? That’s why we allow you to keep a record of everywhere you have been and how far you’ve ridden.

 

 

We know that everybody’s different and that no two rides are the same...even for the same person!

 

 

That’s why we have made a product that will be as useful zipping around cities as it will be exploring the countryside. It also works worldwide* out of the box - no need to buy any additional maps!

 

 

Our bicycles are often our trusted companions for years, if not decades, and we believe that the Velo 2 should be no different.

 

That’s why we have designed, and manufactured, Velo 2 to withstand the elements with you. It will be shock and water-resistant - we’re targeting a high rating to ensure you can ride with confidence in the worst of weather conditions.

 

 

 

We get it. Having to keep track of what you need to charge is annoying! That’s why Velo 2’s battery offers up to 10 hours of daytime use, 20 hours of night-time use and up to six months on standby.

 

Velo 2 pairs with your smartphone to work. And drastically reduces the battery drain of navigation on your phone in the process! You can see how running Beeline navigation with Velo 2 compared against running navigation on Strava below: 

 

 

 

Beeline Velo 2 is a smart device, connected to your phone and to the cloud. This means it can keep getting better through software updates and we’re committed to doing just that. Since we launched our first product back in 2017, we’ve released 10 major feature updates based on the feedback we’ve heard from our community. And we’re only just getting started!

 

 

 

Every Velo 2 device comes with a twist-lock mount (with bands to fit standard handlebars) and a USB-C charging cable. 

 

 

Velo 2 will integrate the best of recent technology to bring new features and an all new design. Here's a full tech spec and how it compares to our original Velo device:

 

 

And here's how it compares against our competitors: 

 

 

 

We have thousands of Beeliners who have joined the journey over the last few years. Here's what some of them have to say about their Velos and our app: 

 

 

"LOVE IT!

Excellent device! I've no idea how I could ever cycle without it."

Gabriela Opacka, Trustpilot

 

"The perfect thing for following Strava routes. [...] I have used it to follow several routes and LOVE it. Even complex intersections were easy to navigate correctly, following the little arrow and 'tulips'. 

This is going to make using new routes a piece of cake."

Tom Bernhardt, Trustpilot

-

 

"Amazing company with a genuine knowledge of their customer's needs."

Big Craig, Trustpilot

-

 

"Superb device that shows everything you need to know, nothing more. Easy to use and to see. I found Maps and GPS devices difficult to see in some circumstances and littered with far too much distracting information. Beeline finds destinations speedily and keeps locked on. Compass mode is a real bonus to allow more exploratory rides. Plus, it is a really good price. Highly recommended."

Nick Assinder, Trustpilot

 

-

 

"Not everything I order online turns out to be any good!

BUT the Beeline navigation is nothing short of MIRACULOUS!!

THANKS SO MUCH, from the package to the instructions, from the app to the gizmo, just bl**dy Brilliant. I really didn't expect to be able to read in full sun, but you can.

And even better, they not only encourage feedback but they make it easy AND they respond."

Robin, Trustpilot

 

-

 

"This has quite simply been brilliant. The interface is simple and uncluttered and really all you need. The app used to plot your route is very simple and intuitive, it also allows you to very accurately pinpoint your destination on the mapping. The device itself is very robust, waterproof, does the job well and looks ace to boot!"

Mike, Trustpilot

 

-

 

"The guys at Beeline did a fantastic job in the last years upgrading the firmware (and yes, my old Beeline is compatible) and the iOS app. I feel like it is a new device! The user experience is excellent."

Thibaut, Trustpilot

-

 

"Love it!

I don’t often leave comments but I love Beeline so much I wanted to leave a review. I have had my Beeline since they first came out and I love it. A nav for people who don’t “do nav” - really easy to use, links to an intuitive app and a really well designed bit of kit for any cyclist."

Em, Trustpilot

 

-

 

"As you know I’m still a big Beeline fan, couldn't imagine my life without it, especially here in Tokyo where I’m always winding my way through the small side streets with no names, and always love going back on my rides to improve and find new routes.

Anyway, I totally can't wait to discover the new hardware features of Velo 2!"

Cherise, email


 

 

*Where we don't yet have Beeline Smart Routing, Velo 2 will be able to offer turn-by-turn routing in any country covered by Google Maps bicycle routing.  It will be able to offer Compass Mode and tracking worldwide. 

 

Beeline Smart Routing is currently supported in the following geographies:

UK, Germany, Netherlands, Belgium, Luxembourg

 

And Beeline supports the following languages in its app and on its devices:

 

English, French, Spanish, Dutch, Italian, German, Japanese

 

We plan on rolling out to more countries as we go forward. Where and when we do that will be based on user numbers and demand. Please let us know if you would like to see your country/language on the list!

 

 

 

 

We have worked with renowned design studio Pentagram at every stage of Velo 2 development process. 

 

Pentagram have previously worked with Rolls Royce, Apple, Harley Davidson, Slack and Waze on design projects. 

 

 

 
 
This all started over six years ago when Beeline founders and good friends, Tom and Mark, decided they’d had enough of getting lost in London on their bikes. They launched Velo for cyclists and then, in response to huge demand, Moto for motorcyclists.
 

In the four years since the Velo was shipped to Beeline’s first customers, Beeliners have travelled over 17,000,000 km over 600,000 journeys. And, since March 2021, they have been rating the roads they ride along.

Now with a team of 20,995 (that’s sixteen employees and an awesome community of riders who feedback), we are focused on improving the ride experience by providing the best bicycle routing there is. Thank you for being part of it! 

 

 

All shipping costs will be charged on BackerKit closer to the campaign. With continued uncertainty around the world, shipping prices continue to fluctuate, and we believe that charging you shipping when we have a clearer idea of how much it costs will reduce the cost to you.

 

As an estimate, we expect to charge:

Please note that we can’t cover taxes when it arrives in your country - you may be subject to these charges.

 

Risks and challenges.

 

We are extremely confident in our ability to deliver this product. We’ve done it twice before and already have all of the pieces of the puzzle in place for manufacture with established relationships with our manufacturing partners for tooling, production and assembly. With several working prototypes already, the product is already much further along the path to completion than is often seen at a crowd-funding stage which means less margin for error.

 

We also have the business experience of running this company for several years, advising other businesses in our previous lives and some very smart advisors keeping us on track. All of this means we’re on top of all the less glamorous but absolutely crucial financial management side of things.

 

That said, no crowd-funding project is without risk so it’s important to identify where any potential road bumps could lie and what we’re doing to mitigate them. These are what we see as major potential risks and we’re confident that at worst these would cause delays rather than an absolute failure to deliver.

 

1) Supply chain. A hazard for any hardware company is that the supply of certain components or materials dries up. This is a particular hazard in 2021, as the supply of components continues to be disrupted by the coronavirus pandemic. We are mitigating this risk by having already placed large orders for key components, to ensure that we have them when we need them. aren’t reliant on any single component supplier.

 

2) Tooling. The tooling process (building the moulds to produce injection moulded parts) takes a long time. We will, therefore, be starting our tooling process within the week to ensure that we stay well on track for our timelines.

 

3) Certification. The bluetooth antennae and batteries in connected products such as Beeline Velo 2 must be certified before they can be mass manufactured which can take time. The risk of delays here is minimal as the batteries and antenna design are similar to those used in the original Beeline bicycle product and we have already worked with a known testing lab in Shenzhen

 

Sustainability.

 

We are passionate about getting as many people onto bicycles as possible; it is better for physical health, mental health and the health of our planet, too. We are deeply aware of our environmental responsibilities as a business and are taking steps to reduce our carbon footprint. In the context of our Indiegogo campaign, these include:

 

Long-lasting design

We build our products to withstand the elements and whatever adventures you take them on. We want your Velo 2 to be your riding companion for many years to come and have made decisions to make it as robust as possible.

 

Reusability and recyclability

We have designed Velo 2 with reliability in mind and we expect that your device will work brilliantly for many years to come. In the rare event of a hardware failure, or in the event of needing a battery replacement, we have established a relationship with a refurbishment provider and will be working on refurbishment solutions for Velo 2.

 

Sustainable Distribution

We have factored train/sea shipping into our production timelines to reduce the emissions associated with transporting Velo 2s to our British and European warehouses.

story:
WE HAVE WON!
We are thrilled to announce that Smacircle S1 has won the Silver at Edison Awards 2018! Smacircle S1 is the one of the more forward thinking projects that will be the next innovation of transportation.

Smacircle S1 was named as a CES 2018 Innovation Awards Honoree in Tech For A Better World product category. The CES Innovation Awards is an annual competition honoring outstanding design and designs in consumer technology products.

Smacircle CEO  

CES 2018 Innovation Awards Honoree

Smacircle S1

 

Smacircle S1

Experience a commute you can actually enjoy with the Smacircle S1 ebike. Avoid crowded public transport, parking costs and glide past traffic with high speeds of 12.4mph. Fold up in five simple steps and carry in your backpack.

At only 15.4lbs (7kg) and easily folded up in five simple steps, it is perfect for those city commutes too far to walk, but too close to drive. Built with high quality materials the S1 boasts a strong and stylish carbon fiber frame and powerful Samsung battery.

iOS and Android apps allow you to lock and unlock the S1, monitor battery usage, adjust the speed and change preferences. An integrated USB charger means your devices never run out of battery.

Smacircle Trolley Bag

The multi-functional Smacircle Trolley Bag perfect for your 1-3 day trips. Easily put your travel accessories and Smacircle S1 in the backpack. Simply pull it to save energy.

 


 

Specific Features

Designed with premium waterproof material & sturdy rolling wheels, The multi-functional Smacircle Trolley Backpack has enough space to fit the Smacircle S1 & your personal belongings.

 

Smacircle Regular Backpack VS Smacircle Trolley Backpack

 

Overview of Smacircle S1 Features

Neat Compact Design

Unlike many other fold-up commuter bikes Smacircle’s unique, modern design is neat and compact. It takes up minimal space and its unisex design means it suits everyone.

Carbon Fiber Frame

Constructed with premium carbon fibre the frame is lightweight, yet strong enough to carry a weight of up to 220lbs/ 100kg.
Its strength and light weight make it ideal for taking on public transport. Trams, planes, cars and buses for no extra cost.

 

Easily Fold Up in 5 Steps

Fold up with easy 5 steps, you can take Smacircle S1 with you wherever you go.

 

Small Enough to Fit Into Your Backpack

Ebikes can be heavy, bulky and take up valuable space. Smacircle invented the S1 to combat this. At only 19 inches lengthways and able to fold up in five simple steps it can fit easily into a standard sized backpack. Alternatively, you can carry it easily by holding onto the saddle.

 

 

Powered by Advanced Brushless DC Motor

Cruise through the city at 12mph at up to a 10% slope with the Smacircle S1 ebike. Powered by a 240W motor the S1 can easily manage uneven sidewalks and ride in raining days because of its waterproofed, so there’s no need to run for the bus, join a busy subway carriage, or pay for parking. Let Smacircle do the hard work for you, there's no peddling needed!

 

Damping Tires

The Smacircle S1 has custom solid damping tires. With advanced wear resistance, there's no need to worry about punctures, or inflating. Smooth tires makes it easy to ride on uneven roads.

 

Sensitive Electronic Brakes

Compared to regular brakes which stop the vehicle through friction, Smacircle S1 has embedded electronic brakes which a more sensitive allowing you to stop faster and more safely. Simply press on the brake button on the handlebars and the motor will stop.

 

Safety Light For Night Rides

Your safety is our first concern. The front light and sidelights beside the saddle ensures that you are visible at night to traffic and pedestrians.

 

Adjustable Handlebar and Saddle

Easily adjust the ebike’s handlebars to fit your needs. Ergonomically designed, the S1 features a soft and comfortable saddle for lengthy rides.

Mobile Phone Holder

Smacircle comes with a mobile phone holder on the handlebar, which allows you to easily navigate your way to your destination. 


 

Built-in Samsung Lithium Ion Battery

Ideal for town and inner city travel the S1’s high quality Samsung battery will ensure an distance of 12 miles before recharging. Simply plug into the wall and charge for 2.5-3 hours and you can get back on the saddle.

The Samsung lithium battery, its high capacity , compact design and long life, make it perfect for Smacircle S1. It is suitable in conditions from -4 °F to 122°F. Its charge cycle is 600 times. The special design of the seat keeps the battery protected from overheating even while sitting on the battery.

The battery is completely safe as long as you use it within the guidelines of the included instruction manual.

 

Built-in USB Charger

With a built-in USB charger you can keep your devices charged up as you ride.

 

No Licence Needed

No need for a driver's license the Smacircle S1 is under 20mph, the threshold speed for street legal.

 

 

Intuitive App

Smacircle S1 comes with a dedicated mobile app, which allows users to lock and unlock the eBike, adjust the light, speed and monitor the battery life. It also monitors your average and max speeds during your trip. Easily attach your phone to the handlebars to stay in the know.

 

Security Lock

Lock and unlock the eBike with your fingertips.

The S1 ebike automatically connects with the mobile phone when the rider is within the range.

When the security lock is activated, the accelerator becomes deactivated. With the security lock, no one else can unlock/ride the ebike except you.

 

 

S1 Mashable Live Stream

 
Testing the Smacircle S1 on the public!
 
 
 
What People Say About Smacircle S1
 
 

 

You are unique & your travel experience should be unique too.

We give you possibly the  best carbon fiber transportation vehicle in style with the most competitive price to making your commute safe, easy and environment-friendly. 

Similar Material Product Comparison Table 

 

 Riding through USA on Smacircle! 

 

 

 

 

All current and future backers will be able to choose between these colors, and the ones already available (Black/Blue and Black/White) when we confirm your color choice at the end of the campaign.

All current and future backers will be able to an extra charger

 

 

Our structural engineers encountered and solved a series of challenges while designing and constructing the S1. Developing the unique folding method or finding the perfect material combination that would let them reduce the total weight of the bike while making sure it can physically support up to 220lbs/ 100 kg of total rider and cargo/luggage weight was a tough process, but we made it.

The more pre-orders we get, the faster we can scale up production. Help us for lock in faster production and ship the Smacircle S1 to you ahead of schedule.

Phase 1: The Mould of Smacircle S1 is Born 

      Phase 2:  Mass production of Smacircle S1 is underway.

Phase 3:  Mass production is undergoing.

 

 

 

 

Stay tuned to the latest update and join the community by following us on: 

 

 

 

 

How confident are you that you can deliver on time?

Because of our close relationships with our manufacturing partners and the extensive testing that has already been performed, we are confident in our ability to meet the timeline. Although unforeseen obstacles can arise during any manufacturing process, we intend to run everything efficiently, transparently, and on-time to over-deliver on the expectations of our backers.

 

 

Interested in being an exclusive distributor of Smacircle in your country? Drop us an email on business@smacircle.com with your offer and we will get back to you as soon as our campaign will have reached its goal! 

 

Is Smacircle S1 Street legal globally? 

Smacircle S1 is 100% street legal. S1 is made under 20mph and its motor is 240 W, which abides to the threshold for street legality. In addition, we are getting through a process to pass CE, FCC, UC certificates and Type Approval (ECWVTA, European Community Whole Vehicle Type Approval). For specific requirements, please check your local rules.

Does Smacircle S1 come in different sizes?

It comes in one size. Smacircle S1 has adjustable handlebars and saddle so it will fit most people's needs.

Do I need a licence to ride Smacircle?

Our bikes are made 100% street legal. The maximum speed is 12.4 mph.

How much does Smacircle S1 weight?

It is the lightest foldable ebike in the world at only 15.4lbs (7kg).

How much weight can Smacircle S1 handle?

Smacircle S1 is made of solid carbon fiber, it can handle riders weighing up to 220.5lbs (100kg) with ease.

How do you charge the Smacircle S1?

Plug charger into S1 and into a plug socket to charge.

Are there different plug types for different countries and regions?

Smacircle S1 will have US, UK, EU and CN plugs to meet the specific needs of different regions.

How often do I need to charge the battery?

To fully charge the battery it takes 2.5~3 hours.

With a fully charged battery how long can I use the S1 for?

Smacircle S1 will take 2.5~3 hours to charge fully. The battery endurance is approximately a distance of 12 miles. If you keep to 12.4 mph, you can ride for 1 hour. f you keep to 6 mph, you can ride for 2 hours.

I can't see the battery - where is it?

It is hidden inside the seat, protected by a locking mechanism.

Will you have APP for both iOS and Android?

Yes.

How do I take care of the bike?

Maintenance is carried out as on a regular bicycle and any professional bike shop will be able to maintain the Smacircle S1.

How are the bikes delivered?

Bikes are safely packed in a box and do not require assembling.

How confident are you that you can deliver on time?

Because of our close relationships with our manufacturing partners and the extensive testing that has already been performed, we are confident in our ability to meet the timeline. Although unforeseen obstacles can arise during any manufacturing process, we intend to run everything efficiently, transparently, and on-time to over-deliver on the expectations of our backers.

Who is responsible for any additional taxes, duties or VAT?

The backer is responsible, please check your country's import duties before purchasing. It is 0% in the US and varies internationally. You can check this comprehensive list to get started.

Do you offer warranty?

Yes. All Smacircle bikes are covered for 1 year. However, the normal wear of tires, brake pads, and bearings is an inevitable part of cycling are not covered.

How do you provide after-sales service?
We provide after-sales service. There could be numerous after-sales service places around the world. You can choose your convenient places for enjoying our good after-sales service. You can also contact us info@smacircle.com to get the guidance for after-sales service. 

Can I return the bike?

Based on indiegogo policy.

How Will We Spend Your Money ?

Money from our backers will be used for product development, mass production and customized design.

If I have other questions, who should I contact?

General Inquiries: info@smacircle.com

story:
Our jackets successfully passed class AA certification. This is the highest level of certification worldwide for motorbike jackets. 

 

Whichever mode you are using, braking will freeze your backlights and increase their intensity as you brake.

This feature is made possible with a built-in accelerometer in the Raylier jacket along with our proprietary algorithms.

 

We have made an optional connectivity module that connects your bike to your Raylier jacket. Compatible with 100% of motorbikes. Just connect it to the blinker cable of your bike. Don't worry, no tools are needed, we made it plug and play!

 

>> Please ADD $45 to your pledge if you want the connectivity module <<

 

 

We're thinking of a fall detection feature. Let us know if that's something you'd like to see as a future update on your Raylier jacket and we'll consider adding it as a stretch goal.

 

Our mission has always been to solve the safety issues when riding a motorbike. 

While adding features that will become the standard of tomorrow, we made sure to design a jacket with today's highest safety regulations.

 

We are proud to say all RAYLIER jackets have passed class AA certification. It is the toughest range of tests we could make our jackets go through. The outer shell is one strong armor you will feel comfortable in.

 

Each jacket is equipped with level 2 visco-elastic protection shells. Recognized as the higher safety standard, they offer optimal protection while providing extreme comfort.

 

The back shell is optional, you'll be able to add it to your order at the end of the campaign in the survey (+$40).

 

At Raylier quality and comfort are some of our top priorities.             

All our jackets include an extended back panel that helps to protect you from the wind coming in at your back.  

We use only anti-abrasive, tear-resistant fabrics.  

All the jackets include high-quality YKK zippers and branded buttons and snaps that are custom made, helping to ensure that your jacket will last for a lifetime. We also made sure the lighting system is non-intrusive, so you will never feel that you are wearing it.         

The most important feature, however, is the comfort of knowing that you are being seen on the road. 

 

You'll choose your gender and size after the campaign ends.

Each jacket comes in Men/Women edition. As for the sizes, men come in XS to 5XL while women jackets are available in XS to 2XL. 

 

For the sizing chart and how to measure guide, please refer to the surveys that we'll send out by January 2021.

 

 

We launched our first generation of RAYLIER leather jacket 2 years ago and since then, shipped thousands of units worldwide. We gathered hundreds of feedback to design the safest jacket you've been dreaming of.

 

 

 

 

Shipping, Taxes (and VAT) will be calculated and paid for towards the end of the campaign before we ship the jackets out to you. During these uncertain times, shipping costs have gone up significantly, however, we do believe that the prices will go down as the situation gets better globally.

Hence, we do not think charging shipping right now, upon pledging is at the interest of our supporters as the prices today might be more expensive than that in a few months time.

Here are our estimates of what shipping would be.

 

 

We offer a 2-year unlimited warranty. After hundreds of jackets shipped, we have had no quality issues so far, as we have refined our quality control process.

If you have any manufacturing problems with the jacket, we will replace the damaged items.

As for the electronics, they underwent extensive stress tests and can withstand quite a bit of wear and tear. They are completely modular so we can easily send you a replacement part if need be.

 

EXCHANGE POLICY


                   If you follow the sizing chart carefully, then the jackets shall fit you just fine. Still, if you wish to exchange your jackets for any reason, we’ll happily do that but you’ll have to pay for the two-way shipping. Because we are offering our jackets at highly discounted prices, we won’t be able to accept returns. Please make sure the items are unworn and unwashed. Also, all items must be in the condition you received them with all tags still attached. We accept exchanges up to 30 days of you receiving the jacket(s).

 

 

This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 1,100+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $460M raised between them.

story:
Disclaimers

 

Payment: Perk prices above are international prices in USD and reflect the cost for the perk before taxes and duties, as these will need to be calculated based on your location prior to delivery. By dealing with this prior to shipping the Swytch Kit can be ‘delivered duty paid’ (DDP) to most countries. This allows it to clear customs smoothly on arrival which prevents hold-ups and admin charges at the border. You will be contacted prior to shipment to arrange the final balance to ensure your delivery goes as smoothly as possible.

 

Any Bike?: The Swytch kit really is compatible with almost any bike. But in cases where unusual features or specifications of your bike mean that the kit is not instantly compatible, we will work with you to find a solution. We have experience of helping over 3,000 customers fit their kits, and approximately 100 of these required some additional customization which we were happy to assist with free of charge.
