story:
What is the Electrom LEV?

The Electrom is a completely emissions free Light Electric Vehicle that legally qualifies as an e-bike in most parts of the world.  It uses a fraction of the energy used by a car to transport a single person and because it is legally a bicycle, it has real advantages when it comes to getting through congested traffic.

At just 60 cm / 24 inches wide the Electrom can easily slip through stalled traffic like a bicycle, and you can park it anywhere you can park a bicycle. Wherever you are going, the Electrom will get you there free of pollution and faster.


Immune to Traffic Jams - Because it is legally a bicycle, the Electrom is allowed to use bike lanes, the median on the side of highways and to lane-split in stuck traffic.
No time wasted looking for parking - As a bicycle the the Electrom can be parked right where you want to go on the sidewalk, and the narrow profile means pedestrians can easily get past.
Cargo & Passengers - The Electrom can carry 100 liters /22 gallons of cargo in a waterproof lockable trunk.  With the easy removal of the cargo hatch it can carry a passenger (passenger size varies depending on the confidence and size of the driver).
Extremely Cost Effective - The Electrom requires no insurance or fuel. At the average US electricity cost of about 12 cents per kilowatt-hour, it costs about 18  cents to charge the battery. That works out to .225 cents per kilometer /.36 cents per mile. Conversely; The American Automobile Association puts the cost of owning and operating a new vehicle in 2017  at an average of $8,469 annually. 
Safety - The Electrom comes equipt with high-visibility LED lights and turn signals,  as well as side mirrors that offer a full view of the road behind. The vehicle itself is highly visible to drivers and they tend to give Electrom riders more room in passing than they would to a conventional bicycle
Exercise -  At the heart of the Electrom is the Generator Drive, which makes pedaling your bike easier (there are no gears to think about), and offers better exercise. There is still a direct connection between the pedals and the wheel which allows the rider to help propel the Electrom up steep hills and to meet the legal definition of a bicycle.
Built to Last - The Electrom is designed to last with an aluminum frame and molded fiberglass and carbon fiber body parts. It has very few moving parts and uses mostly off-the-shelf bicycle components available in any bike shop This guarantees that replacement parts will never be hard to find.
Proven - The current Electrom Prototype has been on the road for over two years, and in that time it has logged over 4500 kilometers / 2800 miles  of travel in a variety of conditions. The design has more than verified it's reliability, safety and comfort. 

 

The Electrom is an emissions-free vehicle packed with features that will allow you to get where you are going with style and convenience, while providing as much or as little exercise as you desire. It looks different because it is different. For the better.
 


Electrom 1 Highlights:

Vehicle Features

  • 72 volt electric assist system with regenerative braking. Top speed of 60kph, adjustable to suit local laws.
  • 100 kilometer / 62 mile base range, 300 kilometers / 186 mile  with extra battery packs.
  • Over 100 liters / 22 gallons of secure waterproof cargo space.
  • The removable cargo hatch allows for passengers.
  • Full set of headlights, turn signals, brake lights and horn.
  • Electronic security features and keyswitch. 
  • USB charge port and  cell phone mount built in.
  • A narrow profile allows the Electrom to go anywhere and park anywhere a bicycle can park.
  • The Electrom is designed to be comfortably ridden in wet weather. The front fairing completely protects your legs and feet so no special footwear or rain pants are needed.
  • The Electrom is designed around a recumbent riding position that is extremely comfortable, especially on longer trips. The design also puts the majority of the vehicle's weight close to the ground which makes for a superior center of gravity and handling compared to an upright e-bike.
  • A low step-over height of only 17 inches makes getting on and off of the Electrom a snap.
  • The tilt away front fairing allows for easy entrance and egress, and is made of a pliable plastic that will crumple in the event of a head-on collision
  • The Generator Drive acts like an automatic transmission and removes the need to shift  through a complicated set of bicycle gears while allowing the rider to exercise as much or as little as they want.
  • All aspects of the vehicle chain-drive system are enclosed inside the body so there's no worry about chain grease on clothing.
  • The quick-deploy center stand allows for easy parking and resting at stop lights
  • The Electrom will be available with a number of drive options to suit local laws


 

Environmental and Health Benefits

  • A true zero emission vehicle, the Electrom is 100% human and electric powered.
  • The Electrom uses very little energy - the power from a 500 Watt solar panel can charge the Electrom in three hours.


Financial and Legal Advantages

  • Legally a bicycle, so busts through traffic jams.
  • As an e-bike the Electrom requires no registration, license or insurance.
  • Very few moving parts = very low maintenance cost and less down time.
  • As a bicycle it can park almost anywhere. Never look for a parking spot again
  • The Electrom Qualifies for priority loading on BC ferry and Washington State Ferries, passage costs only $1.00 in Washington on Washington State Ferries and as little as $2.00 on BC Ferries

 

How We Will Bring the Electrom 1 LEV to Market

Our crowdfunding campaign on Indiegogo will raise the money to create a Production Sample and then Beta Test models. After a reasonable testing period, assembly line production will begin. We don't need a lot of money to get this done; the Electrom has been developed carefully and under budget to this point and we aim to keep it that way. All of the funds raised will go directly to the creation the Electrom 1 Production Sample.

Wait list plan
We value transparency, and want to make sure that we set realistic delivery dates and goals. As such, we are not taking big deposits or trying to pre-sell a bunch of Electroms. Instead we are offering wait-list positions with prices based on how soon you want your Electrom. You can get on the wait-list for as little $25, and  if you really believe in the project you could pledge $1000 to be one of the five Beta Testers.

No mystery parts or cheap gimmicks
The Electrom is designed around popular and proven pre-existing parts. This will help get them made quickly and offer end users lots of choice in sourcing replacement parts. We have established relationships with some of the best e-bike and bicycle parts providers out there. All of the components used will be top-of-the-line  and selected for performance and reliability. The first generation of Electrom 1s will be produced on a small scale and sold in easily assembled  kit format. The delivery as a kit will help with shipping costs  and offers flexibility to suit local e-bike laws . Once we have a proven market we will take the next step to true mass-production.

A question of timing
Many efforts have been made in the past to bring a single-passenger electric vehicle to market, and most of them failed. Some failed because they were bad ideas, but many failed because neither society nor the technology was ready. We believe that modern population, time,  and environmental pressures have brought us to the point where people are eager to give up their cars in exchange for a vehicle like the Electrom. This combined with the fact that electric vehicle battery and component technology has taken giant steps forward in the last decade leads us to believe that the world is finally ready for LEV's.

Adaptable to e-bike laws in almost any area
There are a variety of rules for e-bikes for different countries. The Electrom is built on a modular platform that will be able to run a variety of electric drive systems to suit local laws. Whether you need a direct drive hub motor, geared hub motor, or mid-drive system, all are possible with the Electrom. It can qualify as a moped in many countries. The moped designation allows for more power  and a higher top speed than a regular e-bike.

Made in North America
A number of well-meaning crowdfunded e-bikes have had delays and other challenges when it comes to getting bikes built in Asia. We have taken steps to avoid this phenomenon by designing a vehicle that is less complicated and uses as many off-the-shelf components as possible. The early Electrom 1s will be built locally to get them to the backers as quickly as possible. Once the Electrom 1 has proven itself, we will work to optimize production on a larger scale.

Hit the ground running
Our first milestone will be building the Electrom 1 Production Sample; this work will start as soon as the campaign is funded. After the Production Sample is complete and some testing has taken place we will invite our Beta Test Backers to review the bike as built.  They will then have the option to exercise their wait-list position. The five Beta Test bikes will be built in Victoria BC and delivered quickly, with the first in buyers' hands as early as December 2018.
 

Differences Between the Prototype and the Production Model

We are very happy with the basic design and geometry of the Electrom Prototype but the desire to make it legal in as many areas as possible, combined knowledge gained over two years and 4500+ kilometers of testing has resulted in a few changes:

  • 20" bicycle / 16" moped wheels - Some areas define a bicycle as having a minimum wheel size of 20" outer diameter. To meet this requirement we have outfitted the Electrom 1 with heavy duty 20" bike wheels. This is the same tire size as the 16" moped standard, so users will have access to a wide variety of tires styles and tread patterns. This wheel size will also offer a smoother ride on rough roads.
  • Different rear hatch design - two years of testing have shown that a different style of rear cargo hatch is required. The Electrom 1 hatch will still be removable to carry a passenger, but it will hinge at the back instead of the top.
  • Lighter weight - The Electrom 1 will make use of lightweight components where necessary to achieve a balance between efficiency and durability. The final vehicle weight is expected to be 120 lbs.

Electrom 1 Specifications:

  • Welded aluminum Frame.
  • 203 cm / 80 inch wheel base.
  • 55 kilo / 120 lbs weight without batteries.
  • 100 mm/ 4 inches of front and rear suspension travel.
  • 20" diameter wheels.
  • Fiberglas and carbon fiber body panels and tailbox.
  • 72 volt battery system (user configurable). Base battery is 72 volt, 20 amp-hour Lithoum pack. Approximately $750 USD landed.
  • Up to 300km/186 mile range.
  • Regenerative braking and hydraulic disk brakes
  • Grin Technologies programmable 72 volt 40 amp controller and Cycle Analyst V3 Console.
  • 4.5 meter/14 foot turning circle.

  • Able to accommodate rider sizes ranging from 1 meter 52cm / 5' 0"  to  2 meter /  6' 10".

How Much Will the Electrom 1 Cost? 

It is difficult to give an exact estimate until we have completed the production sample, but we estimate that the Frame kit will sell for $2500 USD, the Base Kit will sell for as low as $4,000 USD, and the Deluxe Kit with full tailbox and front fairing will be around $6000 USD. All of the above options are sold without battery. This will allow the end-user to select a battery that suits their individual needs. As one of the big costs of a battery is the Hazardous Materials Shipping Charge, it doesn't make sense to ship a battery to the Electrom  assembly plant and then on to the final destination. We will provide a list of known reputable local battery suppliers to Electrom purchasers, and should there be no local supply of batteries we will be able to provide a battery at cost.

 

    Some Details of the Electrom 1 LEV

    Range and Power - The Electrom was designed to be configurable to e-bike rules in as many countries as possible. In its stock configuration it  uses an electric hub motor that easily produces enough power to travel as fast as 60 kph / 40 mph. Using one 72 volt, 20 amp-hour battery and traveling at 32 KPH / 20 mph it has a range of 100 +  kilometers / 62 miles. The frame has room for three such batteries yielding a potential range of 300+ Kilometers / 186 miles.

     

    Immune to Traffic Jams - The Electrom is legally a bicycle, and is allowed to lane-split, use bike lanes and the medians on the side of highways.  This and the Electrom’s very narrow profile–less than 60 cm / 24 inches–allows the rider to easily slip through stalled traffic.

     

    No complicated gearshifting needed and all the exercise you want - The Generator Drive acts like an automatic transmission for a bike.  At speeds under 10 kilometers / 6 miles-per-hour the rider's effort goes to the back wheel via chain drive and helps the Electrom get up to speed. This is also helpful when they encounter a steep hill because  the rider's pedaling helps the electric motor get the vehicle up the hill. At speeds above 10 kilometers / 6 miles per-hour, riders can pedal at a constant speed and their efforts are converted to electricity to supplement the battery. If the operator wants a hard workout, they need only pedal a little faster and the resistance increases.  If they wish to take it easy, they can pedal slower and the resistance decreases. The system is automatic and no levers or buttons are required to switch between modes. Although this may sound complicated, the Generator Drive is mechanically simple, with only 7 moving parts, and does not rely on electronic control so there's very little to go wrong.

     
    Cargo and Passengers -

    The tail-box has been designed to handle up to 100 liters / 22  Gallons of cargo (up to five grocery bags), and with the easy removal of the cargo hatch, it has room for a small adult passenger or child.


    Ease of Use - The Electrom has been designed from the ground up to be easy to use. Stand-over height is just 17 inches and thanks to the swing-away front fairing, easily deployed center-stand, and undermounted handlebars, getting on and off is super easy. This, combined with the fact that there are no gears to shift through, makes for a very pleasant riding experience. The Electrom controls are intuitive and simple, consisting only of throttle, brakes and turn signals. The Electrom also has mirrors, lights, turn signals and horn — all of which make it easier to use.

     

    Configurable- The Electrom’s controller is easily programmable for different jurisdictions. For example, in the state of California the top speed for a Class B electric bike is  30 mph / 42 KPH and 750 watts of power draw–with a few minutes of programing the controller can be set for these parameter.  It also has an unlimited setting for track or off-road use. Depending on your local laws you may wish to configure your Electrom to use a Direct Drive Hub Motor, Geared Hub Motor or Mid-Drive System, at time of order, you will be able to specify your desired configuration (the Generator Drive will not be available on a Mid-Drive).

     

     

    The Possibilities are Vast - Because the Electrom has been designed around a modular platform, end users will be able to create their own body panels if they wish.  We have already been asked for a few custom features like a delivery box and the ability to tow another bicycle. Imagine, Instead of putting your mountain bike in a car to get to your local riding area, you will be able to mount a bike-tow bracket and get a warm-up on your way to your off-road ride. Another feature is the ability to tow a cargo trailer for even more carrying capacity.
     

     

    Real Exercise - Many electric bikes are really just electric scooters with pedals attached to exploit e-bike standards as a loophole. Not the Electrom, it is designed to be pedaled.  The pedaling station is ergonomically positioned to allow for hours of comfortable exercise, and  the generator drive allows the rider to pedal as hard as they wish. As a result the quality of exercise is actually better than on a standard bicycle. However, the exercise is voluntary, if one wishes they can just coast along pedaling gently or not at all.

     

    No Hard-To-Find Parts & Designed To Last A Lifetime  - While the design of the Electrom is different, it uses as many off-the-shelf parts a possible in order to guarantee buyers that spare parts will be available in the future. This will also help keep manufacturing and repair costs down as well as protect buyers against obsolescence. The Electrom frames will be built of lightweight and proven aluminum with reparable fiberglass body panels.

     

    Great Visibility & Increased Safety - The Electrom has a full compliment of high visibility LED running lights, headlights, and front and rear turn signals. The vehicle’s size also makes it much easier for drivers to see.
    One of the most important aspect of road safety for bikes is good communication with car drivers. The Electrom puts the rider at eye level with car drivers and this improves communication and visibility.
    The windscreen on the Electrom places the side view mirrors right where the rider needs them for a complete view of the road behind them. The windscreen is made of a flexible plastic that will bend in the event of a crash in order to reduce the risk of injury to the rider.

     

    The Electrom Will Change The Way You Think About Transportation

    Thanks for taking the time to learn about the Electrom 1.  The world is getting smaller, and space is getting tight. This vehicle will allow thousands of people  the freedom to get around faster with less time spent stuck in traffic and far lower costs than a car. It is our hope that the Electrom LEV will usher in a new mode of transportation, one that is sustainable, healthy and affordable. Please let us know if you have questions.


    Fabrizio Cross
    inventor of the Electrom

    info@electrom.ca

     

    Things you can do to help us bring the Electrom 1 to production.

    People are the key to making anything really worthwhile happen. Please spread the word about  the Electrom in any way you can: Tell your friends; Use the Indiegogo share tools at the top of this page; Write an article or blog post. Every little bit helps.

     

    acknowledgements
    The pitch video presented for this campaign was produced by Kinofact, a production company based in Vancouver which specializes in Documentary and Industrial Video production. Shot in Victoria and on Hornby Island the film was written, directed and edited by Elisha Burrows kinofact@gmail.com with cinematography by Zsofin Sheehy Zsofinsheehy.com.

    A special thanks to our model, Erin McGuigan is in order.

As a result the quality of exercise is actually better than on a standard bicycle. However, the exercise is voluntary, if one wishes they can just coast along pedaling gently or not at all.
 
No Hard-To-Find Parts & Designed To Last A Lifetime  - While the design of the Electrom is different, it uses as many off-the-shelf parts a possible in order to guarantee buyers that spare parts will be available in the future. This will also help keep manufacturing and repair costs down as well as protect buyers against obsolescence. The Electrom frames will be built of lightweight and proven aluminum with reparable fiberglass body panels.

 
Great Visibility & Increased Safety - The Electrom has a full compliment of high visibility LED running lights, headlights, and front and rear turn signals. The vehicle’s size also makes it much easier for drivers to see.One of the most important aspect of road safety for bikes is good communication with car drivers. The Electrom puts the rider at eye level with car drivers and this improves communication and visibility.The windscreen on the Electrom places the side view mirrors right where the rider needs them for a complete view of the road behind them. The windscreen is made of a flexible plastic that will bend in the event of a crash in order to reduce the risk of injury to the rider.


 
The Electrom Will Change The Way You Think About Transportation
Thanks for taking the time to learn about the Electrom 1.  The world is getting smaller, and space is getting tight. This vehicle will allow thousands of people  the freedom to get around faster with less time spent stuck in traffic and far lower costs than a car. It is our hope that the Electrom LEV will usher in a new mode of transportation, one that is sustainable, healthy and affordable. Please let us know if you have questions.
Fabrizio Crossinventor of the Electrom
info@electrom.ca

 
Things you can do to help us bring the Electrom 1 to production.
People are the key to making anything really worthwhile happen. Please spread the word about  the Electrom in any way you can: Tell your friends; Use the Indiegogo share tools at the top of this page; Write an article or blog post. Every little bit helps.
 
acknowledgements The pitch video presented for this campaign was produced by Kinofact, a production company based in Vancouver which specializes in Documentary and Industrial Video production. Shot in Victoria and on Hornby Island the film was written, directed and edited by Elisha Burrows kinofact@gmail.com with cinematography by Zsofin Sheehy Zsofinsheehy.com. 
A special thanks to our model, Erin McGuigan is in order.

story:
The LX is a 2-in-1 electric longboard. This means that with just a simple swap of a tire, you can adventure more and worry less.  

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Lux LX: Jeep-like dirt crawling capabilities, but electric and portable. Use the included 8" all-terrain wheels to dirt surf and explore without boundaries. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Use the included 97mm wheels to maximize your speed and shredding capabilities on the streets. Make commuting to work and quick milk runs at your local grocery store something to look forward to. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

With 3000 Watts of power, this board can fly! The LX has powerful belt-drive motors that can push you to speeds of up to 30 MPH!

 

 

 

 

 

 

Don't huff and puff walking up hills. Crush them with the LX. Get up to a 35% gradient hill climb with the Adventure More Package™!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Our wireless remote is created with the most advanced technology in the industry.
It is ergonomic with a built-in odometer, speedometer, an LED screen, and 4-speed/ breaking settings to choose from.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Ride farther between charges on a huge 504WH battery! Go up to 25 miles on one charge! 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Our board is built with a wide, 10" deck to provide you with maximum stability as you campus different terrain. Unlike many e-board brands, we don't want your feet to hang off the board, we want you to be able to grip it, and rip it! Feel safer while being able to adventure to more untapped and unexplored places!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

As our world is continually progressing and becoming more green, the market for electric-powered longboards has grown exponentially out of a need for speed and conscious living. 
The reality is, these vehicles are overpriced and too expensive. 
Revolutionize the way you get around while giving back to the Earth and your bank account.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


 

We want our boards to be accessible to anyone. That is why, unlike our competitors, we sell them directly to you solely online through our website. This saves you money by cutting out the retail middle man from the equation that drives up the cost of boards. This ensures that you get the best price and fantastic service.

 

 

 

 

 

 

LX SPECS

-DECK MATERIAL: 2 Ply Bamboo / 6-Ply Canadian Maple

-DECK LENGTH: 40 Inches / 101 cm

-TRUCKS: Forged / CNC Super carve 380mm/15inch width

-WHEELS: 8" pneumatic all-terrain wheels. Also comes standard with Lux ABEC Supersoft™ wheels.

-MOTOR: Dual 1500 watt (3000 watt total) high-performance custom brushless out-runner motors.

-BEARINGS: Lux Precision Bearings

-BATTERY: 36V 14AH Battery (504WH) 10S4P 35E Cells

-REMOTE: Lux Rv2 Remote, wireless control, instant response.

-WEIGHT: 11.3kg/25 LBS

-RANGE: Up to 30km/25miles standard battery and 10km/7 miles with travel battery.

-TOP SPEED: Approx. 48km/h / 30mph. Speed will reduce as voltage decreases.

-MAX LOAD: 100 kg / 220 lbs

-SUITABLE TERRAIN: Any terrain - Short Grass, dirt tracks, roads and footpaths.

-HILLS: Up to 35% gradient in sport mode (Insanely STEEP!)

-BRAKING: Ultra smooth braking control with regenerative recharging.

-Water Rating: IP 55
 

LX EXTREME SPECS

*ONLY WITH THE EXTREME LX: 

-Military Grade CNC Billet Aluminum Bash Guards

-Military Grade CNC Billet Aluminum Motor Mounts

-Shred SL200 Off-Road Lights

-Shred SL200 Rear Red Lights

ALL OTHER SPECS:

DECK MATERIAL: 2 Ply Bamboo / 6-Ply Canadian Maple

-DECK LENGTH: 40 Inches / 101 cm

-TRUCKS: Forged / CNC Super carve 380mm/15inch width

-WHEELS: 8" pneumatic all-terrain wheels. Also comes standard with Lux ABEC Supersoft™ wheels.

-MOTOR: Dual 1500 watt (3000 watts total) high-performance custom brushless out-runner motors.

-BEARINGS: Lux Precision Bearings

-BATTERY: 36V 14AH Battery (504WH) 10S4P 35E Cells

-REMOTE: Lux Rv2 Remote, wireless control, instant response.

-WEIGHT: 11.3kg/25 LBS

-RANGE: Up to 30km/25miles standard battery and 10km/7 miles with travel battery.

-TOP SPEED: Approx. 48km/h / 30mph. Speed will reduce as voltage decreases.

-MAX LOAD: 100 kg / 220 lbs

-SUITABLE TERRAIN: Any terrain - Short Grass, dirt tracks, roads and footpaths.

-HILLS: Up to 35% gradient in sport mode (Insanely STEEP!)

-BREAKING: Ultra smooth braking control with regenerative recharging.

-Water Rating: IP 55

 

 

 

 

 

 

 
 
With over 1000+ happy Lux board owners around the world, we are proud to launch the LX, adding a sense of adventure to our board mix. We started Lux four years ago and launched our first ever electric longboard the Lux LT. After fulfilling ALL OUR ORDERS, we decided to launch a more X-TREME, EPIC, and adventurous board, the LX. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Here at Lux, LX's are in production at our light manufacturing space in Phoenix, AZ. So much thought was put in from specs to design in order to give you a board that looks as epic as it rides. 
 
 
 
 

 

 

 

If you have any questions, feel free to contact us with the links below or stop on by our Shred Space in Phoenix, AZ. 

Send Email | Lux Shred Space | Facebook

 

 

 

 

 

What are the differences between the LX and the LX Extreme?

The LX Extreme comes with the same internal specs as the Standard LX but with upgraded components that help handle a more extreme Off Road experience! The LX Extreme comes with Military Grade CNC Billet Aluminum Bash Guards, Military Grade CNC Billet Aluminum Motor Mounts, Shred SL200 Off-Road Lights, Shred SL200 Rear Red Lights.

How fast does the board go?

The Lux LX and Lux LX Extreme have a top speed of 30 MPH. The speed of the board depends on a couple factors such as weight, terrain, and wind. If you weigh more or ride on grass or if there are greater winds, the speed will be slower.

How do I control the board? 

The Lux LX is easily controlled through our ergonomic remote! Simply slide the throttle forward to go and pull back to brake. You can choose from 4 different speed modes and 4 different braking modes to easily customize your ride.

What is the range of the board?

The Lux LX and the Lux LX Extreme will provide you with a range from 19-25 miles depending on how much you weigh and the terrain you are riding on. If you weigh more, the range will be less. If you weigh less, the range will be greater.

How long does it take to change the wheels?

Depending on your skill level it can take as little as 5 minutes!

How do you change the wheels?

Its super easy! The LX comes standard with the two necessary tools to change the wheels: A T-tool and an Allen Wrench! Its as simple as taking off the tire, switching the belt and placing the new tire on! 

How long does it take to charge the board?

On average it takes 3-4 hours to charge the board with the potential to take longer if it is completely dead. However, with the LX Rapid charger, you can charge the board in up to half the time!

What terrain can I ride the board on?

With the 2-n-1 interchangeable wheels, the LX can go almost anywhere. The street wheel allows you to travel any road smoothly while the all-terrain wheels allow you to go on grass, hard sand, dirt roads and any gravel. Be sure to clean your board after your off-road travels to help avoid replacement needs. 

Why should I consider getting the adventure package?

The adventure package is built to increase the hill climb of the board upto 10%. Basically the LX gearing ratio is currently geared more for speed. This is optimal on flatland travel. The adventure package almost doubles the gearing ratio (which lowers the speed and increases the torque). This creates more optimal hill climbing conditions.

What are the water restrictions with the board?

All Lux Longboards are IP57 water resistant! If you happen to take the board through a puddle, or get it a little wet, it should be fine. All the motors and most of the internal components are sealed! We do however suggest keeping the board out of the rain and not ride while the ground is saturated with water.

What type of battery is used?

The LX uses 18650 battery technology! The same battery technology used in the Tesla Model X. We use name brand SANYO GA cells. The total size of the battery is a 14Ah 10S4P making a total of 504WH of power.

Can I still ride the board if the battery dies?

Yes! The board has very little resistance if the battery dies. It can be used like a normal longboard without any power.

Will the LX and the LX Extreme be exactly like the pictures?

Although we love what we have put into the board, the Lux LX is still getting its finishing touches so design specifications are subject to change. The images provided up above are the latest prototype designs, however, if any changes do occur in either appearance, cost, or function of the board, updates will be made available to you on Indiegogo in the updates section and via email.

What ESC is used in the LX?

The LX is built with a waterproof 30A ESC. When designing the LX, the Lux Engineers chose to build a custom ESC to optimize for off-road travel. Name brand ESC’s such as Hobbywing simply did not give the LX enough power for off-road travel which is why we built our own. 

Can you install cloudwheels on these boards?

Yes! The cloud wheels should be interchangeable with the Kegel street adaptor! 

Can street wheels be put on these boards?

Yes! The LX comes standard with 97mm street tires. You can easily swap between the street wheels and the off-road wheels! 

Are the wheels Aluminum? Or what material are the wheels made of?

To optimize off-road travel, we decided to injection mold our rims with a high density plastic instead of aluminum! This allows for the board to be light weight and extremely durable! 

What wheel core does the LX use? Kegel, ABEC, or something else?

The LX uses the Kegel core system! This makes it easily interchangeable with other wheels on the market!

 

 

 

 

 

Do you offer financing?

Yes! If you want to purchase the board, but need to finance it, we will be offering financing starting on 6/30! We have paired up with Affirm to offer financing!

When will the board be shipped?

Once the funds are released from Indiegogo, we can start production on the boards! We expect most orders to ship close to 3-4 months from our light manufacturing space once the funds are released. 

Where are the boards shipped from?

All boards will ship from our light manufacturing facility in Phoenix, AZ. We get parts of the board manufactured overseas and do partial manufacturing here in the United States! 

Do we ship internationally?

We do ship internationally! However, there will be different costs associated depending on your location! 

Is there a refund policy?

Please refer to IndieGoGo's policy HERE. Shortly after an order is placed, we will lock in the contribution. This means we have started placing orders for the components to start the process of manufacturing the board. This means we can’t change or refund the order. When you order a board, we build you a board!

Can I pick up my board in Phoenix to avoid shipping charges?

Our main priority is to get these boards shipped out to everyone as soon as possible! Because of the delicacy of our system, we will not be offering local pick up so we can speed up the shipping process.

 

 

 

 

 

Is there a warranty on the board?

The LX comes with a 6 months manufacturer's warranty! All repairs are done inhouse at our light manufacturing spacing in Phoenix, AZ. With the warranty, we cover the entire board from any defects or malfunctions that happen during standard use. If there are any issues, feel free to reach out to us at customerservice@luxlongboards.com or via phone at 1 (602) 932-2917. Just a reminder, the warranty does not cover any misuse, altercations, tampering or modifications that are done to the board.

What happens if my board breaks after the warranty or I break it accidentally?

Don’t worry! With our excellent support, we can get you taken care of asap! You can reach out to Lux Longboards with your issue via phone at 1 (602) 932-2917 or through email via customerservice@luxlongboards.com.

Who can I contact if I have a question about the purchase?

You can reach out to a Lux Longboards representative with any question via phone at 1 (602) 932-2917 or through email via customerservice@luxlongboards.com.

Will I actually get a response if I reach out?

At Lux, we make you a priority! As one of the few US based E-skate companies, we prioritize any and all communication. You have a question, we are more than happy to help you. You can guarantee to get an answer from us within a day of reaching out!

 

 

 

 

 

Do I have to wear a helmet while riding?

You do not have to wear a helmet, but we always recommend wearing a helmet! Accidents happen and we want you to be safe!

Is the LX hard to ride?

No! The LX is so easy to ride (its actually easier to ride than a traditional skateboard/ longboards). With four different speed modes and four different breaking modes you can easily control your ride. With the larger deck, there is ample space for your feet on the board, giving you increased stability!

Can I take the LX on a plane?

The LX was designed with a massive battery! It is a little over 5 times over TSA’s watt hour limit. So, unfortunately, you cannot take it on a plane. The easiest way to take it on vacation if you are flying is to send it to your destination via mail (so make sure to keep your box). Most times it costs about the same as checking a bag.

story:
Meet the Boogie Bag: the bag meant for casual bikers in need of a pack that can go from your bike to your shoulder in seconds. We've combined the durability of a bike attachment with the functionality of a bag to make your ride smoother.

The bag functions as a bike attachment with clips that snap on and off, making it easy to remove and reattach to your bike. You can then carry your belongings with the fashionable strap to be used as a shoulder bag or grab the roll-up clips as a hand bag. 

Rain or shine, your stuff will be kept safe with specifically designed technology that's virtually waterproof.

 

Our goal is to create a bag not only for Boogie Nation, but for anyone in need of a versatile pack that gets the job done. That's why the Boogie Bag features three compartments meant for anything like your keys, wallet, groceries, or even electronics.

The three compartments make for quick storage and an effortless ride. The main compartment is spacious with a protective roll-top closure. Our front zippered compartment is easily accessible while on the bike for quick grabs on the go. Lastly, the back zippered compartment is tucked away for the safety of your most important valuables. 

Dimensions: 10” x 6” x 18”    Weight: 2 lbs.          

Waterproof: Yes                     Volume: 15L                        

Weight Capacity: 25 lbs.     Materials: PVC

The Boogie Bag and its compartments can fit on most bike cages/baskets without intervening with your ride. 

We have spent months perfecting the Boogie Bag. With this launch, we will ship the first 250 Boogie Bags in November of 2021 and the rest by January of 2022. We appreciated all of the support you have shown and we cannot wait to continue to grow Boogie Nation!

Boogie Bikes sits in "small town" Wisconsin about 40 miles north of Milwaukee. The town, called Hingham, is unincorporated and somewhat hard to find... but what's easy to find at Boogie Bikes is hard-working folks who care about their customers and the quality of their work.  

With that work ethic and attention to detail, Boogie Bikes decided to make a top-quality electric bike by carefully selecting the best global components and building in the USA. Our first model is the Boogie Cruiser, which our customers have raved about. While some folks love the bike's ride quality, style, and ease of use, most are so happy with the bike as a whole that they simply can't pick just one favorite feature. 

We are proud to please our customers and hope that you will become one too.
story_txt: Meet the Boogie Bag: the bag meant for casual bikers in need of a pack that can go from your bike to your shoulder in seconds. We've combined the durability of a bike attachment with the functionality of a bag to make your ride smoother.The bag functions as a bike attachment with clips that snap on and off, making it easy to remove and reattach to your bike. You can then carry your belongings with the fashionable strap to be used as a shoulder bag or grab the roll-up clips as a hand bag. Rain or shine, your stuff will be kept safe with specifically designed technology that's virtually waterproof.  Our goal is to create a bag not only for Boogie Nation, but for anyone in need of a versatile pack that gets the job done. That's why the Boogie Bag features three compartments meant for anything like your keys, wallet, groceries, or even electronics.The three compartments make for quick storage and an effortless ride. The main compartment is spacious with a protective roll-top closure. Our front zippered compartment is easily accessible while on the bike for quick grabs on the go. story:
Thank you so much for supporting our first project SDREAM E-Bike. We couldn't be more grateful to witness the success together with our backers! And now we are proud to announce that all the orders from the first project have been shipped properly. We are back, with a new robust beauty. 
 
 

Are you a daily commuter or a frequent traveler? Are you seeking a new way to get around in the city with a more powerful, comfortable and portable electric bicycle?

SDREAM Ur is the smoothest folding e-bike for urban explorations. It brings unprecedented comfy with the innovative rubber anti-vibration damping system, providing the most enjoyable riding experience to the crowded city hassle-free. Powerful, foldable, ultra-lightweight, SDREAM Ur is the next optimal traffic way to freedom.

 

 

In the past, riding comfort has been the disadvantage of most portable bikes. To pursue a lighter body, they had to give up the suspension devices at the expense of user comfort.

To tackle this, SDREAM has finally developed the patent rubber anti-vibration damping system, it can absorb 95% of the shaking while only takes the weight of a small bottle of water. The durability is 3 times higher than traditional suspensions.

From the frame design to the patented hub damping structure, SDREAM Ur achieves the amazingly comfortable riding, as well as the minimalist shape and weight.

 

We chose the premium rust-resistant magnesium alloy to build SDREAM Ur. It makes SDREAM Ur 30% lighter than aluminum alloy ones and much sturdier than carbon fiber. It’s strong to carry a weight of 220lbs/ 100kg, yet its portability makes it ideal for taking with anywhere, no extra sweat needed.

You know what, magnesium alloy is recognized as an environmentally friendly material, it greatly reduces the toxic gas and waste liquid during producing carbon fiber. 

 

An electric bike is not only an alternative to polluting vehicles but a more optimized way to go green, go traveling. Powered by an advanced brushless DC Motor, SDREAM Ur can make you go faster at the speed of 20mph (32km/h), and it’s also easy to reach 25mph (40km/h) with your pedaling efforts.
 

SDREAM Ur perfectly optimizes the efficiency between e-power and pedal, smartly making you get through rush-hour as well as reduce the waste of energy. Before you know it, you can easily get the amount of exercise you need for the day while improving city's environment.

 

The enduring lithium-ion battery is hidden in the seat post, charging up from 0-100% only in 4.5 hours (varying from different models ). No key lock needed, you’re able to charge your bike anytime, anywhere, simply remove the seat post as you can.

You can go up to 50miles/80km per charge with the long-lasting battery, pairing with the advanced torque sensor which can precisely sense your pedal effort and offer the optimal electric-assist timely.
 

Ur features the easiest folding mechanism, folding down to a third of its volume in less than 6 seconds, making this a perfect portable magic. You can always have SDREAM with you anytime, anywhere, and never worry about Ur bike being stolen.

Don’t forget the power of magnet suction buttons, their strong suction ability keeps the folded frame always compact, allowing you to take the bike onto the crowded metro or elevator easily.

 

PRODUCTION PROGRESS

 

SDREAM Ur adopted the design of a single-sided front fork. The experiment proved that thanks to the unique physics and asymmetricity of the fork, Ur weighs lighter but truly withstand heavier bending forces and stiffer than a conventional double-sided fork. 

It's also easier to change your tire without removing the wheel.

 

SDREAM Ur simplifies all tedious and complicated operations smartly, frankly displaying all your cycling efforts: assist levels, speed, trip miles, electricity, etc. Just enjoy the 6 hybrid modes with the standard or upgraded LED dashboard, and experience the speed and convenience SDREAM brings. Anti-dust, waterproof, super easy, you can always view clearly even in the sun.


 

* What are the benefits of the torque sensor?

1. It feels more naturally like a bike – you control the speed through your pedals, you don’t have to fiddle with the controls much.

2. An e-bike with a torque sensor will use less battery power and your range will be much longer.

 

*Limited 400 pics smartphone mount for early backers.

Ur SDREAM is in Pre-production

 

 

 

 

 

 

 
We are Team SDREAM, based in Los Angeles, also have members in Spain, China, Taiwan as well as Malaysia, gathering a bunch of crazy guys who love technology and cycling. We aim to bring the dividend of tech advancement to commuters and cyclists in the world. With the current tech development, we are able to bring the beauty, fun, intelligence and sustainability into our bikes as well as our life in an unprecedented way. We created SDREAM to inspire people including ourselves to go green, go further and create amazing moments. As our core idea, we are always dedicated to making life better with more environmental and technology-friendly works.
 
 
Electric bikes are increasingly regarded as a green alternative to polluting vehicles, as well as an efficient way to the "last mile" commute. However, the high rate of theft is still disturbing to bike owners around the world. To combat this, we have put a strong emphasis on building an e-bike that cannot be stolen, despite its attractive looking. Now SDREAM folding e-Bike is coming out to be an affordable option to ones who like to travel and being secured. We build SDREAM, which is more than a ton of fun.  Ride smart, play hard!
 

 

 
 

 

 

Any Additional Questions or Suggestions?
Shoot us your ideas at ursupport@sdream.bike

story:
Now available for pre-order at ANNOBIKE.COM

 

A1: The superior eBike from Copenhagen 

This first-class eBike celebrates Danish craftsmanship and appreciation of flawless design, high quality, and functionality.

Fostered in the streets of Copenhagen, A1 is a mean machine you've got to own.      

Harder, better, faster, stronger

Inspired by performance motorcycles, the A1 has a robust yet light frame. With this comfortable, reliable and alluring eBike, ANNOBIKE wants to inspire you to get out there. To see and experience life from a new point of view. And to breath fresh air while on the move. Screw the status quo. Ride with style.

Take a ride on the wild side

Nothing compares to the pure pleasure of driving a bike. With the A1, you can cruise through the city and quickly head off-road if you feel like it. With its raw power and raw look, the A1 will quickly become your new companion in urban mobility.

 

 

High-end components – No compromises

The best eBike calls for the best components. ANNOBIKE stands out from the crowd when it comes to comparing design, functionality, quality, durability and price. The A1 comes with an original frame and patented Danish design along with carefully selected specifications such as:

  • G06 series Bafang brushless motor 
  • Exa Form air shocks at the rear suspension with adjustable rebound. 55 mm travel
  • Adjustable dual crowned shocks at the front with magnesium lower leg and hard anodized aluminium Stanchion. 120 mm travel
  • Adjustable dirt bike front stem and handlebar
  • Horizontal and vertically adjustable seat
  • Powerful concealed battery with integrated battery-indicator 18650 Samsung cells
  • Battery lock
  • Tektro disc brakes with a mechanic or hydraulic lever and 160 rear and 183 mm front rotor
  • Covered charger socket
  • TFT color screen pedal-assist showing you all the details you need in any light and weather conditions.
  • Shimano Deore derailleur with trigger shifter
  • Puncture resistant Kenda tires 20" x 4"
  • An optional GPS tracking-device allowing you to deactivate your bike in case of theft (purchased separately)

Build your A1 as you like

Model
The A1 is available in 4 different models. All you need to do is to pick the one you want.

Please consult your local regulations to make sure that your chosen eBike model is legal where you live. For instance, the INTENSE model may not be legal in some states in the U.S due to local law and it is not legal to ride the Intense model on public roads in EU.

Color
The A1 comes in 4 colors: Stealth Black, Racing Green, Rocket Red and Gold Dust! The first three colorways are coated with durable powder while the Gold Dust colorway is anodized, which makes the alloy change color. High-quality coating, all resistant to weather, wear and tear.

 

Once you have pledged for your reward and the campaign is successfully over, you will receive a survey through Crowd Ox by e-mail to confirm your color of choice and other details in order to build your bike.
 

Accessories
Do you want to further customize your A1 by adding accessories? You have the option of adding these cool accessories to your order after choosing your preferred model and color.

The ANNOBIKE team

ANNOBIKE was founded by Farhad Ghasemilee and Thomas Juhl in 2019. Living in Copenhagen, surrounded by iconic designs, architecture and, of course, bicycles, we joined forces in a spark of inspiration: Why not create first-class eBikes that acknowledges its Danish heritage like no other?

Inspired by childhood memories, our first bikes, the evolvement of bike designs each decade and the re-invention of this iconic means of transportation, ANNOBIKE takes on the task of creating new and exciting designs and always challenge what is conventional.

From prototype to production

With support from you, the A1 is in production. ANNOBIKE is here to stay, and a high level of customer service is key in order to succeed. With you on our side, ANNOBIKE will continue to strive towards a more sustainable future.

Your priceless support

Price, customs and VAT

Without compromising the slightest component, ANNOBIKE is able to offer you unseen prices for this high-quality product.

Once you've pledged for the bike you want and the campaign is successfully over, you will receive a survey through Crowd Ox by e-mail to confirm your shipping address, your choice of color and any other details needed for building your bike. 

Please note that the prices shown at this site are excluding customs, shipping and any applicable local taxes.

 

Shipping

The first 200 ANNOBIKE A1 eBikes will be shipped in September 2020!

To guarantee a smooth transition from production to shipping, ANNOBIKE has partnered up with one of the world's leading logistics companies, Kuehne + Nagel, who will take care of the entire delivery from factory to your doorstep.

ANNOBIKE ships worldwide but due to local regulations, shipping may be unavailable in some countries. Please check the rules in your country if in doubt.

 

Read the Review of A1 from GLOBO SURF:

story:
Support team Free Shipping!

Names placed on Free Shipping are subject to Gary's final say (i.e., no profanities or inappropriate content).

Updated Aug 19, 2021: Free Shipping has arrived at the pits so we can't print any more names! Autographed mini Flat Gary cardboard cutouts still available and will ship after filming!

story:
The Ninebot S MAX is a supercharged version of the self-balancing transporter with faster speed and an extended range. The hand-control steering wheel is easy to control and operates smoother than ever before.

Want to upgrade your adventure? Add the Ninebot Gokart Kit and experience the Gokart PRO level of fierce. Together, let’s MAXimize your experience.

 

Equipped with three different uses, it ensures that you get the full experience out of the Ninebot S MAX.

With the hand-control steering wheel, you can ride the Ninebot S MAX just like the Segway i2. Experience the power of full control and a smooth ride by moving slightly to the left or right.

The S MAX is also suitable for inspections around the warehouse or building.

Attach the S MAX to your Gokart Kit to elevate your go-karting performance making it faster than previous models. With Gokart Kit, the top speed limit will be unlocked from 12.4 mph to 23 mph. Totally MAXimize your driving experience.

Are you a Gokart Kit owner? It's time to upgrade your Gokart Kit with the Ninebot S MAX and turn it into the Gokart PRO.

 

With our innovative Leansteer technology, the Ninebot S MAX responds to operation with 0.01 sensitivity, detecting every single movement. It ensures a smoother ride and gets you where you want to be in no time. 

The hand-control and knee control offer you two options to ride your S MAX responding to your own demand.

 

The Ninebot S MAX is equipped with two hub motors and an air-cooled battery pack of 432Wh. With a maximum engine power output of 4,800 W and 96Nm maximum torque, the smart Ninebot S MAX makes riding more exciting than ever before.

With the 12.4 mph top speed, you can have fun in style. Built for practical last-mile transportation and entertainment mobility, the Ninebot S MAX gets you to your destination while you enjoy the moment.

 

Designed for your safety, the MAX engine automatically stops when detecting unusual movements such as lifting or falling.

 

 

Quiet but powerful, the Ninebot S MAX offers a range of up to 23.6 miles, dependent on riding habits and terrain. Experience the MAX adventure at your favorite places, and beyond.

 

The Ninebot S MAX is a newly upgraded transportation that opens up new possibilities for the fun and adventures.

 

It's never been faster and easier to learn a new skill than with the Ninebot S MAX. Our new rider tutorial from the Segway-Ninebot App will guide you through every step, so you can enjoy a comfortable ride in no time. For your safety, the speed is limited to 4.3 mph until you're ready for the adventure.

 

With the adjustable design, you can extend or shorten the steering wheel to your desired height. The metal rotary knob is smooth to loosen and tighten that allow finish the adjustment in seconds.

 

Always ready for the next adventure, the Ninebot S MAX is equipped with a metal stand which stabilizes the MAX for easy storage.

 

The built-in LED front lights illuminate the path ahead of you and increase your visibility to others in proximity to you. Choose from a wide range of light colors that match your personality and make the MAX yours.

*Disclaimer: for your safety, please try not to ride at night.

 

To save your energy, you can turn on the power-assist mode and tilt the MAX slightly forward and roll it along while walking.

 

With the Segway-Ninebot App, you can learn how to safely ride the Ninebot S MAX, customize rear LED lights, adjust speed controls, lock the MAX, monitor battery and mileage, access firmware updates, and more!

 

Elevate your Ninebot S Max experience with special TPE drifting tires, hook, and loop band. Attach the base of the S MAX to the Gokart kit and enjoy the exciting performance of the Ninebot Gokart PRO.

As shown in the graph below, the Gokart Kit with the Ninebot S MAX has a maximum acceleration of 1.02 G, which is almost 1.5 times higher than the Gokart Kit with the Segway miniPro. Under this strong force, the Ninebot Gokart Kit goes from 0 to 23 mph within 5 seconds.

 

We've got you covered.  We added the straps needed to attach the Ninebot S MAX to the Gokart Kit. The accessory will be shipped along with your Ninebot S Max.

 

Compared to other drive units which have only three-speed modes, the Ninebot S MAX-drived Gokart Kit has four modes that are suitable for both beginners and professionals.

 

 

 


 

Segway-Ninebot is a global leader in the field of intelligent short-distance transportation and service robots. The company’s businesses are international, selling products in more than 80 countries and regions. With world-renowned intellectual property, Segway-Ninebot aims to lead the users and the entire industry into the future.

Our new rider tutorial from the Segway-Ninebot App will guide you through every step, so you can enjoy a comfortable ride in no time. For your safety, the speed is limited to 4.3 mph until you're ready for the adventure. With the adjustable design, you can extend or shorten the steering wheel to your desired height. The metal rotary knob is smooth to loosen and tighten that allow finish the adjustment in seconds. Always ready for the next adventure, the Ninebot S MAX is equipped with a metal stand which stabilizes the MAX for easy storage. The built-in LED front lights illuminate the path ahead of you and increase your visibility to others in proximity to you. Choose from a wide range of light colors that match your personality and make the MAX yours.*Disclaimer: for your safety, please try not to ride at night. To save your energy, you can turn on the power-assist mode and tilt the MAX slightly forward and roll it along while walking. With the Segway-Ninebot App, you can learn how to safely ride the Ninebot S MAX, customize rear LED lights, adjust speed controls, lock the MAX, monitor battery and mileage, access firmware updates, and more! Elevate your Ninebot S Max experience with special TPE drifting tires, hook, and loop band. Attach the base of the S MAX to the Gokart kit and enjoy the exciting performance of the Ninebot Gokart PRO.As shown in the graph below, the Gokart Kit with the Ninebot S MAX has a maximum acceleration of 1.02 G, which is almost 1.5 times higher than the Gokart Kit with the Segway miniPro. Under this strong force, the Ninebot Gokart Kit goes from 0 to 23 mph within 5 seconds. We've got you covered.  We added the straps needed to attach the Ninebot S MAX to the Gokart Kit. The accessory will be shipped along with your Ninebot S Max. Compared to other drive units which have only three-speed modes, the Ninebot S MAX-drived Gokart Kit has four modes that are suitable for both beginners and professionals.    Segway-Ninebot is a global leader in the field of intelligent short-distance transportation and service robots. The company’s businesses are international, selling products in more than 80 countries and regions. With world-renowned intellectual property, Segway-Ninebot aims to lead the users and the entire industry into the future.

story:
BREAKTHROUGH PROTECTION
FOR YOUR BIKE... & YOU

Proven by police departments as the most effective bike theft protection & safety system. Over 98% effective in preventing theft!
 

ALARM + APP + GPS TRACKING
Boomerang keeps you connected to your bike.

Three years in development, patented system, battle tested by police, bike share programs, and happy customers around the world.

Now with new features for V2.

 

 

PEACE OF MIND

Know what's happening with your bike AND where it is at all times. If anyone is tampering with your bike, you'll know through text messages and the app. Boomerang also protects YOU with a panic button and crash detection.

 

 

PROVEN EFFECTIVE BY POLICE

Boomerang protects your bike. But don't take our word for it! The San Jose Police Department tested Boomerang in a bike theft sting. "None of the 'bait bikes' equipped with Boomerang  were stolen." The other bikes? Gone.

Read about the sting here. Thieves always take the path of least resistance and target insecure bikes. An inexpensive lock + Boomerang is highly effective in keeping your bike safe. If your bike moves, you can track it with pinpoint accuracy with the most advance GPS tracking system available.

 

REVIEWS OF BOOMERANG

The most common question asked by customers is "Can't a thief remove Boomerang and steal my bike?" Many people believe a hidden tracker is more effective, but this is simply not true. A visible deterrent is proven to be far more effective. It's also nearly impossible to remove Boomerang without the alarm sounding and a notification being sent to you.

Bike mechanic review...

Challenge #1: try removing a bike lock without setting off Boomerang's alarm...

Set the sensitivity of the motion alarm to meet your needs. Or use geofencing to get alerted when your bike leaves a designated area like your garage or office.

Reviews: Bike Index. KnowTechie.

 

DON'T LET THIS HAPPEN TO YOU

Getting your bike stolen is one of the worst feelings. Yet over 1.5 million bikes are stolen each year in the USA alone! (Source: National Bike Registry) Using a lock only slows down thieves by a few seconds.

SIMPLY PUT...

Boomerang is the most effective bike alarm and tracker on the market.

We invented Boomerang to protect your bike and give you a new level of peace of mind. Through the app, you're always connected to your bike wherever you are in the world. Know exactly where your bike is and get instant alerts whenever it's tampered with or moved.

 

 

HOW IT WORKS: ARM & GO

Boomerang securely mounts to your bike with the included tamper proof screws or optional clamp & rack mounts. When you park your bike, simply...

Arm Boomerang through the app.

That's all there is to it.

Boomerang's alarm sounds when your bike is tampered with, a text message and app notification are instantly sent to you. Investigate or remotely track in real-time with pinpoint accuracy. You can also remotely disable the alarm if needed.

Track your bike through Boomerang's mobile app (iOS & Android) or website.

Set the sensitivity of the motion alarm to meet your needs. Or use geofencing to get alerted when your bike leaves a designated area like your garage or office.

 

 

ALARM + TRACKING + SAFETY

Boomerang protects you & your bike.

Boomerang's new panic button and crash detection can sound the alarm and alert your emergency contact list when you're in a pinch. Or give Boomerang to a loved one to know they're safe. 


Press the panic button when you need help.

Emergency contacts and crash detection settings are configurable in the app. When enabled, a long press of the panic button will send text messages to your emergency list with a link to your location on the map.

 

 

MOUNTING BOOMERANG

There are three easy & secure ways to mount Boomerang to meet your needs.

Frame Mount (included)
Tamper proof screws mount Boomerang directly to your bike frame. Can be mounted under the water bottle holder. Special screwdriver bit included.

Quick Clamp Mount (accessory)
Securely & easily mount your Boomerang while your bike is parked or on your car rack.

Rear Rack Mount (accessory)
Securely mount your Boomerang to your rear rack on your bike. For those who do not have room on their bike frame.

 


Mounted under water bottle holder with tamper proof screws (included)


Mounted in kickstand attachment


Secure clamp mount (optional accessory)

 

 

NEW IN BOOMERANG V2

After years of testing V1 in the real world, we've been able to shrink the same ultra-sensitive GPS and cellular tracking capabilities into half the size for V2. 

We added several cool new features like crash detection and a panic button on the hardware. Upgraded cellular from 2G to LTE for better battery life and faster data speeds. We've also upgraded the app with new community features. (See below for details.)

NEW IN V2

  • 50% shorter length: 5.2" vs 10" (13cm vs 25cm)
  • Lighter weight: ~3oz (90 grams)
  • LTE global cellular
  • Crash detection
  • Panic button
  • Community page (in app)
  • Clamp mount (optional accessory)

 

BOOMERANG FEATURES

  • Loud alarm – deters would be thieves when bike is tampered with
  • Text and app alerts – configurable in the app
  • Real-time tracking – ultra precise GPS & cellular tracking
  • Geofencing – get alerted if your bike moves outside of an area
  • Crash detection – alert your emergency contact if you crash, sends location
  • Panic button – instantly alert your emergency contact, sends your location
  • Ride analytics – review your rides in the app, track your progress
  • Community page – connect with other Boomerang users
  • Mounting options – on frame, bike rack, or secure easy on-off clamp
  • Long battery life – 10 hours when in motion, 2-3 months when stationary

 

BOOMERANG OWNERS

eBike owners and commuters. Road biking and mountain biking enthusiasts. And anyone who wants the peace of mind of knowing where their bike is at all times. If you've ever had a bike stolen, you know the feeling.

Parents and spouses also use Boomerang to stay safe. Share your location with a loved one so they know you're safe on your ride.

 

MORE THAN YOUR BIKE

Use Boomerang to track just about anything you need to keep safe.

Your Boomerang isn't limited to only protecting your bike. Use it for any situation where you need to tack and protect your property.
 
                                                       

 

 

TESTIMONIALS

Customers around the world have prevented bike thefts and recovered their bikes thanks to Boomerang.

Rocky from Los Angeles had his e-bike stolen and recovered it hours later thanks to real-time GPS tracking with Boomerang. When he arrived at the location of his stolen bike, the police already had the thief in handcuffs.

                                                       
                                                     – Rocky B., Los Angeles
From Rocky...
 
"Boomerang was charged up and activated. It sent me a signal, but I was in a meeting and did not have my phone on me. But 6 hours later when I did look at the phone, it told me where the bike was. My wife drove me there. When we arrived the bike was standing in the middle of the sidewalk. Two policemen had a guy in handcuffs. I could not believe the police were that efficient. Especially since I hadn’t even called them. Turns out the not so bright crook also stole a brand new BMW. He was putting the bike onto the car rack on the car. The cops thought it was suspicious, so they ran the plates and figured out this was a bad guy. Anyway, I have my bike back.”
 
– Rocky B. (USA)
 

From another happy V1 customer...

“Thanks for all the help in getting and setting up the Cyclotrac. I did a lot of online research before deciding to go with the Boomerang GPS tracker. I finally decided that you seemed to have the longest track record of producing this type of product in a very new market. The ability to potentially track my bike if it is stolen is a real game changer for me.

I set everything up today and I am happy to report that it all seems to be working as promised. The tracker app shows my bike comfortably in my garage. When I armed the system and moved the bike around, the alarm sounded and I received a text message right away.

So thanks again and keep up the good work!”

– Richard A. (USA)

 

                                                  

ALARM DEMO

When your Boomerang is armed, a loud alarm will sound if your bike is tampered with or moved.

 

 

TECHNICAL DETAILS

 

Dimensions:
Length: 5.25" (13.3 cm)
Width: 1.25" (3.1 cm)
Height: 0.75" (2 cm)

Weight:
~3oz (85 grams)

Cellular Data:
Global LTE, provided by Verizon
1 year free data included
$4/mo

Battery Life:
10 hours when moving + sending real-time data
2-3 months in standby mode

Charge Time:
4-6 hours

Charger:
Standard USB cable

 

BATTERY LIFE

When your Boomerang is stationary, a single battery charge lasts for over two months, even when in "armed" mode. If you're away on vacation for weeks or months at a time, you'll know your bike is safe.

Boomerang uses advanced motion detection to optimize battery life when stationary.

If your Boomerang is in armed mode and gets moved, real-time location data is streamed to the app for up to 10 hours while the bike is in continuous motion. When the bike becomes stationary again, battery life is extended. Boomerang gives you ample time (days or weeks) to track down your bike if it's stolen and moved between several locations.

 
 

GLOBAL COMMUNITY

Boomerang V1 is in use and loved around the world.

 
 
 
 

TIMELINE

V2 is currently being manufactured. We are estimating a January/February 2019 shipping for V2 to account for end of year rushes with our manufacturer and parts suppliers.

 

 

 

TEAM

 

 

FAQS

 

Q: How much is the data plan after the first year?
A: For customers who purchase on IndieGoGo, the cost is only $4 USD per month, billed quarterly.

Q: What countries does Boomerang work in?
A: Anywhere LTE is available. The only country known to be incompatible with Boomerang is Japan. All of North America, South America, Europe, Australia, Russia, Africa, and most of Asia is supported.

Q: How do I charge my Boomerang CycloTrac?
A: Charge with any standard USB cable (included).

Q: How long does it take to fully charge?
A: 4-6 hours.

Q: What's the expected battery life?
A: 2-3 months when stationary. 10 hours when moving and sending real-time location data.

Q: How often should I charge the battery?
A: For average users, we recommend charging your Boomerang once a week.

Q: How do I mount my Boomerang CycloTrac?
A: Your Boomerang comes with tamper proof screw and screw driver bit that will allow you to safely and securely install and hold both the device and your water bottle cage to your bike frame. You can also mount it to a bike rack or use the optional secure, easy on-off clamp.

Q: Can I hide my Boomerang CycloTrac in the seat post?
A: No, Boomerang is designed to act as both a theft deterrent as well as a bike recovery device. The majority of bikes have an aluminum frame and seatpost which acts as a natural dampener of radio waves used to transmit cellular data. According to our sources in the San Diego and BART police, a visible GPS device is a better deterrent than a hidden one. Additionally, devices mounted in seat posts or handlebars are far less effective in actually transmitting their location, rendering them useless when you need them most.

Q: How long has Boomerang been in business?
A: We have been in business for three years. Our customers for Boomerang V1 include a division of Trek Bicycle as well as seven city bike share programs, several corporations, a military base, police departments, and several universities including Stanford University.

 

Please reach out to us if you have any other questions. We're here to help!
