story:
StepTwin ® Bike: Each leg has a separate drive​.
All your power directing into the downward stroke. This is termed the "drive phase". You can end the drive phase with any leg at any time. You can relax any leg at any time.

The pedals lift automatically, there is a servo to lift them.

Besides, you can adjust the lifting force for each pedal separately.  


 


Legs move exclusively vertically
StepTwin® Bike, perfect for training your leg, hip, seat, and upper body muscles. You can choose any cadence for each leg. Your muscular system can contract and relax at any rhythm. In other words, as the right leg pushes down, the left leg can push down too.

 


Two bike drives to choose from


 


Innovative string technology​
No chain drive noise, the only noise is the sound of the tires.

 


Adaptive separate rear-wheel drive
StepTwin drive is a separate rear-wheel drive that can be mounted asymmetrically to provide different loads for each leg by replacing the rear locking sprockets 13T - 18T.

 

 

StepTwin® Bike combines running performance with driving dynamics. A new level of outdoor learning on the way to work, school, home, etc.


 

5 Independent speeds for each leg
You can switch the speed separately for the left and the right StepTwin® drive with the help of two switches Shimano Revo-Shifter.

Smooth load transfer to the driving wheel. This is important for safely loading your knee joint. You get the greatest torque when your leg is straightened. 

Ride uphill - 1st speed​

Max speed - 5th speed​

Almost all of the forward energy of your legs turns into kinetic energy of the bike due to the innovative stepping drive.

 

No stress on the joints
Runners eventually get so injured that they can hardly walk because of the wear and tear on their joints. The impact of hard surfaces is harmful to the cartilage in the knees, ankles, and hips.

 

Take advantage of the freedom
Casual riding, cross-training, cardio interval training, rehabilitation after trauma, chiseled perfection legs, bones of steel.

 

Adjustable steering column and seat

 

Quick adjustment with lever
Adjust your handlebar for your trip or riding style. The Promax ahead system with adjustable stem can be raised and lowered from 10 to 90 degrees instantaneously. Made from aluminum, 110 mm length.

 

Vertical folding technology
StepTwin® Bike is easy to fold without having to use any tools. It can be folded and unfolded in 20 seconds.

 

It It may easily fit into a modest space
Folding size (H x L x W): 55.0 x 58.5 x 31.0cm / 21.6 x 23.0 x 12.2in.


Foldable & fits in the trunk of a car
This makes it a practical means of transport fit for sports, leisure, commuting.

 

High-quality components




You will be able to choose the color of your StepTwin® Bike. Frame & Rims colors:
- Red, Black, Blue, Gray, lime-green, Orange, Silver

 



 

We analyzed many bicycle drives




Svea Bicycle
The Sveavelocipede was Brothers Birger and Fredrik Ljungström's first patent dating from 1894. Alfred Nobel had tested the bike and then invested in marketing and manufacturing.

 

Levocyclette Terrot
This model was the first bicycle to have ten separate gears that were changed by way of a meshed gear twist grip mechanism. This costly bike was produced between 1905 and 1924.

 

Alenax / Transbar Power BicycleThe Transbar idea was conceived by Marn T. Seol, a Korean inventor. He sold his idea to Byung D. Yim, a Korean entrepreneur, who brought it to the United States in the early '80s.

And many other bicycle drives

 

Rear hub
We have developed a Unique Hub for the rear wheel of a StepTwin® Bike. This hub allows you to rotate the wheel of the bike through the use of two completely independent chain StepTwin® Drives.

 

 

Next-generation mobility bikes

 

The stages of the execution order
On our website we have created a special section "Overall Progress" which you will have access to via your "CUSTOMER PANEL" and you will find the following:

 


Your support will allow us to offer you a revolutionary StepTwin® Bike and you will be able to evaluate all its advantages. Please join our team and you will get innovative StepTwin® Bike at an advantageous discount and with an added benefit of being one of the first users!

 


Tell a friend! The more people who know about StepTwin® Bike, the larger our community will become. Therefore, everyone will be able to enjoy additional perks and benefits for their StepTwin® Bike!




How can I use StepTwin® Bike?

StepTwin® Bike is a universal folding Bionic bike. He can be used as the regular bicycle: for trips around the city, for work, cyclings, etc. It is possible to use for various pieces of training as the cycle stepper. It is possible to use for the rehabilitation of muscles and joints.

Why the StepTwin® Bike is Separate Bionic Bike?

StepTwin® Bike has a unique dual independent rear wheel drive. Through the unique drive no circular motion, the movements of legs of the cyclist same, as well as at usual walking, natural.

What is a string drive?

StepTwin® String Drive uses fibers and aluminum pulleys drive system instead of a traditional chain.

The main difference between a string and a chain drive?

The string drive does not require maintenance and is totally silent. Chain drive has a greater resource.

What are the fibers made of?

The world's strongest fiber - Dyneema®. It is made from Ultra High Molecular Weight Polyethylene with HDPE coated, resistant to sunshine, UV-radiation, and rain.

The durability of the fibers?

2000 - 3000 km, depending on the loads in the process of cycling.

What happens if the string fiber snaps?

You can ride a StepTwin® Bike on the second separate drive. Or replace the string fiber, it takes 5 minutes. No tool required, no need to remove the rear wheel, or other parts.

Where can get a spare string fiber?

The two spare string fibers are provided and come with instruction to install.

How does StepTwin® Bike differ from the bicycle?

StepTwin® Bike has no dead points, unlike the regular bicycle, and doesn't overload joints. Two independent drives provide complete freedom of the movement by legs.

What does StepTwin® Bike differ from stepper bike?

The main difference is that you can press pedals on StepTwin® Bike any leg and in any sequence: two legs at the same time, two legs separately, only one leg. Besides, it is possible to control the effort made by each leg.

How can StepTwin® Bike help in the rehabilitation?

Two independent wheel drives allow the cyclist to control effort which he makes separately on the right leg and separately on the left leg. For example, on StepTwin® Bike it is possible to move, pressing a pedal only one leg. The second leg can be in a condition of a relax at this time or press a pedal with the minimum loading.

What is the maximum recommended rider weight?

The StepTwin® Bike is designed to carry a maximum load of 120 kg, the equivalent of 264 lbs or 18.9 UK stone. 

How much does the StepTwin® Bike weight?

StepTwin® Bike S1 weight about 9.3 kg / 20.5 lbs. StepTwin® Bike A1 weight about 7.8 kg / 17.2 lbs. lbs. StepTwin® Bike T1 weight about 7.0 kg / 15.4 lbs.

Does StepTwin® Bike come in different sizes?

The StepTwin® Bike is designed to be one size fits all, because it is highly adjustable. The seat ride height and front handle can be adjusted based on your build.

What are the minimum and maximum rider height?

The StepTwin® Bike can comfortably accommodate riders from 130 сm to 210 cm (4'3" to 6'10") thanks to its adjustable seat post and front handle.

How many speeds does the StepTwin® Bike have? 

StepTwin® Bike has five speeds on the left and five speeds on the right are absolutely independent of each other.

Can I order the StepTwin® Bike even though I live outside of the EU?

We ship worldwide, with the except for Saudi Arabia, Peru, Ecuador, Iran, Iraq, Lebanon, Libya, Somalia, Sudan, North Korea, Syria, Yemen. Please note that we cannot ship to military locations.

Does the price of perk include the shipping charge? 

The price does not include the shipping charge. Shipping is set to $79 due to the fact that we ship worldwide directly from the factory in Asia.

Who is responsible for any additional taxes, duties or VAT? 

Import duty tax or VAT may need to be paid if your country requires it.

How is the StepTwin® Bike delivered? 

The StepTwin® Bike is delivered folded and almost fully assembled. An easy-to-follow assembly guide is included.

What kind of warranty does the StepTwin® Bike have? 

All StepTwin® Bikes come with a 2-year international warranty. But wearable items such as brakes and tires are not covered by the warranty. Most local bike shops can repair these since the StepTwin® Bike is based on many standard bike parts.

Where can StepTwin® Bike be serviced? 

The StepTwin® Bike is designed to be simple enough for anyone to replace parts on their own. We will provide documentation and video of possible replacement processes.

I want to be a distributor, where do I start? 

We are open to distributors worldwide once our crowdfunding campaign ends.
story_txt:
StepTwin ® Bike: Each leg has a separate drive​.All your power directing into the downward stroke. This is termed the "drive phase". You can end the drive phase with any leg at any time. You can relax any leg at any time.The pedals lift automatically, there is a servo to lift them.Besides, you can adjust the lifting force for each pedal separately.   Legs move exclusively verticallyStepTwin® Bike, perfect for training your leg, hip, seat, and upper body muscles. You can choose any cadence for each leg. Your muscular system can contract and relax at any rhythm. In other words, as the right leg pushes down, the left leg can push down too. Two bike drives to choose from Innovative string technology​No chain drive noise, the only noise is the sound of the tires.


 Adaptive separate rear-wheel driveStepTwin drive is a separate rear-wheel drive that can be mounted asymmetrically to provide different loads for each leg by replacing the rear locking sprockets 13T - 18T.


  StepTwin® Bike combines running performance with driving dynamics. A new level of outdoor learning on the way to work, school, home, etc.


 5 Independent speeds for each legYou can switch the speed separately for the left and the right StepTwin® drive with the help of two switches Shimano Revo-Shifter.Smooth load transfer to the driving wheel. This is important for safely loading your knee joint. You get the greatest torque when your leg is straightened. Ride uphill - 1st speed​


Max speed - 5th speed​


Almost all of the forward energy of your legs turns into kinetic energy of the bike due to the innovative stepping drive. No stress on the jointsRunners eventually get so injured that they can hardly walk because of the wear and tear on their joints. The impact of hard surfaces is harmful to the cartilage in the knees, ankles, and hips.


 Take advantage of the freedomCasual riding, cross-training, cardio interval training, rehabilitation after trauma, chiseled perfection legs, bones of steel.


 Adjustable steering column and seat Quick adjustment with leverAdjust your handlebar for your trip or riding style. The Promax ahead system with adjustable stem can be raised and lowered from 10 to 90 degrees instantaneously. Made from aluminum, 110 mm length.


 Vertical folding technologyStepTwin® Bike is easy to fold without having to use any tools. It can be folded and unfolded in 20 seconds.


 It It may easily fit into a modest spaceFolding size (H x L x W): 55.0 x 58.5 x 31.0cm / 21.6 x 23.0 x 12.2in.Foldable & fits in the trunk of a carThis makes it a practical means of transport fit for sports, leisure, commuting. High-quality componentsYou will be able to choose the color of your StepTwin® Bike. Frame & Rims colors:- Red, Black, Blue, Gray, lime-green, Orange, Silver  We analyzed many bicycle drivesSvea BicycleThe Sveavelocipede was Brothers Birger and Fredrik Ljungström's first patent dating from 1894. Alfred Nobel had tested the bike and then invested in marketing and manufacturing. Levocyclette TerrotThis model was the first bicycle to have ten separate gears that were changed by way of a meshed gear twist grip mechanism. This costly bike was produced between 1905 and 1924. Alenax / Transbar Power BicycleThe Transbar idea was conceived by Marn T. Seol, a Korean inventor. He sold his idea to Byung D. Yim, a Korean entrepreneur, who brought it to the United States in the early '80s.And many other bicycle drives Rear hubWe have developed a Unique Hub for the rear wheel of a StepTwin® Bike. This hub allows you to rotate the wheel of the bike through the use of two completely independent chain StepTwin® Drives.
 
 
Next-generation mobility bikes The stages of the execution orderOn our website we have created a special section "Overall Progress" which you will have access to via your "CUSTOMER PANEL" and you will find the following: Your support will allow us to offer you a revolutionary StepTwin® Bike and you will be able to evaluate all its advantages. Please join our team and you will get innovative StepTwin® Bike at an advantageous discount and with an added benefit of being one of the first users! Tell a friend! The more people who know about StepTwin® Bike, the larger our community will become. Therefore, everyone will be able to enjoy additional perks and benefits for their StepTwin® Bike! story:
Super efficient power protection ensures your batteries last longer.

Use the Kinetic Energy Recovery System to regenerate energy along the way and go further. When your MiniFalcon runs out of battery, kick it like a regular scooter and go even further! 

 

 

 

 

Made of aerospace-grade aluminum to hold weights of up to 220 lbs while still being super lightweight to carry around almost effortlessly. 

 

 

With the 3x telescopic handlebar shaft to adjust your e-scooter to your height and ride comfortably.

 

Easily pack away its collapsible handles to fold it in your backpack.

 

MiniFalcon's rear wheel folds down for even more ultra-compact storage. When in use, it locks safely in place to prevent unwanted folding.

 

 

 

 

Ride 9 miles/15km on a single charge with the base battery. Or boost the range to 13.4/21km with the upgraded option. 

 

 

 

Light enough to carry in your backpack. Strong enough to support up to 220 lbs. Built with the latest aerospace-grade anodized aluminum, MiniFalcon is extremely strong and lightweight.

 

Ride without worries, over sharp stones, glass and even nails! MiniFalcon never gets a flat tire, thanks to their polyurethane structure. 4x more wear and chemical resistant than rubber tires.

 

 

 

 

The high-efficiency dual shock absorbers in each wheel reduce vibrations and allow you to glide over bumps.

Dual rear brake technology, with an electric and manual ABS anti-locking system, prevents your wheels from locking up and ensures you're always in control.

When in use, it locks safely in place to prevent unwanted folding.    Ride 9 miles/15km on a single charge with the base battery. Or boost the range to 13.4/21km with the upgraded option.    Light enough to carry in your backpack. Strong enough to support up to 220 lbs. Built with the latest aerospace-grade anodized aluminum, MiniFalcon is extremely strong and lightweight. Ride without worries, over sharp stones, glass and even nails! MiniFalcon never gets a flat tire, thanks to their polyurethane structure. 4x more wear and chemical resistant than rubber tires.    The high-efficiency dual shock absorbers in each wheel reduce vibrations and allow you to glide over bumps.Dual rear brake technology, with an electric and manual ABS anti-locking system, prevents your wheels from locking up and ensures you're always in control.

story:
A new icon is Born.

The campaign is finally here and ready to kick-off! We're super excited and proud of our ELBI and the work everyone has put in to make this happen. We're now officially ready, set, GO! to bring this beauty out to all of you.

Welcome ELBI to the new Green World that we start making bike by bike.

 

ELBI, Your Everyday Hero.

Low-Maintenance Bicycles that Make Cycling, Carrying and Owning Easy

ELBI is your everyday hero you can count on day and night. ìt won't let you down!

ELBI Bike mixes BMX features (handlebar, sloping top tube, 20” wheels), mini-bike features (low elongated top tube, upright seating position), carrier bike features (front basket), to create a new typology.

 

Our Unique Product​

Chain-free - Elbi cycles do away with messy chains that ruin clothes and feature clean belt drives that’ll make your ride smooth. In 1984 Harley Davidson replaced their chains with belt drives, too. Why? Chains require lubrication, they rust, and are susceptible to the weather. Belt drives are more durable, more quiet, and cleaner.

Smart oversized front carrier – Designed for convenient city living for all your urban needs. With large storage for a quick and dirty drop of grocery bags. The carrier helps you to get al your everyday needs possible with a smile. The Slim High-Quality Battery is integrated into the front carrier for easy removal.

The Slim High-Quality Battery is integrated into the front carrier for easy removal.

 

Lightweight Aluminum Frame – Unlike conventional steel frames, ELBI bikes is made from strong, lightweight aluminum to make it easy to carry the bike up and down stairs. The aluminum is also rust-proof, making ELBI bikes perfect if you live near the beach or somewhere with rain or snow.

Upright Seating Position – Sore backs can be a byproduct of biking, but not with ELBI. It references a BMX, but holds the body in an upright, heads up position for city commute – ideal navigational position o ensure you feel as good after the ride as you did before. 

 

 

Color option and models

Available in three different colors and models

PEDAL (non-electric), 250W (EU) & 500W (US)

Do you want the best?

 Then choose the '+ package' 

 

Henry Thomas Signature Edition

The actor Henry Thomas has appeared in more than 40 movies and is best known for his role as Elliott Taylor in the 1982 movie "E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial".

Henry Thomas Signature Edition takes you right back to the 80`s with color inspiration from his BMX bike he used when he was cycling with E.T in the front of the basket, but this time you can fly with the help of electricity to all the places you want to go.

Be Good to the Planet and start cycling instead of taking your car.

 

The Design

 

“We wanted to create a minimalistic design with a nod to 80’s nostalgia, the era we grew up in. The quality of the bikes back then may have been sub-optimal, but our lives revolve around it and as adults, we wanted to take its head-turning looks and improve its functionality,” said Henrik Ahlström. “So we came out with the ELBI, a bike that is easy to ride and even easier to own and can take you to all the places where you want to go.”

The final design of the bike is primarily driven by function. To keep it lightweight and virtually maintenance free, the bike is powered by a Gates reinforced Carbon Belt Drive that last longer than chains and requires no lubrication. The electric models also feature a slim and lightweight lithium battery enabling 45-60km (27-40 miles) of range depending on the battery pack and it can even be removed, while not in use, to be used as a USB power bank. With the addition of the brushless Bafang motor on the front wheels, the ELBI bike can tackle any hill with its low-resistance three or eight (upgrade Plus Package) - speed motor.

 

Man's best friend.

ELBI is the perfect urban commuter that is designed to take on salt, sand, and water. It can carry your loved ones and make your everyday life a little bit easier.

 

 

What Makes It Special

 

 

Built to Last

  • Aluminum alloy is a metal with other things added to improve some of its properties. Strong and light so you can ride it for a long time. Fully powder-coated in a thick layer of scratch-resistant thermoset polymer to protect against the elements. The wiring will be integrated in the main tube, which is also reinforced.

 


 

 

Smart Storage

  • Say goodbye to sweaty backs and unsightly stains. Stow your bag in the front carrier. A customized mesh bag, to make your life easy, is included.The bag will keep things such as handbag straps from falling into the front wheel. A 60L shopping bag is available as an upgrade.

 

Maintenance Free Belt Drive

  • Belt-up, up, and away! Gates Drive™ Carbon Drive, clean maintenance-free no lube required, quitet with no chain clatter, weighs less and is stronger than a chain.
 
 

 

 
 

Grip Shifters

  • You get 3 speeds too thanks to a Shimano Nexus 3 shifter and an internal hub combo. Incl in model : pedal, EL250, EL500

  • You get 8 speeds too thanks to a Shimano Nexus 8 shifter and an internal hub combo. Incl in model :pedal+,EL250+,EL500+


 

Fenders

  • Color-matched stainless steel fenders. Fend off dirt, mud, sand, rainwater and all other types of surface gunk, which the tires will churn up, with these fenders.We will make the front fenders much larger than the early models that are shown in the videos.​


HQ Battery, LG 3500mah

  • The 36V x 10,5Ah (250W) or 48V x 10,5Ah (500W) lithium-ion battery can be locked and removed from the ELBI and taken inside to charge while at home or at work. The battery also has a USB charger and an integrated front light. You can even charge your phone while riding the bike.
 
 

 

36V or 48V Front Hub

  • With a front hub motor, outputting 250 or 500 watts with every pedal stroke, getting from
    point A to B has never been so easy.

 

 

LCD Screen

  • We give you up to 5 adjustable speed settings for your EL with a high-contrast LCD display that delivers all important information at a glance, is extremely robust and easy to use and also with a walk-assist.

     

 

 

Automatic Smart Lightning System

Upgrade Option.

  • ELBI can take you anywhere you want to go, even in the dark. The automated lighting system includes front and rear sensors with laser flashing lights to indicate a safe distance to ride. Enjoy the freedom of riding even in the dead of the night. 
 
 

 

Torque Sensor

incl in model : EL250, EL250+

  • We’ve engineered a sensor that automatically senses your cycling and produces different electrical signals to guide the motor output depending on where and how you’re riding by the force you ride. Whether you’re cruising down the boardwalk or pedaling up a hill, our torque sensor system optimizes motor output to provide 30% more distance on one charge.

 
 

 

Cadence Sensor

incl in model : EL500, EL500+

  • cadence sensor uses a magnet on the crank, it turns the motor ON when you start pedaling and turns it OFF when you stop pedaling. It works more or less like a switch. You control the boost level and speed by adjusting the assist mode manually up and down. ELBI 500 and 500+ uses this type of sensor as it is most often used with the throttle only.
 
 

 

Rust-free components

  • The component has been carefully selected to ensure your e-bike will last for years. It is built to be as rust-free as possible – from top to bottom.
 

 

Enginered for easy after-sale service

  • All components are quick release,  making it easier than ever to remove replace and upgrade

    ELBI's components are carefully engineered for an easy upgrade & installing replacement parts. An electric bike ideal for urban travel or outings. 

    ELBI's electric components can be disassembled in minutes & require no technical knowledge.

 

 
 
 

 

 

 

Tektro Wired Hydraulics (front/rear)

incl in model : Pedal+, EL250+, EL500+

  • is the premium of braking technology. This system will improve the braking power and feeling of riding a Elbi bike. Hydraulic mean olie is being pushed thru tubes for instantly and powerful disc brake response. Hydraulics are great for braking in all weather conditions. .

 

Shimano Nexus Inter 8

incl in model : Pedal+, EL250+, EL500+

  • Thanks to the gear change support mechanism, the mechanical shifting resistance is reduced to provide extremely comfortable shifting. The gear ratio is 307%. 
 

 

 

Shimano Nexus Roller Brake

incl in model : EL500

  • The Rollerbrake is most practical for urban cycling in areas without long, steep descents. Advantages are that is weatherproof and requires little maintenance.

 

 

 

 

Shimano Coaster Brake

incl in model : Pedal, EL250

  • Thanks to the gear change support mechanism, the mechanical shifting resistance is reduced to provide extremely comfortable shifting. The gear ratio is 307%. 

 

Automatic drive function​ (throttle)

incl in model : EL500, EL500+

  • The automatic drive function (throttle) allows you to ride fully electric without using the pedal assist. Please note that this function is only available on our US version, as current legislation does not permit the throttle function in most European countries.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Want to sweeten your already awesome ride?

Check out our add-ons

   

   

   

 

 

Model Options

     

* The difference between the EU and US model is the motor size and automatic drive function.
Please note that the US model is not allowed in most European countries. Check your country before placing your order.
* The backer is responsible for any additional taxes, duties, and VAT. Taxes, duties, and VAT vary from country to country.

In the US, the taxes, duties, and VAT are 0%. In Europe, the amount is 25% in VAT and 6% in duties. For other countries, please check the regulations in your country before purchasing.

Please note that taxes, duties, and VAT will be collected after the campaign and before shipping.

 

 

The Ahlström Brothers

Henrik and John Patrik

ELBI is brought to you from Sweden with love by the Ahlstroem brothers.

 

The Backstory

The ELBI story began ten years ago when founder Henrik Ahlström and his two brothers were tasked to develop a small beach cruiser for a local nightclub. The design proved popular and it led to the development of a model aimed for the growing consumer market. In just over a decade, ELBI counts some of the largest companies in Sweden as clients and business partners.

The brothers work with industrial design and product development on a daily basis, so this project has been just like riding an e-bike, smooth. 

 

We’ve spent countless hours designing and building what we believe is the most stylish, affordable, and feature-packed e-bike ever.

To start up production, we need $25,000. As an Indiegogo exclusive, we’re offering over 50 % discount to make sure we reach our goal. This is a UNIQUE limited offer only available on Indiegogo.

Running a crowdfunding campaign requires a 100% transparent approach to our backers. We’ll do everything we can to keep you fully informed about the campaign, production, and shipping. And we promise to deliver the coolest e-bike EVER

Built to Last
Aluminum alloy is a metal with other things added to improve some of its properties. Strong and light so you can ride it for a long time. Fully powder-coated in a thick layer of scratch-resistant thermoset polymer to protect against the elements. The wiring will be integrated in the main tube, which is also reinforced.

 



  

Smart Storage
Say goodbye to sweaty backs and unsightly stains. Stow your bag in the front carrier. A customized mesh bag, to make your life easy, is included.The bag will keep things such as handbag straps from falling into the front wheel. A 60L shopping bag is available as an upgrade.






 
Maintenance Free Belt Drive
Belt-up, up, and away! Gates Drive™ Carbon Drive, clean maintenance-free no lube required, quitet with no chain clatter, weighs less and is stronger than a chain.

 
 




 
 
 


Grip Shifters

You get 3 speeds too thanks to a Shimano Nexus 3 shifter and an internal hub combo. Incl in model : pedal, EL250, EL500
You get 8 speeds too thanks to a Shimano Nexus 8 shifter and an internal hub combo. Incl in model :pedal+,EL250+,EL500+







 
Fenders
Color-matched stainless steel fenders. Fend off dirt, mud, sand, rainwater and all other types of surface gunk, which the tires will churn up, with these fenders.We will make the front fenders much larger than the early models that are shown in the videos.​






HQ Battery, LG 3500mah
The 36V x 10,5Ah (250W) or 48V x 10,5Ah (500W) lithium-ion battery can be locked and removed from the ELBI and taken inside to charge while at home or at work. The battery also has a USB charger and an integrated front light. You can even charge your phone while riding the bike.

 
 



 
36V or 48V Front Hub
With a front hub motor, outputting 250 or 500 watts with every pedal stroke, getting frompoint A to B has never been so easy.

 





 
LCD Screen

We give you up to 5 adjustable speed settings for your EL with a high-contrast LCD display that delivers all important information at a glance, is extremely robust and easy to use and also with a walk-assist.
 


 



 

Automatic Smart Lightning System
Upgrade Option.
ELBI can take you anywhere you want to go, even in the dark. The automated lighting system includes front and rear sensors with laser flashing lights to indicate a safe distance to ride. Enjoy the freedom of riding even in the dead of the night. 

 
 



 
Torque Sensor
incl in model : EL250, EL250+
We’ve engineered a sensor that automatically senses your cycling and produces different electrical signals to guide the motor output depending on where and how you’re riding by the force you ride. Whether you’re cruising down the boardwalk or pedaling up a hill, our torque sensor system optimizes motor output to provide 30% more distance on one charge.

 
 





 
Cadence Sensor
incl in model : EL500, EL500+
cadence sensor uses a magnet on the crank, it turns the motor ON when you start pedaling and turns it OFF when you stop pedaling. It works more or less like a switch. You control the boost level and speed by adjusting the assist mode manually up and down. ELBI 500 and 500+ uses this type of sensor as it is most often used with the throttle only.

 
 





 
Rust-free components
The component has been carefully selected to ensure your e-bike will last for years. It is built to be as rust-free as possible – from top to bottom.

 





 
Enginered for easy after-sale service

All components are quick release,  making it easier than ever to remove replace and upgrade
ELBI's components are carefully engineered for an easy upgrade & installing replacement parts. An electric bike ideal for urban travel or outings. 
ELBI's electric components can be disassembled in minutes & require no technical knowledge.

 

 
 
 



   

Tektro Wired Hydraulics (front/rear)
incl in model : Pedal+, EL250+, EL500+
is the premium of braking technology. This system will improve the braking power and feeling of riding a Elbi bike. Hydraulic mean olie is being pushed thru tubes for instantly and powerful disc brake response. Hydraulics are great for braking in all weather conditions. .






 
Shimano Nexus Inter 8
incl in model : Pedal+, EL250+, EL500+
Thanks to the gear change support mechanism, the mechanical shifting resistance is reduced to provide extremely comfortable shifting. The gear ratio is 307%. 

 



  

Shimano Nexus Roller Brake
incl in model : EL500
The Rollerbrake is most practical for urban cycling in areas without long, steep descents. Advantages are that is weatherproof and requires little maintenance.





 
 
 

 


Shimano Coaster Brake
incl in model : Pedal, EL250
Thanks to the gear change support mechanism, the mechanical shifting resistance is reduced to provide extremely comfortable shifting. The gear ratio is 307%. 





 



Automatic drive function​ (throttle)
incl in model : EL500, EL500+
The automatic drive function (throttle) allows you to ride fully electric without using the pedal assist. Please note that this function is only available on our US version, as current legislation does not permit the throttle function in most European countries.






 
 

 
 
 


 
 Want to sweeten your already awesome ride?Check out our add-ons           Model Options     * The difference between the EU and US model is the motor size and automatic drive function.Please note that the US model is not allowed in most European countries. Check your country before placing your order.* The backer is responsible for any additional taxes, duties, and VAT. Taxes, duties, and VAT vary from country to country.In the US, the taxes, duties, and VAT are 0%. In Europe, the amount is 25% in VAT and 6% in duties. For other countries, please check the regulations in your country before purchasing.Please note that taxes, duties, and VAT will be collected after the campaign and before shipping.  The Ahlström BrothersHenrik and John PatrikELBI is brought to you from Sweden with love by the Ahlstroem brothers. The BackstoryThe ELBI story began ten years ago when founder Henrik Ahlström and his two brothers were tasked to develop a small beach cruiser for a local nightclub. The design proved popular and it led to the development of a model aimed for the growing consumer market. In just over a decade, ELBI counts some of the largest companies in Sweden as clients and business partners.The brothers work with industrial design and product development on a daily basis, so this project has been just like riding an e-bike, smooth.  We’ve spent countless hours designing and building what we believe is the most stylish, affordable, and feature-packed e-bike ever.To start up production, we need $25,000. As an Indiegogo exclusive, we’re offering over 50 % discount to make sure we reach our goal. This is a UNIQUE limited offer only available on Indiegogo.Running a crowdfunding campaign requires a 100% transparent approach to our backers. We’ll do everything we can to keep you fully informed about the campaign, production, and shipping. And we promise to deliver the coolest e-bike EVER

story:
THE XMERA E-BIKE IS ON A MISSION TO REVOLUTIONIZE TRANSPORTATION

We're transforming the daily commute of one or two people plus their usual luggage load into a safe and effective workout, by monitoring and controlling the level of fitness effort that will help you reach your goals. 

 

DITCH YOUR GYM MEMBERSHIP

Forget wasting hours idling in traffic every day, only to have to rush to the gym after work. Instead, use your daily commute to improve your health and physical condition while avoiding traffic at the same time. The Xmera e-bike features a BPM (beats per minute) sensor integrated with the e-bike controller (computer of the e-bike) so the motor assistance adjusts to your body's needs and your pre-programmed workout goals. 

 

 

 

 

 Now available and included with all "Plus" Perks

Our sensor is designed to accurately and effectively monitor your heart rate in real time. The Xmera bracelet comes with built-in Bluetooth connectivity and PCG heart rate sensors which pass the information to bike’s controller.

 

Xmera comes with different types of battery cells depending on the model:

  • Xmera 250:  36V 10AH(Samsung) Lithium-ion Battery
  •  Xmera 250S: 2 batteries of 36V 17.5AH/24.5AH(Samsung) Lithium-ion Battery Each
  • Xmera 750: 48V 17.0AH(Samsung) Lithium-ion Battery
  • Xmera 750S: 2 batteries of 48V 17.0AH(Samsung) Lithium-ion Battery Each
  • Xmera 500SS: 2 batteries of 48V 14AH/21AH(Samsung) Lithium-ion Battery Each

The controller of the Xmera is designed to recharge the battery while riding the bike and reduces the need to connect it to a power supply.

 

 

 

The sensors can assist the biker in several workout modes. For example, Xmera can facilitate a constant BPM rate while commuting (fat burn mode)  - a real cardio training session, previously only possible in the gym. The major benefit? Save our Xmera owners' precious time and help them improve their health and condition by keeping their bodies in shape.

While our core mission is the body and machine harmonization, BPM e-bike cardio assisted technology is just the beginning of our e-bike biometric sensor integrations.

 

 


Xmera mobile app unlocks the e-bike while the integrated GPRS signal continuously communicates with the central server and GNSS updating the real-time location of the e-bike on the smartphone app.


Xmera is a medium weight (74 lbs) high performance, long-range electric bicycle and workout machine with a top speed of 20 mph in the US and 24 km/h in the EU. The average battery life ranges from 37 miles (60 km) to 124 miles (200 km) depending on the rider's weight and e-bike's configuration (Xmera comes with a second back-up battery as an add-on option). 

Xmera is equipped with Bafang hub motors and comes in 2 options:
1 motor on the back wheel or 2 motors (back and front wheel) for increased torque and power.

story:
THE UNIMOKE UTLITY ELECTRIC BIKE

 

THANK YOU!

The UNIMOKE e-bike cmpaign has ended and all bikes are delivered to our contributors! UNIMOKE is now being produced as a serial product in Berlin, Germany and we are EXTREMELY thankful to all our brave supporters for making this happen!

Visit our website for updated product info and future orders!

 

 

Check out our NEW Campaign for the coolest ELECTRIC Folding BIKE here!

 

Your support helped us to expand our production workspace, hire more staff and invest in tooling. Collecting pre-orders for the UNIMOKE on Indiegogo enabled us to actually start full production in Berlin, Germany and we are very thankful for this amazing start and chance given!

FOLLOW US 

We keep owners, supporters and our audience updated about the UNIMOKE progress on a daily basis. Also, never hesitate to contact us with any questions you may have... 

Buy Online in our Shop

UNIMOKE EBIKE on Facebook

UNIMOKE OWNERS GROUP

UNIOKE EBIKE on Youtube

story:
Hey!

We are happy to announce that FUBi fixie got the EuroBike 2019 Award.

https://www.eurobike.com/en/program-highlights/...

At the moment we are producing the bikes and frames.

Estimated delivery is now in end of 2019

The finished bikes look like this:

FUBifixie white model

FUBifixie matte black model

The finished products will have:

-Disc brake
-Fork ready for disc brake. (those how opt in for the frame)
-Belt drive ready!
-New frame design with stronger down-tube and top-tube!
-Hand made in Finland.

Check for specs by scrolling down the page.

Check how long we have come with the production and view updates on our blog as well

http://fubifixie.com/blog/

 

We have finished a crowd-funding campaign on Kickstarter. We surpassed our  goal and we closed the campaign with  567,608 SEK from 140 backers. We are now thrilled to continue to have you join our journey and pre-sell FUBi fixie here on Indiegogo at ~30% less than the retail price! .

Please feel free to contact us with any questions, comments, and concerns at info@fubifixie.com or our website http://fubifixie.com/

 

Best

The FUBi team

 

FUBi folding system

The basic idea with FUBi fixie folding principle is to keep as much of the traditional diamond frame as possible. This allows you to transform your existing full-size bike into a folding bike. This without sacrificing riding performance and looks.

The bike

FUBi fixie is a full-size folding bike with the same looks, price and riding features as a "normal" fixie/bike, yet can be folded with ease for convenient transport and storage. It's a has full-sized 700C wheels.

 

 

 

 

Transform your bike into a folding bike  

FUBi fixie is designed with minimal changes to the existing bicycle design. FUBi uses only standard bicycle parts except for the frame. This allows you to use your own custom parts or any available standard parts.

High performance 

Experience the best riding performance among folding bikes. It has the same performance as a normal fixie.

 

Easy to fold

FUBi is easy to fold without having to use any tools. It can be folded and unfolded in 5-10 seconds. When used as a fixed-gear it rolls on the front wheel when folded. If used as a single gear (with freewheel) it rolls on both wheels.

 

Patented frame technology

FUBI fixie has the FUBI patented frame technology that utilizes the triangular principle in order to have a very rigid and light frame.

 

Secure locking system

The folding system allows you to lock FUBi in a more secure way. Lock it around a pillar with front wheels, frame and pillar all locked together with a U-lock.

 

Affordable

Usually folding bikes are expensive. FUBi fixie offers a competitive pricing that can compete with normal bikes, fixed-gear bikes and single-gear bikes.

 

Single-speed, fixed-gear or 3-speed hub

The bikes have a front and rear brake and a flip-flop hub. The bike can be used as a single-speed or fixed-gear bike by turning the rear wheel around. There is also a 3 speed freewheel hub option.

 

 Where it fits

FUBi fixie fits folded in elevators, metro, bus and in most cars.

 

FUBi fixie will be made in Finland to ensure the right production quality. The bikes will be manufactured by our manufacturing partner and our team specialized in both manufacturing and bicycles.

 

 

Fubi will be made of quality parts.

  • FRAME
    FRAME FUBi fixie frame consisting of five different frame parts: loose free pivots for folding and an extra diagonal part for stability and for quick release on down tube.
  • FOLDED DIMENSIONS
    95x80x35cm folded.
  • WEIGHT
    12-13kg
  • GEAR
    Singel-gear & fixed-gear or Sturmey archer 3-speed freewheel hub.
  • HANDLEBAR
    FUBi fixie straight handlebar 45cm wide.
  • BRAKES
    Tektro R539 Brake caliper rear and Repute disc brake front.
  • CHAIN
    KMC, silver.
  •  TIRES & RIMS
    Deep Profile 700 x 32H x 14G, 43mm profile Rim 622, tire 25C-622
  • (23Cx622 to 35Cx622 works on the frame)
  • HUBS
    32H x 14G high flange, cartridge bearings with a rear flip-flop hub.
    Or alt. Sturmey-Archer 3 Speed Freewheel Rear Hub
  • CRANKSET
    Lasgo, 170mm 46t chain ring.
  • BOTTOM BRACKET
    Conventional threaded, Square Taper
  • SADDLE
    Selle royal Viper
 

 

The bike and frame have 2-years warranty.

 

We will ship to anywhere around the world. All units will be packed and shipped in a custom box with a form fitting high-density foam for maximum protection.

 

Please note that we have increased the price a bit since the crowdfunding started, Because the final retail price will be higher.

 

 




How Interlock works with FUBifixie:

Risks and challenges

Similar to many crowdfunding projects, we face several risks and challenges in undertaking this next step in the evolution of FUBi. The primary risks for us include:

ENGINEERING

We have already completed the prototyping and the test phase of the FUBi fixie to our full satisfaction. In the design and construction, we still have some small issues we want to solve in order that the bike functions better. However, we are very confident that we will be able to find the best solutions to solve these issues.

SUPPLY CHAIN

Many crowdfunding campaigns can encounter problems when taking their prototypes to production. Smooth execution is significant to overcome such risks. 
The bikes and the frames will be made by the producers we know and trust. We are therefore confident to be able to produce the bikes on time. However, unexpected things can happen sometimes. If there is a delay, it is for a good reason and most likely because we only ship when the bikes fulfill our requirements.

THE FUBi TEAM

Finding the right people is a challenge for any endeavor. Success in this major step of the evolution of FUBi requires a team of talented, passionate and motivated designers, engineers and entrepreneurs. 
Fubicom is an existing business run by a small team of real people with a passion and ambition for new, different and innovative solutions in the field of bicycles. Because of the major undertaking, this means for us that we are already actively looking for new members to join us.

(23Cx622 to 35Cx622 works on the frame)

In the design and construction, we still have some small issues we want to solve in order that the bike functions better. However, we are very confident that we will be able to find the best solutions to solve these issues.

Many crowdfunding campaigns can encounter problems when taking their prototypes to production. Smooth execution is significant to overcome such risks. The bikes and the frames will be made by the producers we know and trust. We are therefore confident to be able to produce the bikes on time. However, unexpected things can happen sometimes. If there is a delay, it is for a good reason and most likely because we only ship when the bikes fulfill our requirements.
THE FUBi TEAM
Finding the right people is a challenge for any endeavor. Success in this major step of the evolution of FUBi requires a team of talented, passionate and motivated designers, engineers and entrepreneurs. Fubicom is an existing business run by a small team of real people with a passion and ambition for new, different and innovative solutions in the field of bicycles. Because of the major undertaking, this means for us that we are already actively looking for new members to join us.

story:
Introducing the world's most affordable carbon fiber ebike the EC1. Three words: Light, convertible, affordable .The average electric bicycle is approximately 60lbs/27kg. It’s not an ideal bicycle to pedal on it’s own and it’s really meant to be used by motor. Carbon fiber bicycles or carbon electric bicycles are presently only for the lucky ones. The EC1 carbon ebike weighing in at 34 lbs, is a versatile, convertible ebike that weighs less than most conventional bicycles and lets you cruise at speeds of up to 32 kmh/20 mph at the flick of a button.  But wait, you can make this amazing ebike even lighter by removing the back wheel with the motor and replacing it with the free, yes free, extra rim that we are throwing in just to make this an even more incredible product to our early backers. By replacing the back rim, which has the motor, with the regular rim that we are providing for you, you can turn your already super light carbon fiber ebike into a super light mountain bike for when you want to go trekking, or if you want to use the power of your legs instead of the motor.  

The versatility doesn't end there. You can leave the motor and batteries on the bike and only use them when you need the extra boost. You can turn off the bike and just use it as a regular bicycle and save the power for when you need it, or you can turn on the bike and cruise through the streets, the trails, or wherever your heart desires with the amazing power of this awesome ebike. Carbon fiber ebikes presently retail between $3,500 - $20,000+. We want the final product be under $2,000 and we are offering even better deals for early supporters.

Go up to 40 km on one charge with the Lithium Ion Battery

We want the best. We hate settling for anything less. We never like to hear the words 'it’s not possible'. For years people have told us we can’t make a carbon fiber bicycle or carbon fiber electric bicycle for under $2,000. They told us that the frame would be too weak, the battery life would be too short, that it would look too weird. That motivated us even more. Motivated us to prove to them that it CAN be done, that we can provide a dual purpose carbon fiber bicycle / ebike at an incredible price. We began to brainstorm on how to achieve this. We needed the EC1 to be lightweight, modular, strong, streamlined and most importantly affordable. And we finally found a way! But our goal can’t be obtained without your help. With your support, if we reach our goal, we can make all of this, & the EC1, a reality. We want to raise the standard and give everyone the opportunity to enjoy the finer things. Don’t settle. Go for more. Own your very own EC1, the 2 in 1 carbon fiber bicycle and ebike. Help us make this happen by being an early supporter. Own your very own EC1 from $999 USD!!!

The EC1 Carbon frame weighs only 1.15 kg/2.53 lbs


Modular – Exchange the rear wheel with the standard wheel provided and remove the Battery Pack to switch your carbon fiber ebike into a fully functioning bicycle. Save energy for when you really need it with the pedal assist or drop the weight even more and switch to the regular wheel for when you feel like some exercise.

Choose whether you want the motor in the front or the rear

Lightweight – The EC1 uses carbon fiber frame and aluminum alloy components to reduce the weight significantly with the bike weighing only 15.5 kg/34 lbs. Additional carbon fiber upgrades to the rims, handlebars and more can be done to reduce the total weight of the bike even further.

The EC1 weighs only 34 lbs/15.5 kg!

Built to Last – Using unidirectional carbon fiber. We offer the strongest weave of carbon fiber compared to the regular 12K or 3K tow. By doing this we have reduced the weight significantly without sacrificing the structural integrity of the bicycle.

Streamlined – By having the slim frame design you significantly reduce air resistance so you can hit speeds you couldn’t imagine. We also offer racing bike handle bars for those who want to take it to the next level.

We understand that in trying to appeal to all clients, we must cater to them! We allow customization of frame size between 480 mm - 560 mm upon ordering your bike, and if you don't know which size is best for you can refer to this chart: 

All backers will be contacted at the end of the campaign to find out what size of frame you want! 


Indiegogo is a great platform to see if there is interest in our vision. Does the world want a Carbon fiber ebike/bicycle under $2,000? Indiegogo opens the doors to the world’s community and gives us the answer. Plus, Daymak’s goal is to reduce the carbon foot print one ebike at a time and Indiegogo helps us share that vision with the world!

The funds raised will be used for:

  • Finishing the frame mold
  • Finalizing the design of the EC1
  • EN 15194 testing & certification for Europe
  • Develop an international network of service dealers
  • Achieve mass production to get the lowest prices which are passed on to our early supporters

  • Frame : 130 MMR QR, 22" / 560mm Frame ,700 Unidirectional Carbon Fiber 1.15kg / 2.53lbs
  • Headset: 1.125" / 28mm Top 1.5"/38mm Down
  • Rims: Front - 36H Aluminum Rear - 24H Aluminum
  • Forks: 700C Aluminum Suspension Fork
  • Handlebars: Aluminum angle 6 degrees 31 x 2.6 x 620 mm/ 26.7"
  • Tires: 40-622 (700x38c – 28 x 1 5/8 x 1 ½)
  • Gearshift: Shimano EZ Fire - Right 7 Speed 2055mm / Left 3 Speed 1800mm
  • Derailleur: Direct Attachment Type: Rear - Shimano Tourney TX 6/7 Speed, Front - 3 Speed
  • Motor: Daymak Specialized Motor 250W Brushless
  • Controller: Daymak Drive 24V Intelligent Brushless Controller
  • Charge Time: 4 - 6 Hours
  • Levels of Pedal Assist: 5
  • Max Load: 265 lbs / 120 kg
  • Display: LCD Multifunction
  • Weight: 34 lbs / 15.5 kg
  • Range: 25 - 30 km / 15 - 18 miles
  • Battery: 24V10.4 AH GEB Lithium Ion self-locking key release, on-board or off-bike charge capable, LED power indicators, start-up diagnostic feature, magnetic connectors
  • Max Speed: 20 mph - 32 km/h (25 km/h in Europe)
  • Charger: 110V/220V cUL/CE

Upgrade to the Advanced or Pro models and get even more 

The EC1 Advanced comes with carbon fiber rims as well, reducing the weight even further! The EC1 Advanced also has an upgrade to a 36V 7.8ah Samsung Battery which will increase the power for more torque when you need it. The EC1 Advanced will weigh approximately 32lbs / 14.5kg


The EC1 Pro comes with carbon fiber rims, forks, seat , handlebars and extensions. The upgrade on the EC1 Pro gives you a 36V 7.8ah Samsung battery, to give you even more distance before you need to charge again. The EC1 Pro will weigh approximately 28 lbs / 12.7 kg making carrying it up and down stairs a breeze!

Here is our expected timeline from development to delivery for the EC1.

We want to thank you all in advance for even taking the time to check out this project. We aim to show the world that we can escape the habits of old and make new trends. Trends that are, stylish, trends that are innovative, trends that are good for the planet.

Risks and challenges

The risks and challenges that we face, are based on the molding of the frame. We must ensure that we meet the perfect balance of a water resistant ebike, while being able to do any minor modifications like swapping out parts. With anything that is electric it needs to be as sealed securely to avoid corrosion, and as we all know getting caught in the rain is always a real possibility when riding your bike.

With that being said, we have more than 10 years experience developing ebikes, fulfillment, testing, quality assurance. So when we deliver, we truly deliver. No surprises!
story_txt:
Introducing the world's most affordable carbon fiber ebike the EC1. Three words: Light, convertible, affordable .The average electric bicycle is approximately 60lbs/27kg. It’s not an ideal bicycle to pedal on it’s own and it’s really meant to be used by motor. Carbon fiber bicycles or carbon electric bicycles are presently only for the lucky ones. The EC1 carbon ebike weighing in at 34 lbs, is a versatile, convertible ebike that weighs less than most conventional bicycles and lets you cruise at speeds of up to 32 kmh/20 mph at the flick of a button.  But wait, you can make this amazing ebike even lighter by removing the back wheel with the motor and replacing it with the free, yes free, extra rim that we are throwing in just to make this an even more incredible product to our early backers. By replacing the back rim, which has the motor, with the regular rim that we are providing for you, you can turn your already super light carbon fiber ebike into a super light mountain bike for when you want to go trekking, or if you want to use the power of your legs instead of the motor.  The versatility doesn't end there. You can leave the motor and batteries on the bike and only use them when you need the extra boost. You can turn off the bike and just use it as a regular bicycle and save the power for when you need it, or you can turn on the bike and cruise through the streets, the trails, or wherever your heart desires with the amazing power of this awesome ebike. Carbon fiber ebikes presently retail between $3,500 - $20,000+. We want the final product be under $2,000 and we are offering even better deals for early supporters.Go up to 40 km on one charge with the Lithium Ion BatteryWe want the best. We hate settling for anything less. We never like to hear the words 'it’s not possible'. For years people have told us we can’t make a carbon fiber bicycle or carbon fiber electric bicycle for under $2,000. They told us that the frame would be too weak, the battery life would be too short, that it would look too weird. That motivated us even more. Motivated us to prove to them that it CAN be done, that we can provide a dual purpose carbon fiber bicycle / ebike at an incredible price. We began to brainstorm on how to achieve this. We needed the EC1 to be lightweight, modular, strong, streamlined and most importantly affordable. And we finally found a way! But our goal can’t be obtained without your help. With your support, if we reach our goal, we can make all of this, & the EC1, a reality. We want to raise the standard and give everyone the opportunity to enjoy the finer things. Don’t settle. Go for more. Own your very own EC1, the 2 in 1 carbon fiber bicycle and ebike. Help us make this happen by being an early supporter. Own your very own EC1 from $999 USD!!!The EC1 Carbon frame weighs only 1.15 kg/2.53 lbsModular – Exchange the rear wheel with the standard wheel provided and remove the Battery Pack to switch your carbon fiber ebike into a fully functioning bicycle. Save energy for when you really need it with the pedal assist or drop the weight even more and switch to the regular wheel for when you feel like some exercise.Choose whether you want the motor in the front or the rearLightweight – The EC1 uses carbon fiber frame and aluminum alloy components to reduce the weight significantly with the bike weighing only 15.5 kg/34 lbs. Additional carbon fiber upgrades to the rims, handlebars and more can be done to reduce the total weight of the bike even further.The EC1 weighs only 34 lbs/15.5 kg!Built to Last – Using unidirectional carbon fiber. We offer the strongest weave of carbon fiber compared to the regular 12K or 3K tow. By doing this we have reduced the weight significantly without sacrificing the structural integrity of the bicycle.Streamlined – By having the slim frame design you significantly reduce air resistance so you can hit speeds you couldn’t imagine. We also offer racing bike handle bars for those who want to take it to the next level.We understand that in trying to appeal to all clients, we must cater to them! We allow customization of frame size between 480 mm - 560 mm upon ordering your bike, and if you don't know which size is best for you can refer to this chart: All backers will be contacted at the end of the campaign to find out what size of frame you want! Indiegogo is a great platform to see if there is interest in our vision. Does the world want a Carbon fiber ebike/bicycle under $2,000? Indiegogo opens the doors to the world’s community and gives us the answer. Plus, Daymak’s goal is to reduce the carbon foot print one ebike at a time and Indiegogo helps us share that vision with the world!The funds raised will be used for:
Finishing the frame mold
Finalizing the design of the EC1
EN 15194 testing & certification for Europe
Develop an international network of service dealers
Achieve mass production to get the lowest prices which are passed on to our early supporters

Headset: 1.125" / 28mm Top 1.5"/38mm Down

Rims: Front - 36H Aluminum Rear - 24H Aluminum

Forks: 700C Aluminum Suspension Fork

Handlebars: Aluminum angle 6 degrees 31 x 2.6 x 620 mm/ 26.7"

Tires: 40-622 (700x38c – 28 x 1 5/8 x 1 ½)

Gearshift: Shimano EZ Fire - Right 7 Speed 2055mm / Left 3 Speed 1800mm

Derailleur: Direct Attachment Type: Rear - Shimano Tourney TX 6/7 Speed, Front - 3 Speed

Motor: Daymak Specialized Motor 250W Brushless

Controller: Daymak Drive 24V Intelligent Brushless Controller

Charge Time: 4 - 6 Hours

Levels of Pedal Assist: 5

Max Load: 265 lbs / 120 kg

Display: LCD Multifunction

Weight: 34 lbs / 15.5 kg

Range: 25 - 30 km / 15 - 18 miles

Battery: 24V10.4 AH GEB Lithium Ion self-locking key release, on-board or off-bike charge capable, LED power indicators, start-up diagnostic feature, magnetic connectors

Max Speed: 20 mph - 32 km/h (25 km/h in Europe)

Charger: 110V/220V cUL/CE

The EC1 Advanced also has an upgrade to a 36V 7.8ah Samsung Battery which will increase the power for more torque when you need it. The EC1 Advanced will weigh approximately 32lbs / 14.5kg
The EC1 Pro comes with carbon fiber rims, forks, seat , handlebars and extensions. The upgrade on the EC1 Pro gives you a 36V 7.8ah Samsung battery, to give you even more distance before you need to charge again. The EC1 Pro will weigh approximately 28 lbs / 12.7 kg making carrying it up and down stairs a breeze!



Here is our expected timeline from development to delivery for the EC1.




We want to thank you all in advance for even taking the time to check out this project. We aim to show the world that we can escape the habits of old and make new trends. Trends that are, stylish, trends that are innovative, trends that are good for the planet.

Risks and challenges
The risks and challenges that we face, are based on the molding of the frame. We must ensure that we meet the perfect balance of a water resistant ebike, while being able to do any minor modifications like swapping out parts. With anything that is electric it needs to be as sealed securely to avoid corrosion, and as we all know getting caught in the rain is always a real possibility when riding your bike.
With that being said, we have more than 10 years experience developing ebikes, fulfillment, testing, quality assurance. So when we deliver, we truly deliver. No surprises!

story:
The Smart Ped gets you anywhere around the city, comfortably and effortless. The Kick assisted e-bike gives you the smartest move possible around the city for travelling short-medium and longer distances for both going to work, or just cruising around.

 



 


 

The Smart Ped is easy to use, fold and carry around. It’s made of innovative ultra-light materials. You can easily fold it and carry it around everywhere you go.

 

Using the Smart Ped is simple and fun: all it needs is a kick and the kick assist will take care of the rest. One kick takes you as far as 1km!

 

If you prefer a different cruising experience, you can simply access and change the settings through the BitRide app available for both iOs and Android devices. From the app, you can even set-up a smart lock so that no-one will be able to use your Smart Ped without your permission.



 


The Smart Ped is built to perfectly adapt to your needs: the technology behind it is complex, but using it is extremely easy and efficient.

You stand on it, connect to the BitRide app and go!

You will have full control over both battery usage and speed, thanks to the connection between the engine and your smartphone. The new Smart Ped makes moving around the city safe and practical with a maximum speed of 25km/h and a 30km traveling distance with on full battery life. The Smart Ped is equipped with the latest version of the awarded “Zehus Bike All In One” hybrid engine, making it both efficient and eco-friendly.

Thanks to the KERS (Kinetic Energy Recovery System), every time you hit the brakes, your Smart Ped will gain battery life (unless it is already at 100%).

FlyKly guarantees a battery life of 30km, making this revolutionary e-kick bike usable for more than a day with one charge only.

 


 

The Smart Ped works by connecting your smartphone to the BitRide app.

All you need to do is download the app and it will connect automatically to your Smart Ped, and you’re good to go!

Connecting your Smart Ped to your smartphone allows you to widely customize your cruising experience. You can choose your riding style, increase and decrease the kick assist range, manage the smart lock feature, and soon, also activate all Bluetooth devices connected to it such as your helmet.

   

 


The Ped concept was born 100 years ago with the Auto Ped. It was a mobility system for postmen in New York.

We made it smart through usability studies and technology.




The new Smart Ped is very agile. It allows you to easily travel in traffic and reach your destination in no time. The fact that it’s extremely easy to fold enables you to carry it everywhere in your office, public transport, your car and even the elevator.

250W of power, with a maximum speed of 25km/h, switch brakes, both front and back lights, classify the Smart Ped as Pedelec25, not requiring wearing a helmet or passing any driving tests for anyone over 14 years of age.




The Smart Ped allows you to save up to 40% of the effort required to ride a common bicycle.

The KERS system and Zehus engine combo, converts your brakes power into energy, fueling your battery.

This allows your Smart Ped to maintain its battery life with optimal efficiency while supporting you whenever you need it. It’s an electric bike, but you don’t necessarily need to charge it.

Obviously, you can always connect it to a power supply to store extra energy for emergencies.

 

 




FlyKly is part of the Zehus group - Italy.

Our mission is to make cities more bike friendly with new and smart mobility solutions.

FlyKly creates and offers eco-friendly mobility solutions for people in need of a smart move around the city.




Our mission is to promote a more eco-friendly and healthy lifestyle in cities around the world. We want to create the perfect conditions to move around urban areas efficiently and in a smart way.

People come before cars.





The word “Kly” comes from the greek and it signifies “constant energy”. FlyKly represents our way of building a new, energetic and efficient world.




There are hundreds of people around the world using a FlyKly product with a Smart Wheel. 

The Smart Ped has already been developed and tested.

All we need is you!



The  Smart Ped is ready. What you saw in the videos above is real and functioning.

We are experienced and ready to deliver according to plans, as we have worked for over 4 years in delivering products for smart commuting.

Tiny inconveniences happen from time to time, and if they do, we will let you know and work out a solution.

Our products are assembled and shipped from Milan, Italy

 


 

Is Smart Ped an electric scooter?

No, the Smart Ped is an e-kick bike. Smart Ped has an electric motor but no control knobs. You just need one kick to activate the engine: after that, you won’t need to do anything else for almost a kilometer.

 

How does the innovative engine that runs the motor work?

The technology behind it is quite complicated, but it is very easy to explain. One kick, and it’s working. You brake, and it’s slowing down and it’s stopping

 

What if I want to kick less than a kilometer?

You just need to open Bitride app and change the ‘kick assist’ setting with a click.

 

Is Smart Ped legal? Can I use it in my city?

The new Smart Ped is categorized as a Pedelec25 so you can use it in your city without any worries.

 

Why would I have to support you?

The new Smart Ped is ready to go and ready to be produced. We just need your help to make it real!

 


 

Is there a warranty on my Smart Ped?

Yes, there is a limited warranty of 2 years on your Smart Ped.
 

How do I turn on the e-kick bike? Off?

Your Smart Ped wakes up when you reach 6 km/h, then your smart ped will turn off automatically after 2 minutes when no action is detected. If you connected with your smartphone, the turn-off time is raised to 10 minutes.

 

How long does it take to fully charge the battery?

Approximately 2,5 hrs when the battery pack is completely empty. We also offer a car charger that can use the 12V plug of your car/RV to charge your Smart Ped!

 

Will I damage the battery if I run it all the way dead?

No. There’s no need to worry about over discharging your battery from riding. We have designed the system to always stay within a safe operating range while in use. However, do not let your Smart Ped stays empty for long periods of time, otherwise please charge it at least once every 45 days.

 

Can I make it go faster than the listed top speed?

We limit the speeds for safety. Sorry, we won’t raise the max limit for anyone nor can you access the software in any way to change that yourself as higher speeds can damage the electronics. Any alteration, tampering or modification of the electronics, battery, controller, throttle, motor, circuitry or related electrical wiring will not be serviced or supported by Smart Ped and will void the warranty. What backers do on their own after they receive their models outside the warranty is up to them.

 

How does the regenerative braking (KERS) work?

Regenerative braking returns charge to the battery whenever you command the Smart Ped to slow down. Examples include using braking to stop, or braking while going down a hill. Simply coasting, or kicking without engaging the brake does not put any amount of charge back into the battery

 

Can I ride it off-road, jump off ramps/curbs or other hardcore trick riding?

We have engineered the scooter to handle shock and vibration, riding off curbs, doing jumps/hops, etc. To prolong the life of the product we recommend minimizing stunt riding. However, the scooter can ride off-road in general since it’s components are sealed from dust, dirt and water, or on grass or hard pack dirt. Even with the thick 16" wheels, we recommend slower speeds on loose gravel as the product was mainly designed for and performs best on paved or urban street riding and for occasional rough terrain. Please always check tire pressure before riding. Low tire pressure may result in loss of range and damage to the rims / frame.

 

How do I know when the battery is low?

Check easily the battery charge indicator within the BitRide app, your Smart Ped travel console.

 

How long of a lifecycle does the battery have?

Smart Ped uses only premium lithium cells in its battery packs. Battery pack is guaranteed for 2 years, but Riders can expect their battery to last many more (approx 5 yrs) under normal daily use.

 

Is the Smart Ped rustproof and waterproof?

IP54 Water resistant body & IPX5 Weatherproof battery/motor/controller electronics system. The scooter is water resistant (splash proof) during normal riding but it goes without saying that it should not be submerged under water. The sensitive and sophisticated electronics are sealed within the water & dustproof frame and the throttle. Never expose the enclosed electronics/wiring to water. Riding the scooter in wet environments like rain, snow or mud can still cause the bearings and hardware to corrode over time requiring regular replacement long term. In addition, riding in wet conditions is slippery and extremely dangerous on any scooter, so we don’t advise it on a regular basis. Damage due to water is not covered under your warranty. Always wipe off water afterward and keep it dry to preserve the scooters life. It is always best to store the scooter indoors (in a garage or closet) rather than outdoors for prolonged storage.

 

If the battery runs out can I kick with the scooter?

Yes, absolutely. The Smart Ped is designed to be kicked along just like any other kick scooter with the electrics either turned on or off.

 

Do I need a special license, insurance or registration to ride a Smart Ped?

Nope! According to European regulation, the NEW Smart Ped is categorized as a Pedelec25 and does not require a license. However, we recommend that riders are at least 14 years old and wear a helmet at all times. Check your local and state laws for requirements specific to your area. Smart Ped is legal and classified as an electric bike almost everywhere, and as such don’t require a special license. There are a few jurisdictions with more specific laws and we recommend to check those before riding if you are concerned.

 

Is it legal to ride the Smart Ped in my country?

European and US laws may vary. Many state laws approve the use of electric scooters in bike lanes of general road traffic and of course on private land and off-road. All countries have their own rules on light electric vehicles so it’s best to consult with your local transportation authority. Helmets are required by law in some places and optional in other places. Please check your local regulations

 

When does it ship?

We want to make sure the quality is perfect so we don’t want to rush them out sooner than promised, so will be ready to ship starting February 1st. Please check out our "production timeline" and we’ll be updating weekly as the production process continues to see if we can speed up the process and shipping.

 

I want to be a rep/distributor/retailer, how do I start?

We are open to amazing retailers worldwide that have awesome physical retail spaces. If you have a retail store you would like to carry Smart Peds in, inquire by emailing us at dealers@flykly.com.

 

How can I contact you?

You can email us anytime at hello@flykly.com or like us on Facebook, follow us on Instagram and Twitter, and subscribe on YouTube!

story:
When you think back to the first time you rode a bike, overwhelming feelings of joy and accomplishment come to mind. That first taste of independence comes back, your self esteem rises and you remember believing that anything is possible. Many children across the globe will never have this experience, or cherish memories like these. We don’t want anyone to miss out on owning their first bike and experiencing these breakthroughs, so Pinkbike and Trailforks created the Share the Ride Foundation.

 

Teaming up with our sponsors and distributors globally, Share The Ride raises money to bring disadvantaged children from all over the world the opportunity to share the joy of being on 2 wheels by providing them with bicycles, helmets and locks.

 

Since its inception in 2013, the foundation has raised over $130,000 and brought smiles to hundreds of children around the world including the Czech Republic, India, Poland, USA, Canada, UK, Australia, South Africa, Taiwan and NZ.

 

Last year Share the Ride blew past its 2015 goal of $40,000 by raising a grand total of $47,124. Underprivileged children in locations all around the globe got to understand the immense satisfaction that owning a bike can bring.

 

This year our goal is to raise $45,000 and distribute even more bikes globally! So put today’s coffee money towards stoking some kids out, and making their holiday season a wheely wheely good one. Visit www.pinkbike.com/sharetheride to donate!

story:
Why BlueMAX

If you fly an Avidyne-equipped Cirrus SR20 or SR22 you almost certainly rely on the MFD to display detailed engine data. The MFD does that job quite well, but the hardware and software was designed over 15 years ago and hasn't changed in that time. The hardware is becoming more expensive to maintain and there is no prospect of any software upgrade in the future. 

The BlueMAX adapter enables you to access the same engine data as the MFD uses but stream it wirelessly via Bluetooth to a portable device such as a phone or tablet allowing easier and more versatile ways to view the data.

Benefits

  • Redundancy - if your MFD fails, or has to be removed for maintenance you can still see all your engine data.
  • Features - the BlueMAX software application goes beyond the MFD user interface, offering higher resolution logging, individual fuel tank tracking, easier data uploads and much more.
  • The option to completely remove the MFD - virtually all the other functions of the MFD can already be replicated on a portable device - with BlueMAX engine monitoring the last reason to keep the legacy MFD disappears.
  • Customisation - you may want to run your engine more conservatively than the redline and caution limits that are hardwired into the MFD - the BlueMAX app will allow you to choose your own limits and be alerted when they are reached.
  • Logging - instead of the 6 second data logging interval used by the MFD, BlueMAX logs engine data every second at a higher resolution. Uploading log files to SavvyAnalysis or Cirrusreports is much easier - just connect your portable device to WiFi or a mobile network and upload instantly - no need to be at the plane, on ground power, with a carefully formatted USB stick.

The Project

Right now prototype hardware is working and has been installed into one aircraft. The software app is working on Android and has been tested on multiple devices. Not all planned features are yet implemented but there are no major challenges in completing these, other than the time and money required to do so.

iOS support will be provided in two ways - a stand-alone app based on the Android app, and by existing EFB vendors adding support for BlueMAX to their own applications. At this stage one such vendor (Aerovie) has agreed to do so.

This campaign is intended to establish that there is sufficient demand for the product to justify a production run of PC boards and cases - both of which have setup costs that require a minimum number to make it feasible.

Installation

Installation is relatively straightforward. In all aircraft a single power wire needs to be run to the breaker panel. In DAU equipped aircraft (those with a glovebox rather than analog engine gauges) the adapter plugs between two existing connectors. In SIU equipped aircraft (those with analog engine gauges on the right of the panel) either new connectors matching the DAU aircraft can be installed, or depending on the age of your aircraft there may be existing connectors that can be used with a pre-made harness, which will be offered at a modest extra cost. The time required to install is likely to be 1-2 hours.

Installation will need to be done by an authorised person (e.g. an A&P.) Depending on what country you are in, some kind of approval may be required. In the US the FAA regulations and published policies for portable devices in aircraft suggest that a logbook entry will be all that is required, but this will be up to the A&P to assess. It is planned to obtain an EASA minor change approval which will permit installation in Europe, and should also be usable in Australia, New Zealand and Canada under reciprocal agreements.
