MOTOR TYPE: Integrated, clutch-less direct drive
MOTOR: 250 watt, proprietary, high efficiency, permanent magnet motor
MOTOR WEIGHT: 1.37 kg
MAXIMUM TORQUE: 50 Nm
GEAR SHIFT DETECTION: Yes
TOP SPEED: 25 km/h (because of limitation by law)
SMALL BATTERY:Weight: 0.60 kg / capacity: 110 Watt hour / voltage: 44v /range: 40 - 60 km* / duration: 1.5 h at 50% performance
LARGE BATTERY: Weight: 1.20 kg / capacity: 290 Watt hour / voltage: 44v /range: 130 - 150 km* / duration: 3 h at 50% performance
DIMENSIONS INCL. CONTROL UNIT:Small battery: 292 x 82 x 52 mm / Large battery: 312 x 82 x 52 mm
BATTERY TYPE: Sealed, maintenance-free, lithium-ion
BATTERY CHARGER WEIGHT: 350 g
BATTERY CHARGE TIME: approx. 3 h
*Range is generally depending on speed, terrain, rider weight and driving conditions
Where can I buy the bimoz?Here on Indiegogo there are "Perks" which are packages with corresponding equipment. At this moment in time there is no alternative way to order something anywhere else. If you have further questions about payment please contact our support team at: support@bimoz.ch
When are the perks expected to be delivered?We will start delivery in October 2019.
How fast is the shipping?Please email us on: shipping@bimoz.ch
What is included in the delivery?According to the perk you order you will get the elements which are in the description. The bimoz-system always includes the connector, the control-unit, a battery, the power regulator, a bluetooth-speed-detector and the installation guide. 
Can I pick-up the bimoz locally?No, we only offer shipping at the moment.
Do you offer a warranty? If so, how does the completion or transaction work?We offer a two years warranty according to the EC regulations. If you have further questions, please contact our service: support@bimoz.ch
Who do I contact if I have questions concerning the product or the payment?Please contact our support team directly regarding this at: support@bimoz.ch
Why is the bimoz so light?Because it is the first gearless permanent magnet direct drive, which makes it quiet, robust and brilliantly simple in construction and requires only a minimal time to install.
How good is the quality?We deliver high quality – made in Europe!
What kind of feeling is it to drive the bimoz system?Since the bimoz system is directly linked to the bottom bracket, the engine support fits perfectly on the turn – we call it „the flow“! The highly sensitive sensors optimally adjust the motor support to match your pedalling: bike riding remains bike riding and the support adjusts itself to your “flow.” This makes the support seem very smooth, harmonized and integrated into your own riding style.
Must I necessarily press in the pedals?Yes, of course! This is what makes cycling what it is. A little movement is good for your health. This means when you press in the pedals the bimoz gives you support. You decide how much by regulating the amount of support. Scooter driving is something completely different, and takes away the fun of riding.
Can I drive the bimoz system without motor assistance?Because bimoz is a gearless direct drive motor, your bicycle can be used without motor support as a normal bike without any friction or resistance!
Is the bimoz meant just for old people?No! The bimoz is for all people. Women who cannot keep up so readily with their sporting men, children who have the same problem as their fathers, older people who have the problem as their grandchildren – commuters, sporty people, fitness fanatics or their complete opposites. The bimoz app will make it especially essential for us all.
Can I use the bimoz for any bicycle?Primarily yes. There are a few bikes where the bimoz does not fit. 2 factors are crucial: The length of the frame (for the battery with control) and the crank length. The bimoz will have 5 different crank lengths, covering about 95% of the usual crank lengths. As to which crank length you require is something we can determine after the Indiegogo campaign is successfully completed. Of course the bicycle should be in an impeccable state and safe to use on the roads. Especially the brakes should work correctly. If you have any questions, please contact our support team at: support@bimoz.ch
How do I know how to install the bimoz sytem on my bicycle?We provide you with a full installation guide, also you will find installation videos on our Youtube channel for all different typ of pedals (more to come).
Do I need extra tools to install the bimoz on my bicycle?No, any special tools are part of the delivery.
Do I need to bring my bicycle to a workshop to have it installed?No, because the bimoz is inherently a retrofit kit. Briefly:

Mount battery
remove only left pedals and crank
put our connector on your bottom bracket
fit bimoz
attach control unit and affix cable
finished!

However, we do admit that you must have had a wrench in your hand. The time of the installation amounts to about 20 minutes.
How far do I get with the bimoz?Honestly? To this question there are many answers or none! Depending on altitude, terrain and level of support, full-day tours are also feasible. But honestly, you are riding a bicycle, and if you ride straight ahead or downhill you can still step on the pedals. The bimoz functions without drive, without friction or extra effort on your part as with your normal bicycle. As additional batteries are offered, you should pack a second battery in your backpack on exhausting tours. For the ride to work (average 19 kilometers, in major cities 11 kilometers) a single battery charge is always sufficient.Small battery: up to 60 km*Large battery: up to 150 km** depending on speed, terrain, rider weight, driving conditions
What is the maximum torque?The torque is limited to 50 Nm, this is to protect the switching gear.
Can the bimoz get wet?Yes, the bimoz works in any weather, at any temperature, and also in all types of terrain. Always make sure that the battery does not stay out all night that is something they generally do not like.
Is it possible to lock the battery to the bicycle? Is the battery removable?The battery is securely fixed to the bicycle during operation. The battery can be removed on its own for example when charging.
What is the lifespan of the battery?Up to 1000 cycles over a period of 5 years.
Can I use other battery packs?Unfortunately not, because bimoz is a self-contained closed unit. The bimoz is a smart drive and can do more than all other Pedelec retrofit kits. The controls for the bimoz and the connection for the bimoz app are located in the lower part of the battery. For this reason, batteries from other manufacturers are not suitable for the bimoz.
Where can the bimoz be used legally?Everywhere in structures with your local road laws.
Do I need an addition registration for the bimoz, or an additional driver's license?You do not need a license for the bimoz (support up to 25 km/h, max. 250 watts). However, there are the relevant road traffic regulations in different countries. If you have any questions in this regard, please contact our customer service: support@bimoz.ch
Do I need any safety equipment when using bimoz?No, but we do generally recommend wearing a helmet.
How much is the bimoz app?Nothing – if the Crowd Funding targets are reached, we will provide you with this app for Android and iOS for free and will continuously maintain and develop it, so you can really use it.
Is there also a cell phone mount for the bimoz?No, because these are available elsewhere for a reasonable price. There are already proven products from the Internet or bike stores – we do not want to reinvent the wheel here.
...........................................................................................................................................
 Deutsche Version ...........................................................................................................................................

bimoz ist ein leistungsstarker smarter E-Bike-Mittelmotor und kann mit wenig Aufwand jedem Fahrrad installiert werden.


Getriebeloser Mittelmotor mit Direkantrieb (Permanentmagnetmotor)
Bis zu 150 km Reichweite
Wiegt weniger als 2 kg inkl. standard Batterie
Reibungsloser Leerlauf – Fahrrad behält gewohnte Fahreigenschaften bei ausgeschaltetem Motor
Integrierte Nabenbauart die sich vollständig in das Tretlagergehäuse integriert
Bimoz fügt sich harmonisch in das Design Ihres Fahrrades ein
Intelligente Sensoren im Pedalgahäuse integriert
Patentierte Technologie
Stufenlose Drehzahlregelung



Wir haben das wohl leichteste und einfachste System weltweit um Ihr Fahrrad in ein E-Bike umzurüsten
250 Watt Motor plus standard Batterie wiegt weniger als 2 kg!
Hergestellt in Europa - hohe Qualität
Direktantrieb ohne Zahnräder, Riemen oder Kupplungen zwischen dem Reiter und dem Hauptkettenrad = hohe Leistungen mit geringer Wartung
Kompatibel mit fast allen Schalt- und Kurbelsystemen im Markt;ermöglicht ein effizientes Drehmoment des Motors
Extrem leise, kompakt, robust und wartungsarm
Keine Reibungsverluste während der Fahrt ohne motorische Unterstützung
Mit bimoz verwandeln Sie Ihr Lieblings-Fahrrad innerhalb von nur 20 Minuten in ein E-Bike mit all dem Komfort Ihres persönlichen Fahrrads und der Unterstützung eines hochwertigen E-Bike Systems


Der bimoz ist als Direct Drive konzipiert worden.Diese revolutionäre Technik ermöglicht gleich mehrere interessante Features:
 
Antriebssupport an Bergen - je stärker Du treten musst, desto mehr hilft Dir der bimoz.
Kein "schieben" oder "ziehen" dank Mittelantrieb, keine hörbaren Fahrgeräusche des Antriebs.
Fahren ohne Antrieb ist ohne Änderung des Fahrverhaltens möglich. Du kannst Dein Fahrrad nutzen, als wäre es Dein normales Fahrrad.
Durch unser Konstruktionsprinzip "less is more" haben wir den bimoz auf unter 2 Kilogramm gebracht (250 Watt, Standard Akku).
Trainingsfunktion: Der bimoz ist ein ideales Trainingsgerät. Mit der "bimoz- App" können wie bei einem Hometrainer "Bergfahrten" simuliert werden - im Flachland.
Cardiotraining ist ebenfalls möglich: Du gibst Deine Pulsfrequenz ein, und der bimoz unterstützt Dich, wenn es zuviel wird, oder bremst Dich aus, wenn Dir die Strecke zu leicht wird.
Über die bimoz-App lassen sich schöne Routen mit Freunden teilen.

 
BEKANNT AUS

 

 
Der Umstieg in die Elektromobilität ist nicht nur eine Domäne der Autos. Gerade in Urbanen Räumen ist der Umstieg auf Fahrräder wünschenswert. Aber wer möchte schon verschwitzt ins Büro kommen? Hierfür ist der bimoz genau das Richtige. Der bimoz lässt einem die Wahl zwischen Fahrradfahren und Elektroantrieb. Das echte bimoz-feeling ist wie "Bergabfahren mit Rückenwind". In wenigen Minuten kann fast jeder sein Fahrrad in ein Pedelec verwandeln. Keine Parkplatzprobleme, kein Stau - so sieht die Welt mit dem bimoz aus. bimoz ist ein Qualitätsprodukt und verhält sich wie ein Schweizer Uhrwerk: So präzise und feinfühlig unterstützt der bimoz den Fahrer. Der Akku ist abnehmbar und kann so bequem zuhause oder am Arbeitsplatz aufgeladen werden.
 
Produktion, Design, Elektronik und Kontrolle:

Jahrzehntelange Erfahrung in der Motorrad- und Energieeinsparungstechik
Viele Jahre als Renningenieur tätig in der höchsten Klasse der früheren Moto-GP
Erfinder vieler hochwertiger Technologien
Kooperiert seit Jahren mit der technischen Universität in Mailand (Polytechnikum) 

"weniger ist mehr- Dinge müssen einfach sein damit sie ewig funktionieren"
   Du liebst den bimoz und willst uns helfen diese tolle Idee nach vorne zu bringen?
Dann erzähl Deinen Freunden und Bekannten wie gut der bimoz ist. Je mehr Menschen auf das Fahrrad umsteigen, desto besser ist es für uns. aber auch für die Umwelt. Beeil Dich, denn die "Early-Bird-offers..." sind begrenzt - warte also nicht zu lange.
Source: clapway website
Gewicht Total (Motor + Batterie): 1.97 kg
MOTORTYP : Integrierter, kupplungsloser Direktantrieb
MOTOR: 250 Watt Permanentmagnetmotor mit hoher Effizienz
MOTORGEWICHT: 1.37 kg
MAXIMALES DREHMOMENT: 50 Nm
SCHALTPUNKTERKENNUNG: Ja
HÖCHSTGESCHWINDIGKEIT: 25 km/h (wegen gesetzlicher Beschränkung)
STANDARD-AKKU :Gewicht: 0.60 kg / Kapazität: 110 Watt-Stunde / Spannung: 44vReichweite: 40 - 60 km* / Laufzeit: 1,5 Stunden bei 50% Leistung
XL-AKKU :Gewicht: 1.20 kg / Kapazität: 290 Watt-Stunde / Spannung: 44vReichweite: 130 - 150 km* / Laufzeit: 3 Stunden bei 50% Leistung
GRÖSSE INKL. STEUEREINHEITStandard-Akku: 292 x 82 x 52 mm / XL-Akku: 312 x 82 x 52 mm
AKKUTYP: Verschlossen, wartungsfrei, Lithium-Polymer
BATTERIELADEGERÄT GEWICHT: 350 g
AKKU-LADEZEIT: ca. 3 Stunden
*die Reichweite ist abhängig von Geschwindigkeit, Gelände, Fahrergewicht und Fahrbedingungen
Wo kann ich den bimoz kaufen?Hier auf Indiegogo kannst du die "Perks" (also Pakete) mit entsprechenden Ausstattungen bestellen. Zurzeit gibt es keine alternative Möglichkeit irgendwo anders zu bestellen. Wenn Du weitere Fragen zur Bezahlung hast, kontaktiere bitte unser Support-Team: support@bimoz.ch
Wann werden die Perks voraussichtlich ausgeliefert?Wir werden ab Oktober 2019 mit der Auslieferung beginnen.
Wie lange dauert der Versand zu mir nach Hause?Bitte sende uns dazu seine E-Mail an: shipping@bimoz.ch
Was ist in der Lieferung enthalten?Du erhältst passend zu dem von dir ausgewählten Paket alle Bestandteile, welche in der Paketbeschreibung aufgelistet sind. Das bimoz-System enthält immer den Adapter, die Steuereinheit, einen Akku, den Leistungsregler, ein Bluetooth-Geschwindigkeitsmesser und eine Montageanleitung.
Kann ich den bimoz auch abholen?Nein, wir bieten aktuell nur den Versand an.
Bietet ihr eine Garantie an? Wenn ja, wie kann man diese in Anspruch nehmen?Wir bieten eine 2-jährige Garantie, entsprechend den EU-Verordnungen. Bei weiteren Fragen wende dich bitte an unseren Support: support@bimoz.ch
Wen kann ich kontaktieren wenn ich Fragen zum Produkt oder der Bezahlung habe?Bitte kontaktiere diesbezüglich unser Support-Team direkt unter: support@bimoz.ch
Warum ist der bimoz so leicht?Der bimoz ist der erste, getriebefreie Permanentmagnetmotor-Direktantrieb. Dadurch ist er superleise, widerstandfähig, brillant einfach konstruiert und superschnell anzubringen.
Wie gut ist die Qualität vom bimoz?Wir liefern hochwertige Qualität – Made in Europe!
Wie fühlt es sich an mit dem bimoz-System zu fahren?Da das bimoz-System direkt an der unteren Pedalaufhängung angeschlossen wird, ist die Antriebsunterstützung perfekt im Einklang zur Tretbewegung – wir nennen es "den Flow". Die ausgeklügelten Sensoren erkennen deine Tretbewegung und passen die Motorleistung entsprechend an, d.h. Fahrradfahren bleibt immer noch Fahrradfahren. Der Support fühlt sich sehr smooth und harmonisch an und passt sich perfekt an deinen eigenen Fahrstil an.
Muss ich unbedingt in die Pedale treten?Ja natürlich! Das macht Fahrradfahren erst zu dem was es ist. Ein bisschen Bewegung ist gut für deine Gesundheit. Das bedeutet, wenn du in die Pedale trittst, unterstützt dich der bimoz. Wie viel, das bestimmst du, indem du die Kraft der Unterstützung regelst. Mofa fahren ist etwas ganz anderes, und nimmt unserer Meinung den Fahrspaß.
Ist es mit dem bimoz möglich auch ohne Motorunterstützung zu fahren?Da der bimoz ein getriebeloser Permanentmagnetmotor-Direktantrieb ist kannst du dein Fahrrad auch jederzeit mit ausgeschaltetem Motor fahren - ohne Reibung oder Widerstand.
Ist der bimoz nur etwas für alte Leute?Nein! Der bimoz ist für alle Menschen gemacht. Frauen, die nicht so ohne weiteres mit ihren sportlichen Männern mithalten können, Kindern die das gleiche Problem mit ihrem Vater haben, ältere Menschen, die das Problem mit ihren Enkeln haben – Pendler, Sportcracks, Fitnessfanatiker oder das komplette Gegenteil davon. Insbesondere mit der App wird der bimoz für uns alle unverzichtbar.
Kann ich den bimoz für jedes Fahrrad benutzen?Prinzipiell ja. Es gibt wenige Fahrräder bei denen der bimoz nicht passt. Ausschlaggebend sind 2 Faktoren: Die Länge des Rahmens (für den Akku mit Steuerung) und die Kurbellänge. Den bimoz wird es mit 5 unterschiedlichen Kurbellängen geben, die ca. 95 % der gängigen Kurbellängen abdecken. Welche Kurbellänge Du benötigst klären wir gemeinsam nachdem die Indiegogo-Kampagne erfolgreich abgeschlossen ist. Natürlich sollte dein Fahrrad in einem tadellosen, verkehrsfähigen Zustand sein. Vor allem die Bremsen sollten einwandfrei funktionieren. Wenn Du Fragen hast, wende Dich bitte an unser Support-Team unter: support@bimoz.ch
Wie erfahre ich, wie ich das bimoz-System an meinem Fahrrad montiere?Wir liefern eine umfangreiche Bedienungsanleitung und werden ausserdem Montagevideos für alle möglichen Pedaltypen auf unserem Youtube-Kanal bereitstellen (weitere Infos folgen).
Benötige ich Spezialwerkzeuge um den bimoz an meinem Fahrrad zu montieren?Nein, alle benötigten Spezialwerkzeuge sind Bestandteil der Lieferung.
Muss ich mein Fahrrad zur Montage in eine Werkstatt bringen?
Nein, denn der bimoz ist von Natur aus ein Nachrüstsatz. In Kürze:
1. Aukkupack dran2. Linke Pedale und Kurbel abmontieren3. Verbindung ans Tretlager anbringen4. bimoz drauf5. Bediengerät anbringen und verkabeln6. fertig!
Dennoch geben wir zu, dass man schon mal einen Schraubenschlüssel in der Hand gehabt haben muss. Die Zeit der Montage beläuft sich auf ca. 20 Minuten.
Wie weit komme ich mit dem bimoz?Ganz ehrlich? Auf diese Frage gibt es entweder ganz viele Antworten, oder gar keine! In Abhängigkeit von Höhenunterschied, Gelände und Support-Level sind so auch Ganztagstouren machbar. Aber ganz ehrlich, Du fährst Fahrrad - und wenn es geradeaus geht, oder bergab, da kannst du auch mal in die Pedale steigen. Der bimoz fährt sich ohne Antrieb, ohne Reibung und zusätzlichen Kraftaufwand wie dein normales Fahrrad. Da zusätzliche Akkus angeboten werden, solltest Du bei anstrengenden Touren einen zweiten Akku in den Rucksack packen. Für die Fahrt zur Arbeit (durschnittlich 19 - in Großstädten 11 Kilometer) langt eine Akkuladung alle male.
Standard-Akku: bis zu 60 km*XL-Akku: bis zu 150 km** abhängig von Geschwindigkeit, Gelände, Fahrergewicht und Fahrbedingungen
Was ist das maximale Drehmoment?Das Drehmoment ist auf 50 Nm begrenzt ist, um die Schaltperipherie zu schützen.
Darf der bimoz nass werden?Ja klar, der bimoz funktioniert bei jedem Wetter, bei jeder Temperatur und auch in jedem Gelände. Immer schön darauf achten, dass der Akku nicht nachts draußen bleibt, das mögen die nämlich grundsätzlich nicht gerne.
Ist es möglich dan Akku am Fahrrad abzuschließen - ist der Akku abnehmbar?Die Batterie wird während des Betriebs am Fahrrad festgeschlossen. Die Batterie kann man einzeln abnehmen z.B. zum Laden.
Was ist die Lebenserwartung des Akkus?Bis zu 1000 Ladezyklen bzw. 5 Jahre.
Kann ich andere Akkupacks benutzen?Leider nein, da der bimoz eine in sich geschlossene Einheit darstellt. Der bimoz ist schließlich ein Smart-Drive und kann mehr als alle anderen Pedelec-Nachrüstsätze. Im unteren Teil des Aukkupacks befindet sich die Steuerung für den bimoz und die Connection für die bimoz-App. Aus diesem Grunde sind Akkus anderer Hersteller nicht für den bimoz geeignet.
Wo kann der bimoz legal genutzt werden?Der bimoz kann überall im Einklang mit den jeweiligen Straßenverkehrsordnungen und Gesetzten eingesetzt werden.
Brauche ich eine Anmeldung für den bimoz, oder einen zusätzlichen Führerschein?Der bimoz ist Führerscheinfrei (Support bis 25 km/h max. 250 Watt). Dennoch gibt es in unterschiedlichen Ländern die jeweilige Straßenverkehrsordnung. Wenn Du diesbezüglich Fragen habst, wende Dich sich bitte an unseren Support: support@bimoz.ch
Ist zusätzliche Schutzausrüstung erforderlich um bimoz sicher nutzen zu können?Nein, aber wir empfehlen generell einen Sturzhelm zu tragen.
Was wird die bimoz-App kosten?Nichts – wenn die Crowdfunding-Ziele erreicht sind, schenken wir Euch diese App für Android und iOS und werden sie kontinuierlich pflegen und weiterentwickeln, damit sie euch wirklich nutzt.
Gibt es auch eine Handyhalterung für den bimoz?Nein, weil es die sehr preisgünstig woanders gibt. Im Internet oder Fahrradfachhandel gibt es hier schon bewährte Produkte – hier wollen wir das Rad nicht neu erfinden.

story:
THIS CAMPAIGN IS CANCELED  I  THIS CAMPAIGN IS CANCELED

Sorry for canceling this campaign prematurely. We startet our indiegogo campaign with a small facebook community and thought to spread our mission in a short time. May be our target was to high ...

We will be back next year - with new content, videos, smaller staggered targets and hopefully a big community all over the world.

Lets stay in touch on facebook or twitter

((Of course we informed our supporters and pay back their money for this campaign))

THIS CAMPAIGN IS CANCELED  I  THIS CAMPAIGN IS CANCELED


ENGLISH


Don´t you worry about rising gasoline and electricity prices ?

Are Batteries and Accus empty right in the moment you need them ?


now comes freee !

There is only one difference to the energy out of your power point

The freee cell will produce 24/7 energy for free !


We explore and elaborate different kinds of free energy systems by a magnetic drive in an interdisciplinary team of subject-specific priorities since 3 years. Now we are ready to dare the breakthrough.Our goal is a global independent and public use without economic interests. Since our objective pursued no economic factor other than the manufacture of the freee cells we do not receive subsidies and focus consciously against the marketing of energy companies to enable a free future-oriented power supply for everybody

All this does not work without revolutionary developments … and even not without you.

We develop different energy concepts that make magnetic power useable. First we transform this power into electrical energy by using a dynamo. In this step the electrical energy already can be used.


How it works

Of course we have technology and components already developed significantly. Now we will develop this energy modules in different frame sizes and amperages to enable power supply in buildings as well as batteries used in cars, home appliances and of course batteries for multifunctional use in small devices.

Safety first ! push the stop button if you do not need electricity. The freee cell is ready to use shortly after the resolve of the button.

Magnetical Power is not harmful, nevertheless it is necessary to encase it for direct use to shield it´s attraction to screens and metallic objects in the immediate environment.

Now we need your help for complementary research, material tests, advanced technical requirements and the development of maintanance-free prototypes up to the first series production to permit a full-fleged use of „freee“ the independent energy system no later than 2018.

Climate change was largely caused by the improper or exessive use of existing energy systems. Among other things, more exhaust gases were emitted, than our nature can handle … freee could make a decisive contribution to stop climate change and to regenerate the nature

Natural resources are affected too. Thus, the global petroleum occur will be depleted irretrievably in the next 50-100 years … freee waives entirely on external energy. We need minor raw materials and aim to use renewable resources.

Developing countries need help on several areas. Next to water shortage, hunger and education, energy is also an essential factor which should be in balanced dependence to the disposal … freee is an independent energy system which takes no more than its component and production costs. It can be used individually and everywhere. In this way you give future a new drive

Think about our planet and the people who live on it

Make the world a better place, starting at your home

Free, cheap and everlasting

be freee



Perks ( free shipping )

Here´s a breakdown of the perks you can choose from when you support this campaign. Select your perk from the sidebar at the top of this campaign.

______________________________________________________________________

DEUTSCH


Ärgerst Du dich manchmal über steigende Benzin- und Strompreise ?

Sind Batterien und Akkus genau dann leer wenn Du sie brauchst ?


Jetzt kommt freee !

Es gibt nur einen Unterschied zum Strom aus deiner Steckdose

Die freee cell erzeugt 24 Stunden am Tag kostenlosen Strom !


Seit 3 Jahren erforschen und erarbeiten wir verschiedene Formen freier Energiegewinnung durch magnetischen Antrieb in einem interdisziplinären Team diverser fachspezifischer Schwerpunkte.

Nun sind wir bereit den Durchbruch zu wagen. Unser Ziel liegt in einer weltweiten unabhängigen und öffentlichen Nutzung ohne wirtschaftliche Interessen.

Da unsere Zielsetzung keinen wirtschaftlichen Faktor außer der Herstellung der freee Zellen verfolgt erhalten wir keine Zuschüsse und richten uns bewusst gegen die Vermarktung an Energieunternehmen um jedem Menschen eine kostenfreie, zukunftsorientierte Stromversorgung zu ermöglichen

Das alles geht nicht ohne revolutionäre Neuentwicklungen … und nicht ohne dich.

Wir entwickeln verschiedenartige Energiekonzepte die magnetische Kraft nutzbar machen. Dafür wandeln wir diese Kraft über einen Dynamo in elektrische Energie um, die in diesem Schritt bereits nutzbar ist. 


Und so funktioniert es

Natürlich haben wir Technik und Komponenten bereits deutlich weiter entwickelt. Nun werden wir diese Energiemodule in unterschiedlichen Baugrößen und Stromstärken weiterentwickeln um beispielsweise Gebäudeversorgung, sowie Batterien für PKWs und Haushaltsgeräte aber auch Batterien für den multifunktionalen Einsatz in Kleingeräten zu ermöglichen.

Sicherheit ! Wenn Du längere Zeit keinen Strom benötigst, kannst du die Freee Cell einfach ausschalten. Es dauert nur einen Moment bis sie wieder betriebsbereit ist.

Magnetische Strahlung ist nicht gefährlich, dennoch muß sie für den direkten Gebrauch durch eine schützende Hülle ummantelt werden um ihre Anziehungskraft auf Bildschirme und metallische Objekte in der näheren Umgebung abzuschirmen.

Nun brauchen wir deine Hilfe für ergänzende Forschungen, Materialtests erweiterte technische Anforderungen und der Entwicklung von wartungsfreien Prototypen bis zur ersten Serienfertigung um spätestens 2018 eine erste vollwertige Nutzung von „freee“ dem unabhängigen Energiesystem zu ermöglichen.

Der Klimawandel wurde weitestgehend durch den falschen oder übermäßigen Einsatz unserer bestehenden Energiesysteme verursacht. So wurden unter anderem mehr Abgase emitiert, als unsere Natur verkraftet … freee könnte einen entscheidenden Beitrag Leisten, den Klimawandel aufzuhalten und die Natur zu regenerieren.

Auch natürliche Rohstoffe sind betroffen. So wird das weltweite Erdölvorkommen voraussichtlich in den nächsten 50-100 Jahren unwiederbringlich erschöpft sein … free verzichtet vollkommen auf externe Energie. Wir benötigen einen geringen Bestandteil an Rohstoffen für die Bauteile und bemühen uns um die Verwendung erneuerbarer Ressourcen.

Entwicklungsländer benötigen meißt Hilfe auf mehreren Ebenen. So ist neben Wassermangel, Hunger und Bildung auch Energie ein wesentlicher Faktor, der in einem ausgewogenen Verhältnis zur Verfügung stehen sollte … freee ist ein unabhängiges Energiesystem welches auf seinen Bauteil- und Fertigungskosten beruht und überall individuell einsetzbar ist. So gibst du Zukunft den richtigen antrieb

Denken Sie an unseren Planeten und die Menschen die darauf leben.

Mach die Welt zu einem besseren Ort und beginn bei dir zu Hause

… frei, günstig und für immer

be freee

Safety first ! push the stop button if
you do not need electricity. The freee cell is ready to use shortly
after the resolve of the button.


Magnetical
Power is not harmful, nevertheless it is necessary to encase it for
direct use to shield it´s attraction to screens and metallic objects
in the immediate environment.

Now
we need your help for complementary research, material tests,
advanced technical requirements and the development of
maintanance-free prototypes up to the first series production to
permit a full-fleged use of „freee“ the independent energy system
no later than 2018.


Climate
change was largely caused by the improper or exessive use of existing
energy systems. Among other things, more exhaust gases were emitted,
than our nature can handle … freee could make a decisive
contribution to stop climate change and to regenerate the nature

Natural
resources are affected too. Thus, the global petroleum occur will be
depleted irretrievably in the next 50-100 years … freee waives
entirely on external energy. We need minor raw materials and aim to
use renewable resources.

Developing
countries need help on several areas. Next to water shortage, hunger
and education, energy is also an essential factor which should be in
balanced dependence to the disposal … freee is an independent
energy system which takes no more than its component and production
costs. It can be used individually and everywhere. In this way you
give future a new drive

Think
about our planet and the people who live on it

Make
the world a better place, starting at your home

Free,
cheap and everlasting

be
freeePerks ( free shipping )Here´s
 a breakdown of the perks you can choose from when you support this 
campaign. Select your perk from the sidebar at the top of this campaign.______________________________________________________________________DEUTSCHÄrgerst
Du dich manchmal über steigende Benzin- und Strompreise ? 

Sind
Batterien und Akkus genau dann leer wenn Du sie brauchst ? Jetzt kommt freee !Es gibt nur einen Unterschied zum Strom aus deiner SteckdoseDie freee cell erzeugt 24 Stunden am Tag kostenlosen Strom !

Seit
3 Jahren erforschen und erarbeiten wir verschiedene Formen freier
Energiegewinnung durch magnetischen Antrieb in einem
interdisziplinären Team diverser fachspezifischer Schwerpunkte.
Nun
sind wir bereit den Durchbruch zu wagen. Unser Ziel liegt in einer
weltweiten unabhängigen und öffentlichen Nutzung ohne
wirtschaftliche Interessen.
Da
unsere Zielsetzung keinen wirtschaftlichen Faktor außer der
Herstellung der freee Zellen verfolgt erhalten wir keine Zuschüsse
und richten uns bewusst gegen die Vermarktung an Energieunternehmen
um jedem Menschen eine kostenfreie, zukunftsorientierte
Stromversorgung zu ermöglichen

Das
alles geht nicht ohne revolutionäre Neuentwicklungen … und nicht
ohne dich.


Wir
entwickeln verschiedenartige Energiekonzepte die magnetische Kraft
nutzbar machen. Dafür wandeln wir diese Kraft über einen Dynamo in
elektrische Energie um, die in diesem Schritt bereits nutzbar ist. Und so funktioniert esNatürlich haben wir Technik und Komponenten bereits deutlich weiter entwickelt. Nun
werden wir diese Energiemodule in unterschiedlichen Baugrößen und
Stromstärken weiterentwickeln um beispielsweise Gebäudeversorgung,
sowie Batterien für PKWs und Haushaltsgeräte aber auch Batterien
für den multifunktionalen Einsatz in Kleingeräten zu ermöglichen.Sicherheit ! Wenn Du längere Zeit keinen Strom benötigst, kannst du die Freee Cell einfach ausschalten. Es dauert nur einen Moment bis sie wieder betriebsbereit ist.
Magnetische
Strahlung ist nicht gefährlich, dennoch muß sie für den direkten
Gebrauch durch eine schützende Hülle ummantelt werden um ihre
Anziehungskraft auf Bildschirme und metallische Objekte in der
näheren Umgebung abzuschirmen.

Nun
brauchen wir deine Hilfe für ergänzende Forschungen, Materialtests
erweiterte technische Anforderungen  und der Entwicklung von
wartungsfreien Prototypen bis zur ersten Serienfertigung um
spätestens 2018 eine erste vollwertige Nutzung von „freee“ dem
unabhängigen Energiesystem zu ermöglichen.


Der
Klimawandel wurde weitestgehend durch den falschen oder übermäßigen
Einsatz unserer bestehenden Energiesysteme verursacht. So wurden
unter anderem mehr Abgase emitiert, als unsere Natur verkraftet …
freee könnte einen entscheidenden Beitrag Leisten, den Klimawandel
aufzuhalten und die Natur zu regenerieren.

Auch
natürliche Rohstoffe sind betroffen. So wird das weltweite
Erdölvorkommen voraussichtlich in den nächsten 50-100 Jahren
unwiederbringlich erschöpft sein … free verzichtet vollkommen auf
externe Energie. Wir benötigen einen geringen Bestandteil an
Rohstoffen für die Bauteile und bemühen uns um die Verwendung
erneuerbarer Ressourcen.

Entwicklungsländer
benötigen meißt Hilfe auf mehreren Ebenen. So ist neben
Wassermangel, Hunger und Bildung auch Energie ein wesentlicher
Faktor, der in einem ausgewogenen Verhältnis zur Verfügung stehen
sollte … freee ist ein unabhängiges Energiesystem welches auf
seinen Bauteil- und Fertigungskosten beruht und überall individuell
einsetzbar ist. So gibst du Zukunft den richtigen antrieb

Denken
Sie an unseren Planeten und die Menschen die darauf leben.

Mach
die Welt zu einem besseren Ort und beginn bei dir zu Hause

… frei,
günstig und für immer

be
freee

story:
The Temple College Foundation

The Temple College Foundation is in the business of keeping the community connected to College, and our goal is to help Temple College students complete degrees, certificates, or transfer to a four year institution with as little financial burden as possible. We have several programs to make this possible. We provide scholarships, and innovative no-interest Leopard Loans.

By removing this financial barrier, we believe we can build a better community. Those who complete a certificate or an Associate's degree earn on average 15,000 dollars more than those with just a high school diploma. The increase of disposable income in turn is returned to the local economy through entertainment, restaurants, retail, and other leisure activities. So as our students make the transition from students to workforce, the Foundation is providing opportunity.

Ride Bike Temple!  

Ride Bike Temple! is a community bike share program which has been grant funded and volunteer driven. We currently have three locations in Temple, Texas. The first is on the main campus of Temple College, the second is at the University Courtyard Apartments, and the third at Baylor Scott & White Hospital. We have grant funded two more location at the Temple VA Hospital and downtown at the Temple Public Library.

The goal of Ride Bike Temple! is to provide inexpensive, green public transportation about town. You can rent and ride a bike for two dollars a day.

Why we need you

We have two software pieces which run our system but are currently nor communicating with each other, meaning the process has to be manually monitored and controlled. This is a time consuming process and needs to be automated. We are in the process of having the software bridge built, and need your help to complete it. 

Grassroots innovation has made this program possible, now we need you to make it practical and successful.

We need you to invest in our community!

Our Goals

We have set three Goals
$5,000 - Our base goal covers the cost of the software bridge and would also provide improved signage at our locations.
$15,000 - Our second goal would allow us to build the software bridge, improve our signage, and would also allow us to create a brand new crowd-funded bike station.
$25,000 - Our reach goal, in addition to our first two goals, this goal would allow us the means to create a maintenance fund to continually improve our fleet and ourstations.

Thank You

The Temple College Foundation would like to thank you for your support. Without the community, we would not be able to support our students and program. As we grow we are excited for you to be involved with us. Let's Ride, Bike Temple!

story:
Companion Bike Seats

We launched Companion Bike Seat in 2011 with the goal of putting a second passenger on a bicycle. After a year and a half of designing and prototyping, our first bike seats were delivered to customers in the fall of 2013, and there are now over 200 bike seats in 7 countries across 3 continents. The number one thing our customers have asked us for over the last year: a backrest for their bike seat. So that's exactly what we plan on delivering!

Our aim is to make the backrest compatible as a removable add-on accessory to our bike seats, that way folks who've already purchased a bike seat can get one too. It will quickly and easily attach onto the back of the bike seat frame, and you're ready to go!

It came as a little bit of a surprise to us, but the vast majority of our customers are parents with young children. Companion Bike Seat is a great alternative to expensive cargo bicycles and gives you much the same functionality: it comes with a locking, waterproof storage compartment underneath the seat. It's a perfect way to offer to bring your kids along for the ride, and adding a backrest will make it safer to do so, especially for smaller children. 

Here's what one of our more recent customers said about their bike seat:

"I wanted to thank you for making this wonderful product.  My bike is the only form of transportation for me and my daughter, and when she approached 40 pounds and can really no longer fit into the Co-Pilot, I started to sweat. Xtracycle costs a minimum of $400 for a cargo seat for a child, and your product does it and so much more affordable! Thank you thank you, thank you!!!"

<What We Need & What You Get>

I created a proof-of-concept design for our bike seat backrest earlier this year, using parts that I purchased at the local hardware store. I'm now working on finalizing the design of the backrest and creating the necessary specs so our factory can start prototyping.

We initially set out to raise $2000 to pay for the cost to design and prototype our first backrests. Now that we've reached that goal, we've set for ourselves a stretch goal of $5,000, which will completely cover the cost of tooling and manufacturing of our first 100 bike seat backrests, plus all of the design costs as well. We've already received some initial feedback from the factory on the designs, and we're very close to having the factory start prototyping! We've got a couple of small changes to make, then we'll be giving the factory the go-ahead to get started on the first prototype. If all continues to go according to plan, we'll have our backrests ready for purchase in March of 2015.

In addition to getting a backrest for your bike seat before everyone else, we're also offering a couple brand new perks that aren't available anywhere else:

  • Companion Bike Seat t-shirts
  • Companion Bike Seat cycling caps

Here is an artist rendering of the new backrest design for our bike seats, installed onto a bike seat, overlooking San Francisco:


<The Impact>

Bicycle commuting has massive benefits to society and may be the single-most-important mass transit option we have as populations (and traffic) in cities continue to grow. Not only does it reduce traffic and pollution, but it dramatically reduces healthcare costs as well, since exercise becomes a regular part of the daily commute.

Companion Bike Seats make bike commuting more accessible to folks by bringing the bicycle one step closer to the automobile - now there's room for an extra passenger and cargo space to store your valuables while you're riding. All of a sudden your bicycle can be used to run so many more daily errands: picking up the kids from school, going grocery shopping, taking the bicycle out for date-night, the possibilities are endless. Just imagine, instead of driving everywhere, you're riding everywhere, and getting exercise while you're running all of your errands!

Adding a backrest to the bike seat makes it even easier and safer for parents to bring their children along for the ride. Plus it makes the bike seat more comfortable for passengers of all ages and sizes. Of all the things our customers have asked us for over the last year, the backrest has been by far the number one accessory requested.

<Backrest Design Progress>

Here are some photos showing the step-by-step progress we've made on the backrest design so far.

Initial concept drawings exploring various ways to mount the backrest onto the bike seat. We wanted it to be easy to install and remove, yet provide ample load support as a backrest for the passenger.

Concept drawings for the shape of the cushion and how it attaches to the frame of the backrest:

Here's the design we ultimately settled on below. This is about where we were at in the design process when we started our Indiegogo campaign.

Next we modeled out the design to test how much weight the backrest would be able to support. The top right screenshot show the initial concept under load testing. Based on the results of this modeling, we decided to modify the design to add more support capacity. The bottom right screenshot shows an updated model with support struts added in. 

We also reduced the height of the backrest to reduce the lever effect for the final design. Here's a screenshot of the more finalized design for the backrest, under load testing. This design almost doubled the amount of support the backrest could provide as compared to the initial design we started with.

Next we put together some renderings of the backrest to get a feel for how it looked on the bike seat. We used some photos of the bike seat to add the backrest in.

Based on these renderings, we decided to make a couple small changes, reducing the height of the backrest and reducing the size of the cushion slightly. Here are a couple of diagrams from the finalized specs that were sent over to our factory for cost estimates.

We hope to start prototyping within the next couple of weeks, and we'll share pictures of those as soon as we have them!

<Potential Risks & Challenges>

We learned a lot about the challenges of manufacturing a wholly new product during the first year and a half launching Companion Bike Seat. Finding a suitable, trustworthy manufacturing partner is difficult at best, but thankfully that's all behind us now. The biggest risk with our backrests will be how quickly we can finalize our "golden unit" prototype and begin manufacturing. A golden unit is a prototype that meets all of our requirements for the final product, and enables us to tell the factory, "Yes, that's exactly what we want. Now let's go make a thousand of them just like that."

Here are pictures of the multiple iterations we made while prototyping our bike seats (this spanned around 5 months):

By April of 2013 we had everything nailed down and our golden unit was 95% complete. However, the storage compartment wasn't waterproof and we needed to find the right gasket material to solve this. 

It ultimately took our factory three months to source suitable material to begin manufacturing our bike seats. We could have moved forward without the gasket material and delivered our bike seats many months earlier, but it was critically important to deliver the highest quality product possible, so we stuck with it despite the delay.

We even put one bike seat through destructive load testing  to see how much weight it could withstand.

It ended up taking over 4000 lbs before our bike seat bent under the load.

Our backrests will be no different. We will make sure that the backrest is easy to install and remove, and that it's of the same high-quality standards we require for our bike seats. This may result in some small time-delays before they're ready to ship, but it will be well-worth the wait.

<Additional Ways You Can Help>

If you're not able to contribute to our campaign, no worries at all, we appreciate that you read this far on our page! You can still help us reach our goal by spreading the word with your friends and family about our campaign. We're on all the major social media channels, and it's also super easy to share directly with Indiegogo!

  • Facebook
  • Twitter
  • Instagram
  • YouTube
  • LinkedIn
  • Pinterest

Thanks for your support in making bicycle commuting the norm rather than the exception!

story:
Short Summary

Let's improve our economy, our national security and our environment all in one simple step - by driving electric!  $1.5T per year is leaving our economy for foreign oil and military support and that is way too much (http://www.rmi.org/rftransportationexecutivesummary).  Let's get off foreign oil and use local electrons to move us around.  This is not as much of a technical challenge as a political one and a public awareness issue - and that's where crowd funding can make a difference.  Here's a recent article called "Electric Vehicles Strengthen US Competitiveness" - http://www.huffingtonpost.com/phyllis-cuttino/electric-vehicles_b_2059945.html

What We Need & What You Get

I've already built a prototype and it works well.  I can do much better by using composite materials, computer-controlled manufacturing and lithium batteries.  I have the skills and experience required and the support of a very talented team.  We need funding for tools, supplies and overhead for the shop.  This requires Computer Numerically Controlled (CNC) machines, honeycomb panels, electric drive systems and battery packs with battery management systems.  A desktop CNC and a desktop 3D printer will be used to create one-quarter scale models.  A large CNC is required for the full-size prototypes along with parts and materials.  At least two versions will be built using the same frame - an economy version and a performance version.  The website will be updated at least weekly with pictures, video and all information about the builds (including CAD files and parts lists).
 
The main focus is the frame design.  The rest of the vehicle will be relatively easy since other similar vehicles have been built based on the same or similar components.  All parts will be off-the-shelf and simple to install on the frame.  This project will produce plans, parts and complete vehicles so that people can build their own, buy a kit, or get a fully-assembled vehicle.  In addition to the frame, all attachment brackets will be provided, and wiring harness will be prefabricated.  This project will result in open-air vehicles, registered as motorcycles in most states (check your local laws).  After this project is completed, work will continue to provide bodies that can be added if desired.

The Impact

Not even counting the big stuff like Global Warming and the fate of future generations, there is war, terrorism and more oil spills.  This will empower people to buy cars that are locally manufactured, will last for generations, and be easily maintained and upgraded while having the capability to make your own "fuel" with solar panels.  Even when charged from the grid, electric vehicles are cleaner and keep money local.  By promoting these vehicles, we can change the direction that the world is headed.  These vehicles will provide local jobs building clean transportation.

Other Ways You Can Help

Open Source means that anybody and everybody can help, and provide input along the way.  It also means that anyone can setup a shop to start building these.  Best of all, by providing a solid foundation (a proven chassis), others can create different body panels and create totally different looking vehicles so that each one can be customized.  In the early stages, there will be lot's of CAD work and quarter-scale modeling.  Anybody with a desktop CNC can download the files and build scale models to help evaluate and improve the design.  People can also help create other designs using the same method including bikes, scooters, trucks and other vehicles.

Other Ways You Can Help
Open Source means that anybody and everybody can help, and provide input along the way.  It also means that anyone can setup a shop to start building these.  Best of all, by providing a solid foundation (a proven chassis), others can create different body panels and create totally different looking vehicles so that each one can be customized.  In the early stages, there will be lot's of CAD work and quarter-scale modeling.  Anybody with a desktop CNC can download the files and build scale models to help evaluate and improve the design.  People can also help create other designs using the same method including bikes, scooters, trucks and other vehicles.

story:
Hello

My name is Mikael Kjellman, I like outdoor adventure sports and work as a design engineer. I really like to bike, but where I Iive in Sweden, the weather is not always very bicycle-friendly. So I designed and built a four-wheeled bike with full fabric body to keep dry and warm in all-weathers. 

I have driven it to work every day for a year now and it has proven to be a very practical and comfortable little vehicle. It is a fun vehicle to drive and I really like to build things. But the big reason for me has been the environmental benefits that these vehicles could have if they were made more popular.

I plan to develop a kit based on my prototype, intended for home builders and small pro-builders. It is to design and start production of this kit, I seek your funding's.

Visit mypodride.com for all the latest information!

Presentation

PodRide is a velomobile that is meant to be a practical every day vehicle.
It has approximately the same seating position and seat height as a small car, allowing easy access and good visibility in traffic. It has four wheels to be narrow enough for bicycle paths but still be stable in the curves. It has a full waterproof body to keep you warm and dry in any weather, heated windshield, soft seat with back support, air suspension and studded tires in winter. A small trunk for your shopping bags and a tow bar for a bike trailer when you want to bring your kids.

The electric motor and control system are from a standard e-bike system and should make it a street legal bike in many countries. And may then be operated on bicycle paths and without a drivers license.

DEC 2016 Update:  Please click here to see an update concerning pricing, availability, legal matters, etc

 

 

Technical data:

Length: 180cm                Width: 75cm
Height: 145cm                 Seat Height: 50cm
Weight: 70kg                    Wheel: 20 inch tires
Wheelbase: 88 cm         Turning circle: 3,5m
Motor: 250W electric    Gears: Internal Geared Hub
Range: 60km                   Speed:25km/h (with motor)
Co2 emissions: 7g/km(EU-electricity mix)
(Car 140g/km, Electric car 70g/km)
 

Bicycle-Cars are practical, good for your health, cheap to run, good for the environment and fun to drive. They require no new and advanced technology to work and they would not cost much if they were mass-produced. Many other bicycle-cars have been available on the market for many years but they are still for some reason, an almost unknown vehicle. I think my more car-like bicycle-car concept will appeal to many more people than the low streamlined tricycles that are available today. I hope that by building and running practical, fun and good looking bicycle-cars like PodRide, we can get bicycle-cars to become a popular and mass-produced vehicle.

Visit mypodride.com for all the latest information!


PodRide in the news:

 

Planned actions

 

Reaching: 10 000
Plan one is to make drawings and building instructions of the existing prototype.
Requires: that a designer puts 2-3 months of work on the project.

Reaching: 30 000
Plan two is to make key parts available such as wheels and drive shafts which are difficult to manufacture yourself.
Requires: more design work, find and buy parts, order and test parts and probably buy batches of some parts.

Reaching: 50 000
Plan three is to make a complete kit with all the parts and materials needed.
Requires: finding manufacturers for all parts, production molds, test build kits and build infrastructure to pack and ship kits.

Reaching: 100 000
Plan four is to make an easy to build complete kit, no fabrication needed (like a IKEA Furniture).
Requires: redesign of many parts and details, molds and manufacturing tools and more infrastructure for pre-assembly, quality control, pack and ship kits, a lot of test building of the kits and making good instructions.

Reaching: 200 000  or more
Plan five is to also offer completed kits and start developing a longer version with a small rear seats for children, dogs or more cargo

 

 

Risks and problems

It is a complex product and most of the parts have to be specially manufactured.
My job is to design and purchasing machine parts but I have no experience in designing and purchasing textile parts.
I'm the only fully dedicated team member today.
The price on the kit may turn out to be too expensive.
I do not have any big resources so if I for some reason must end the project, it is not certain that I can repay all contributions.
The rules on electric bicycles differs from country to country, and some places do not allow 4 wheels on bicycles.
The project is intended to promote practical bicycle cars and can lose much of its meaning if for example Toyota suddenly releases a practical bicycle cars.
This may sound negative but I want to be honest and not pretend that there are no risks and problems. However, I am convinced that I can put together a good team and solves these difficulties and make a great velomobile.

 

Spread the word

This campaign is designed to raise money, but the long term goal is to promote bicycle-cars. So it is equally important to spread the word, show your friends,    share online, talk to your local politicians and traffic planners show that this kind of vehicles exist and work.

/Mikael Kjellman

story:
SmartHalo is a smart biking device designed for urban cyclists. Its military-grade locking system ensures it stays permanently on your handlebar to assist you when you need it. The intuitive navigation system shows you the quickest, safest routes to your destination. Automatic tracking capabilities save your biking metrics seamlessly. The powerful front light illuminates your path at night. And when you’re not around, SmartHalo keeps your bike safe from thieves. This is the smart biking system you’ve been waiting for.

SmartHalo finds the quickest, safest routes to make your ride a stress-free experience. Input the destination on your smartphone, tuck it safely in your pocket and let SmartHalo take care of the rest. Get turn-by-turn navigation straight on your handlebar... a bike GPS communicated through an intuitive light halo. Alleluia.

Unlike regular fitness apps, there is no need to press “start” or “stop” – SmartHalo tracks your progress as soon as you start pedalling. Get extensive metrics and visualize the data in the app.

Night lights get lost, stolen and fail on us – that is unacceptable. SmartHalo stays permanently on your bike with tamper-proof screws.You never have to worry about biking in the dark again. You don't even need to think about turning the light on or off. SmartHalo does it for you.

Cyclists miss important notifications all the time, because street noise and road vibration make them hard to notice. Introducing your personal biking assistant.

Let's put an end to bike theft. SmartHalo’s internal motion sensor makes sure that any persistent meddling with your sacred two-wheeler triggers an alarm. Thieves be warned.

Since SmartHalo recognizes your phone, it deactivates as soon as you approach your bike. Seamless technology. 




DESIGN

SmartHalo’s design philosophy is centered on simplicity. Biking in cities can be a challenge, so we’ve made sure our device was simple to use, yet smart. How? By reducing its interface to its simplest possible form – a circle.

One of our biggest challenges was to make sure SmartHalo would fit any bike, right in the center of the handlebar. After months of sketching and modeling, we found an elegant, durable and minimalist solution.

Have you ever seen a car driver remove his headlights after parking? Neither have we. Why should bikers have to remove their accessories after each ride? We designed SmartHalo to install permanently on your bike while making sure it doesn't get stolen – it will withstand the world’s harshest urban environments. Its unique, military-grade locking system ensures it stays on your bike to assist you when you need it.

APP

It's so simple anyone could use it. We don’t want our users browsing endless menus – we want them biking. We’ve spent countless hours testing this interface and success will be measured by how little time it takes to get you going.

TECHNOLOGY

We designed SmartHalo to be beautiful inside and out. There is no on/off button – its sophisticated sensors detect your presence. When you finish your ride, it automatically shuts down. This leads to amazing battery life, to keep going as long as you do. Under standard usage, SmartHalo will last around three weeks.

TIMELINE

We believe that technology should not be something you have to worry about – it should just work. We're urban cyclists who wanted to deal with the main problems of biking in cities: navigation and security. We found that the existing solutions right now were just not suited for harsh urban environments. They fall in two main categories:

  • Bike accessories and gadgets that need to be removed after each ride, stuffed with energy-intensive screens and awkward maps;
  • Fancy (and expensive) smart bikes that are attractive to thieves and require you to replace your existing ride. 

This is why we created SmartHalo. We built something that fits any bicycle, is durable, tamper-proof and intuitive to use. 

Risks and challenges

Ok, hardware is hard and our project, ambitious – we need to get design, software, electronics, suppliers and financing right. Admittedly, this is no easy feat.

But we’re not starting from scratch. We’ve been bootstrapping with our own money for the last year to create working prototypes and companion apps in both iOS and Android. Our list of electronic components is almost final and we’re putting the final touches to our CAD designs.

Now we need to go from prototype to mass-production to distribution.

We’re working with suppliers and the entire supply chain is locked. Mass production should start early 2016, to have a product shipped to our backers in June 2016.

story:
Know The Creator

Hello, I am Mohsin Khan from Australia, I have been doing various science projects but this is the first one I am going to commercialize through crowdfunding. This idea Came to my mind when I was fined by traffic officer for tinted car windows as I loved them a lot. After few months I got an idea and made this prototype shown in pitch video. 
Now I have also tested this Electro magnetic film on a full sized room window(video attached). I have not done this thing on a commercial level, I am just raising funds so I can launch it on a commercial level.


IDEA

It is about tinting/shading your car windows/room widows only when you need. You can make you car/room windows transparent or opaque with just a click of the remote.

We are successful in making a prototype of electrochromic film as shown in video we just have to make it according to the size of your car window to fit it in your car and give you the feeling of controlling the shade. It can easily be installed on car windows or any window ans is controlled by a remote. 

What new have we done We just made it that cheaper so everyone can afford it and secondly we have extended this high tech product to be used for any window of the world, either that be a car window or a room window. 

100% successful prototype shows our dedication to the project still we believe we can enhance its quality and control. We Believe that you have a right to decide when to tint your car windows and when to make them transparent.

Purpose Of Campaign We need to produce these Electronics Remote Controlled at commercial level and export them through online platforms for which we need money. With 5000$ we can buy enough material to cover our day to day orders because we start production after getting orders and not pile up stock. 

Hopefully we will get a lot of support from you people. We will keep on updating you about our project. Thank you (Stay Tuned We will Bring Many new Innovative Projects after this)


Risks & Challenges

Obviously every innovative idea has inbuilt risks involved in it but successful prototype reduces these risks. I am confident that I can produce them on a level where I can provide it to the contributors and make a setup for commercial production.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you like our idea but you can't contribute it is not a problem, just help us by spreading the word.

story:
Pre-Order Our 1000 or 1250 Watt Powerful Full Size E-Bike or Super-Compact, Folding Bike with Front Wheel / All Wheel Drive System available only through IndieGoGo!

Athletic Investments, LLC doing business as Xtreme Fat Tire Bikes has teamed up with 8-time World Speed Boat Title Holders and the Multiple World Record Setting Team of Miss GEICO Racing.

With GEICO's expertise in engineering, safety and quality control and Xtreme's innovative fat tire bicycle designs, we are proud to present some of our very best Fat Tire Electric Bicycles.

Our E-Bikes feature our patented Front Hub Motor Electrical System paired with a rear Shimano 8 Speed Design that provides riders with the benefits of front wheel / all wheel drive, (when adding pedal power). The result is the only truly safe Fat Tire Electric Bike with all wheel drive.

Choose from 1000 watt or 1250 watt, 48 Volt systems that will safely power you through any terrain and over any obstacle with out the potential danger of flying over the handle bars common in rear wheel powered e-bikes.

Need to Finance Your Contribution?
Click here to learn how to Finance Your Folding Electric Bike

We offer two models of e-bikes:

Full Size Model: (As seen in Campaign Video)

Our fat tire full size model is available in three sizes; Medium - 17", Large - 19" or Extra Large - 21" frame with 26" wheel type and an extra wide 5" tire x 30" in diameter.

Super Compact Folding Model:

Our fat tire folding bike model; with 4" wide tires x 24" diameter.

 

Both models are available in our Standard Matte Black with Neon Yellow Rims Style or a Sportsman Version, perfect for hunting and gaming, with Camouflage Frame and Camouflage Rims.

In addition, we are offering a variety of interchangeable bike accessories from fenders, front gear racks for fishing and hunting gear or spring loaded back racks, even a golf bag boy puller attachment.

We use  a Front Hub Motor that with combined with your own pedal power creates an All-Wheel Drive Fat Tire Electric Bike that safely powers through any terrain and over almost any obstacle. This E-Bike literally has no limits. You can now cycle upstairs, over logs, and over most any obstacle your bottom bracket can clear and even some it can’t. The All-Terrain System allows cycling on even the softest sand, snow, deep mud, and gravel. 

Check out our interchangeable bike accessories from front gear racks and spring loaded rear rack, fenders and even a golf bag holder for trekking around the golf course!

About Our Electric Bikes:

Our E-Bikes use a Front Hub Motor that with combined with your own pedal power creates an All-Wheel Drive Fat Tire Electric Bike that safely powers through any terrain and over almost any obstacle. This E-Bike literally has no limits.

We offer a 1000 watt and 1250 watt option for you to choose from. You can now cycle upstairs, over logs, and over most any obstacle your bottom bracket can clear and even some it can’t. The All-Terrain System allows cycling on even the softest sand, snow, deep mud, and gravel. For a LIMITED TIME ONLY you can purchase our electric bikes from $1099 - $1199.

A SAVINGS OF $600 from Regular Retail Price!

Our Electric Bikes come in the Standard Style of Matte Black Frame and Neon Yellow Rims or our Sportsman Style of Camouflage Frame and Rims ideal for Hunting and Fishing. Check out our interchangeable bike accessories from front gear racks and spring loaded rear rack, fenders and even a golf bag boy puller attachment for trekking around the golf course!

This Electric Bike is Literally  Unstoppable!!!!!

Why Front Wheel Drive?

Here's Why: By taking our ultimate Fat Bike and adding our Front Wheel Drive Electric System we feel we have designed a ONE OF A KIND E-Bike.

Most Electric Bikes are either rear wheel drive mid - drive, rear system.  This puts all the torque on the rear and as anyone who has ever driven through soft terrain like sand, snow, mud or over obstacles like curbs, stairs or logs, would know front wheel drive torque performs better.

With the motor in the front, you can go through any terrain. Also, with others rear torque systems, at top speed, in soft terrain, when you attempt to turn you easily could dig the wheel in and cause a dangerous situation.

  • Download Our Independent Engineering Report
     
  • Download Our Geico Report

With our E-Bike, you just power through those turns. And by adding a little pedal power you have an ALL-WHEEL DRIVE  E-BIKE  that will cycle through any terrain and over it almost anything!

Two Styles to Choose From:  Standard or Sportsman

Choose from the sleek E-Grizzly with matte black frame and fork and yellow neon rims or are game stalker E-Cherokee with camouflage frame, fork and rims. Both electric bikes are available with a 1000 Watt, 48 Volt E-Bike system for speeds up to 25 mph or the 1250 Watt, 48 Volt E-Bike system with speeds up to 30 mph.

Why Ride a Fat Tire E-Bike?

If you are a commuter, looking to protect the environment, or just a person looking to save money on  gas, then this e bike is for you. You can easily get around town, avoid traffic jams and enjoy the outdoors on our Electric Bikes.

Other great uses for our fat E-Bikes are for hunters, or a rider looking to go places they have only been able to get to on foot before, or someone that’s just up for some xtreme riding.

Xtreme’s Fat E-Bikes will get you there!

What makes Xtreme’s eBike so much better than the rest?

Our Unique Safety Features:

Our Braking System:

We only use Avid Disc Rotors and Calipers and we use a 180mm rotor on both the Front and Rear for maximum stopping power.


Our eBike Motor:

Our motor only works with your thumb on the throttle; it shuts off automatically when you release it.


Our Tires:

Our Fat Tires are the widest width available which provides stability and superior stopping power.

Most other Fat Tire E-Bikes utilize either Center or Rear Wheel Drive Systems. This not only is a Safety Factor in Loose or Soft Terrain but, it also prohibits their ability to move through loose terrain or over obstacles.

The Rear Wheel Drive System is proven to turn poorly in Soft Terrain and can be hard to maneuver which can be dangerous at high speeds in soft terrain such as snow, grass or sand.

The Center Wheel Drive Systems can become unstable on uneven terrains and negotiating obstacles and have far more difficulty in climbing obstacles compared to the ALL-Wheel Drive System.

We have designed the first ever ALL-WHEEL Drive for SUPERIOR SAFETY and BEST for getting through most any terrain, and over obstacles!

Our Copyrighted and patented Skull Tire with its’ 5” width is made of Puncture-Resistant Rubber and is currently the WIDEST FAT TIRE being  manufactured.
 

This tire is not only the coolest out there, but is very functional as well with its Center Bead.

You can Ride on only 10mm of tire when on hard surfaces and with 5” of width you have the widest tire made for soft terrain. This tire works with 5 PSI to 30 PSI, so it can be flattened out for very Soft Terrain and add pressure to 30 PSI for the road. This tire with its large air capacity acts just like a Shock for Jumps and Rough Terrain.

Electric Bike Battery:

Our batteries are made by Greenway, one of the top Battery Manufacturers is Asia. It uses a separate Water Bottle Mount that is not part of the battery like most other companies use and can be easily removed without having to take off any wires from the battery. This battery has a sealed shell that is completely Water Proof with its own built in voltage meter to tell if it needs a charge or not. Plus it has a neat carrying handle attached to it for Easy Removal  to carry for security or take with you to charge. Our 48 Volt system and uses only the best Lithium Ion Technology with Sony Cells.

Front Hub Electric Bike Motor:

Choose From:

1000 Watt or 1250 Watt with 48 Volts for the Xtreme Rider in You.

This allows you to have a Fat E-Bike that can take you literally anywhere!

Rear Wheel System:

Rear Wheel is a Quick Release Hub with a Shimano 11-36T Cassette and an 8-Speed Shimano Alivio / Altus Rear Derailleur.

Now add these two great features together and here’s what you get:

The only Fat Bike which is All-Wheel Drive on the Market. This Bike’s Drive System will literally take you anywhere, over most any object, even upstairs and over logs with ease.

In Addition:

Top Quality Sealed Bearings Components: Our E-Bikes are not only made for any Terrain but, also any environment with its sealed Bearing Head Set, Bottom Bracket, and Hubs making it completely weather resistant.

All Alloy Components: 

We use all alloy parts and frame for additional weather resistance.

Front Hub Motors and Electric Systems:

All of our motors are Brushless and our parts, as well as, our cord plugs are water resistant.

Full Size Rim Specifications:

100mm Ultra- Light Alloy Rims , 26" by 100mm  with Cut-Outs

Schrader Valve, 36H

 

Digital Display Control Panel and Throttle:

Handle bar mounted, Control panel with Digital Display and Throttle

Our Bike has three Levels which are controlled by the Control Panel:

Low: For just cruising

Medium: For riding through and over most any obstacle or terrain.

High: For full torque and speed

 

Variety of Bike Sizes:

Detailed Specifications:

Full Size E-Bike Specifications:

Brakes/Levers: Avid BB5 disc brakes with Front/Rear 180mm Rotors.

Rim: 100mm Alloy Rims with Cut Outs, ultra-light single wall alloy, welded seam, 36H.

Front Hubs: Motor Hub with Alloy sealed Shell, 1000 Watt or 1250 Watt System or KT 135mm Alloy with sealed bearings Quick Release.

Rear Hub: Alloy Hub with Sealed Bearings and 8-Speed Cassette, Quick Release.

Tire: 26’ by 5” width; Widest tires manufactured with Copyrighted Skull Design. High density rubber for puncture resistance with center bead.

Tubes: 4” x 26” Schrader valve.

Chain: KMC Rust Buster.

BB Set: Steel shell, sealed bearings, 100mm shell width.

Shifter: Shimano 8-Speed Alivio 

Rear Derailleur: Alivio / Altus 8-Speed

Seatpost: Alloy 27.2 mm, 350 mm length (black)

Seatpost Clamp:Alloy with Quick Release.

Throttle: Handle Bar Mounted Thumb Throttle

Control Pad:  Control Panel with Digital Display and three power levels.

Control Unit: Seat Post mounted rear 22 AMP.

48V 1250 Watt gets 25 - 30 mph at full speed steady 30 Miles+
