story:
We are excited to introduce SmartStick, which has been our passion project for the last 2 years. We have been producing OBD2 devices for the car dealer market for many years, but we have had the idea of an OBD2 device that stays connected and provides ongoing diagnostics and monitoring of without the need to ever open the App. And now we have done it. We believe SmartStick to be a groundbreaking product, and one that will have a major impact on our driving experience.

 

  • ENHANCING VEHICLE SAFETY
  • SAVING YOU MONEY
  • MONITOR EVERY ASPECT OF YOUR VEHICLES.

 

WE HAVE STOCK ON ITS WAY!!

We have already completed development and mass production has begun, so this project is going ahead. But we are hoping we can raise additional funds through crowdfunding which will obviously enable use to increase inventory and widen our marketing scope, but more importantly help build a strong base of early customers (hopefully you) to be part of this journey. Share ongoing feedback and ideas for the future. We plan to treat all our early backers as part of this project and involve them in all new releases and developments. We welcome you to come on board, be part of this exciting journey and enjoy immediate and ongoing benefits.   

 

Product Overview

Smart health, trip and maintenance monitoring of not only your vehicle, but every vehicle in the family. SmartStick is the world’s thinnest and most advanced OBD2 tool that is going to impact upon the way we use and monitor our vehicles. SmartStick is a game changer as it works entirely in the background, performing a full health check every time you drive, without the need to ever open the App. Record every trip, classify as business or personal, record vehicle expenses, set maintenance reminders and generate comprehensive driving, usage and expense reports.

We believe SmartStick is a groundbreaking product, and one that will have a major impact on our driving experience.

 

  • ENHANCING VEHICLE SAFETY
  • SAVING YOU MONEY
  • MONITOR EVERY ASPECT OF YOUR VEHICLES.

 

 

 

 

The Onboard Diagnostics, or OBD2, port is found on all modern vehicles, normally used by mechanics to diagnose and clear fault codes. SmartStick is a powerful tool that connects your smartphone to the vehicle's computer in real-time, giving the user access to a range of features usually only found on expensive professional diagnostic scanners.

 

 

  •  SEAMLESS INTEGRATION - No need to open the app ever. Plug, Play and Leave
  •  AUTOMATIC MONITORING - Full health scans performed on every trip
  •  ONBOARD STORAGE - Never misses a trip even when Bluetooth is off
  •  FAMILY MONITORING - Access information remotely about every vehicle
  •  BATTERY SCAN - Monitors battery health in real-time

 

 Video : App Overview 

 

 

 

Video : Fitting the SmartStick Device and Phone Mount

 

 

 

 

 

Clean Home screen showing a quick view of your vehicle’s information and status. User profile, Bluetooth status and shortcuts to all the main features. Easy access to Settings where you find account details and App settings including Metric/Imperial, Notifications, Location Settings, Product Support, App and Device version and updates. 

 

Stunning LIVE Driving Mode shows detailed information about your current trip in a clean simple screen with the option of Night Mode for low glare. Shows live Speed and RPM in large display as well as trip duration, trip mileage, top speed, top RPM, average speed, engine temperature, battery voltage and fuel consumption indicator to help optimise fuel efficient driving. Simply place your phone on the SmartStick phone mount provided to ensure safe, hands-free driving.

 

Video : SmartStick Driving Mode

 

 

(Only available on SmartStick PLUS)

The new Family Feature is a game changer. Keep track of every vehicle in your family, remotely and in real-time. The Family Snapshot screen gives you a quick overview of the status of each vehicle, and then tap on any of the family members to see detailed diagnostics, trip data, maintenance requirements and reports. The Find Cars screen allows you to see the location of each family member (this feature can be switched off in settings) and even send messages within the App to each family member. You receive automatic alerts, even when the App is closed, if any family vehicle encounters a fault, battery issue or maintenance reminder. Now without having to do anything, you can have the peace of mind that every vehicle in the family is safe and maintenance is up to date.

 

Video : SmartStick Family Feature

 

 

Full Health Scans are performed automatically every time you drive your vehicle and you receive alerts if any faults are detected. See a quick view of the Scan Results and open reports for details on any faults, causes and fixes. Includes I/M Readiness and Freeze Frame Report. You will get detailed explanation of the results (in easy to understand terms) and be made aware of the seriousness of each fault and what actions to take. Share these reports with your mechanic to save time and money and determine the consequences of driving with that fault. SmartStick even performs a full battery health scan and reports on charge percentage, standing voltage, cranking voltage and cranking time. This will give you early warning if your battery needs replacing before it is too late and you are stranded.

 

Video : SmartStick Alerts and Notifications Simulation

 

 

With its built-in data storage, every trip is recorded including full details of time, distance, speed and RPM. View driving graphs and be able to quickly classify trips as personal or business with a single swipe, or tap on a trip for more details which includes detailed data of each trip, the start and stop location, the trip route on a map and add related parking or toll costs for that trip.

 

Record and view all fuel, maintenance and other vehicle costs and upload receipts. You can even use the Glove Box to upload any other vehicle related documents or save photo memories of your various trips. Generate full colour reports or detailed CSV reports of personal and business trip percentages, cost allocation and expense details. This is very useful for tax purposes or for car share records.

 

Get Maintenance reminders for your vehicle and any other family vehicles based on either mileage or date. Use the range of default Maintenance items or add your own reminders. When a reminder is sent through, you can ask to be reminded later, cancel it or if the work has been done you can tap Maintenance Done and it will automatically take you to add the maintenance record.

 

Video : SmartStick Settings

 

 

  • Does everything other devices do and so much more.
  • SmartStick is the thinnest full function OBD2 device to hit the market.
  • Stunning App design, easy to use and intuitive.
  • Automatic, Real-time data, uploaded to cloud server with no need to open the App.
  • Stay informed about your vehicle’s health, maintenance requirements and usage.
  • One Screen Family Snapshot shows the entire family status.
  • Ensure that your vehicles and family are safe.
  • Identify issues before they get worse, saving you time and money.
  • Diagnose faults, identify causes and suggested fixes, all from the App.
  • Keep track of costs, receipts and records.
  • Generate various reports and share with family members, accountant or mechanic.
  • Classify vehicle usage for cost-sharing and tax purposes.
  • Historical data stored on cloud and accessible even when phone is changed over.
  • Remote firmware and software update capabilities ensuring we are able to fix bugs and add features in the field.
  • Location feature allows you to track each trip, Find Car or locate family vehicles. (Can be disabled in Settings)

 

 

 

 

 

  • 3 Year Replacement Warranty.
  • We have an arrangement with UPS to ensure reliable international shipping.
  • Generate Support Tickets directly through the App.
  • Our support team is committed to providing answers to questions and technical support and our target is to respond to all Support Tickets within 12 hours.
  • We’ve been manufacturing OBD devices and working with the same factory for over 5 years so we expect no production surprises.
  • Our engineers and designers work closely with the factory to ensure we get exactly what we have aimed for, including quality, design, functionality, packaging, backup and supply timing.
  • We’ve been carrying out road testing for over 12 months.
  • We have already placed our first order for 1,000 units to ensure we are able to meet our Kickstarter Early-Bird reward supply commitments and ready to place subsequent orders.
  • We value your input. We plan to work closely with our Backers in order to improve the product on an ongoing basis through firmware and App updates.

 

 

 

 

 

 

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

We understand and acknowledge that no project comes without risks and challenges. Despite our planning, there are circumstances that may be out of our control. If we are met with these events, we promise to communicate with full transparency to you, our backers, and work to resolve all issues in a timely manner. We don't foresee any major issues as we have been producing OBD2 devices for the car dealer industry and have been working with the same factory for nearly 5 years. Our engineers and designers work closely with the factory to ensure we get exactly what we have aimed for, including quality, design, functionality, packaging, backup and supply timing. This product has been developed and tested over the last 2 years to ensure it's ready to be launched. We have the App completed and our first 1,000 devices in production and expect this to be complete by mid April 2020, to meet our April 2020 despatch commitment for backers. We are waiting for the Kickstarter response and ready to start production on a further 1,000 if neccessaryl. Our biggest challenge is going to occur if we have more than 1,000 backers in regard to meeting our May 2020 despatch goal, but we still believe we can meet this. In regards to the Coronavirus situation, we do not expect it to impact our timeline as production is nearly 80% complete with mainly firmware updates to be finalised. We will of course keep you updated if anything changes.

story:
I can still use your help!

Thank you guys so much for being so generous!!

Even though I have reached my goal I could still use donations to help me afford the concrete to pour and a powder coating so that it lasts for many years.

Who I am
My name is Austin Bell. I am a rising senior and a boy scout. I'm building this station for my Eagle Scout project and need a little help with funding it. That's where you all come in. With your funding and support I will be able to create this repair station to help out the community give people access to tools they normally wouldn't have.

What the station will be

This bike repair station will have multiple tools to fix anything from a flat tire to adjusting your gears. People will be able to come up to the station and be capable of repairing almost any issue with their bike. This stand will have the tools attached by cables so they will be able to be enjoyed by people for years down the road. Along with the repair station I plan to film a video on how to change a flat tire by demonstrating how to myself. A biker will be able to scan it on their smartphone and the link will take them straight to the video. 

Why donate

    For every donation I get I can put more of my own time and money into the project. My goal is to create and effective and easy to use station that can benefit anyone. This project will benefit the whole community by encouraging biking and allowing people that wouldn't normally have access to bike tools and knowledge to be able to fix almost anything. 


    If I am able to raise $600 or more I will order a custom made stainless steel outdoor bike pump to put right next to the station.


    Any leftover money I end up with will be donated to the Harrisonburg Parks and Recreation department to be used to benefit the community.

      Possible Issues/Obstacles

      There are chances that people would be able to come by and cut the cables and steal the tools, but that's one reason that I want to raise money so that I can replace and stolen or broken tools and keep the station nice over time. 

        Other Ways You Can Help

        If you can't donate don't worry! Spread the word and share my page!

        Also if you are able to donate time or any parts/services that would be greatly appreciated and you can get in touch with me at my email: atbsteelers@gmail.com

        Thanks so much!
story_txt:
I can still use your help!
Thank you guys so much for being so generous!!

Even though I have reached my goal I could still use donations to help me afford the concrete to pour and a powder coating so that it lasts for many years.


Who I am

My name is Austin Bell. I am a rising senior and a boy scout. I'm building this station for my Eagle Scout project and need a little help with funding it. That's where you all come in. With your funding and support I will be able to create this repair station to help out the community give people access to tools they normally wouldn't have.
   What the station will be
This bike repair station will have multiple tools to fix anything from a flat tire to adjusting your gears. People will be able to come up to the station and be capable of repairing almost any issue with their bike. This stand will have the tools attached by cables so they will be able to be enjoyed by people for years down the road. Along with the repair station I plan to film a video on how to change a flat tire by demonstrating how to myself. A biker will be able to scan it on their smartphone and the link will take them straight to the video. 
Why donate

  For every donation I get I can put more of my own time and money into the project. My goal is to create and effective and easy to use station that can benefit anyone. This project will benefit the whole community by encouraging biking and allowing people that wouldn't normally have access to bike tools and knowledge to be able to fix almost anything. 

If I am able to raise $600 or more I will order a custom made stainless steel outdoor bike pump to put right next to the station.

Any leftover money I end up with will be donated to the Harrisonburg Parks and Recreation department to be used to benefit the community.

  Possible Issues/Obstacles
There are chances that people would be able to come by and cut the cables and steal the tools, but that's one reason that I want to raise money so that I can replace and stolen or broken tools and keep the station nice over time. 

  Other Ways You Can Help If you can't donate don't worry! Spread the word and share my page!
Also if you are able to donate time or any parts/services that would be greatly appreciated and you can get in touch with me at my email: atbsteelers@gmail.com
Thanks so much!

story:
Meet the Scharf AeroCar


Have you ever wanted to soar above the traffic?  Cut time off your annual trip to the shore?  Escape the confines of normal?

The Scharf AeroCar is a street-legal car that can fly like a normal private aircraft such as a Cessna.  On the road it can be driven at speeds up to 80 MPH and can achieve 30+ MPG fuel mileage.  In the air it can be flown at 150 MPH and can achieve 23 MPG fuel mileage.


Green Technology is Our Strength

The Scharf AeroCar also features a state-of-the-art hybrid electric/diesel 200 horsepower motor that is capable of providing power to both the drive-train for car operation and the propeller for aircraft operation.  The motor can be fueled at any neighborhood gas station with regular diesel, off-road diesel, or bio-diesel fuel.  This is a major achievement, as these fuels are less than half the cost of AVGAS and jet fuel that is normally required by small aircraft.

On the road, the Scharf Aerocar can drive at speeds up to 80 MPH and can achieve more than 25 MPG fuel economy.  In the air, the Scharf Aerocar can fly at speeds up to 150 MPH and can achieve 23 MPG fuel economy.

Its excellent fuel performance allows the Scharf AeroCar to have a carbon footprint the size of a normal SUV.  By contrast, a small aircraft has the carbon footprint of three SUV's.


Affordability is Our Goal

The Scharf AeroCar can be manufactured and brought to market for a cost less than $100,000.  Because its wings fold flush alongside the passenger compartment, it can be parked in any garage, saving an owner the expense of hanger space.  It can be insured using a hybrid auto/air policy at less cost.  It requires far less maintenance than a standard small aircraft and does not require fuel loading at an airport, as the owner can simply drive to the nearest gas station.

Perhaps the biggest savings, however, is the operating cost.  In the air, a small aircraft will burn between 10-15 gallons of AVGAS per hour.  AVGAS is at least $6.00 per gallon and can be as expensive as $12.00 per gallon ($60-$120 per hour).  The Scharf Aerocar burns just under 5 gallons of road-grade diesel fuel per hour at cruise ($20 per hour).

On the road, the Scharf AeroCar can transport 4 passengers and 500 pounds of load at at least 25 MPG.  It is possible the Scharf AeroCar will actually achieve 40 MPG due to its streamlined shape, but that will be impossible to test until it actually drives on the highway.


Meet the AeroCar Team - Our Story

Roy Scharf

Roy Scharf is a 28-year-old entrepreneur with an extensive background in aerospace engineering, flying, and robotics.  A graduate of the Embry-Riddle Aeronautical University, Roy has dedicated his life to the pursuit of innovation.  Starting his own company by age 25, Roy has designed aircraft, space shuttles, wind turbines, solar generators, and numerous devices.


Mike Thomas

Mike Thomas is a 29-year-old entrepreneur who has built more than 13 successful businesses including 2 restaurants, 3 newspapers, and 5 social service agencies.  Mike's role will be to develop the market and production operation of the Scharf AeroCar.

"I have had a love affair with airplanes since I could read.  As a nerdy kid I read and studied everything about airplanes and flying.  For Christmas, all I wanted was airplane books.  It is a dream to be part of the Scharf AeroCar.  I look forward to using my business talents and contacts to make it a huge success."


The AeroCar is Ready for the Workshop

Over the past year we have assembled the pieces to build the first prototype of the Scharf AeroCar.  We have negotiated with suppliers and are ready to begin construction.  The project will take 8-10 months to complete, but will result in the world's first flyable Scharf AeroCar.

All of the preliminary design, testing, and negotiation is complete.  The Scharf AeroCar is ready to be built!


We Can Make a Huge Difference in Our Community

More than six months of dedicated research has permitted us to draw the conclusion that there is a market for more than 25,000 Scharf Aerocars in the United States in the next decade.  We will build and test each Scharf AeroCar in our hometown of Franklin, PA (Venango County).

Not unlike any other semi-rural area, Venango County has been hit hard over the past decade.  Once the center of the world's oil industry (oil was discovered here), Venango County has experienced a slow decline.  There are many boarded-up factories and refineries from a forgotten-era of prosperity.

The Scharf AeroCar represents a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to create more than 500 well-paying jobs in Venango County over the next 10 years.  We will use the abundance of industrial space and blue collar workforce to build a healthy and productive aerospace company.

Project partners Roy Scharf and Mike Thomas are both entrepreneurs (see above) and are each dedicated to rebuilding the well-being of Venango County and its citizens.

"The Scharf AeroCar not only represents an exciting new horizon in aviation," says Mike Thomas, "but an opportunity to establish commerce in a very troubled area.  The key is to build the first prototype, which we can use to launch this great effort."


What Comes Next?

Picture an airline flying a fleet of Scharf AeroCars, as it picks up passengers from their front door and takes them to their destination without stopping at a busy airport or enduring the delays of mass transit.

Picture a company with the ability to hire and manage a staff located a job site 500 miles away from its headquarters.  Better yet, picture that company only having to spend $100,000 on a Scharf AeroCar instead of millions on a traditional aircraft.

Can you imagine if we shift the trend of large carbon footprints that are created as a result of commercial air travel to a place where a passenger can leave a smaller footprint than a motorboat?

The Scharf AeroCar is on the brink of something big.  Can you imagine?


We Need Your Help

$250,000 will allow us to build the first prototype of the Scharf AeroCar in 8-10 months.  It will give us the opportunity to prove to the world that the technology exists, can be operated safely and efficiently, and deserves to be spread across the planet over the next decade.  Your support will give this project wings and will guarantee a flying model.

Kickstarters, we need your help.  Do you believe in this project?  Can you imagine the future?  Our funding goal is larger than most projects, but the Scharf AeroCar represents a huge contribution to the aviation field.  If you are excited about this project, we humbly ask for your financial backing.  Even if you are not able to make a contribution, please help us spread the word--tell you friends, co-workers, and neighbors that something big is taking shape because 2 friends with the 'right stuff' have accepted the challenge.  We can do this!


Risks and challenges

The question we are asked most frequently is: "will it actually fly?"

Here's the great news: the Scharf AeroCar has been engineered to professional design standards, and yes, it will fly as promised.

Think about Boeing's newest aircraft, the 787, for a moment: the entire model was designed and tested on a computer before a single piece was fabricated. Aeronautical Engineer Roy Scharf has completed the same process and is ready to bring the AeroCar to life.

We have mitigated risk as much as possible: we have procured a workshop; we have the necessary technology and suppliers to build the prototype; we have marketing and production professionals on staff. We are ready to roll!

Your support of the Scharf AeroCar will be an investment in an accomplished, professional company with the necessary pieces to achieve success. The biggest risk is allowing this rare opportunity to pass us by!


Thank you, so very much, for your consideration and support.  We (Roy & Mike) both appreciate it more than you know.

story:
About this project

Day by day born a new, good solutions what satisfy more and more on-demand while they want to tackle a „last mile problem”. The size is very defining in all cases. In section while we were looking for a solution for this problem and thought forward this borned a w scooter. A (human forced) vehicle what you can transform a practical small size and wear part of your clothes also. If you wear a vehicle live together with a crowded public transportation became more efficient, because no need more special place and attention. Neither while you travel nor when you direct, because the vehicle (if you wear it) is not a special, but that and the user form a unity.

Our vision
Have you ever wanted to get somewhere fast but always had the problem of where to put your bike? Of course you could have taken your skateboard but you haven’t learned to jump the curves yet. And there is always the dilemma of where to put your ride. Well, we have come up with a perfect solution. The w scooter is a foldable scooter that you can wear. That’s right, after getting where you want to go, you can fold it up and carry it on your waste. It fits your body perfectly and when you want to bolt, you just whip it out and go! Some of the advantages of the w scooter:

  • get to wherever you want fast and easy (it’s a simple scooter)
  • environmentally friendly (no motor)
  • has health benefits (you are outside and moving)
  • fits around your waist without bumping into doorways
  • you can carry it with a strap
  • you can take it anywhere (trains, busues, subways, and even the beach)
  • thief-proof (it is strapped to you)

Target audience

Just about anyone with 2 legs and feet. Of course people who have ridden skateboards, scooters, longboards are at an advantage but basically anyone can learn using it in 5 minutes. All you need is a little sense of fun. There is no age limit.

Used materials, technical details: plywood, stainless steel, steel, foamed PVC, polystyrene, weight: 2,3 kg

How it works

Development
At the current stage the w scooter is a great ride (it is on 70%) but we would like to make the following developments what will be finished until the middle of summer 2016.

  • develop and refine the use of materials
  • improve on the weight and durability
  • research water resistance
  • find a way for easy cleaning
  • tiller size adjustability and customization
  • customization to fitting around the waist
  • maximizing efficiency of the wheel size
  • adding a feature to hide the wheel so it makes no direct contact with clothes
  • adding an extra element to rest the second foot
Team

Perks


Risks and challenges

We are a startup company so besides having a working prototype we are at ground zero. Our product is a completely original concept therefore most of the elements need custom planning and manufacturing. We firmly beleive in our product and are enthusiastic in making our dream come true. We are convinced that this is an extraordinary idea and that the product is not only a fun new toy but a vehicle that solves urban mobility and environmental problems. The aim of our campaign is to come up with the founds for developing and testing. To find answers to our questions with your help and create a vehicle really makes a difference.

story:
The Coolpeds foldable iBike 2

What is cool about the Coolpeds iBike 2?

From the successful maker of the world's first briefcase electric scooter and the iBike, the iBike 2 is a compact foldable electric bike that empowers you to journey effortlessly at speeds of up to 20 mph through the city. 

Top media reviews:

“The latest electric bikes are all kinds of cool and innovative, but one thing they're generally not is cheap, rarely dipping below US$1,000. Coolpeds believes that the world needs a cheaper e-bike, one that doesn't skimp on style or lightweight design.”

 

 

With its powerful 350 watt hub motor, built-in compact mud guards, heavy duty tires, powerful V-brakes, and vintage leather seat with suspension springs, the iBike can take you comfortably through any weather condition anywhere in the city!  And the sturdy luggage rack makes it super versitile.

The quick folding system enables you to carry it with anywhere: in a subway station or train, the trunk of your car, or even hide it under your desk at work.

The iBike 2 is built to last and has a very sturdy carbon steel frame.  Best of all, you can exercise by riding it as a regular bike, but when you feel the need for a boost, you can just turn on the powerful 350 W electric motor system by simply pressing a button at the grip for speeds up to 20 mph and range of up to 30 miles on one charge with pedal assist (range depends on weight, wind resistance, riding style, and flatness of road surface); there will be 2 ways you can enjoy the power: 

1. You can pedal comfortably via the smart electric assist system.  

2. You can just twist the accelerator in the handle grip and the iBike will take you anywhere without you sweating or pedaling. 

iBike 2 at the Santa Monica Beach and Pier - perfect for crusing to Malibu and Venice!

GET your iBike 2 NOW, this incredible 70% off price will not be offered EVER again!

 

Reliable Power for your ride
The high quality LG Lithium Ion battery is safely stored in the frame and kept safe with a keyed lock. What's more, you can remove the battery super easily by sliding it out of the frame without folding the frame!  Take it out and charge it, or plug the bike directly to a power outlet nearby.   Charge it for 2 hours with our super fast charge(a $39 USD option), and you are up and running again!

PERFORMANCE & COMFORT

Powerful  brushless maintenance-free hub motor for amazing performance

Genuine leather seat with suspension springs that give you cushion over bumpy roads

Adjustable seat, steering wheel and handlebar for perfect fit

Anti-slip  grip rubber handlebars with support

FREE awesome USB charging port!

 

TECHNICAL DETAILS

  

FRAME

  • 20'' carbon steel frame
  • Handles up to 220 lbs (100 kg)
  • shiny white only

 

  

TWIST THROTTLE

  • Go full electric with the comfortable twist style accelerator in the handle grip
  • LED light shows battery level

 

WHEEL SPECS

  • Tire Size: 20 x 1.5"
  • All-terrain tires
  • High quality V- brakes front and back

 

  

PHONE HOLDER

  • Convenient phone holder included for FREE

 

POWER

  • Powerful 350W motor

 

CONVENIENT STORAGE

  • Built-in sturdy luggage rack

 

BATTERY

  • Easily removable lithium battery

 

The Perks

 

 

Your contribution will change the world

Coolpeds USA's mission is to provide fun, reliable, and affordable green transportation to everyone around the world.  We came up with revolutionary award winning electric scooters before and we continue to work on innovative products for all of you!

Tony Chan, founder, serial tech entrepuerneur.  Graduated from UCLA and worked at Microsoft, Seattle, as a software engineer.  He left Microsoft many years to start his product design and manufacturing company and successfully supplied various cool products to Sears, Walgreens, Lowe's, and many other global companies.  In addition, the Coolpeds team has won many international awards for campaigns in improving the environment and society.

With his passion and experience in car racing and building, as well as his team of world class engineers and designers, lots of advanced technology is integrated in Coolpeds products. 

Tony also invented the highly acclaimed and CBS TV featured briefcase electric scooter.

Tony filming an entrepreneur documentary with Chris Evans (Captain America) 

 

Frequently Asked Questions

Q: How much weight can the iBike 2 handle? 

A: The iBike 2 is solid and can handle up to 220 lbs. 

Q: How confident are you in delivering the bikes on time?

A: We have been delivering products successfully for many years and we will contiue to do even better.  Sometimes there can be little delays due to customs clearnce during shipping, but we will do our best to update you and move the orders as quickly as possible. 

Q: What is the real usable range:

A: From our experience, some male users can get about 15-20 miles on pedal assist mode. Pure electric mode without pedaling may be up to about 10 miles. 

Q: Can I order the iBike 2 even though I live outside of the US? 
A: Yes, we deliver to almost anywhere in the world.  

Q:The price is very low for an electirc bicycle. Why?

A: Coolpeds USA's mission is to offer great products that are affordable for everyone. We utilize our many years of manufacturing resources and even owning our own plant to make an eBike that is not only affordable, but also made of reliable parts.  Now you can contribute to this revolution and get 70% off the anticipated MSRP.

Q: Does the iBike 2 come in different sizes? 

A: The iBike 2 is designed to be one size fits all, because it is highly adjustable. The seat ride height and front handle can be adjusted based on your build. 

Q: Where is the battery 

A: it is nicely tugged under the seat so it is easily removalbe in less than 5 seconds!

Q: How much does the iBike 2 weigh?

A: It weight about 18 kg, which is about 39 lbs. 

Q: How long does the iBike 2 battery last?

A: The iBike 2's lithium battery provide reliable power for up to about 37 miles on power assist pedal mode.  The battery takes around 3-4 hours charge.  

Q: Can I still go on the iBike if the battery runs out of power?

A: That is a BIG Yes!  You can still ride it like a normal bike and it is a very smooth bike to ride.

Q: Can the battery be removed?

A: Yes. The battery is replaceable and can be removed in less than 5 seconds after you unlock it with your unique key.

Q: Can I test ride the iBike 2?

A: At this stage test rides are only available in Los Angeles. Please contact us by email for a test ride.

Q: Does it require assembly?

A: It will require minimal assembly, and we recommend customers with no experience in bikes take their iBikes to a local bike shop before use.

Q: How much does shipping cost for the iBike 2?

A: International shipping will cost $160 USD because each bike is shipped directly from the factory to you in order to minimize costs for you.  Now we are offering a limited number of bikes with a much discounted shipping of only $99, duty and taxes not included, within the US and Canada!

Q: What kind of warranty does the iBike have?  

A: All iBikes and batteries come with a 2 year manufacturer's warranty. But wearable items such as brakes and tires are not covered by the warranty.   Parts will be sent to customers for most repairs, and most local bike shops can repair it since the iBIke 2 is based on many standard bike parts.   It is basically very easy to maintain!

Coolpeds exhibiting at a large national technology trade show in Vegas, and customers loved our innovative and affordable products!

Other Ways You Can Help

We will greatly appreciate your sharing this awesome campaign with your friends and family to promote affordable and green mobility around the world!

Thank you so much for taking the time to consider this campaign!

Sincerely,

Tony and the Coolpeds USA team

http://coolpeds.us

By Buying this product, the buyer agrees that the manufacturer or reseller is not liable for incidental or consequential loss or damage due directly or indirectly to the use of this product.

Please comply with your local regulations when using this product.  Thank you and safe riding!
story_txt:
The Coolpeds foldable iBike 2
What is cool about the Coolpeds iBike 2?
From the successful maker of the world's first briefcase electric scooter and the iBike, the iBike 2 is a compact foldable electric bike that empowers you to journey effortlessly at speeds of up to 20 mph through the city. 
Top media reviews:

“The latest electric bikes are all kinds of cool and innovative, but one thing they're generally not is cheap, rarely dipping below US$1,000. Coolpeds believes that the world needs a cheaper e-bike, one that doesn't skimp on style or lightweight design.”

 
 
With its powerful 350 watt hub motor, built-in compact mud guards, heavy duty tires, powerful V-brakes, and vintage leather seat with suspension springs, the iBike can take you comfortably through any weather condition anywhere in the city!  And the sturdy luggage rack makes it super versitile.
The quick folding system enables you to carry it with anywhere: in a subway station or train, the trunk of your car, or even hide it under your desk at work.

The iBike 2 is built to last and has a very sturdy carbon steel frame.  Best of all, you can exercise by riding it as a regular bike, but when you feel the need for a boost, you can just turn on the powerful 350 W electric motor system by simply pressing a button at the grip for speeds up to 20 mph and range of up to 30 miles on one charge with pedal assist (range depends on weight, wind resistance, riding style, and flatness of road surface); there will be 2 ways you can enjoy the power: 
1. You can pedal comfortably via the smart electric assist system.  
2. You can just twist the accelerator in the handle grip and the iBike will take you anywhere without you sweating or pedaling. 


iBike 2 at the Santa Monica Beach and Pier - perfect for crusing to Malibu and Venice!

GET your iBike 2 NOW, this incredible 70% off price will not be offered EVER again!
 
Reliable Power for your rideThe high quality LG Lithium Ion battery is safely stored in the frame and kept safe with a keyed lock. What's more, you can remove the battery super easily by sliding it out of the frame without folding the frame!  Take it out and charge it, or plug the bike directly to a power outlet nearby.   Charge it for 2 hours with our super fast charge(a $39 USD option), and you are up and running again!

PERFORMANCE & COMFORT
Powerful  brushless maintenance-free hub motor for amazing performance
Genuine leather seat with suspension springs that give you cushion over bumpy roads
Adjustable seat, steering wheel and handlebar for perfect fit
Anti-slip  grip rubber handlebars with support
FREE awesome USB charging port!

 
TECHNICAL DETAILS



 

FRAME

20'' carbon steel frame 
Handles up to 220 lbs (100 kg)
shiny white only



 


 

TWIST THROTTLE

Go full electric with the comfortable twist style accelerator in the handle grip
LED light shows battery level






 

WHEEL SPECS

Tire Size: 20 x 1.5" 
All-terrain tires
High quality V- brakes front and back





 


 

PHONE HOLDER
Convenient phone holder included for FREE




 

POWER
Powerful 350W motor  





 

CONVENIENT STORAGE
Built-in sturdy luggage rack 





 

BATTERY
Easily removable lithium battery 



 
The Perks
 
 
Your contribution will change the world
Coolpeds USA's mission is to provide fun, reliable, and affordable green transportation to everyone around the world.  We came up with revolutionary award winning electric scooters before and we continue to work on innovative products for all of you!

Tony Chan, founder, serial tech entrepuerneur.  Graduated from UCLA and worked at Microsoft, Seattle, as a software engineer.  He left Microsoft many years to start his product design and manufacturing company and successfully supplied various cool products to Sears, Walgreens, Lowe's, and many other global companies.  In addition, the Coolpeds team has won many international awards for campaigns in improving the environment and society.
With his passion and experience in car racing and building, as well as his team of world class engineers and designers, lots of advanced technology is integrated in Coolpeds products. 
Tony also invented the highly acclaimed and CBS TV featured briefcase electric scooter.


Tony filming an entrepreneur documentary with Chris Evans (Captain America) 
 
Frequently Asked Questions
Q: How much weight can the iBike 2 handle? 
A: The iBike 2 is solid and can handle up to 220 lbs. 
Q: How confident are you in delivering the bikes on time?
A: We have been delivering products successfully for many years and we will contiue to do even better.  Sometimes there can be little delays due to customs clearnce during shipping, but we will do our best to update you and move the orders as quickly as possible. 
Q: What is the real usable range:
A: From our experience, some male users can get about 15-20 miles on pedal assist mode. Pure electric mode without pedaling may be up to about 10 miles. 
Q: Can I order the iBike 2 even though I live outside of the US? A: Yes, we deliver to almost anywhere in the world.  
Q:The price is very low for an electirc bicycle. Why?
A: Coolpeds USA's mission is to offer great products that are affordable for everyone. We utilize our many years of manufacturing resources and even owning our own plant to make an eBike that is not only affordable, but also made of reliable parts.  Now you can contribute to this revolution and get 70% off the anticipated MSRP.
Q: Does the iBike 2 come in different sizes? 
A: The iBike 2 is designed to be one size fits all, because it is highly adjustable. The seat ride height and front handle can be adjusted based on your build. 
Q: Where is the battery 
A: it is nicely tugged under the seat so it is easily removalbe in less than 5 seconds!
Q: How much does the iBike 2 weigh?
A: It weight about 18 kg, which is about 39 lbs. 
Q: How long does the iBike 2 battery last?
A: The iBike 2's lithium battery provide reliable power for up to about 37 miles on power assist pedal mode.  The battery takes around 3-4 hours charge.  
Q: Can I still go on the iBike if the battery runs out of power?
A: That is a BIG Yes!  You can still ride it like a normal bike and it is a very smooth bike to ride.
Q: Can the battery be removed?
A: Yes. The battery is replaceable and can be removed in less than 5 seconds after you unlock it with your unique key.
Q: Can I test ride the iBike 2?
A: At this stage test rides are only available in Los Angeles. Please contact us by email for a test ride.
Q: Does it require assembly?
A: It will require minimal assembly, and we recommend customers with no experience in bikes take their iBikes to a local bike shop before use.
Q: How much does shipping cost for the iBike 2?
A: International shipping will cost $160 USD because each bike is shipped directly from the factory to you in order to minimize costs for you.  Now we are offering a limited number of bikes with a much discounted shipping of only $99, duty and taxes not included, within the US and Canada!
Q: What kind of warranty does the iBike have?  
A: All iBikes and batteries come with a 2 year manufacturer's warranty. But wearable items such as brakes and tires are not covered by the warranty.   Parts will be sent to customers for most repairs, and most local bike shops can repair it since the iBIke 2 is based on many standard bike parts.   It is basically very easy to maintain!

Coolpeds exhibiting at a large national technology trade show in Vegas, and customers loved our innovative and affordable products!
Other Ways You Can Help
We will greatly appreciate your sharing this awesome campaign with your friends and family to promote affordable and green mobility around the world!
Thank you so much for taking the time to consider this campaign!
Sincerely,
Tony and the Coolpeds USA team
http://coolpeds.us

story:
Coolpeds USA's Briefcase electric scooter is the perfect last mile solution for a greener world

What is the Coolpeds Briefcase?

Coolpeds USA's Briefcase is a high-quality carry-on suitcase with a built-in electric scooter that you can ride at up to 20 km/hour to your destinations like the office, subway, trains, Starbucks, airport boarding gates, restaurants, scenic spots near your hotel, etc.  It is like a "mini Tesla" at your service all the time!

When you arrive, just fold it up and pull it along like a normal suitcase.  From the app, you can track its location.  With the USB charging port, you can juice up your phone and iPad, all while alleviating the pollution and congestion in the city!

After more than a century of little innovation in the luggage industry, we re-invented the suitcase to make life easier for the modern commuter and traveler. No more tiring walks to the train station, boarding gates, to remote parking lots, classrooms, etc.  With the Coolpeds Briefcase, you will travel more comfortably and be the coolest frequent traveler flying across the airport!

Save more than 50 trees every year by reducing CO2 by commuting on an electric scooter for 10 km everyday. 

A single young tree can only absorb about 11kg of CO2 per year.

Average emission of a car is 160 gram of CO2 per km.

10 km per day x 160 gram of CO2 x 365 days = 584 kg of CO2 reduced per year per 1 Coolpeds user


The Coolpeds Briefcase makes urban commute and travel fun

Commuting is tough for people living in big cities plagued by air pollution, traffic congestion and an energy crisis. Urban people usually commute within a radius of 2-5 km, a distance too far to walk and too difficult to drive and to find parking or taxis.  Bikes are great but are too big for many places such as offices, supermarkets, cafes, trains, subways, etc; so they get stolen easily.

By 2030, there will be about 5 billion people living in cities globally, and they all need compact and green forms of transportation.




In the news:






 Powerful motor inside the rear wheel

  USB charging port for your phone and gadgets  

Easily folds in seconds and lightweight

Race Car inspired adjustable steering linkages



Durable poly carbonate shell

                 Smart LCD display and trigger style speed controller


                    Padded compartment for your laptop and iPad

SPECIFICATIONS:

Colors: Green, Black, Red, and Baby Blue

Speed:  Up to 20 km/hr (about 12 miles per hour)

Range: Up to 10 km (about 6 miles)  per full charge

Weight:  About 7.9 Kg (this is the lightest e scooter in the world!) Fortunately Airlines rarely weigh your carry on

Loading capacity: Up to 90 Kg

Wheels:  Durable polyurethane wheels

Samsung Lithium Ion battery: 6 Ah and 24 Volt (similar to batteries in the Tesla)

Charge time: 2-3 hours

Charger: Super lightweight and compact charger, similar to your laptop charger

Cool extra feature: 

USB charging port for your gadgets

Reach goal:  Anti Loss GPS function added if funding reaches 100,000 USD


Please choose the $349 perk plus the $80 shipping perk.


                                                       

The green solution that gets you to your destinations faster!


Coolpeds has already  successfully sold over 1000 of its first generation smart electric scooters, the Coolpeds3,  to customers around the world.

Comments from Previous Coolpeds Customers:

Ricky L. from Toronto:

"The scooter is really awesome, it is sturdy and durable and all points to a high quality electric vehicle!! I was very impressed with the torque power on uphill inclines and the speed is surprisingly fast and amazing!! I am amazed by how powerful the battery is, it has lasted longer than I expected, giving me superb range and distance!! Keep up the good work and quality!! Loving everything so far!!"


We received a number of PATENTS granted for our designs already!

Coolpeds is a ultra-lightweight electric scooter brand that aims to provide green and innovative last mile solutions for commuters, students, and travelers.  Coolpeds' mission is to alleviate urban traffic congestion and pollution around the world.   

Weighing in at 6-9kg, the company’s flagship products are easy to ride and fold in seconds, making them convenient to take anywhere, whether on the subway, in offices, or on planes. 

                          



The mass production tooling and molds are about 85% complete for the Coolpeds Briefcase!  So we are almost ready for mass production.

The funding from this campaign will speed up the mass production and add the GPS tracking function with an APP for Android and iOS.  Your feedback will also be important for improving our products.
In addition, your support will help us market to a lot more customers around the world to start a revolution in green commuting and travel.  
We manufacture our own products!  
Unlike many projects and new startups who are still trying to navigate the manufacturing world and trying to find reliable OEM factories, we already have over 20 years of our own factory and mass production experience. 
Successful previous trade exhibitions and customers around the world:

 

Tony at Walmart's world headquarter with a buyer

Coolpeds won the Chivas Venture Championship!
In what ways can the Coolpeds Briefcase improve your lifestyle?

Local commute -pack your laptop and stuff, ride it to a  Starbucks or to a  bank or cafe; fold it up and pull it onto the subway or train.  No more waiting for taxi or getting stuck in traffic.


Travel - ride it in a new town and discover places without wearing your shoes off 

Use it along with your car - parked at a remote parking lot? now you can glide effortlessly to your office or convention centers.


School - get to class effortlessly and fast on big campuses, without wearing a heavy backpack.

Conventions - collect catalogs in it and ride around to check out all the cool stuff in huge fairs and trade shows, then ride it back to your car or public transports.



Or just pure fun anywhere!


Wait!  you can also ride to the boarding gate at a big airport & charge up your phone while you wait.  
 Check out this video of our briefcase scooter flying through the airport.





Tony Chan - founder of Coolpeds USA, graduated from UCLA, with over 15 years of manufacturing, international marketing, and automotive racing technology experiences; he previously worked at Accenture and Microsoft in Seattle as a software developer.  Tony received a number of patents in the USA and China for designs in various products and the innovative Coolpeds Briefcase Electric Scooter.  

Tony Li - mechanical and electrical guru, with over 25 years of experience in electric motor design, industrial automation design, metal fabrication, tooling and molding, and manufacturing.

Jeff Smith - graduated from the Rhode Island School of Design in industrial design and has over 15 years of professional experience in designing sports products.

Karina Y - finance and marketing guru, graduated from York University in Toronto

Chester Mui - graduated from Tufts University, with over 10 years of expertise in product launch and global marketing; previously worked at IBM and Groupon USA.  

FAQ


Can it charge my mobile or ipad?

Yes, absolutely.  The Coolpeds Go Briefcase has a USB charging port.

How long is the warranty?

1 year warranty on the motor, electronic controller, battery, and briefcase.

Can I replace the lithium battery set if needed?

Yes, you can buy replacement battery sets from us; it is about $ 99 USD.  The lifespan of the battery set  is about 500-600 charges.

Can it pass the security at airports?

We have passed all the security gates so far, because our battery capacity is under the limit of most airlines and airports. 

I can help with your project or become your dealer, how should I get in touch?

Please email info@coolpeds.com with your details and a description of how you may be able to help. We are very keen to hear from all those interested to help with the campaign. Please bear with us and will be in touch as soon as things calm down a little to discuss / arrange.


Remember to get the $89 USD perk for shipping also! 

Thank you so much for your support!

You can help us by going to The Venture's website and giving us your vote.

The Venture is a global campaign from Chivas  where they will fund social entrepreneurs from all over the world, and  will be able to access some of these funds simply by getting votes from cool people like you.

story:
Venco is a device designed to be fitted in a centred, high-mounted position at the rear of a vehicle. Venco analyses the data from the sensors -  gyroscope and the accelerometer and displays the current state of the vehicle - acceleration, braking to a halt, turn direction – through distinct signals and signs on one or several stackable LED matrices, thereby alerting other traffic participants and pedestrians.

The device is equipped with a free slot which allows plugging a wireless module to transmit data also to a LCD display or Google Glasses thus indicating the speed, the acceleration, compass, map and the traffic behind to the cyclist or to the driver.

 

Sharing information that may be relevant to other traffic participants can improve traffic flow and safety.

 

Venco is made of one or more stackable LED matrices , ATMEGA32U4 micro-controller board   which controls the LED screen, reads and transmits data from the sensors and from the ESP8266 module, a rechargeable battery, and a splitter which houses the wireless module and the multi-sensor MPU9150: gyroscope, accelerometer, magnetic field meter, temperature sensor.

 

The device has a SD card slot which keeps all sensor data collected during the trip for further analysis.

 

Venco has been developed using an innovative topology (Topology 1). It is a combination of familiar elements applied in a way which upgrades their established functions into an original product for enhanced information exchange.

Topology 1

Venco has the advantage to present data accurately and the benefit of automatic alert signal with no need of manual activation.

An additional accessory to the automatic back-light is a LCD display connected to a micro computer. It can be fitted on the wheel to visualize the sensor data of the automatic back-light and the traffic behind.

The source code and different pixel art are committed regularly to Github: https://github.com/temeroot/venco.

 

The smart bike computer and back-light production is ready. We ship now to our backers and receive new orders. Thanks for your support.

story:
THE GLOBAL PEACE MACHINE

Your electric bill is a major part of your budget, along with gasoline, food and other energy related necessities that our government and its special interest partners are denying us of this technology that has the potential to not only end dependence on foreign oil, but to lower energy prices to what they used to be 20 years ago. We can’t build our own cars but we can generate our own electricity. Join us and we can make this happen!

My name is Rod Nelson, a self-educated, retired 83 year old mining and construction business owner. Businesses can absorb these costs, by price adjustments but us home owners don’t have this luxury. Competition forces a business to lower costs wherever possible. When you don’t have a college education, challenges must be solved with common sense learned from experience.

As a child, like most children, when given a chore by mother. I often rebelled, with “I can’t”, which invariably earned a vociferous, “can’t never did nuthin”, from mother and the chores got done.

This engrained ethic is responsible for my business successes and the many patented inventions to resolve difficult challenges. Most of my inventions were labor saving tools and machines used in my businesses and never commercialized, but fuel costs for my heavy equipment and portable generators drove me to developing more efficient engines. Two patents were issued for engines that were 3 times more efficient and non-polluting. I received no support from the government, auto industry nor the elitist universities, so for the next 10 years I devoted my efforts to adapting these engines to power electric generators using CO2 as the working fluid.

Needless to say, no support, rather a collective “you can’t” response from the government and their industrial partners, who are spending billions of our tax dollars on energy projects that are historically inefficient, while denying the world of this obviously disruptive technology, that not only substantially reduces the demand for oil but ends the perceived CO2 global warming threat and the funding of mid-eastern sponsored terrorism. Government and their special interest partners have demonstrated their collective determination to keep us from enjoying the monetary benefits of these patented technological advances. They are saying "you can't" I am saying "WE CAN AND WILL", and you cannot stop us from making our own electricity.

ENERGY EFFICIENCY AND CLIMATE CHANGE!

For the last 13 years I have worked to bring a bench model to its present state, which functions as described in the patent applications, but not to a level for commercialization. Because to fast track this stage and take advantage of the many intellectual properties that will evolve from continued R&D, we are exploring alternative funding sources. Pegi and I have invested our life savings to get to this stage and despite the hardships and lack of government support we know you and the rest of the world need and deserve this God given economic break.

 

“Everybody talks about the weather but nobody does anything about it!”(Mark Twain)

This technology does something about climate change, global warming, smog and acid rain. Many global politicians are convinced that Carbon Dioxide (CO2) is changing the weather, but are doing nothing about it and apparently don’t want to. Our engine principals are covered in the first 2 issued patents. The efficiency alone reduces the CO2 emissions by more than 50%, which is significant and possible if the electric and Auto industry will recognize and adopt it. Market forces will make this happen but probably not for 10- 20 years. These two industries account for 80% of man-made CO2 emissions into the atmosphere.

The environment need not suffer this inexcusable time delay!

Our efforts are now concentrated on making available to all global electric users, even those that do not have access to fossil fuels. Our 3rd patent allows us to power standalone generators of any KW output using CO2 as the power source, the auto industry has demonstrated strong opposition, as will the utility industry, we can’t build our own cars, however the electric companies cannot stop anyone from making their own electricity, which is exactly what our commercial CO2 powered generators are designed to do. Unlike solar PV cells and wind turbine standby generators that provide limited storage capability (2-3 days @ minimum usage) and require continued obligation to the utility grid, our generators, using any heat source (solar, waste heat from any source) will provide whole house power 24/7 all year long, total freedom from the grid, with its unpredictable seasonal disruptions, and no more electric bills forever!!


Short Summary

Our planet is threatened by 2 paradoxical dilemmas: 1. Global warming caused by CO2. And 2. Global TERRORISM. Seemingly, unrelated, the reduced cost of energy, made possible by this technology, means lower prices of your food, gasoline and all of life’s necessities.  The global impact may not guarantee world peace but the effect of billions of dollars removed from terrorist hands will certainly restrict the actions emanating from the mid-east making the world a much safer place, WITH A MUCH CLEANER ATMOSPHERE.


Pegi here, Having worked closely with the public all of my life, I am very aware of the concerns of the average person, it is discussed everyday.

We feel that nothing is ever going to change but that is not true and change can come about not by politicians but by you and me. 

Now I am going to tell you how, about 13 years ago our group began work on a simple engine, it was found through R&D that this technology could be powered by Carbon Dioxide/CO2, you may or may not believe CO2 is the cause of global warming, we just know that it can be used in the most productive manner, proven by us.

So your next question is probably so what does this have to do with my life ?

Everything, from the cost of your electric, primarily, to the cost of your food, clothes, you name it and it is costing you, simply because every dollar you spend for electric is also being spent by the folks who manufacture and grow those necessities.

The Nelson CO2 engine used to generate electricity in your home or business frees you from an electric bill each month, the money spent on electric can be used to pay for the generator that will give you electric 24/365 for pennies a day, let the winds blow, throw rain, sleet, snow and hail at us and you are still in a home or business with electric. And you are not going to die in your bed from carbon monoxide poisoning  produced by todays standby generators, and you are not going to have to go out and refuel the thing every hour or so.

How can I get one is probably your next question ?

This is how, you know the old saying it takes a village, our village is all of you contributing to our crowd funding campaign, give as you can and help us get this on the market and out to you, we need your help, we and our small group have paid for everything so far and I have to tell you we have hit a financial brick wall.

Together we can do this, oh and I forgot to tell you this technology is as green as grass.


WHAT WE NEED

The government and their industrial partners have prevented you from enjoying the benefits this technology will give you.  $95,000 will make possible the final production design, special tooling and safety requirements, making possible the commercialization of an electric generator for your home or small business, freeing you from the monopolized electric companies and their monthly billing forever. Continued development of patentable products, learned from this work, will create a market force for greatly reduced food, gasoline and fuel prices for everyone, which will also reduce CO2 in the atmosphere. Pegi and I have invested our life savings to get to this stage and consider this technology a God given gift to humanity worth dying for. With your help it will be your gift to yourself, your loved ones and the rest of the world.


WHAT YOU GET

Your generator will be set up and running, with no out of pocket expense and half of your previous electric bill will pay for the generator, the other half is yours to do whatever you enjoy. When the generator is paid off (3 to 5 years) you no longer have an electric bill for the rest of your life and if you ever choose to sell your home the added value will add substantial appeal to a buyer and the appraisal value. Your contribution at this time will make possible mass commercialization and a gift that keeps giving to yourself, your loved ones and the rest of the world.
story_txt:
THE
GLOBAL PEACE MACHINE

Your electric
bill is a major part of your budget, along with gasoline, food and other energy
related necessities that our government and its special interest partners are
denying us of this technology that has the potential to not only end dependence
on foreign oil, but to lower energy prices to what they used to be 20 years
ago. We can’t build our own cars but we can generate our own electricity. Join us
and we can make this happen!
My name
is Rod Nelson, a self-educated, retired 83 year old mining and construction
business owner. Businesses can absorb these costs, by price adjustments but us home owners don’t
have this luxury. Competition forces a business to lower costs wherever
possible. When you don’t have a college education, challenges must be solved
with common sense learned from experience.

As a
child, like most children, when given a chore by mother. I often rebelled, with
“I can’t”, which invariably earned a vociferous, “can’t never did nuthin”,
from mother and the chores got done.
This
engrained ethic is responsible for my business successes and the many patented
inventions to resolve difficult challenges. Most of my inventions were labor
saving tools and machines used in my businesses and never commercialized, but
fuel costs for my heavy equipment and portable generators drove me to
developing more efficient engines. Two patents were issued for engines that
were 3 times more efficient and non-polluting. I received no support from the
government, auto industry nor the elitist universities, so for the next 10
years I devoted my efforts to adapting these engines to power electric
generators using CO2 as the working fluid. 

Needless
to say, no support, rather a collective “you can’t” response from the
government and their industrial partners, who are spending billions of our tax
dollars on energy projects that are historically inefficient, while denying the
world of this obviously disruptive technology, that not only substantially
reduces the demand for oil but ends the perceived CO2 global warming threat and
the funding of mid-eastern sponsored terrorism. Government and their special
interest partners have demonstrated their collective determination to keep us
from enjoying the monetary benefits of these patented technological advances.
They are saying "you can't" I am saying "WE CAN AND
WILL", and you cannot stop us from making our own electricity.
ENERGY
EFFICIENCY AND CLIMATE CHANGE!
For the last 13 years I have worked to bring a
bench model to its present state, which functions as described in the patent
applications, but not to a level for commercialization. Because to fast track
this stage and take advantage of the many intellectual properties that will
evolve from continued R&D, we are exploring alternative funding sources.
Pegi and I have invested our life savings to get to this stage and despite the
hardships and lack of government support we know you and the rest of the world
need and deserve this God given economic break.

does anything about it!”(Mark Twain)

suffer this inexcusable time delay!
Our efforts are now concentrated on making
available to all global electric users, even those that do not have access to
fossil fuels. Our 3rd patent allows us to power standalone
generators of any KW output using CO2 as the power source, the auto industry
has demonstrated strong opposition, as will the utility industry, we can’t build our own
cars, however the electric
companies cannot stop anyone from making their own electricity, which is
exactly what our commercial CO2 powered generators are designed to do. Unlike
solar PV cells and wind turbine standby generators that provide limited storage
capability (2-3 days @ minimum usage) and require continued obligation to the
utility grid, our generators, using any heat source (solar, waste heat from any
source) will provide whole house power
24/7 all year long, total freedom from the grid, with its unpredictable
seasonal disruptions, and no
more electric bills forever!!

story:
Introducing Maxfoot Foldable eBike

Commutes, Adventures, and Anything In-between.

Introducing MaxFoot eBike - your ultimate companion as you embark on your journeys. Skip the traffic jams, cut the crowded public transportation clusters, reject any limitations - just go places as you wish.


MaxFoot has zero tolerance for discomfort. Our design team wanted to make sure that we don’t compromise comfort for the speed and sleek aerodynamic design. After many thoughtful plannings, we came up with the final design that incorporates not just maximum comfort and style, but also the highest level of safety protection.     

Features

What People Are Saying About MaxFoot

See What ElecticBikeReview.com thinks about Maxfoot! 

 

Highlights

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
MaxFoot can conquer any road you want. Enjoy a smoother ride.
 
 

Sophisticated design, suitable for both modern commuting and wilderness adventures. The Maxfoot is made for any weather condition while getting you to your destination in style.

 

With the 1-Click foldable pedals, MAXFOOT takes space saving to the next level. It takes less than 10 seconds to fold MAXFOOT. Just fold then set aside!

 

 

Competitor Comparison

 

Color Options

Limited Edition Colors (Add-On Options)

We offer 4 special colors in our limited Metallic Collection: Violet, Sky, Ash, & Fire. You can choose to upgrade your electric bike to one of these colors at the Add-On sections near the end of our campaign page!

       

 

Designed To Fit Any Lifestyle

 

Tech Specs

 

Available Add-On Accessories

 

 

What's in the Box?

 

Meet The Team

Maxfoot was founded & designed by Charles & Gordon

Charles and Gordon started off as average bike riders. After the release of electric bikes all over the world, they decided to invest in what they believed to be the next generation of commuting. After riding electric bikes for a couple of years and switching between a couple of different brands, they wanted the whole world to enjoy what they were - the stunning adventures of riding with an e-bike.

In March 2019, they decided to create a company that can bring e-bikes to anyone without having to pay an arm and a leg for it. MaxFoot electric bicycle was born.

Both in their early 20s at the time, Charles and Gordon obtained bank loans, leased a small workspace in Southern California, and spent a majority of their loans in aluminum alloy frames and the best motors on the market. Working with top-gun engineers, they began constructing, designing the most advanced yet sleek e-bikes the world have yet to see.

They went through countless design drafts and spent hours communicating back-and-forth with manufacturers and engineers. They tested the prototypes around the streets of Riverside and rode hours to ensure all aspects were safe and perfect.

Their main mission when they set up MaxFoot was to spark passion in others about the exceptional yet inaccessible automotive technologies. Now, their mission has become their purpose of life which is to bring the best yet affordable e-bike to everyone in the world.

We're in Production! 

We wanted to share some behind the scenes of MaxFoot's set-up. Stay tuned for more! 
 

 

Timeline

 

They are talking about us too

Spread The Word!

Contact Us

Email: sales@maxfoot.bike

Phone: (818)305-6122, Mon-Fri 9:00am-5:00pm PDT

story:
My name is Renae Gismondi, myself along with my two daughters Becca and Brianna decided to make this campaign to raise money to purchase an Adaptive Bike for an amazing kid from National Park, his name is TJ Edmunds. TJ is a 13 year old boy who loves life and has many friends. Unfortunately he can not "hang" at his friends houses because they are not wheelchair accessible. With a bike, he will be able to join his friends and enjoy the freedom that every kid that age should have. He would love to be able to go on bike rides with his mom on his very own cool bike.

We are asking the community to come together to make this happen. The weather is getting nice and it would be great to have this bike for TJ to enjoy as soon as possible.

Everyone who meets TJ will tell you that he can light up a room with his smile and personality. This bike will allow him to grow towards independence and freedom from his wheelchair. 

Thanking you in advance for your generous donations to achieve this goal. Let's show this young man that there are people who support him and love him, just for being himself !!!
