story:
The AM1 is a lightweight motorised bike. It looks like a bike, handles like a bike, weighs the same as a bike but rides like you're freewheeling downhill with a tailwind. The best part, you can own one starting at $799.

Moving through cities is expensive, uncomfortable and time-consuming. Our aim is to relieve you from the shackles of public transport and endless queues of traffic, through our product the AM1. Electric bikes on the market today don't address these issues, but add further problems, like features you don't need, complexity and lots of extra weight.

 

That's why we created the AM1. It brings together the lightweight handling and simplicity of a single speed bike, with the effortlessness of an electric bike. It has a lightweight 20-mile battery that easily covers an average commute of 8.5 miles each way with plenty of range spare to meet your friends after work.

A lean battery meant we could create a compact motor that gets rid of gears altogether. We've merged the best of a classic single speed bike with the effortlessness of an electric one, into a sleek, minimal design.

You can own the AM1 starting from $799.

 

 

Did we mention that the AM1 is light? It's 13.5kg (30lbs)  including battery. The average bike weighs 25lbs while the average city share bikes (Santander Cycles, London / Citibike, NY) weighs 23kg's (50lbs)  

The AM1 is easy to take upstairs, throw in the back of a car or hang on the wall if that’s what you’re into. 

 

 

Inspired by the simple and ultra-reliable mechanics of single-speed bikes, the AM1 has a single-speed in it's DNA and electrons in its blood.

 

 

The motor gives you a boost when you really need it. The sensor in the pedals delivers smooth, controlled power relative to the speed of your pedalling. Pedal slower to slow down, faster to speed up. 

Smile as you pass lycra-clad roadies with the knowledge that the AM1 probably costs less than their carbon fibre rear wheel. 

 

 

How does it work? The pedal sensor detects when you're pedalling and assists you depending on how much effort you put in.

Want to go faster with less effort, turn the assist up. Want to get your heart rate up, turn the assist down.

With the assist off, the AM1 rides like a normal bike without the motor resistance often found on conventional electric bikes.

 

The goods news is that all mechanical parts are compatible with standardised bike components. Support your local bike store and fulfil your 'dog in basket' dreams. BYOD.

 

 

Pre-order the AM1 now from $799. This is an industry first price-point for an e-bike of this design, weight and capability.

 

 

The AM1 is our entry level e-bike designed to suit daily commutes. The progressive frame geometry is inspired by fixed gear track bikes. The 16.5" (420 mm) straight handlebars provide a responsive and agile feel. The deep-rimmed wheels create a clean aerodynamic aesthetic. Finished with silver hardware.

 

 

Want something a little more laid back? The AM1 STEP features an open frame design and cafe style handlebars. The silver deep rimmed wheels are complemented by ergo-grips and a super-plush sprung saddle. Embrace the pot-holes and enjoy a seriously comfortable ride.

 

 

The e-bike without compromise, the AM1+ features the same track inspired frame geometry and 420mm (16.5")straight handlebars as the AM1 but is 30% more powerful. The AM1+ features Tektro mechanical disc brakes to ensure it stops as well as it goes. The deep-rimmed wheels are available in silver or black with matching hardware. 

 

 

The ultimate utility e-bike, the AM1 STEP+ is 30% more powerful than an AM1 STEP and features Tektro mechanical disc brakes to ensure it stops as well as it goes. The AM1 STEP+ has the same open frame design and cafe style handlebars, brown ergo-grips and a sprung saddle as the AM1 STEP but the wheels are available in silver or black with matching hardware.

 

Summary

  • Ultra-lightweight design.
  • 20-mile (32km) range*
  • Compact, maintenance-free motor (road legal US/UK/EU/Japan) 
  • Ultra-reliable single gear drive train. 
  • Electronic braking system
  • Removable battery pack
  • 3-hour charger
  • High-quality Samsung batteries with multiple safety features and protection circuits.

*assumed 75kg rider weight, mid-level assist and moderate pedalling.

 

  • A part-assembled AM1 in the chosen size, colour and spec
  • Battery
  • Charger
  • User Guide & Instruction manual
  • Tool Kit

The AM1 arrives partly-assembled. This is one of the ways we kept the cost low. We offer written and video instructions to make sure assembly is super easy and takes less than an hour for a first timer, or even in as little as 20 mins.

We also supply everything you need to put it together - all hex/Allen keys, spanner and a screwdriver. However, if you have any doubts, we can ship the bike directly to your local bike store as part of our Build Local Program. They can arrange for assembly at an additional fee and you can then ride it away; assembled and fitted to you. When we send out the shipping survey we will ask if this is something you'd be interested in.

If you run a bike shop and want to be part of the Build Local Program, learn more about it here.

 

 

The AM1 had to be beautiful. We were inspired by the minimal approach of single speed and fixed gear bikes and were determined to make the e-bike equivalent.

The AM1 needed to be as simple to ride as a regular push bike. Our earlier prototypes featured complicated displays and frame integrated batteries but these presented more problems than solutions. 

The AM1's battery clicks in and out in seconds. Park the bike outside and charge the battery inside. And to ride it... switch it on and pedal. 

Durability is also key to the AM1; a bike should be robust. We tested each and every iteration for months on real roads to ensure the AM1 is as maintenance-free and as hardy as possible. 

The early prototypes frames where made of steel. But for a bike that's designed to be left outside, steel is cursed by a tendency to rust. 

Early AM1 steel frame rusting away

Aluminium is lighter and doesn't corrode so is as happy outside in the rain as it is in a nice dry bike shed. This is why the AM1 has an aluminium frame-set. With tough rims, a 2-stage paint finish and waterproof connectors we take pride in endorsing the day-to-day durability of the AM1.

 

We're two product designers and bike nerds who've spent the last 4 years working on this bike. The AM1 is a distillation of all the knowledge and learnings gained through a relentless effort to pare-back an electric bike to the bare essentials.

The testing and development of the AM1 brought its own test of challenges. Mainly, how can we guarantee that this bike will be reliable for different riders, load weights, road conditions and environmental conditions.

So we built a testing rig... 

 

The Chariots

When it comes to product testing, controlled lab tests only tell part of the story. With great (electrical) power comes great responsibility and the electronics needed to be absolutely reliable.

To test the bikes at triple their intended tow weight we built The Chariots, the spawn of a late-night brainstorm into how to measurably stress test the AM1 in real world conditions.

The idea was to capture the weight of the rider and passenger, then conduct a series of tests to learn how each electrical component behaves under increasing loads. To no ones surprise, they were SERIOUSLY FUN to ride. To date, we've successfully completed tests with a leisure cyclist effortlessly towing over 250 kg’s (2 passengers + 1 rider) proving the power of the AM1. See for yourself.

 

The Battery

We completed an extensive program of battery development to find the perfect voltage, power and size of battery. We hand-soldered prototype batteries ourselves, rode tens of thousands of miles on them, and continually revised the size and placement until we we achieved the right power to weight ratio in a durable, portable and safe form factor.

Safety is paramount for lithium batteries. We made it one of our first ground rules that our batteries had to be of the highest quality and completely safe without compromise.

 

 

Disclaimers

Assembly: Due to the nature of shipping bikes internationally some assembly will be required. We provide clear video and written instructions, as well as the tools required with every bike. If you don't feel confident with basic assembly we have a process in place where can, for a small fee, ship the bike to your local bike store where it will be assembled for you and collected in person. Please add on 'Local Assembly' to your pledge to activate this option.

Battery life: On medium assist with a 165lbs (75kg) rider the battery life ranges from 25-50km. Actual battery life will vary based on a numbers of factors including rider weight, effort contributed by rider, wind, elevation and external temperature.

Production: All AM1 models in this campaign are production samples made using the manufacturers and supply chain we have in place. There may be some changes, modifications or improvements made to the scaled manufactured version which will be shipping to all backers.

Local Taxes for non-EU: While we do our best to comply with local tax laws you may be subject to import taxes or duties.

 

Risks and challenges

All the bikes shown in our film and campaign, unless labeled as a prototype are a production-ready factory sample. We have a 4 year relationship with our main manufacturer. The samples they have sent us have over 50,000 miles of testing, by us and our beta testers. We did not want to end up as another crowdfunding project that promises the world and delivers nothing years after the campaign ends. So we invested a lot of time and money early on in the process to ensure that when our campaign ends, we know how we're going to scale our manufacturer to fulfil your pledges.

That said, we are building hardware with components that are created in multiple facilities around the world. Sometimes components become discontinued or a particular part faces a supply chain issue. While this is certainly not our first rodeo, there are numerous logistical, political and natural events which we can't control, but we can handle them with minimal drama while maintaining clear communication with our backers.

Global shipping can also present some logistical and tax challenges but we have lined up a number of different partners to assist with navigating this.

Our aim is to relieve you from the shackles of public transport and endless queues of traffic, through our product the AM1. Electric bikes on the market today don't address these issues, but add further problems, like features you don't need, complexity and lots of extra weight. 
 That's why we created the AM1. It brings together the lightweight handling and simplicity of a single speed bike, with the effortlessness of an electric bike. It has a lightweight 20-mile battery that easily covers an average commute of 8.5 miles each way with plenty of range spare to meet your friends after work.A lean battery meant we could create a compact motor that gets rid of gears altogether. We've merged the best of a classic single speed bike with the effortlessness of an electric one, into a sleek, minimal design.You can own the AM1 starting from $799. 

  Did we mention that the AM1 is light? It's 13.5kg (30lbs)  including battery. The average bike weighs 25lbs while the average city share bikes (Santander Cycles, London / Citibike, NY) weighs 23kg's (50lbs)  The AM1 is easy to take upstairs, throw in the back of a car or hang on the wall if that’s what you’re into.   Inspired by the simple and ultra-reliable mechanics of single-speed bikes, the AM1 has a single-speed in it's DNA and electrons in its blood.  The motor gives you a boost when you really need it. The sensor in the pedals delivers smooth, controlled power relative to the speed of your pedalling. Pedal slower to slow down, faster to speed up. Smile as you pass lycra-clad roadies with the knowledge that the AM1 probably costs less than their carbon fibre rear wheel.   How does it work? The pedal sensor detects when you're pedalling and assists you depending on how much effort you put in.Want to go faster with less effort, turn the assist up. Want to get your heart rate up, turn the assist down.With the assist off, the AM1 rides like a normal bike without the motor resistance often found on conventional electric bikes.  The goods news is that all mechanical parts are compatible with standardised bike components. Support your local bike store and fulfil your 'dog in basket' dreams. BYOD.  Pre-order the AM1 now from $799. This is an industry first price-point for an e-bike of this design, weight and capability. 
  The AM1 is our entry level e-bike designed to suit daily commutes. The progressive frame geometry is inspired by fixed gear track bikes. The 16.5" (420 mm) straight handlebars provide a responsive and agile feel. The deep-rimmed wheels create a clean aerodynamic aesthetic. Finished with silver hardware.  Want something a little more laid back? The AM1 STEP features an open frame design and cafe style handlebars. The silver deep rimmed wheels are complemented by ergo-grips and a super-plush sprung saddle. Embrace the pot-holes and enjoy a seriously comfortable ride.  The e-bike without compromise, the AM1+ features the same track inspired frame geometry and 420mm (16.5")straight handlebars as the AM1 but is 30% more powerful. The AM1+ features Tektro mechanical disc brakes to ensure it stops as well as it goes. The deep-rimmed wheels are available in silver or black with matching hardware.   The ultimate utility e-bike, the AM1 STEP+ is 30% more powerful than an AM1 STEP and features Tektro mechanical disc brakes to ensure it stops as well as it goes. The AM1 STEP+ has the same open frame design and cafe style handlebars, brown ergo-grips and a sprung saddle as the AM1 STEP but the wheels are available in silver or black with matching hardware. Summary
Ultra-lightweight design.
20-mile (32km) range*
Compact, maintenance-free motor (road legal US/UK/EU/Japan) 
Ultra-reliable single gear drive train. 
Electronic braking system
Removable battery pack
3-hour charger
High-quality Samsung batteries with multiple safety features and protection circuits.
*assumed 75kg rider weight, mid-level assist and moderate pedalling.  
A part-assembled AM1 in the chosen size, colour and spec
Battery
Charger
User Guide & Instruction manual
Tool Kit
The AM1 arrives partly-assembled. This is one of the ways we kept the cost low. We offer written and video instructions to make sure assembly is super easy and takes less than an hour for a first timer, or even in as little as 20 mins.We also supply everything you need to put it together - all hex/Allen keys, spanner and a screwdriver. However, if you have any doubts, we can ship the bike directly to your local bike store as part of our Build Local Program. They can arrange for assembly at an additional fee and you can then ride it away; assembled and fitted to you. When we send out the shipping survey we will ask if this is something you'd be interested in.If you run a bike shop and want to be part of the Build Local Program, learn more about it here.  
Boast your build with a "Built by" sticker. Included with every bike.
 
  The AM1 had to be beautiful. We were inspired by the minimal approach of single speed and fixed gear bikes and were determined to make the e-bike equivalent. The AM1 has the minimum number of components.
 The AM1 needed to be as simple to ride as a regular push bike. Our earlier prototypes featured complicated displays and frame integrated batteries but these presented more problems than solutions. The AM1's battery clicks in and out in seconds. Park the bike outside and charge the battery inside. And to ride it... switch it on and pedal. The battery removes in seconds and charges just like a phone. Fully charged in 3 hours
 Turning up the assist to increase the power is a simple button press.
 Durability is also key to the AM1; a bike should be robust. We tested each and every iteration for months on real roads to ensure the AM1 is as maintenance-free and as hardy as possible. The early prototypes frames where made of steel. But for a bike that's designed to be left outside, steel is cursed by a tendency to rust.  Early AM1 steel frame rusting away Aluminium is lighter and doesn't corrode so is as happy outside in the rain as it is in a nice dry bike shed. This is why the AM1 has an aluminium frame-set. With tough rims, a 2-stage paint finish and waterproof connectors we take pride in endorsing the day-to-day durability of the AM1.  Sweat the small stuff. A studio time-lapse captures Nav and Jack poring over a frame detail.
  We're two product designers and bike nerds who've spent the last 4 years working on this bike. The AM1 is a distillation of all the knowledge and learnings gained through a relentless effort to pare-back an electric bike to the bare essentials.The testing and development of the AM1 brought its own test of challenges. Mainly, how can we guarantee that this bike will be reliable for different riders, load weights, road conditions and environmental conditions.So we built a testing rig...  The Chariots
Two AM1s pulling an additional person on the roads.
 
When it comes to product testing, controlled lab tests only tell part of the story. With great (electrical) power comes great responsibility and the electronics needed to be absolutely reliable.
To test the bikes at triple their intended tow weight we built The Chariots, the spawn of a late-night brainstorm into how to measurably stress test the AM1 in real world conditions.
The idea was to capture the weight of the rider and passenger, then conduct a series of tests to learn how each electrical component behaves under increasing loads. To no ones surprise, they were SERIOUSLY FUN to ride. To date, we've successfully completed tests with a leisure cyclist effortlessly towing over 250 kg’s (2 passengers + 1 rider) proving the power of the AM1. See for yourself.

 
The Battery
We completed an extensive program of battery development to find the perfect voltage, power and size of battery. We hand-soldered prototype batteries ourselves, rode tens of thousands of miles on them, and continually revised the size and placement until we we achieved the right power to weight ratio in a durable, portable and safe form factor.
The development of the AM1 battery, from early-stage prototype (left) to final form (right)
Safety is paramount for lithium batteries. We made it one of our first ground rules that our batteries had to be of the highest quality and completely safe without compromise.
 
Testing the battery management system.
 
The AM1 battery is barely bigger than a coke can.
 
All our batteries are waterproof (IP56 rated)
 
Motor and battery remain cool after a hard ride.
 
 
 

 
Disclaimers
Assembly: Due to the nature of shipping bikes internationally some assembly will be required. We provide clear video and written instructions, as well as the tools required with every bike. If you don't feel confident with basic assembly we have a process in place where can, for a small fee, ship the bike to your local bike store where it will be assembled for you and collected in person. Please add on 'Local Assembly' to your pledge to activate this option.

Battery life: On medium assist with a 165lbs (75kg) rider the battery life ranges from 25-50km. Actual battery life will vary based on a numbers of factors including rider weight, effort contributed by rider, wind, elevation and external temperature.
Production: All AM1 models in this campaign are production samples made using the manufacturers and supply chain we have in place. There may be some changes, modifications or improvements made to the scaled manufactured version which will be shipping to all backers.
Local Taxes for non-EU: While we do our best to comply with local tax laws you may be subject to import taxes or duties.
 
Risks and challenges
All the bikes shown in our film and campaign, unless labeled as a prototype are a production-ready factory sample. We have a 4 year relationship with our main manufacturer. The samples they have sent us have over 50,000 miles of testing, by us and our beta testers. We did not want to end up as another crowdfunding project that promises the world and delivers nothing years after the campaign ends. So we invested a lot of time and money early on in the process to ensure that when our campaign ends, we know how we're going to scale our manufacturer to fulfil your pledges.
That said, we are building hardware with components that are created in multiple facilities around the world. Sometimes components become discontinued or a particular part faces a supply chain issue. While this is certainly not our first rodeo, there are numerous logistical, political and natural events which we can't control, but we can handle them with minimal drama while maintaining clear communication with our backers.
Global shipping can also present some logistical and tax challenges but we have lined up a number of different partners to assist with navigating this.

story:
SITGO -The World's Best Folding Electric Bike, specially designed for you, environmentally friendly, cool, compact, safe and unique: The world's first electric Bike can be charged with car cigarette lighter.

It has cool appearance, simple, lightweight and easy to store with 3 simple folding steps,it's the best partner when you traveling around.You can store it under your desk, take it on the subway or bus, put it in the trunk of your car or pack it in a suitcase —Sitgo is so compact it can fit almost anywhere.

Sitgo not just an ordinary electric bike, it has USB charging port, which can be used to charge your cell phone, MP3 and other digital equipment at anytime, anywhere, it also has a 360-degree rotating cell phone holder, you can riding while listen to the music or check on your navigation, with an unique 12V cigarette lighter charging function, it will keep your SITGO never run out of power, it’s your best travel companion.

Adhered the sporty design of awesome streamlines from German designer RICHARD SAPPER, referring to dynamics and science of riding wind resistance, the design of SITGO is fit for proportion of human height perfectly, with less effort and energy efficient, assembling the bike is also undergoing a rigorous testing and riding experience.

The next generation electric folding bike is here

Electric Folding bikes haven't fundamentally changed in over 10 years. They have normal wheels and less than ideal geometry. They ride poorly, are heavy and awkward to use, but worst of all, they don't actually fold that small.

We set out to change all of that

Two years ago we started working on a vision of the perfect electric folding bike — a bike that is lightweight, durable, rides and feels like a regular bike, is safe and easy to use and folds incredibly small.Now Sitgo takes a radical departure from conventional bike design. It is unlike any other electric bicycle in the world.

Use latest Japanese super mute brushless motor technology and energy-efficient power lithium battery, motor and battery, just like a car engine. Material selection directly affects the usage life and effectiveness, SITGO adhere to the quality-first principles and concepts, only make best electric bike, employed the feature of lightweight motor, low power consumption, super mute, and high-power, and the battery has the characteristics of environmentally safety, super power, and long life.

Korean unique design of 360degree rotary phone holder, 53mm-80mm retractable, suitable for most cell phones, so can listen to music, check on your navigation while you riding, make your trip fun.

Two Taiwan produced high brightness and wide range of high-energy, long life LED focusing lens lights are used as headlights and aluminum push ruby LED taillights (three lighting modes) as your travel escort at night.

We will give out an newly developed car charger to each INDIEGOGO BACKER, Let your SITGO never out of power, and keep you away from the power outlet trouble.

SITGO Parameters:  

Battery: 36V 8.8AH power lithium battery  

Motor: 250W brushless hub motor  

Speed: 0-25KM/H

Suitable Height: 155-195cm  

Age: not less than 16 years old  

Range: 30-35km  

Tire size: front wheel 18 inches, rear wheel 8 inches  

Handle features: LED battery indicator, horn, headlight control, speed control, power switch  

Pedals: Folding skid pedals  

Headlight: Dual5W lens focusing bright LED lights  

Taillight: Aluminum push ruby LED taillights (three lighting modes)  

USB charging port: 5V, 2A USB charging port  

Material: ABS, high-strength steel, stainless steel  

Cushion: comfortable high elastic cushion  

Climbing angle: less than 15 degrees  

Brake system: Power-off brakes + V break hub  

Maximum load: 120KG  

Charging time: 4-5 hours  

Charger: 110-220V Household Charger + 12V car cigarette lighter charger  

Battery Life: 3-5Years(Not Less 1000 Cycles)

Unfold Size:102CM(height)x98CM(Length)x80CM(Seat Height)

Folding Size: 75CM(height)x64CM(width)x24CM(Thickness)  

G.W/N.W: 22/19KGS

Development process:

SITGO have gone through 2 years of development with hundreds of drawing modification, and no less than five generations of prototypes before we were satisfied in offering you this product. We broke through the manufacturing process to create these beautiful electric folding bicycles. We partnered with German designer and Hongkong craftsman of 10 years experience in order to find the most suitable materials to complete a stylish, high quality e-bike.

SITGO TECHNOLOGY CO., Ltd. integrated research and development, production, sales and service in one; it’s an operator for intelligent short-haul travel equipment. The company was founded in 2014 and located in Hong Kong.

Our mission is to use artisan spirit of perfectionism, creating intelligent short-haul travel equipment with first-class user experience, to improve the quality of life. Nowadays, we travelling on a narrow street surrounded by tons of cars, while promoting environmental protection, to make travelling more compact, easier to carry around, energy saving and environmental protection is our goal.

Our motto is “Travelling as your heart goes”; this is also the commitment that we offered to our users from our product and design. In the industry that lack of innovation and capability for travel equipment, our team is particularly specializes in innovative design of appearance and streamline structure improvements. A solid professional knowledge base + excellent innovation capability = SITGO.

SITGO STORY:  

We are a small team with a big dream. Sitgo Team provide and keep design high quality and elegant electric bikes. We are going to production  more fantastic products in the next 3 years,we'll need your help to make all these come true.  

Already over 10,000 followers on board, keep asking us about whether they can get the Sitgo overseas. Even lots of celebrities are a fan of Sitgo! We want to introduce Sitgo to all of you lovely bikers through INDIEGOGO.With the support of our beloved backers, we wish to provide people across the world with the world's most elegant, stylish electric folding bike!

Lastly, we would like to thank you for taking the time to view the Sitgo. We hope that you will back and share this project!

180USD= Thipping to Australia, Canada,Asia Countries, EU Countries, NZ and USA. Shipping Cost is: $160USD for each SITGO.Please add shipping cost to Your Perks.

280USD= The countries outside Australia, Canada,Asia Countries, EU Countries, NZ and USA,the Shipping Cost is:$260USD for each SITGO.Please add shipping cost to Your Perks.

Please note additional duties/taxes maybe apply depending on your destination country.

The SITGO doesn’t fit into the traditional e-bicycle category because you cannot pedal it. It’s more of an electric transport vehicle or electric scooter akin to a Segway, only more bicycle-shaped.

For US,Canada,the US State laws vary. Some state laws approve the use of electric scooters in bike lanes of general road traffic and some do not. To the best of our knowledge  e-scooters are street legal in California, Connecticut, Kentucky, Missouri, Nevada, Texas, Virginia and Washington, with many other states expected to follow suit. 

For EU Countries,SITGO Will Apply and Get CE(Conformite Europeenne) Certificate Before Delivery,With this certificate,SITGO street legal Free in most EU countries.

All countries have their own rules on light electric vehicles or electric scooter so it’s best to consult with your local transportation authority.

Is it legal to ride SITGO? Please See Our Street Legal Explain Above FAQ.

What is the range? This depends on many factors such as riding style. rider weight, terrain and conditions. As a general guide our 8.8A model is capable of a range of 30-35km. 

Does SITGO come with a warranty? We are offering a one (1) year warranty on electric parts(Motor,Battery,Handle,Light and Etc) for "non normal wear". This means any defective parts we will replace within the 1st year. Except electric parts,SITGO other parts(wheel,tyre,seat,absorber and etc) you can easy find them in local bikeshop or hardware market.
Can it go uphill? For sure! Because of the power that SITGO has it can go up a 15 degree incline which should be adequate for most roads. 
What is the load capacity? Maximum recommended load capacity is 120kg.
Can I buy from any dealers? We do not have any dealers at present though we are looking to take on local dealers as soon as we can. If you are a dealership that would like to stock our products we would love to hear from you.
Can I change the battery myself? Yes, it is a not difficult process of unscrewing the side ABS plate on the front wheel and unplugging. We will provide instructions on how to do this with your SITGO by video later. 
How can you keep the price of SITGO so low? SITGO Design and manufacture by ourself own factory,we have more than 10years in electric bike and electric scooter production and experience.And SITGO future MSRP(retail) price will be:1099USD+Shipping.Now we want thank you for your Support and promotion our SITGO on Indiegogo,You can get 50%more discount for super early bird price(499USD+Shipping Only 10pcs limited).
Do you sell spare parts? Yes, We plan on offering replacement parts through a network of local dealers as well as offering direct sales from ourselves. 
What is the minimum and maximum rider height? There are no absolute minimums or maximums, the handlebars can be adjust by different height from 155m to 195cm.
Is SITGO fully assembled when delivered? Absolutely. Simply unpack and it's ready to go. When your SITGO arrives the battery will be about 50% charged.
Is SITGO waterproof? The SITGO is water proof though not to be submerged under water. With that being said, we do recommend to avoid riding in the rain for safety reasons. Always wipe out water afterwards and keep it dry to preserve the scooters life. 
If the battery runs out How i can do? On Sitgo handle bar,there's battery indication.You can know the left electricity always.Even the battery runs out,you still can easy push SITGO.
Can I use the battery charger in my country, what is the voltage? Yes! Our chargers work with voltages from 100V to 240V. 

Our passionate team are prepared to go all out to make SITGO.The SITGO prototypes have already been tried and tested. And SITGO mold already finish and first mass-production sample already in tested.

Our team are experienced in industrial design, working with manufacturers to get it right and delivering great product all over the world.

We promise our backers that we will do everything possible to deliver on spec and on time. We will always keep you in the know with progress updates and never leave you hanging.Delivery of rewards/perks is subject to best efforts and not guaranteed.

Please note additional duties/taxes may apply depending on your destination country.

SITGO Mold Photos:

SITGO Workshop Photos:

SITGO First Mass-Production Sample Photos:

story:
At Xtreme Fat Tire Bikes,
We keep reinventing the wheel!

This past summer we delivered a couple of our electric bikes to Yankee’s Head Coach Joe Girardi that were custom painted in Yankee Pinstripes exclusively for him. While the bikes certainly turned heads on the streets of New York, we couldn’t help but notice the time it took for us to ride the electric bikes from our hotel to Yankee stadium in the Bronx, (about 10 minutes), as we zipped along in the bike lane, past traffic jams and pedestrians alike. 

The commute coming back to the hotel was another story. It took over an hour by taxi cab as we waited in the traffic jams we encountered, enduring honking horns, road rage, not to mention the exorbitant taxi fare and tip! OUCH.

So we got to thinking …

“Why wouldn't more people commute using our Electric Bike?”

The only thing we could come up with is where to safely store the bike when it’s not being ridden so we thought …Why not apply our patent pending front wheel / all wheel electric bike technology to a lighter weight, folding bike that a commuter could compactly fold in half and bring right into his office or apartment.

We think we have really hit it out of the ball park with this one!

Our electric bikes are already unique to all other e-bikes on the market in so many game-changing ways.

1. Premium Kenda Tires to travel in any terrain from paved streets to soft sand, to trail to mud to snow, making this a go anywhere, any season, mode of transportation.

2. Our patent pending front wheel / all-wheel drive, (adding pedal power), that SAFELY takes you upstairs over curbs and obstacles that might otherwise send you flying over the handlebars with a rear wheel electric system. Without power and torque of a front wheel system riding in any soft terrain like snow, sand and mud can allow for the front wheel of a bike to dig in and stop making it extremely dangerous.

3. Top of the line rust-resistant components for extended durability and life of the bike.

4. Ability to travel 30 plus miles on a single battery charge.

5. Top quality certified and safety inspected sealed lithium ion batteries that easily remove from the bike for charging and safe-keeping.

6. Both USB port and a 110 Volt Fanned Battery Charger to prevent overheating.

Now add our electric bike system to the compact light-weight folding bicycle and you have:

1. A lighter faster electric bike with the ability to compactly fold and store in your home, college dorm, apartment, office, on boats or RVs, your car trunk … just about anywhere!

Just unfold it and you are ready to go!

2. The E-Buffalo is the absolute best green energy commuter bike on the market today … designed for commuting not only on the busy streets of New York City, but any city and in any season, snow or wet icy pavement without having to worry about traffic jams, and parking fees!

Don’t live in a big city? Our fat tire, all terrain electric bike can handle a commute on country roads and trails as well.

3. It’s a “no sweat” commute. Arrive “office-ready”; with no need to change from biking attire to office wear.

4. The ability to bring your bike on a bus, subway, train, or high speed rail, tremendously extending the commuting distance.

5. Year-round, street legal transportation ... No driver’s license necessary.

6. An awesome bike for RV owners and Boat Owners, who need a way to easily get around town at a RV park or Marina. (We even sell tire covers to protect your boat, RV, home or office form scuff marks and tire debris.)

Island hopping?

This is the ideal bike to take you through the gravelly terrain of remote islands.

7. But most importantly, our electric bike is safer than rear wheel drive, and more fun!

Not only will you enjoy your commute, you will want to ride it everywhere and on any terrain … From sandy beaches, to mountain trails! We also have a camouflage painted sports version, designed specifically for hunting and gaming.

Of course, we think are folding electric bike is nothing short of Spectacular!

But you don’t have to take our word on it. We hired an independent professional engineer to analyze our bike design and his report supports the superiority in front wheel drive along with our rim design and fat tire.

Download the independent report.

Now Available in Three Distinct Styles and Color Combinations:

Choose from:

  • Our popular Matte Black Bike with Neon Yellow Rims or Matte Black Rims
  • Our Camouflage Bike with Camouflage Rims, 
  • Or Our White Bike with White Rims!

Need to Finance Your Contribution?
Click here to learn how to Finance Your Folding Electric Bike

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Why Front Wheel Drive?

Here's Why: By taking our ultimate Fat Bike and adding our Front Wheel Drive Electric System we feel we have designed and patented a ONE OF A KIND E-Bike. Most Electric Bikes are either rear wheel drive mid - drive, rear system. This puts all the torque on the rear and as anyone who has ever driven through soft terrain like sand, snow, mud or over obstacles like curbs, stairs or logs, would know front wheel drive torque performs better. Ask anyone in the auto industry and they will give you the same answer.

With the motor in the front, you can go through any terrain. Also, with others rear torque systems, at top speed, in soft terrain, when you attempt to turn you easily could dig the wheel in and cause a dangerous situation. With our E-Bike, you just power through those turns. And by adding a little pedal power you have an ALL-WHEEL DRIVE E-BIKE that will cycle through any terrain and over almost anything!

Why Ride a Fat Tire E-Bike?

If you are a commuter looking to protect the environment or just a person looking to save money on gas then this e bike is for you. You can easily get around town, avoid traffic jams and enjoy the outdoors on our Electric Bikes.

Other great uses for our fat E-Bikes are for hunters, or a rider looking to go places they have only been able to get to on foot before, or someone that’s just up for some xtreme riding.

Xtreme’s Fat E-Bikes will get you there!

What makes Xtreme’s Electric Bike so much better than the rest?

Our Safety Features:

Our Braking System:

We only use Disc Rotors and Calipers and we use a 180mm rotor on both the Front and Rear for maximum stopping power.

Our eBike Motor:

Our motor only works with your thumb on the throttle; it shuts off automatically when you release it.

Our Tires:

Our Fat Tires are the widest width available which provides stability and superior stopping power.

Most other Fat Tire E-Bikes utilize either Center or Rear Wheel Drive Systems. This not only is a Safety Factor in Loose or Soft Terrain but, it also prohibits their ability to move through loose terrain or over obstacles.

The Rear Wheel Drive System is proven to turn poorly in Soft Terrain and can be hard to maneuver which can be dangerous at high speeds in soft terrain such as snow, grass or sand.

The Center Wheel Drive Systems can become unstable on uneven terrains and negotiating obstacles and have far more difficulty in climbing obstacles compared to the ALL-Wheel Drive System.

Our Front Wheel Drive System with Pedal Power creates the first ever ALL-WHEEL Drive for SUPERIOR SAFETY and BEST for getting through most any terrain, and over obstacles!

Electric Bike Battery:


Our batteries are made by Greenway, one of the top Battery Manufacturers in Asia. It uses a separate Water Bottle Mount that is not part of the battery like most other companies use and can be easily removed without having to take off any wires from the battery. This battery has a sealed shell that is completely Water Proof with its own built in voltage meter to tell if it needs a charge or not. Plus it has a neat carrying handle attached to it for Easy Removal to carry for security or take with you to charge. The 48 Volt system and uses only the best Lithium Ion Technology with Sony Cells. These cells are insulated and manufactured for maximum safety.

Front Hub Electric Bike Motor:

Choose From:

- 1000 Watt with 48 Volts E-Bike System 

- 1250 Watt 48 Volt E-Bike System 

This allows you to have a Fat E-Bike that can take you literally anywhere!

Rear Wheel System:

Rear Wheel is a Quick Release Hub with a Shimano 11-36T Cassette and an 8-Speed Shimano Altus or Alivio Rear Derailleur.

Now add these two great features together and here’s what you get:

The only Fat Bike which is All-Wheel Drive on the Market. This Bike’s Drive System will literally take you anywhere, over most any object, even upstairs and over logs with ease.

In Addition:

Top Quality Sealed Bearings Components: Our E-Bikes are not only made for any Terrain but, also any environment with its sealed Bearing Head Set, Bottom Bracket, and Hubs making it completely weather resistant. All Alloy Components:

We use all alloy parts and frame for additional weather resistance.

Front Hub Motors and Electric Systems:

1000 Watt System: We a Front Hub Motor but with 48 V Battery and a 22 AMP Sealed Control Unit. (48V X 22 AMPS= 1052 Watts)**

1250 Watt System: We use the same Front Hub Motor but with 48 V Battery and a 26 AMP Sealed, Waterproof Control Unit. 48V X 26 AMPS= 1248 Watts

**Wattage is Calculated Volts X AMPS= Watts.

All of our motors are Brushless as are our parts, our cord plugs are water resistant.

Control Digital Display and Throttle:

Handle bar mounted, Control Digital Display and Throttle

Our Bike has three Levels which are controlled by the Control Digital Display:

Low: For just cruising

Medium: For riding through and over most any obstacle or terrain.

High: For full torque and speed

Warranty and After Market Support:

Xtreme Fat Bikes uses the best Cycling and E-Components made. We Warranty the Frame and Fork System for Two Years and all of our E-Components are plug and play. So, even after our One Warranty we can Replace any part separately and never have to replace the whole unit. Our Hub Motors slide out of their Shell and can be replaced as well, without ever having to Re-Lace a new Hub.

Components:

Front System Components:

Rear Wheel System:

 

E-Control Unit Components:

Throttle:

Digital Display:

Xtreme Hunting and Fishing Gear Rack:

Can mount to Front Fork.

Specifications:

Steel Fishing and Hunting Rack with Optional Camouflage coating Three Rubber straps for fishing rods of any size, two for bow and one for arrow, or three to hold rifles. All bolts and nuts are Stainless Steel.

Xtreme Hunting and Fishing Gear Rack:

Mounts to Front of E-Buffalo
.

Specifications:

Steel Fishing and Hunting Rack with Optional Camouflage coating Three Rubber straps for fishing rods of any size, two for bow and one for arrow, or three to hold rifles. All bolts and nuts are Stainless Steel.

Xtreme 's Optional Standard Bike Rack Specifications:

Standard aluminum gear bike rack with a 31.8 mm seat post clamp mount. Stainless steel bolts for attachment with alloy brackets to allow for easy mount on our bikes or most any bike with a 190mm rear drop out. Choose from matte black or camouflage.

Will hold up to 150 lbs of weight. Easy to attach for Fishing and Hunting Gear Racks

Optional Wheel Covers and Fenders:

E-Bike Specifications:

Frame: Alloy Al6061, with front emblem (Alloy).

Fork: Steel 1 1/8” Threadless.

Headset: 1 1/8 Threadless, Sealed Bearings, Alloy Shell.

Handlebars: Alloy 31.8mm center clamp, 650 mm length with 35mm rise (textured black).

Adjustable Stem: 1 1/8” Alloy with 31.8 mm clamp, 200mm length.

Brakes/Levers: BB5 disc brakes with Front/Rear 180mm Rotors.

Rims and Wheel Sets:

Rim: 100 mm Alloy Rims with Cut Outs, ultra-light single wall alloy, welded seam, 36H.

Front Hubs: Motor Hub with Alloy sealed Shell, 1000 or 1250 Watt System,

Rear Hub: Alloy Hub with Sealed Bearings and 8-Speed Cassette, Quick Release.

Tire: 24" by 4” width; Premium Kendra tires with high density rubber for puncture resistance with center bead.

Tubes: 24" x 4" Schrader valve.

Components:

Crank Set: Alloy 38T chain ring, Alloy crank with 175mm arm.

Chain: KMC Rust Buster.

BB Set: Steel shell, sealed bearings, 100mm shell width.

Shifter: Shimano 8-Speed Alivio or Altus

Rear Derailleur: Alivio or Altus 8-Speed

Seatpost: Alloy 27.2 mm, 350 mm length (black)

Seatpost Clamp: Alloy with Quick Release.

Weight and Packing:

Packing: 100% completely assembled.

Front Wheel Hub Motor: 1000 Watt 48V or 1250 Watt 48V Brushless Hub with Alloy Sealed Shell.

Throttle: Handle Bar Mounted Thumb Throttle

Control Pad: Control Pad with three power levels and digital speed and power display.

Control Unit: Sealed Waterproof Control Unit.

Speed:

48V gets 30 MPH plus additional torque power at full speed steady 30 Miles+ Distance.

FAQs - Frequently Asked Questions:

Why Doesn’t Our Bike Have Shocks?

Installing shocks on a Fat Tire Bike offers no significant value. The Fat Tires behave like shocks due to the large volume of air they contain and will cushion your ride over rough terrain and obstacles.

Why is Xtreme E-Bike the Only “REAL” Fat Tire E-Bike?

Fat Tire Electric Bikes with Rear Wheel Motors are really not true Fat Tire E-Bikes they are really just Electric Bikes with Fat Tires and are limited to cycling on streets and hard terrain.

Here’s why:

The Rear Wheel Drive E-Bike’s front wheel will dig in and bog down in loose terrain, making it dangerous to ride. In addition, the E-Bike not drive over loose terrain and obstacles. Everyone in the auto industry will tell you Front Wheel Drive is preferred in snow and dirt and that All Wheel Drive is the most effective method for riding to places you cannot get to with Rear Wheel Drive. Our Xtreme E-Bike will allow you to cycle in any and all terrain. You will not get this with a Rear Wheel Fat Tire E-Bike. Instead all you get is an E-Bike with the look of a Fat Tire Bike!

Our Electric Bike is Front Wheel / All Wheel Drive. What Exactly Does This Mean?

The Front Wheel Drive makes our Bike the only All-Terrain Electric Bike currently in production. The Xtreme E-Bike can take you anywhere. You can ride on sand, snow, mud, upstairs and over obstacles. No other E-Bike in today’s market will allow you to do anything except ride on streets and other hard surfaces. If you are someone who enjoys riding on the beach, in the snow, on trails as well as the street, than this is the best E-Bike for you.

What Makes Our Company Better and Able to Guarantee You Will Receive a Bike?

We have already produced and sold close to 100 “Real” Fat Tire E-Bikes. Our Xtreme E-Bikes are not only being used for personal use but for commercial use as rental units at beach and ski resorts. What better way to tour the country side of a resort town than on a Fat Tire All Terrain E-Bike?

We have recently sold several E-Bikes to a company that conducts cavern tours at the Louisville Mega Cavern, a 100 acre set of caves system in Louisville, Kentucky. In addition, we have received only positive feedback from everyone who has tested and ridden our E-Bikes. They all agree that Front Wheel Drive combined with peddling power allows them much more freedom to ride to places that they could not go with a Rear Wheel Drive E-Bike.

How do you get maximum Speed from your E-Bike?

Check and make sure that none of your brake pads are rubbing the tires. Also, be sure that your tires are inflated to 28 lbs.

How do I get a correct reading from my Speedometer?

Speedometers measure speed based on the diameter of tires. Most are not calibrated to proper settings. Make sure it is set at 29.5 tire diameter to ensure proper readings.

How Far can you Travel on a Charged Battery?

Our Electric Bikes can go around 30 Miles on hard surface at top speed without any peddling. The distance will vary if you are on soft terrain or going up hills as that takes more power.

If you add peddling to your journey you can substantially increase the distance you can travel on a fully charged battery.

How Long Does it Take to Fully Charge the Battery?

A completely depleted battery takes approximately three hours to charge.

How Long Will the Battery Last?

The battery is rated to last 500 cycles. A cycle = depleting a battery then fully charging it 500 times. So how long the battery last depends on how much usage. Most batteries last a lot longer than 500 Cycles more like 1000-1500 Charges because, typically a battery is never completed depleted prior to charging.

What is Our Warranty with Our Electric Bikes?

We offer a one year manufacturer’s warranty on all parts except the battery which is warrantied for six months.

How Can You Contact Us Once You Purchase Your E-Bike and After the Campaign has Ended?

Visit our website at www.XtremeFatTireBikes.com where you can email us or Call us at: (757) 635-5160.

Risks and challenges

Xtreme Fat Tire Bikes Has finalized the E-Bike designs and has tooled all the parts needed to assemble the bikes, including Tires and Ultra-Light Rims. We already have a fully stocked warehouse of Electric Bikes and have more arriving the end of February.

We have over 200 units out to customers throughout the United States and the feedback from consumers has been extremely positive.

These Electric Bikes have been fully tested for safety and we have US Based experts along with experts in China and Taiwan and have complete confidence that these products will continue to exceed the expectations of our customers.

A cycle = depleting a battery then fully charging it 500 times. So how long the battery last depends on how much usage. Most batteries last a lot longer than 500 Cycles more like 1000-1500 Charges because, typically a battery is never completed depleted prior to charging.What is Our Warranty with Our Electric Bikes?We offer a one year manufacturer’s warranty on all parts except the battery which is warrantied for six months.How Can You Contact Us Once You Purchase Your E-Bike and After the Campaign has Ended?Visit our website at www.XtremeFatTireBikes.com where you can email us or Call us at: (757) 635-5160.Risks and challengesXtreme Fat Tire Bikes Has finalized the E-Bike designs and has tooled all the parts needed to assemble the bikes, including Tires and Ultra-Light Rims. We already have a fully stocked warehouse of Electric Bikes and have more arriving the end of February.We have over 200 units out to customers throughout the United States and the feedback from consumers has been extremely positive.These Electric Bikes have been fully tested for safety and we have US Based experts along with experts in China and Taiwan and have complete confidence that these products will continue to exceed the expectations of our customers.
